original: 24. Sabbānussatipuññañca pasaṃsā saraṇattayaṃ ratanattayaguṇapasaṃsā ca ete diṭṭhijukammamhi saṅgayhanti, tasmiṃ saṅgahapāpuṇe saṃsayo sandeho natthi.

analyzed: vegena catūsu pi vikappesu dasseyya

original: 26. Dasapuññakriyādīnaṃ vasena ca bahūnipi bhavanti etāni pana cittāni dasapuññakiriyādīnaṃ vasenapi bahūnipi bhavanti iti evaṃ pakāsaye bhagavā pakāseyya.

original: mayā samudāhaṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: mayā samudāhaṭam kathitam

original: Yathā panassa yathā pana assa vipākassa kusalaṃ dānādivasena dānādīnaṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ
analyzed: yathā panassa yathā pana assa vipākassa kusalam dāna ādi vasena dāna ādīnam dasa puñña kiriya vatthūnam

original: vasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati, idaṃ vipākacittaṃ tathā na pavattati. Hi saccaṃ
analyzed: vasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati idam vipāka cittam tathā na pavattati hi saccam

original: idaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesu kāmāvacaradhammantogadhesu
analyzed: idam vipākam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti tad ārammaṇa vasena paritta dhamma pariyāpannesu kāmāvacara dhamma ntogadhesu

original: chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi kusalasampayuttadhammato
analyzed: chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati sampayutta dhammānam ca visese asati pi kusala sampayutta dhammato

original: assa vipākassa, sampayuttadhammānañca nānatte asatipi idaṃ vipākaṃ ādāsatalādīsu
analyzed: assa vipākassa sampayutta dhammānaṃ ca nānatte asati pi idam vipākam ādāsa tala ādīsu

original: dhammajātesu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ. Ayamassādhippāyo – yathā ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ
analyzed: dhamma jātesu mukha nimittam viya nirussāham ayam assa adhippāyaḥ yathā ādāsa tale mukha nimittam

original: mukhe calite calati, acalite na calati, mukhassa kāraṇaṃ vinā mukhanimittassa viya
analyzed: mukhe calite calati acalite na calati mukhassa kāraṇam vinā mukha nimittassa

original: kāraṇaṃ natthi, evaṃ kusalakāraṇā vipākassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi, nirussāhaṃ vipākaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇam natthi evam kusala kāraṇā vipākassa aññam kāraṇam natthi nirussāham vipākaṃ

original: 32. Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ manussānaṃ ime aṭṭha mahāvipākā duhetukatihetukānaṃ kāmāvacaradevānaṃ, manussānañca paṭisandhiyo bhavanti.
analyzed: kāmāvacara devānam manussānam ime aṭṭha mahā vipākāḥ du hetuka ti hetukānam kāmāvacara devānam manussānam ca paṭisandhiyaḥ bhavanti

original: 33-4. Tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā balavārammaṇe atimahantavibhūtārammaṇe
analyzed: tato param pavattiyam yāvatāyukam bhavaṅgam hutvā balava ārammaṇe ati mahanta vibhūta ārammaṇe

original: tadārammaṇañca hutvā tato paraṃ maraṇakālasmiṃ cuti hutvā pavattanti, evaṃ iminā
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam ca hutvā tatas param maraṇa kālasmim cuti hutvā pavattanti evam iminā

original: mayā vuttappakārena catūsu ṭhānesu vipaccanti vipākabhāvena jāyanti.
analyzed: mayā vutta ppakārena catūsu ṭhānesu vipaccanti vipāka bhāvena jāyanti

original: 35. Sabhūmikusaleheva mahāpākā samā vinā mahāpākā kammadvāraṃ kammakāraṇaṃ vinā,
analyzed: mahā pākā samā vinā mahā pākā kamma dvāram kamma kāraṇam vinā

original: kammañca mahāpuññānaṃ kiriyavatthukaṃ vinā vajjetvā sabhūmikusaleheva attano bhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: kammam ca mahā puññānam kiriya vatthukam vinā vajjetvā sa bhūmi kusalehi iva attanaḥ bhūmiyam

original: pavattehi kusalehi eva samā sadisā. Kammadvāraṃ nāma kāyaviññattikammadvāraṃ, vacīviññattikammadvāraṃ,
analyzed: pavattehi kusalehi eva samā sadisā kamma dvāram nāma kāya viññatti kamma dvāram vacī viññatti kamma dvāram

original: bhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ manodvāraṃ, iti tividhaṃ kammadvāraṃ kammakāraṇaṃ. Kammaṃ nāma
analyzed: bhavaṅga saṅkhātam manaḥ dvāram iti tividham kamma dvāram kamma kāraṇam kammam nāma

original: aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalacetanā idha adhippetā.
analyzed: aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusala cetanā idha adhippetā

original: 36. Pākā kusalavipākā aviññattijanattā ca viññatti ca viññatti ca viññattiviññattiyoti
analyzed: pākā kusala vipākā a viññatti janattā ca viññatti ca viññatti ca viññatti viññattiyaḥ ti

original: vattabbe sarūpekasesaṃ katvā “viññattī”ti vuttaṃ, tā janentīti viññattijanā, na viññattijanā
analyzed: vattabbe sarūpa ikasesam katvā viññatti iti vuttam tāḥ janenti iti viññatti janāḥ na viññatti janāḥ

original: aviññattijanā, tesaṃ bhāvo aviññattijanattaṃ. Tasmā aviññattijanattā kāyaviññattivacīviññattisaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: tesam bhāvaḥ a viññatti janattam tasmai a viññatti janattā kāya viññatti vacī viññatti saṅkhātānam

original: kammadvārānaṃ ajanakattā manodvārasaṅkhātassa kammadvārassa vasena ca appavattanato
analyzed: kamma dvārānaṃ ajanaka ttā manodvāra saṅkhātassa kamma dvārassa vasena ca appavattanato

original: avipākasabhāvato ca akammabhāvato ca appavattanato ceva puññakiriyavatthuvasena appavattanato
analyzed: avipāka sabhāvato ca akamma bhāvato ca appavattanato ca iva puñña kiriya vatthu vasena appavattanato

original: ceva puññehi no samā asadisā.
analyzed: ca iva puññehi no samā asadisā

original: 37-9. Parittārammaṇattā hi tesamekantato tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ekantato parittārammaṇattā
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇa ttā hi tesam ekantataḥ tesam vipākānam ekantataḥ paritta ārammaṇa ttā

original: kāmāvacarārammaṇattā tesu vipākesu sattapaññattikārammaṇā karuṇāmuditā kadāci kismiñci
analyzed: kāmāvacara ārammaṇa ttā tesu vipākesu satta paññattika ārammaṇā karuṇā muditā kadāci kismiñci

original: kāle na jāyanti, tathā evaṃ tisso pana viratiyo etesu vipākesu na jāyanti, hi kasmā
analyzed: kāle na jāyanti tathā evam tissaḥ pana viratiyaḥ etesu vipākesu na jāyanti hi kasmā

original: kāraṇā na jāyanti, pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāti kusalā nāmāti satthunā vuttā yasmā kāraṇā,
analyzed: kāraṇāḥ na jāyanti pañca sikkhāpadā kusalā ati kusalā nāma ati satthunā vuttā yasmā kāraṇā

original: tasmā na jāyanti. Tathādhipatinopettha tathā evameva cattāro adhipatinopi etesu vipākesu
analyzed: tasmā na jāyanti tathā adhipatinā upa itthā tathā evam eva cattāraḥ adhipatinā upi etesu vipākesu

original: na santi. Kasmā? Chandādīni dhammajātāni puretaraṃ katvā anuppajjanato na santi,
analyzed: na santi kasmā chanda ādīni dhamma jātāni puretaram katvā anuppajjanataḥ na santi

original: iti vacanaṃ viniddise ācariyo katheyya.
analyzed: iti vacanam viniddise ācariyo katheyya

original: 40. Asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ pana puññato vipākesu asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ
analyzed: asaṅkhāra sasaṅkhāra vidhānam pana puññatas vipākesu asaṅkhāra sasaṅkhāra vidhānam

original: puññato kusalato āgamanavasena ñeyyaṃ. Tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena mukhe calite
analyzed: puññataḥ kusalataḥ āgamana vasena ñeyyam tattha ekaccānam ācariyānam matena mukhe calite

original: ādāsatale mukhanimittacalanaṃ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro hoti,
analyzed: ādāsa tale mukha nimitta calanam viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipākaḥ asaṅkhāraḥ hoti

original: sasaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko sasaṅkhāro hoti, evaṃ āgamanavasena ñeyyaṃ. Paccayato
analyzed: sa saṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko sa saṅkhāraḥ hoti evam āgamana vasena ñeyyam paccayato

original: ceva ñeyyaṃ tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi
analyzed: ca iva ñeyyam tattha ekaccānam ācariyānam matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kamma ādīhi

original: uppanno asaṅkhāro dubbalehi sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ paccayavasena viññeyyaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
analyzed: uppannaḥ asaṅkhāraḥ dubbalehi sa saṅkhāraḥ ti evam paccaya vasena viññeyyam jānitabbam

original: 41-2. Hīnādīnaṃ puññānaṃ vipākattā hīnādayo vipākā puññavādinā jinena paridīpitā
analyzed: hīna ādīnam puññānam vipāka ttā hīna ādayaḥ puñña vādinā jinena paridīpitā

original: bhavanti, iti evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena pavattaṃ idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ ekantena
analyzed: bhavanti iti evam iminā vutta ppakārena pavattam idam aṭṭhavidham cittam ekantena

original: savatthukaṃ kāmalokasmiṃ jāyate, aññattha pana aññāsu bhūmīsu na jāyate.
analyzed: sa vatthukam kāma lokasmim jāyate aññattha pana aññāsu bhūmīsu na jāyate

original: Viññāṇapañcakaṃ niyatārammaṇanti cakkhuviññāṇassa rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ, na saddādayo.
analyzed: viññāṇa pañcakam niyata ārammaṇanti cakkhu viññāṇassa rūpam eva ārammaṇam na sadda ādayo

original: Sesattayaṃ yadā cakkhuviññāṇena gahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tadāssa rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: sesa ttayam yadā cakkhu viññāṇena gahitam ārammaṇam karoti tadā assa rūpam ārammaṇam

original: hoti. Yadā sotaviññāṇena gahitaṃ, tadāssa saddo ārammaṇo hoti. Yadā ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi
analyzed: hoti yadā sota viññāṇena gahitam tadā assa saddaḥ ārammaṇaḥ hoti yadā ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇehi

original: gahitāni ārammaṇāni karonti, tadāssa gandharasaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇāni honti. Manoviññāṇadhātudvayaṃ
analyzed: gahitāni ārammaṇāni karonti tadā assa gandha rasa phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇāni honti manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dvayam

original: yadā tadārammaṇaṃ hoti, tadā chaārammaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: yadā tad ārammaṇam hoti tadā cha ārammaṇam hoti evam aniyata ārammaṇam hoti

original: Rūpārammaṇāya kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamo padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ etassāti apagamapadaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: rūpa ārammaṇāya kiriyā manaḥ dhātuyāḥ apagamaḥ padaṭṭhānam āsanna kāraṇam etassa ati apagama padaṭṭhānam

original: tāya āvajjanaṃ katvā ṭhitāya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccaṃ karīyatīti attho. Tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tāya āvajjanam katvā ṭhitāya cakkhu viññāṇena dassana kiccam karīyati iti atthaḥ tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: sampaṭicchanabhāvena gayhākāraṃ. Santīraṇādirasā somanassayuttā manoviññāṇadhātusantīraṇatadārammaṇarasā,
analyzed: sampaṭicchana bhāvena gayhākāram santīraṇa ādi rasā somanassa yuttā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu santīraṇa tad ārammaṇa rasā

original: upekkhāyuttā pana santīraṇatadārammaṇapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutirasā, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā
analyzed: upekkhā yuttā pana tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: santīraṇādibhāvena gayhākāraṃ.
analyzed: santi īraṇa ādi bhāvena gayhākāram

original: 43. Kāmāvacarapuññassa kāmāvacarakusalassa soḷasa vipākā honti. Iti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
analyzed: kāmāvacara puññassa kāmāvacara kusalassa soḷasa vipākāḥ honti iti yam vacanam vuttam

original: taṃ vacanaṃ tihetukapuññassa ukkaṭṭhassa vasena ācariyo paridīpaye. Ayamettha attho
analyzed: tam vacanam ti hetuka puññassa ukkaṭṭhassa vasena ācariyaḥ paridīpaye ayam ettha atthaḥ

original: – chandādhipateyyādīnaṃ vasena ukkaṭṭhatihetukakusalaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: chanda ādhipateyya ādīnam vasena ukkaṭṭha ti hetuka kusalam kāma sugatiyam ti hetuka paṭisandhim

original: datvā pavatte aṭṭha ahetukakusalavipākāni, aṭṭha mahākusalavipākānīti soḷasa pākāni nipphādeti.
analyzed: da tvā pavatte aṭṭha ahetuka kusala vipākāni aṭṭha mahā kusala vipākāni iti soḷasa pākāni nipphādeti

original: 44. Kusalānugataṃ katvā bhājitaṃ kiṃ mahaggataṃ vipākacittaṃ kusalānugataṃ kusalaṃ
analyzed: kusala anugatam katvā bhājitam kim mahaggatam vipāka cittam kusala anugatam kusalam

original: anugataṃ katvā mahaggatakusalacittena samānaṃ katvā bhagavatā bhājitaṃ desitaṃ. Kiṃ
analyzed: anugatam katvā mahaggata kusala cittena samānam katvā bhagavatā bhājitam desitam kim

original: kena kāraṇena? Kāmāvacarapuññaṃva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ iva asamānaphalaṃ natthi yato
analyzed: kena kāraṇena kāmāvacara puññam iva kāmāvacara kusalam iva asamāna phalam na atthi yatas

original: yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā vipākaṃ kusalānugataṃ katvā bhagavatā bhājitaṃ desitaṃ. Kāmāvacarapuññaṃvāti
analyzed: yasmai kāraṇā tasmai vipākam kusala anugatam katvā bhagavatā bhājitam desitam kāmāvacara puññaṃvā ati

original: yathā aṭṭhavidhesu kāmāvacarakusalesu ukkaṭṭhatihetukakusalaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: yathā aṭṭhavidhesu kāmāvacara kusalesu ukkaṭṭha ti hetuka kusalam kāma sugatiyam ti hetuka paṭisandhim

original: datvā pavatte soḷasa kusalavipākāni nipphādeti, tihetukaomakañca duhetukaukkaṭṭhañca
analyzed: da tvā pavatte soḷasa kusala vipākāni nipphādeti ti hetuka omakam ca du hetuka aukkaṭṭham ca

original: kāmasugatiyaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukavirahitāni ahetukaduhetukasaṅkhātāni
analyzed: du hetuka paṭisandhim da tvā pavatte ti hetuka virahitāni ahetuka du hetuka saṅkhātāni

original: vipākāni nipphādeti, duhetukaomakaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte
analyzed: vipākāni nipphādeti du hetuka omakam pana kāma sugatiyam ahetuka paṭisandhim da tvā pavatte

original: aṭṭha ahetukavipākāni nipphādeti, evaṃ kāmāvacarapuññaṃ asamānaphalaṃva hoti.
analyzed: aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni evam kāmāvacara puññam asamāna phalam va hoti

original: 45. Gajādīnaṃ chāyā gajādisadisā hoti yathā, evaṃ mahaggatavipākaṃ sabbathā sabbapakārena attano kusaleheva samānaṃ hoti.
analyzed: gaja ādīnam chāyā gaja ādi sadisā hoti yathā evam mahaggata vipākam sabbathā sabba pakārena attano kusalehi iva samānam hoti

original: 46-7. Kāmāvacarapuññaṃva nāparāpariyavedanaṃ idaṃ mahaggatakusalaṃ kāmāvacarapuññaṃva
analyzed: kāmāvacara puññam va na apara apariya vedanam idam mahaggata kusalam kāmāvacara puññam va

original: aparāpariyavedanaṃ aparasmiṃ bhave phaladāyakaṃ na hoti, jhānā aparihīnassa bhavagāmino
analyzed: apara apariya vedanam aparasmim bhave phala dāyakam na hoti jhānā a parihīnassa bhava gāminaḥ

original: paṭisandhigāmino sattassa kusalānantaraṃyeva phalaṃ uppajjati, iti ca ñāpanatthaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi gāmino sattassa kusala anantaram yeva phalam uppajjati iti ca ñāpana ttham

original: etassa mahaggatavipākassa kusalānugataṃ kusalānugamanaṃ bhagavatā kataṃ.
analyzed: etassa mahaggata vipākassa kusala anugatam kusala anugamanam bhagavatā katam

original: 48. Ettha etasmiṃ mahaggatavipāke paṭipadākkamo tesañca hīnādīnaṃ bhedato jhānāgamanato mahaggatakusalajhānassa āgamanavasena vibhāvinā paṇḍitena veditabbo.
analyzed: ettha etasmin mahaggata vipāke paṭipadā kkamaḥ tesam ca hīna ādīnam bhedataḥ jhāna āgamanataḥ mahaggata kusala jhānassa āgamana vasena vibhāvinā paṇḍitena veditabbo

original: 49. Ettha vipāke chandādiadhipatīnaṃ abhāvo, ayameva visesato kusalato ayaṃ eva viseso, sesaṃ sabbapakāraṃ avisesena kusalena samaṃ mataṃ kathitaṃ bhagavatā.
analyzed: ettha vipāke chanda ādi adhipatīnam abhāvaḥ ayam eva visesataḥ kusalataḥ ayam eva viseso sesam sabba pakāram avisesena kusalena samam matam kathitam bhagavatā

original: 50. Suññataṃ animittanti, tathāpaṇihitantipi suññataṃ anattā, animittaṃ aniccaṃ,
analyzed: suññatam animittanti suññatam anattā animittam aniccam

original: appaṇihitaṃ dukkhaṃ iti etāni tīṇi nāmāni maggassa anantare catubbidhassa maggassa
analyzed: appaṇihitam dukkham iti etāni tīṇi nāmāni maggassa anantare catubbidhassa maggassa

original: anantare catubbidhe phale honti.
analyzed: anantare catubbidhe phale honti

original: 51. Labbhanti parabhāgasmiṃ maggānantare pavattaphalato aññasmiṃ kāle vaḷañjanaphalesu
analyzed: labbhanti parabhāgasmim magga anantare pavatta phalato aññasmin kāle vaḷañjana phalesu

original: phalasamāpattisamāpajjanakālesu etāni tīṇi nāmāni na labbhante, phalehi vipassanāvaseneva
analyzed: phala samāpatti samāpajjana kālesu etāni tīṇi nāmāni na labbhante phalehi vipassanā vasena iva

original: anattaaniccadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vipassanānaṃ vasena eva tāni tīṇi nāmāni labbhare phalehi labbhante.
analyzed: anatta anicca dukkha saṅkhātānam tiṇṇam vipassanānam vasena eva tāni tīṇi nāmāni labbhare phalehi labbhante

original: 52. Honti sādhipatīneva lokuttaraphalāni tu ekantato sādhipatīni eva honti, lokuttaraphalāni ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ vipāke adhipatī natthi.
analyzed: honti sa adhipatīna iva lokuttara phalāni tu ekantataḥ sa adhipatīni eva honti lokuttara phalāni ṭhapetvā aññasmin vipāke adhipatī natthi

original: 53. Maggo attano maggabhāvena maggo nāma vuccate bhagavatā. Phalaṃ maggaṃ upādāya aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ nissayaṃ katvā maggo nāma iti vacanaṃ vuccate bhagavatā.
analyzed: maggaḥ attanaḥ magga bhāvena maggaḥ nāma vuccate bhagavatā phalam maggam upādāya aṭṭhaṅgika maggam nissayam katvā maggaḥ nāma iti vacanam vuccate bhagavatā

original: 54. Ime satta akusalavipākā. Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, tassadisattā gocaro ārammaṇanti
analyzed: ime satta akusala vipākāḥ gāvaḥ caranti ettha ati gocaro tad sadisa ttā gocaraḥ ārammaṇanti

original: attho, aniṭṭho ca aniṭṭhamajjhatto ca aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattā, teyeva gocaro aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattagocaro,
analyzed: atthaḥ aniṭṭho ca aniṭṭha majjhatto ca aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhattā te yeva gocaraḥ aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhatta gocaraḥ

original: tasmiṃ aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattagocare vattare vattanti. Sukhādittayayuttā te te aṭṭha

original: iminā mayā vuttappakārena phassassa paṭhamaṃ samudīritataṃ viññunā vibhāvinā viññeyyaṃ,
