original: visesato visesena aññathā na viññeyyaṃ. Na ca pariyesitabboyaṃ, tasmā pubbāparakkamo
analyzed: visesataḥ visesena aññathā na viññeyyam na ca pariyesitabbaḥ oyam tasmā pubba aparakkamaḥ

original: yasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ pubbāparakkamo viññunā na ca pariyesitabbo na gavesitabbo, dhammā
analyzed: yasmā kāraṇā ayam pubbāparakkamaḥ viññunā na ca pariyesitabbaḥ na gavesitabbaḥ dhammā

original: eva vacanatthalakkhaṇādīhi vijānatā paṇḍitena pariyesitabbā.
analyzed: eva vacana attha lakkhaṇa ādīhi vijānatā paṇḍitena pariyesitabbā

original: Iṭṭhākārānubhavanarasā iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanakiccā subhojanarasaṃ anubhavanto rājā viya. Cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānā cetasikapassaddhipadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: iṭṭha ākāra anubhavana rasāḥ iṭṭha ārammaṇa anubhavana kiccā su bhojana rasam anubhavantaḥ rājā viya cetasika assāda paccupaṭṭhānā cetasika passaddhi padaṭṭhānā

original: Paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasā paṭijānanakiccā vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇakaraṇamiva vaḍḍhakino
analyzed: pacca abhiññāṇa karaṇa rasā paṭijānana kiccā vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇa karaṇam iva vaḍḍhakino

original: sakiṃ sañjānitvāpi dāruharesu suttassa paṭipasāraṇaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Yathāgahitanimittavasenāti
analyzed: sakim sañjānitvā api dāruharesu suttassa paṭipasāraṇam viya ati adhippāyaḥ yathā gahita nimitta vasena ati

original: yathāpavattitanimittassa vasena. Manasi abhinivesakaraṇaṃ gayhākārā.
analyzed: yathā pavattita nimittassa vasena manasi abhinivesa karaṇam gayhākārā

original: Āyūhanarasā pavattanakiccasādhakā. Mahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viya yathā mahāvaḍḍhakī sayampi
analyzed: āyūhana rasāḥ pavattana kicca sādhakāḥ mahāvaḍḍhaki ādayaḥ yathā mahāvaḍḍhakī sayam pi

original: dāruṃ tacchati, parepi dāruṃ tacchāpeti, evaṃ sayampi ārammaṇe sandahati, sampayuttadhammepi abhisandahāpeti.
analyzed: dārum tacchati pare api dārum tacchāpeti evam sayam pi ārammaṇe sandahati sampayutta dhamme api abhisandahāpeti

original: Āhananaṃ bhuso hananaṃ, pariyāhananaṃ samantā hananaṃ, taṃ raso etassāti āhananapariyāhananaraso.
analyzed: āhananam bhusaḥ hananam pariyāhananam samantā hananam tam rasaḥ etassa ati āhanana pariyāhanana rasaḥ

original: Ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo ārammaṇaparimaddanalakkhaṇo.
analyzed: ārammaṇa anumajjana lakkhaṇaḥ ārammaṇa parimaddana lakkhaṇaḥ

original: Pinayatīti pīti, sahajātadhamme ārammaṇe pinayatīti attho. Kāyacittapharaṇarasā. Udaggassa cittassa bhāvo odagyaṃ, taṃ paccupaṭṭhānaṃ etassāti odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: pinayati iti pi iti sahajāta dhamme ārammaṇe pinayati iti attho kāya citta pharaṇa rasāḥ udaggassa cittassa bhāvaḥ odagyam tam paccupaṭṭhānam etassa ati odagya paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Saddahanti vatthuttayaṃ saddahanti. Akālusiyapaccupaṭṭhānā anāvilabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Saddheyyavatthupadaṭṭhānā saddahitabbavatthuttayāsannakāraṇā.
analyzed: saddahanti vatthuttayam saddahanti akālusiya paccupaṭṭhānā anāvila bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā saddheyya vatthu padaṭṭhānā saddahitabba vatthuttaya āsanna kāraṇā

original: Araññagatasudesako viya araññe gato maggasudesako viya.
analyzed: arañña gata sudesakaḥ viya araññe gataḥ magga sudesakaḥ viya

original: Attanā avinibbhuttānaṃ dhammānanti avigatānaṃ cetasikānaṃ. Tesanti tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ
analyzed: attanā a vinibbhuttānam dhammānam ti avigatānam cetasikānam tesanti tesam cetasikānam

original: dhammānaṃ. Santepi ca tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva
analyzed: dhammānam sante pi ca tesam cetasikānam anupālana lakkhaṇa ādimhi vidhāne atthi kkhaṇe yeva

original: taṃ tesaṃ pāletabbānaṃ cetasikānaṃ pavattakkhaṇeyeva taṃ jīvitaṃ te dhamme pāletabbe
analyzed: tam tesam pāletabbānam cetasikānam pavatta kkhaṇeya iva tam jīvitam te dhamme pāletabbe

original: cetasike anupāleti. Udakaṃ viyāti yathā udakaṃ attani uppalādīni anupāleti, tathā
analyzed: cetasike anupāleti udakam viyāti yathā udakam uppala ādīni anupāleti tathā

original: anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne santepi tesaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva anupāleti, vijjamānakkhaṇeva
analyzed: anupālana lakkhaṇa ādimhi vidhāne sante api tesam atthi kkhaṇā iya iva anupāleti vijjamāna kkhaṇā iva

original: anupāletīti adhippāyo. Paccayuppannepi ca dhamme anupāleti, dhāti viya kumāraṃ aññāya
analyzed: anupāleti iti adhippāyaḥ paccaya uppanne pi ca dhamme anupāleti dhāti viya kumāram aññāya

original: janitaṃ kumāraṃ rakkhantī dhāti viya, parassa puttaṃ aṅkādinā dhāretīti dhāti. Sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva
analyzed: janitam kumāram rakkhantī dhāti viya parassa puttam aṅka ādinā dhāreti iti dhāti sayaṃpavattita dhamma sambandhena iva

original: pavattati attanā pavattitehi dhammehi sampavattati. Niyāmako viya yathā niyāmako
analyzed: pavattati attanā pavattitehi dhammehi sampavattati niyāmakaḥ viya yathā niyāmakaḥ

original: ekanāvāya vutthehi janehi saha pavattati, bhaṅgato uddhaṃ taṃ jīvitaṃ na pavattayati,
analyzed: eka nāvāya vutthehi janehi saha pavattati bhaṅgataḥ uddham tam jīvitam na pavattayati

original: attano ca abhāvā ṭhapayitabbānaṃ cetasikānañca abhāvā, bhaṅgakkhaṇe cetasike na ṭhapeti
analyzed: attanaḥ ca abhāvāḥ ṭhapayitabbānam cetasikānam ca abhāvāḥ bhaṅga khaṇe cetasike na ṭhapeti

original: sayaṃ bhijjamānattā, vaṭṭisneho khīyamāno padīpasikhaṃ na karoti yathā.
analyzed: sayam vaṭṭi snehaḥ khīyamānaḥ padīpa sikham na karoti yathā

original: Sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānoti mudubhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, sītalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā.
analyzed: somma bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno ti mudu bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno sītala bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno vā

original: Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho ime khandhā gahitā.
analyzed: kāyaḥ ti ca ittha vedanā ādayo tayo khandhā vedanā kkhandho saññā kkhandho saṅkhāra kkhandho ime khandhāḥ gahitā

original: Nimmaddanarasāti nimmaddanakiccā. Kāyacittānaṃ avūpasamatāuddhaccādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti ādiggahaṇena kukkuccaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: nimmaddana rasā ati nimmaddana kiccā kāya cittānam a vūpasama tā uddhacca ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati ādi ggahaṇena kukkuccam gahetabbam

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Cetasikaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: cetasika niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dutiyo paricchedo.
analyzed: dutiyaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 3. Tatiyo paricchedo
analyzed: tatiyaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Cetasikavibhāganiddesavaṇṇanā
89. Sabbe cetasikā vuttā, buddhenādiccabandhunā ye sabbe cetasikā ādiccabandhunā
analyzed: sabbe cetasikāḥ vuttāḥ buddhena ādiccabandhunā ye sabbe cetasikāḥ ādiccabandhunā

original: buddhena vuttā, te sabbe cetasikā nāmasāmaññato nāmasamānabhāvena dvepaññāsabhavanti
analyzed: buddhena vuttā te sabbe cetasikāḥ nāma sāmaññataḥ nāma samāna bhāvena

original: te, anottappapariyosānā dvipaññāsa bhavanti.
analyzed: te anottappa pariyosānāḥ dvipaññāsa bhavanti

original: 90-92. Catupaññāsadhā kāme, rūpe pañcadaseritā kāme kāmāvacare catupaññāsa cittāni
analyzed: catupaññāsadhā kāme rūpe pañcadasā īritā kāme kāmāvacare catupaññāsa cittāni

original: īritā. Rūpe rūpāvacare pañcadasa cittāni īritā bhavanti. Dvādasārūpe arūpāvacare
analyzed: īritāḥ rūpe rūpāvacare pañcadasa cittāni īritāḥ bhavanti dvādasa arūpe arūpa avacare

original: dvādasa cittāni bhavanti. Cattālīsa manāsavā lokuttaracittāni cattālīsa bhavanti,
analyzed: dvādasa cittāni bhavanti cattālīsa manāsavāḥ lokuttara cittāni cattālīsa bhavanti

original: ekavīsasataṃ sabbe cittuppādā samāsato saṅkhepato ekavīsasataṃ hoti. Etesu tesamuppattiṃ
analyzed: ekavīsa satam sabbe cittuppādā samāsataḥ saṅkhepataḥ ekavīsa satam hoti etesu tesam uppattim

original: ito paraṃ etesu mayā vuttesu cittesu tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ
analyzed: itas param etesu mayā vuttesu cittesu tesam phassa ādīnam dhammānam uppattim ekam ekam

original: uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya ahaṃ pavakkhāmi desissāmi.
analyzed: uddharitvā citta cetasikesu bhikkhūnam pāṭava tthāya aham pavakkhāmi desissāmi

original: 93. Ekaggatā cittekaggatā manakkāro manasikāro jīvitaṃ phassapañcakaṃ ete aṭṭha cetasikā avinibbhogā aññamaññato avigatā ekuppādā samānuppādā sahakkhayā sahavayā.
analyzed: ekagga tā citta ekagga tā manakkāraḥ manasikāraḥ jīvitam phassa pañcakam ete aṭṭha cetasikāḥ a vinibbhogāḥ aññamaññataḥ avigatāḥ eka uppādā samāna uppādā saha kkhayā saha vayā

original: 94. Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitindriyaṃ ekaggatā manakkāro ime cetasikā sabbasādhāraṇā sabbacittehi sādhāraṇā, sabbacittānaṃ sādhāraṇā vā.
analyzed: phasso ca vedanā saññā cetanā jīvitindriyam ekagga tā manakkāraḥ ime cetasikā sabba sādhāraṇā sabba cittehi sādhāraṇā sabba cittānam sādhāraṇā vā

original: 95. Vitakko pañcapaññāsa-cittesu samudīrito. Cāro chasaṭṭhicittesu vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaresu
analyzed: vitakko pañca paññāsa cittesu samudīritaḥ cāro cha saṭṭhi cittesu vitakko tāva dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjita kāmāvacaresu

original: ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti pañcapaññāsacittesu bhagavatā samudīrito.
analyzed: ekādasasu paṭhamajjhāna cittesu ca ati pañca paññāsa cittesu bhagavatā samudīritaḥ

original: Vicāro dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaracittesu ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ca
analyzed: vicāraḥ dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjita kāmāvacara cittesu ekādasasu paṭhamajjhāna cittesu ca

original: ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu jāyati. Ettha etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi.
analyzed: ekādasasu dutiya jhāna cittesu ca ati cha saṭṭhi cittesu jāyati ettha etasmim vacane saṃsayaḥ natthi

original: 96. Ekapaññāsacittesu, pīti tesaṭṭhiyā sukhaṃ pītidomanassupekkhāsahagatakāyaviññāṇacatutthajjhānavajjitesu
analyzed: eka paññāsa cittesu pīti sukham pīti domanassa upekkhā sahagata kāya viññāṇa catuttha jjhāna vajjitesu

original: ekapaññāsacittesu jāyati. Sukhaṃ domanassadukkhupekkhāsahagatavajjitesu tesaṭṭhicittesu
analyzed: eka paññāsa cittesu jāyati sukham domanassa dukkha upekkhā sahagata vajjitesu

original: jāyati. Upekkhā somanassasukhadukkhasahagatavajjitesu pañcapaññāsacittesu jāyati.
analyzed: jāyati upekkhā somanassa sukha dukkha sahagata vajjitesu pañca paññāsa cittesu jāyati

original: Dukkhaṃ akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇapaṭighasahagatesu tīsu cittesu jāyati.
analyzed: dukkham akusala vipāka kāya viññāṇa paṭigha sahagatesu tīsu cittesu jāyati

original: 97. Hoti dvāsaṭṭhicittesu, somanassindriyaṃ pana domanassadukkhasukhupekkhāsahagatavajjitesu
analyzed: hoti dvāsaṭṭhi cittesu somanassa indriyam pana domanassa dukkha sukha upekkhā sahagata vajjitesu

original: dvāsaṭṭhicittesu jāyati. Dukkhindriyaṃ panekasmiṃ akusalavipāke kāyaviññāṇe jāyati.
analyzed: dvāsaṭṭhi cittesu jāyati dukkha indriyam pana ekasmin akusala vipāke kāya viññāṇe jāyati

original: Tathekamhi sukhindriyaṃ tathā ekasmiṃ puññapāke kāyaviññāṇe hoti.
analyzed: tathā ikamhi sukha indriyam tathā ekasmin puññapāke kāya viññāṇe hoti

original: 98. Pañcuttarasate citte, vīriyaṃ āha nāyako jino pañcadvārāvajjanadvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavajjite
analyzed: pañca uttara sate citte vīriyam āha nāyakaḥ jino

original: pañcuttarasate citte vīriyaṃ āha kathesi. Catuttarasate citte, samādhindriyamabrvi
analyzed: pañcuttara sate citte vīriyam āha kathesi catuttara sate citte samādhi indriyam abrvi

original: vicikicchāsahagatadvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇapañcadvārāvajjanavajjite catuttarasate
analyzed: vicikicchā sahagata dvi pañca viññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa pañca dvāra āvajjana vajjite catuttara sate

original: citte samādhindriyaṃ avoca.
analyzed: citte samādhi indriyam avoca

original: 99. Sabbāhetukacittāni, ṭhapetvā cekahetuke sabbāni aṭṭhārasa ahetukacittāni ekahetukacittadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ ekuttarasate citte chandassa uppattiṃ uddise paṇḍito katheyya.
analyzed: sabba ahetuka cittāni ṭhapetvā ca ikahetuke sabbāni aṭṭhārasa ahetuka cittāni eka hetuka citta dvayam ca ṭhapetvā sesasmin ekuttara sate citte chandassa uppattim uddise paṇḍitaḥ katheyya

original: 100. Ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇādike dasa viññāṇe ca vicikicchāyutampi cittaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ dasuttarasate citte adhimokkho bhagavatā udīrito.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe cakkhu viññāṇa ādike dasa viññāṇe ca vicikicchā yutam pi cittam ṭhapetvā sesasmin dasa uttara sate citte adhimokkhaḥ bhagavatā udīritaḥ

original: 101-2. Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattaṃ cha yugaḷā ca iti ime
analyzed: saddhā sati hirī ottappam alobhaḥ adoso yugaḷā ca iti ime

original: ekūnavīsati dhammā niyatā hutvā ekanavutiyā citte jāyanti. Ekūnavīsati dhammā ahetukesu
analyzed: ekūnavīsati dhammā niyatā hutvā ekanavutiyā citte jāyanti ekūnavīsati dhammā ahetukesu

original: aṭṭhārasasu apuññesu dvādasasu akusalesu na jāyare na jāyanti.
analyzed: aṭṭhārasasu apuññesu dvādasasu akusalesu na na jāyanti

original: 103. Ekūnāsītiyā citte, paññā jāyati sabbadā paññā dvādasaakusalaaṭṭhārasaahetukamahākusalañāṇavippayuttamahāvipākañāṇavippayuttamahākiriyāñāṇavippayuttavajjite
analyzed: ekūnāsītiyā citte paññā jāyati sabbadā paññā dvādasa akusala aṭṭhārasa ahetuka mahākusala ñāṇa vippayutta mahā vipāka ñāṇa vippayutta mahā kiriyā ñāṇa vippayutta vajjite

original: ekūnāsītiyā citte jāyati. Aṭṭhavīsatiyā citte, karuṇāmuditā siyuṃ karuṇāmuditā aṭṭhasu
analyzed: ekūnāsītiyā citte jāyati aṭṭhavīsatiyā citte karuṇā muditā siyum karuṇā muditāḥ aṭṭhasu

original: mahākusalesu, aṭṭhasu mahākiriyāsu, rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānavajjitesu dvādasarūpāvacaresu
analyzed: mahā kusalesu aṭṭhasu mahā kiriyāsu rūpāvacara pañcama jhāna vajjitesu dvādasa rūpāvacaresu

original: cāti aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittesu siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
analyzed: ca ati aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittesu siyum bhaveyyum

original: 104. Kāmāvacarapuññesu, sabbalokuttaresu ca kāmāvacaramahākusalesu cittesu sabbesu lokuttaresu cāti saha aṭṭhake cattālīsavidhe citte viratittayaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kāmāvacara puññesu sabba lokuttaresu ca kāmāvacara mahākusalesu cittesu sabbesu lokuttaresu ca ati saha aṭṭhake cattālīsavidhe citte virati ttayam hoti

original: 105. Saddhā sati hirottappaṃ alobhādittayampi ca yugaḷāni cha ca majjhattaṃ karuṇāmuditāpi ca.
analyzed: ca ca ca

original: 106. Tathā tisso viratiyo sabbe te pañcavīsati dhammā mahākusalacittasampayuttaabyākatacittasampayuttāti kusalena sabbesuyeva dhammesu chekena vijitaṅgaṇena pakāsitā.
analyzed: tathā tissaḥ viratiyaḥ sabbe te pañcavīsati dhammā mahā kusala citta sampayutta abyākata citta sampayuttā ati kusalena sabbesu yeva dhammesu chekena pakāsitā

original: 107. Ahirīkaṃ anottappaṃ, moho uddhaccameva cāti ime cattāro dhammā niyatā hutvā dvādasāpuññacittesuyeva dvādasaakusalacittesuyeva jāyare jāyanti.
analyzed: ahirīkam anottappam mohaḥ uddhaccam eva ca ati ime cattāraḥ dhammā niyatāḥ hutvā dvādasa apuñña cittesu yā iva dvādasa akusala cittesu yā iva jāyare jāyanti

original: 108-9. Lobho doso ca moho ca, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo vicikicchā middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ
analyzed: lobho doso ca moho ca māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayaḥ vicikicchā middham uddhaccaṃ

original: kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ macchariyampi ca ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ issā ca domanassakaṃ ete dhammā
analyzed: kukkuccam thinam macchariyam pi ca ahirikam anottappam issā ca domanassakam ete dhammā

original: akusalā akusalacittasampayuttā ekantena mahesinā vijitaṅgaṇavigatamalena vuttā.
analyzed: akusalā akusala citta sampayuttā ekantena mahesinā vijita aṅgaṇa vigata malena vuttā

original: 110. Lobho aṭṭhasu lobhamūlesu cittesu bhagavatā niddiṭṭho dassito. Diṭṭhi catūsu
analyzed: lobhaḥ aṭṭhasu lobha mūlesu cittesu bhagavatā niddiṭṭhaḥ dassitaḥ diṭṭhi catūsu

original: diṭṭhisampayuttesu cittesu vuttā. Māno diṭṭhivippayuttesu catūsu gāhūpavādappabhindanena
analyzed: diṭṭhi sampayuttesu cittesu vuttā mānaḥ diṭṭhi vippayuttesu catūsu gāhūpavāda pabhindanena

original: vutto. Doso dvīsu eva paṭighasampayuttesu cittesu munindena vutto.
analyzed: vuttaḥ dosaḥ dvīsu eva paṭigha sampayuttesu cittesu munindena vuttaḥ

original: 111. Issāmaccherakukkuccā dvīsu dosamūlesu cittesu jāyanti, no saha saha no jāyanti,
analyzed: issā macchera kukkuccāḥ dvīsu dosa mūlesu cittesu jāyanti no saha saha no jāyanti

original: ekekova jāyantīti attho. Vicikicchā panekasmiṃ vicikicchā pana ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte
analyzed: ekekaḥ uva jāyanti iti attho vicikicchā pana ekasmin vicikicchā pana ekasmin vicikicchā sahagata citte

original: jāyati. Thinamiddhaṃ pañcasu sasaṅkhārikaakusalacittesu jāyati.
analyzed: jāyati thinam iddham pañcasu sa saṅkhārika akusala cittesu jāyati

original: 112-3. Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitaṃ mano vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti vīriyaṃ
analyzed: phasso ca vedanā saññā cetanā jīvitam manaḥ vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti vīriyam

original: samādhi ca chando cevādhimokkho ca manasikāro ca cuddasa dhammā kusalā ca kusalacetasikā
analyzed: samādhi ca chando ca iva adhimokkho ca manasikāro ca cuddasa dhammā kusalā ca kusala cetasikā

original: ca honti. Akusalā ceva akusalacetasikā ceva abyākatāpi ca abyākatacetasikā ca honti.
analyzed: ca honti akusalā ca iva akusala cetasikā ca iva abyākatā api ca abyākata cetasikā ca honti

original: 114. Ekūnatiṃsacittesu, jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ mataṃ catūsu somanassasahagatākusalesu,
analyzed: ekūnatiṃsa cittesu jhānam pañcaṅgikam matam catūsu somanassa sahagata akusalesu

original: dvādasasu somanassasahagatamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyacittesu, sukhasantīraṇahasituppādacittesu,
analyzed: dvādasasu somanassa sahagata mahā kusala mahā vipāka mahā kiriya cittesu sukha santīraṇa hasituppāda cittesu

original: tīsu rūpapaṭhamajjhānacittesu, aṭṭhasu lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti ekūnatiṃsacittesu
analyzed: tīsu rūpa paṭhama jhāna cittesu aṭṭhasu lokuttara paṭhama jhāna cittesu ca ati ekūnatiṃsa cittesu

original: pañcaṅgikaṃ pañcāvayavajhānayuttaṃ jhānaṃ sugatena mataṃ. Upekkhāsahagatāni cattāri
analyzed: pañcaṅgikam pañca avayava jhāna yuttam jhānam sugatena matam upekkhā sahagatāni cattāri

original: lobhamūlāni ca dve dosamūlāni ca dve mohamūlāni ca manodhātuttikañca upekkhāsahagatā
analyzed: lobha mūlāni ca dve dosa mūlāni ca dve moha mūlāni ca manaḥ dhātuttikam ca upekkhā sahagatā

original: tisso ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo ca dvādasupekkhāsahagatāni mahākusalamahāvipākakiriyacittāni
analyzed: tisso ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyo ca dvādasa upekkhā sahagatāni mahā kusala mahā vipāka kiriya cittāni

original: tīṇi rūpadutiyajjhānacittāni aṭṭha lokuttaradutiyajjhānacittāni cāti sattatiṃsa cittāni
analyzed: tīṇi rūpa dutiya jhāna cittāni aṭṭha lokuttara dutiya jhāna cittāni ca ati sattatiṃsa cittāni

original: catujhānaṅgayuttāni catujhānāvayavayuttāni iti evaṃ niddise katheyya.
analyzed: catu jhāna aṅga yuttāni catu jhāna avayava yuttāni iti evam niddise katheyya

original: 115. Ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ, tivaṅgikamudīritaṃ tīṇi rūpāvacaratatiyajjhānacittāni,
analyzed: ekādasavidham cittam tivaṅgikam udīritam tīṇi rūpāvacara tatiya jhāna cittāni

original: aṭṭhalokuttaratatiyajjhānacittāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ tiavayavajhānayuttaṃ,
analyzed: aṭṭha lokuttara tatiya jhāna cittāni ca ati ekādasavidham cittam ti vaṅgikam ti avayava jhāna yuttam

original: cha rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānapañcamajjhānacittāni, dvādasārūpāvacaracittāni, soḷasa
analyzed: rūpāvacara catuttha jhāna pañcama jhāna cittāni dvādasa arūpāvacara cittāni soḷasa

original: lokuttaracatutthajjhānapañcamajjhānacittāni cāti catutiṃsavidhaṃ cittaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ
analyzed: lokuttara catuttha jjhāna pañcama jhāna cittāni ca ati catutiṃsavidham cittam duvaṅgikam

original: dviavayavajhānayuttaṃ udīritaṃ jinena īritaṃ.
analyzed: udīritam jinena īritam

original: 116. Sabhāvenāvitakkesu, jhānaṅgāni na uddhare sabhāvena pakatiyā avitakkesu vitakkavirahitesu
analyzed: sa bhāvena avitakkesu jhāna aṅgāni na uddhare sa bhāvena pakatiyā avitakkesu vitakka virahitesu

original: dvipañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni jhānāvayavāni jino na uddhare. Ayametthādhippāyo – aññattha
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇesu jhāna aṅgāni jhāna avayavāni jinaḥ na uddhare ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ aññattha

original: vitakko jhānacittena vippahīno bhāsito, imesu pana neva jhānacittena pahīnā, pakatiyā
analyzed: vitakko jhāna cittena vippahīnaḥ bhāsito imesu pana na iva jhāna cittena pahīnā pakatiyā

original: vitakkavirahitāni dvipañcaviññāṇāni sabbāhetukacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni jino
analyzed: vitakka virahitāni dvi pañca viññāṇāni sabba ahetuka cittesu maggaṅgāni magga avayavāni jino

original: na uddhare na deseyya.
analyzed: na uddhare na deseyya

original: 117. Budho jino dvipañcaviññāṇesu manodhātuttike ca tīsu santīraṇesu cāti soḷasacittesu
analyzed: budhaḥ jinaḥ dvi pañca viññāṇesu manaḥ dhātuttike ca tīsu santīraṇesu ca ati soḷasa cittesu

original: tīṇindriyāni vade katheyya. Ekasmiṃ pana cattāri ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte
analyzed: tīṇi indriyāni vade katheyya ekasmim pana cattāri ekasmim vicikicchā sahagata citte

original: cattāri indriyāni honti, ekādasasu akusalacittesu vicikicchāyuttacittavajjitesu hasituppāde
analyzed: cattāri indriyāni honti ekādasasu akusala cittesu vicikicchā yutta citta vajjitesu hasita uppāde

original: ceva voṭṭhabbanacitte cāti terasasu cittesu pañca indriyāni budho bhagavā uddhare uddhareyya.
analyzed: ca iva voṭṭhabbana citte ca ati terasasu cittesu pañca indriyāni budhaḥ bhagavā uddhare uddhareyya

original: 118. Satta dvādasacittesu, indriyāni jinobrvi jino buddho ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu
analyzed: satta dvādasa cittesu indriyāni jinaḥ brvi jinaḥ buddhaḥ ñāṇa vippayutta mahā kusala mahā vipāka mahā kiriyā saṅkhātesu

original: dvādasacittesu satta indriyāni abrvi kathesi, ekenūnesu aṭṭheva, cattālīsamanesu
analyzed: dvādasacittesu satta indriyāni abrvi kathesi ekenūnesu aṭṭha iva cattālīsa manesu

original: ca jino ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu dvādasasu cittesu,
analyzed: ca jinaḥ ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kusala mahā vipāka mahā kiriyā saṅkhātesu dvādasasu cittesu

original: pañcadasasu rūpesu, dvādasasu arūpesu cāti ekenūnesu cattālīsamanesu aṭṭheva indriyāni abrvi.
analyzed: pañcadasasu rūpesu dvādasasu arūpesu cāti ekenūnesu cattālīsamanesu aṭṭheva indriyāni abrvi

original: 119. Cattālīsāya lokuttaracittesu navakaṃ indriyanavakaṃ nāyako abrvi kathesi. Evaṃ
analyzed: cattālīsāya lokuttara cittesu navakam indriya navakam nāyakaḥ abrvi kathesi evam

original: indriyayogopi, veditabbo vibhāvinā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittesu indriyayogo
analyzed: indriya yogaḥ api veditabbaḥ vibhāvinā evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena cittesu indriya yogaḥ

original: vibhāvinā visesena paññaṃ bhāvetuṃ pakāsetuṃ sīlametassāti vibhāvī, tena veditabbo.
analyzed: vibhāvinā visesena paññam bhāvetum pakāsetum sīlam etassa ati vibhāvī tena veditabbo

original: 120. Amaggaṅgāni nāmettha, aṭṭhārasa ahetukā ettha etesu cittesu aṭṭhārasa ahetukā
analyzed: amaggaṅgāni nāma ittha aṭṭhārasa ahetukā ettha etesu cittesu aṭṭhārasa ahetukā

original: natthi maggo etesūti amaggaṅgāni nāma, jhānaṅgāni na vijjanti, viññāṇesu dvipañcasu
analyzed: natthi maggaḥ etesu ti amaggaṅgāni nāma jhāna aṅgāni na vijjanti viññāṇesu dvi pañcasu

original: dvipañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgānipi na saṃvijjanti.
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇesu jhāna aṅgāni pi na saṃvijjanti

original: 121. Ekaṃ cittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ ekaṃ vicikicchāsahagatacittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ dumaggāvayavaṃ,
analyzed: ekam cittam dumaggaṅgam ekam vicikicchā sahagata cittam dumaggaṅgam dumagga avayavam

original: catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttākusalacittesu ca dvīsu paṭighayuttesu ca uddhaccayuttesu cāti
analyzed: catūsu diṭṭhi vippayutta akusala cittesu ca dvīsu paṭigha yuttesu ca uddhacca yuttesu ca ati

original: sattasu cittesu ca timaggaṅgāni timaggāvayavāni honti. Cattālīsāya cittesu, maggo
analyzed: sattasu cittesu ca ti maggaṅgāni ti magga avayavāni honti cattālīsāya cittesu maggaḥ

original: so caturaṅgiko catūsu diṭṭhisampayuttākusalesu ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu
analyzed: so caturaṅgiko catūsu diṭṭhi sampayutta akusalesu ñāṇa vippayutta mahā kusala mahā vipāka mahā kiriyā saṅkhātesu

original: dvādasasu cittesu ca rūpāvacaradutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātesu dvādasasu
analyzed: dvādasasu cittesu ca rūpāvacara dutiya tatiya catuttha pañcama jhāna saṅkhātesu dvādasasu

original: rūpāvacaresu, dvādasasu arūpāvacaresu cāti cattālīsāya cittesu caturaṅgiko maggo
analyzed: rūpāvacaresu dvādasasu arūpāvacaresu ca ati cattālīsāya cittesu caturaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: caturāvayavo maggo hoti.
analyzed: catura avayavaḥ maggo hoti

original: 122. Pañcaddasasu cittesu, maggo pañcaṅgiko mato ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu
analyzed: pañcaddasasu cittesu maggaḥ pañcaṅgikaḥ mataḥ ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kusala mahā vipāka mahā kiriyā saṅkhātesu

original: dvādasasu, tīsu rūpapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti pañcaddasasu cittesu pañcaṅgiko pañcāvayavo
analyzed: dvādasasu tīsu rūpa paṭhamajjhāna cittesu ca ati pañcaddasasu cittesu pañcaṅgikaḥ pañca avayavaḥ

original: maggo bhagavatā mato. Dvattiṃsacittesu maggo sattaṅgikopi ca lokuttaradutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātesu
analyzed: maggaḥ bhagavatā mataḥ dvattiṃsa cittesu maggo sattaṅgikaḥ api ca lokuttara dutiya tatiya catuttha pañcama jhāna saṅkhātesu

original: dvattiṃsacittesu maggo sattaṅgiko sattāvayavo hoti.
analyzed: dvattiṃsa cittesu maggo sattaṅgikaḥ satta avayavaḥ hoti

original: 123. Maggo aṭṭhasu cittesu maggaphalavasena aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko
analyzed: maggaḥ aṭṭhasu cittesu magga phala vasena aṭṭhasu lokuttara cittesu maggaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ

original: aṭṭhāvayavo hoti. Iti parisamāpane. Tu padapūraṇe. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
analyzed: aṭṭha avayavo hoti iti parisamāpane tu pada pūraṇe evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena

original: sabbacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni dhīro uddhareyya, deseyyāti attho.
analyzed: sabba cittesu maggaṅgāni magga avayavāni dhīraḥ uddhareyya deseyya ati attho

original: 124. Balāni dve dvicittesu hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātesu dvīsu cittesu dve balāni
analyzed: balāni dve dvi cittesu hasita uppāda voṭṭhabbana saṅkhātesu dvīsu cittesu dve balāni

original: honti. Ekasmiṃ tīṇi dīpaye ekasmiṃ vicikicchāyutte tīṇi balāni dhīro dīpaye pakāseyya.
analyzed: honti ekasmin tīṇi dīpaye ekasmin vicikicchā yutte tīṇi balāni dhīraḥ dīpaye pakāseyya

original: Vicikicchāyuttato sesesu ekādasasu akusalesu cattāri balāni honti. Cha dvādasasu
analyzed: vicikicchā yuttataḥ sesesu ekādasasu akusalesu cattāri balāni honti cha dvādasasu

original: ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu dvādasasu cittesu cha balāni
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayutta mahā kusala mahā vipāka mahā kiriyā saṅkhātesu dvādasasu cittesu cha balāni

original: hontīti dhīro niddise katheyya.
analyzed: honti iti dhīraḥ niddise katheyya

original: 125. Ekūnāsītiyā satta ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu dvādasasu
analyzed: ekūnāsītiyā satta ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kusala mahā vipāka mahā kiriyā saṅkhātesu dvādasasu

original: kāmāvacaracittesu, sattavīsatiyā mahaggatacittesu, cattālīsalokuttaracittesu cāti
analyzed: kāmāvacara cittesu sattavīsatiyā mahaggata cittesu cattālīsa lokuttara cittesu ca ati

original: ekūnāsītiyā cittesu satta balāni honti. Soḷasevābalāni tu dvipañcaviññāṇāni ca tisso
analyzed: ekūnāsītiyā cittesu satta balāni honti soḷasā iva abalāni tu dvi pañca viññāṇāni ca tisso

original: manodhātuyo ca tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti soḷasa eva cittāni abalāni balavirahitāni honti,
analyzed: ca tīṇi ca ati soḷasaḥ eva cittāni abalāni bala virahitāni honti

original: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittaṃ sabalaṃ balena sahagataṃ abalampi ca balavirahitañcāpi
analyzed: evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena cittam sa balam balena sahagatam abalam pi ca bala virahitam ca api

original: cittaṃ viññeyyaṃ dhīrena vijānitabbaṃ.
analyzed: cittam viññeyyam dhīrena vijānitabbam

original: 126. Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalindriyāni, cittesu jāyanti hi yesu yāni yesu cittesu yāni
analyzed: cittesu jāyanti hi yesu yāni yesu cittesu yāni

original: jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalaindriyāni jāyanti, mayā samāsena samuddharitvā asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ uddharitvā
analyzed: jāyanti mayā samāsena samuddharitvā asaṃsaṭṭham uddharitvā

original: tesu cittesu sabbānipi tāni jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalaindriyāni samāsena saṅkhepena mayā
analyzed: tesu cittesu sabbāni api tāni jhānaṅga maggaṅga bala indriyāni samāsena saṅkhepena mayā

original: buddhadattācariyena vuttāni kathitāni.
analyzed: buddhadatta ācariyena vuttāni kathitāni

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Cetasikavibhāganiddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: cetasika vibhāga niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Tatiyo paricchedo.
analyzed: tatiyaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 4. Catuttho paricchedo
analyzed: catutthaḥ paricchedo

original: Ekavidhādiniddesavaṇṇanā
Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, nayamekavidhādikaṃ;
analyzed: itas param pavakkhāmi nayam ekavidha ādikam

original: Ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ, buddhiyā pana vuddhiyā.
analyzed: ābhidhammika bhikkhūnam buddhiyā pana vuddhiyā

original: Ahaṃ ito paraṃ ito paricchedato paraṃ ekavidhādikaṃ nayaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ buddhiyā vuddhitthāya pavakkhāmi desessāmi.
analyzed: aham itas param itas paricchedataḥ param ekavidha ādikam nayam ābhidhammika bhikkhūnam buddhiyā vuddhi tthāya pavakkhāmi desessāmi

original: 128. Sabbamekavidhaṃ cittaṃ, vijānanasabhāvato sabbaṃ cittaṃ vijānanasabhāvato ekavidhaṃ, duvidhañca bhave cittaṃ ahetukasahetukato idaṃ cittaṃ duvidhaṃ bhaveyya.
analyzed: sabbam ekavidham cittam vijānana sabhāvataḥ sabbam cittam vijānana sabhāvataḥ ekavidham duvidham ca bhave cittam ahetuka sahetukataḥ idam cittam duvidham bhaveyya

original: 129. Puññāpuññavipākā hi, kāme dasa ca pañca ca hi saccaṃ kāme kāmāvacare kusalākusalavipākā dasa pañca ca kiriyā tisso iti sabbe aṭṭhārasa cittuppādā ahetukā.
analyzed: puñña apuñña vipākāḥ hi kāme dasa ca pañca ca hi saccam kāme kāmāvacare kusala akusala vipākāḥ dasa pañca ca kiriyā tisso iti sabbe aṭṭhārasa cittuppādāḥ ahetukā

original: 130. Ahetukato cittuppādato sesā ekasattati cittuppādā sahetukāti sahetukā nāmāti mahesinā tādinā aviparītasabhāvena hetuvādinā paccayavādinā niddiṭṭhā.
analyzed: ahetukataḥ cittuppādataḥ sesā ekasattati cittuppādā sa hetukā ati sa hetukā nāma ati mahesinā tādinā aviparīta sabhāvena hetuvādinā paccaya vādinā niddiṭṭhā

original: 131. Savatthukāvatthukato savatthukaavatthukavasena tathā ubhayavasena savatthukavasena, avatthukavasena ca sabbaṃ vuttappakārena ca mānasaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: savatthuka avatthukato savatthuka avatthuka vasena tathā ubhaya vasena savatthuka vasena avatthuka vasena ca sabbam vutta ppakārena ca mānasam tividham hoti

original: 132-4. Sabbo kāmavipāko ca, rūpe pañcadasāpi ca cittuppādā ādimaggo paṭhamamaggo
analyzed: sabbo kāma vipāko ca rūpe pañcadasa api ca cittuppādāḥ ādi maggo paṭhama maggo

original: hasituppādo manodhātukiriyāpi ca domanassadvayañcāpi tecattālīsa mānasā vinā vatthuṃ
analyzed: hasituppādaḥ manaḥ dhātu kiriyā api ca domanassa dvayam ca api tecattālīsa mānasāḥ vinā vatthum

original: vatthuṃ vajjetvā na uppajjanti, ekantena savatthukā nāma. Arūpāvacaravipākā ca ekantena
analyzed: vatthum vajjetvā na uppajjanti ekantena sa vatthukā nāma arūpa avacara vipākā ca ekantena

original: avatthukā, mayā vuttato cittuppādato sesāni dvecattālīsa cittāni ubhayathā savatthukāvatthukavasena siyuṃ.
analyzed: avatthukā mayā vuttataḥ citta uppādato sesāni dvecattālīsa cittāni ubhayathā sa vatthuka avatthuka vasena siyum

original: 135. Ekekārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, pañcārammaṇameva ca cittaṃ chaḷārammaṇakañceti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārenāpi tividhaṃ cittaṃ siyā.
analyzed: eka eka ārammaṇam cittam pañca ārammaṇam eva ca cittam chaṣ ārammaṇakam ca iti evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena api tividham cittam siyā

original: 136-8. Viññāṇāni ca dve pañca, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca abhiññāmānasaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ
analyzed: viññāṇāni ca dve pañca aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca abhiññā mānasam ṭhapetvā sabbam

original: mahaggatañcevāti tecattālīsa cittuppādā pana ekekārammaṇā viññeyyā dhīrena. Tattha
analyzed: mahaggatam ca iva ati tecattālīsa cittuppādāḥ pana eka eka ārammaṇāḥ viññeyyāḥ dhīrena tattha

original: citte manodhātuttayaṃ pañcārammaṇaṃ īritaṃ bhagavatā. Mayā vuttacittato sesāni tecattālīsa
analyzed: citte manaḥ dhātu ttayam pañca ārammaṇam īritam bhagavatā mayā vutta cittataḥ sesāni tecattālīsa

original: cittāni chaḷārammaṇikāni matāni satthunā, tathā evaṃ cittaṃ kusalākusalādito tividhaṃ.
analyzed: cittāni chaṣ ārammaṇikāni matāni satthunā tathā evam cittam kusala akusala āditaḥ tividham

original: Ādi-saddena abyākataṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ādi saddena abyākatam gahetabbam

original: 139. Ahetukaṃ cittaṃ ekahetukañca cittaṃ dvihetukañca cittaṃ tihetukañca cittanti evaṃ iminā pakārena cittaṃ catubbidhaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.
analyzed: ahetukam cittam eka hetukam ca cittam dvi hetukam ca cittam ti hetukam ca cittam ti evam iminā pakārena cittam catubbidham vibhāvinā viññātabbam

original: 140-2. Heṭṭhā mayāpi niddiṭṭhā aṭṭhārasa cittuppādā ahetukā, vicikicchuddhaccasaṃyuttaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā mayā api niddiṭṭhāḥ aṭṭhārasa cittuppādāḥ ahetukāḥ vicikicchu ddhacca saṃyuttam

original: cittaṃ ekahetukaṃ evaṃ udīritaṃ bhagavatā. Kāme kāmāvacare puññavipākakriyato kusalavasena
analyzed: cittam eka hetukam evam udīritam bhagavatā kāme kāmāvacare puñña vipāka kriyataḥ kusala vasena

original: ca vipākavasena ca kiriyāvasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā akusalā ca dasadhā cāti
analyzed: ca vipāka vasena ca kiriyā vasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādāḥ akusalā ca dasadhā ca ati

original: bāvīsati cittuppādā duhetukā. Kāme kāmāvacare puññavipākakriyato puññavasena ca vipākavasena
analyzed: bāvīsati cittuppādāḥ du hetukā kāme kāmāvacare puñña vipāka kriyato puñña vasena ca vipāka vasena

original: ca kiriyāvasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā. Sabbaṃ mahaggatañceva appamāṇaṃ lokuttaracittañca tihetukaṃ.
analyzed: ca kiriyā vasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā sabbam mahaggatam ca iva appamāṇam lokuttara cittam ca ti hetukam

original: 143-50. Rūpīriyāpathaviññatti-janakājanakāditoti rūpairiyāpathaviññattijanakavasena
analyzed: rūpi īriyāpatha viññatti janaka ajanaka ādeḥ ti rūpa eriyāpatha viññatti janaka vasena

original: rūpairiyāpathajanakavasena ca rūpajanakavasena ca tikiccājanakavasena cātiādīhi pakārehi
analyzed: rūpa iriyā patha janaka vasena ca rūpa janaka vasena ca tikiccā janaka vasena ca ati ādīhi pakārehi

original: sabbaṃ cittaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha tasmiṃ citte dvādasākusalā, kāmadhātuyā kusalā,
analyzed: sabbam cittam catubbidham hoti tattha tasmim citte dvādasa akusalā kāmadhātuyā kusalā

original: tathā kāme dasa kiriyā, abhiññāmānasaṃ dvayaṃ, ime bāttiṃsa mānasā rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti,
analyzed: tathā kāme dasa kiriyāḥ abhiññāmānasam dvayam ime bāttiṃsa mānasāḥ rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti

original: iriyāpathaṃ kappenti, viññattiṃ janayanti. Kusalā mahaggatamānasā kiriyā ca mahaggatamānasā,
analyzed: iriyāpatham kappenti viññattim janayanti kusalāḥ mahaggata mānasā kiriyā ca mahaggata mānasā

original: aṭṭha anāsavacittāni, chabbīsati ca mānasā rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti, iriyāpathaṃ kappenti.
analyzed: aṭṭha anāsava cittāni chabbīsati ca mānasā rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti iriyāpatham kappenti

original: Copanaṃ na pāpenti viññattiṃ na janayantīti attho. Ime cittuppādā dukiccaniyatā,
analyzed: copanam na pāpenti viññattim na janayanti iti attho ime cittuppādāḥ du kicca niyatā

original: dasa viññāṇe ṭhapetvā dvīsu bhūmīsu vipākā manodhātudvayasantīraṇattayamahāvipākarūpavipākānaṃ
analyzed: dasa viññāṇe ṭhapetvā dvīsu bhūmīsu vipākāḥ manaḥ dhātu dvaya santīraṇa taya mahā vipāka rūpa vipākānam

original: vasena aṭṭhārasa pākā manodhātu kiriyā cevāti imāni ekūnavīsati cittāni rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti,
analyzed: vasena aṭṭhārasa pākā manodhātu kiriyā cevāti imāni ekūnavīsati cittāni rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti

original: itaradvayaṃ na karonti, puna dvepañcaviññāṇā paṭhamaṃ “dasa viññāṇe”ti vuttattā “punā”ti
analyzed: itara dvayam na karonti puna dve pañca viññāṇā paṭhamam dasa viññāṇā iti vutta ttā punāti

original: vuttā. Arūpīsu vipākā ca sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisandhicittañca arahato cuticittañca
analyzed: vuttā arūpīsu vipākā ca sabbesam sattānam paṭisandhi cittam ca arahataḥ cuti cittam ca

original: ime soḷasa mānasā tikiccāni na karonti.
analyzed: ime soḷasa mānasā tikiccāni na karonti

original: 151. Ekadviticatuṭṭhāna-pañcaṭṭhānappabhedato ekakiccadvikiccatikiccacatukiccapañcakiccabhedena pañcadhā cittaṃ pañcapakāraṃ cittaṃ pañcanimmalalocano buddho akkhāsi kathesi.
analyzed: eka dvi ti catu ṭṭhāna pañca ṭṭhāna ppabhedataḥ eka kicca dvi kicca ti kicca catu kicca pañca kicca bhedena pañcadhā cittam pañca pakāram cittam pañca nimmala locanaḥ buddhaḥ akkhāsi kathesi

original: Kusalākusalā sabbe, cittuppādā mahākriyā;
analyzed: kusala akusalā sabbe cittuppādāḥ mahā kriyā

original: Mahaggatā kriyā ceva, cattāro phalamānasā.
analyzed: mahaggatā kriyā ca iva cattāro phala mānasā

original: 153. Sabbeva pañcapaññāsa cittuppādā javanaṭṭhānatoyeva javanakiccavaseneva ekaṭṭhāne ekakicce nippapañcena satthunā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivirahitena satthunā niyāmitā kathitā.
analyzed: sabbe iva pañcapaññāsa cittuppādāḥ javana ṭṭhāna toyā iva javana kicca vasena iva eka ṭṭhāne eka kicce nippapañcena satthunā taṇhā māna diṭṭhi virahitena satthunā niyāmitā kathitā

original: 154. Puna dvepañcaviññāṇā cittuppādā dassane savane tathā ghāyane sāyanaṭṭhāne phusane paṭipāṭiyā satthunā niyāmitā.
analyzed: puna dve pañca viññāṇā cittuppādā dassane savane tathā ghāyane sāyanaṭṭhāne phusane paṭipāṭiyā satthunā niyāmitā

original: 155. Manodhātuttikaṃ āvajjane paṭicchane, ete aṭṭhasaṭṭhi cittuppādā ekaṭṭhānikataṃ ekakiccabhāvaṃ gatā pattā bhavanti.
analyzed: manaḥ dhātuttikam āvajjane paṭicchane ete aṭṭha saṭṭhi cittuppādāḥ eka ṭṭhānikatam eka kicca bhāvam gatā pattāḥ bhavanti

original: 156-8. Cittadvayaṃ dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma udīritaṃ bhagavatā, somanassayutaṃ cittaṃ pañcadvāre
analyzed: citta dvayam dviṭṭhānikam nāma udīritam bhagavatā somanassa yutam cittam pañca dvāre

original: santīraṇaṃ siyā. Chadvāre tadālambaṇañca balavārammaṇe atimahantārammaṇe sati siyā,
analyzed: santi īraṇam siyā cha dvāre tad ālambaṇam ca balava ārammaṇe ati mahant ārammaṇe sati siyā

original: tathā voṭṭhabbanaṃ pañcadvāresu voṭṭhabbanaṃ hoti. Manodvāresu pana sabbesaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ
analyzed: tathā voṭṭhabbanam pañca dvāresu voṭṭhabbanam hoti manaḥ dvāresu pana sabbesam ārammaṇānam

original: āvajjanaṃ hoti, idaṃ cittadvayaṃ dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: āvajjanam hoti idam citta dvayam dviṭṭhānikam nāma hoti

original: 159. Paṭisandhiyā ṭhānato paṭisandhiyā kiccavasena bhavaṅgassa ṭhānato bhavaṅgassa
analyzed: paṭisandhiyā ṭhānataḥ paṭisandhiyā kicca vasena bhavaṅgassa ṭhānataḥ bhavaṅgassa

original: kiccavasena cutiyā ṭhānato cutiyā kiccavasena te mahaggatavipākā nava tiṭṭhānikā
analyzed: kicca vasena cutiyā ṭhānataḥ cutiyā kicca vasena te mahaggata vipākāḥ nava ti ṭṭhānikā

original: tikiccāti muninā matā.
analyzed: tikicca ati muninā matā

original: 160-3. Aṭṭha kāmā mahāpākā, paṭisandhibhavaṅgato paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena tadārammaṇato
analyzed: aṭṭha kāmā mahā pākā paṭisandhi bhavaṅgato paṭisandhi bhavaṅga vasena tad ārammaṇato

original: ceva tadārammaṇavasena ca eva cutiṭṭhānavasena ca aṭṭha cittāni catuṭṭhānikacittāni
analyzed: ca iva tad ārammaṇa vasena ca eva cuti ṭṭhāna vasena ca aṭṭha cittāni catu ṭṭhānika cittāni

original: honti, iti vacanaṃ dhīro niddise, kusalākusalapākopekkhāsahagatadvayaṃ pañcadvāre
analyzed: honti iti vacanam dhīraḥ niddise kusala akusala pāka upekkhā sahagata dvayam pañca dvāre

original: santīraṇaṃ bhave, chadvārikesupi balavārammaṇe sati tadārammaṇatā siyā. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ
analyzed: bhave cha dvārikesu pi balava ārammaṇe sati tad ārammaṇa tā siyā paṭisandhi bhavaṅgānam

original: ṭhānavasena ca cutiṭṭhānavasena ca idaṃ cittadvayaṃ pañcaṭṭhānikacittaṃ nāmāti udīritaṃ muninā.
analyzed: ṭhāna vasena ca cuti ṭṭhāna vasena ca idam citta dvayam pañcaṭṭhānika cittam nāma ati udīritam muninā

original: 164. Pañcakiccaṃ dvayaṃ cittaṃ, aṭṭhakaṃ pana catukiccaṃ, navakaṃ tikiccaṃ, dve cittuppādā dvikiccā, imesaṃ imehi cittuppādehi sesaṃ ekakaṃ kiccaṃ.
analyzed: pañca kiccam dvayam cittam aṭṭhakam pana catu kiccam navakam ti kiccam dve cittuppādā dvi kiccāḥ imesam imehi cittuppādehi sesam ekakam kiccam

original: Bhavaṅgāvajjanañceva, dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ;
analyzed: dassanam sampaṭicchanam

original: Santīraṇaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ, javanaṃ bhavati sattamaṃ.
analyzed: santīraṇam voṭṭhabbanam javanam bhavati sattamam

original: 166. Chabbidhaṃ hoti taṃ channaṃ taṃ cittaṃ channaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanoviññāṇānaṃ
analyzed: chabbidham hoti tat channam tam cittam channam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ viññāṇānam

original: pabhedato chabbidhaṃ hoti, cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ sattannaṃ
analyzed: pabhedato chabbidham hoti cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam sattannam

original: vasena cittaṃ sattadhā hoti.
analyzed: vasena cittam sattadhā hoti

original: 167. Ekekārammaṇaṃ chakkaṃ, pañcārammaṇabhedato chaḷārammaṇato ceva chaḷārammaṇacittavasena mano cittaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: eka eka ārammaṇam chakkam pañca ārammaṇa bhedataḥ chaṭ ārammaṇataḥ ca iva chaṭ ārammaṇa citta vasena mano cittam aṭṭhavidham hoti

original: 168. Tattha tasmiṃ citte dvepañcaviññāṇā ekekagocarā honti, dve cittuppādā rūpārammaṇikā, dve dve cittuppādā saddādigocarā.
analyzed: tattha tasmim citte dve pañca viññāṇāḥ ekeka gocarāḥ honti dve cittuppādāḥ rūpa ārammaṇikāḥ dve dve cittuppādā sadda ādi gocarā

original: 169. Pañcābhiññāvivajjitaṃ sabbaṃ mahaggataṃ, sabbaṃ lokuttarañca iti idaṃ cittaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ bhave.
analyzed: pañca abhiññā vivajjitam sabbam mahaggatam sabbam lokuttaram ca iti idam cittam eka eka ārammaṇam bhave

original: 170. Idaṃ chakkaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ vibhāvinā ñeyyaṃ, manodhātuttayaṃ pañcārammaṇikaṃ nāma bhave.
analyzed: idam chakkam eka eka ārammaṇam vibhāvinā ñeyyam manaḥ dhātu tayam pañca ārammaṇikam nāma bhave

original: 171. Kāmāvacaracittāni cattālīsaṃ tathā ekekaṃ sabbāni abhiññāni ca chaḷārammaṇikānīti chaḷārammaṇikāni nāma paṇḍitena viññeyyāni.
analyzed: kāmāvacara cittāni cattālīsam tathā ekekam sabbāni abhiññāni ca chaṭṭha ārammaṇikāni iti chaṭṭha ārammaṇikāni nāma paṇḍitena viññeyyāni

original: 172. Sattaviññāṇadhātūsu pacchimaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuñca kusalākusalābyākatavasena tidhā katvā navavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
analyzed: satta viññāṇa dhātūsu pacchimam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuñca kusala akusala abyākata vasena tidhā katvā navavidham cittam hoti

original: 173. Manoviññāṇadhātuyā bhedo puññāpuññavaseneva vipākakiriyabhedato chasattatividho hoti.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyāḥ bhedo puñña apuñña vasena iva vipāka kiriya bhedato cha sattatividhaḥ hoti

original: 174. Manodhātuṃ vipākakiriyabhedato dvidhā katvā pubbe vuttehi navadhā cittehi mānasaṃ dasadhā hoti.
analyzed: manaḥ dhātum vipāka kiriya bhedataḥ dvidhā katvā pubbe vuttehi navadhā cittehi mānasam dasadhā hoti

original: 175. Pacchimaṃ dhātudvayaṃ manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātudvayaṃ, manodhātuṃ kusalavipākaakusalavipākakiriyāvasena
analyzed: pacchimam dhātu dvayam manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dvayam manaḥ dhātum kusala vipāka akusala vipāka kiriyā vasena

original: tidhā katvā, manoviññāṇadhātuñca kusalākusalābyākatavasena tividhā katvā cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi
analyzed: tidhā katvā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuñca kusala akusala abyākata vasena tividhā katvā cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇehi

original: saha cittaṃ ekādasavidhaṃ hoti, iti idaṃ vacanaṃ paṇḍito paridīpaye.
analyzed: saha cittam ekādasavidham iti idam vacanam paridīpaye

original: 176. Manoviññāṇadhātumpi kusalākusalādito kusalākusalavipākakiriyāvasena catudhā
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātum pi kusala akusala āditaḥ kusala akusala vipāka kiriyā vasena catudhā

original: vibhajitvāna taṃ cittaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi saha tippakārāya manodhātuyā
analyzed: vibhajitvāna tam cittam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇehi saha tippakārāya manaḥ dhātuyā

original: ca saha dvādasadhāpi dhīro vade.
analyzed: ca saha dvādasadhā api dhīraḥ vade

original: 177-9. Cittaṃ cuddasaṭṭhānabhedena cuddasadhā bhave, paṭisandhiyā vasena ca bhavaṅgavasena
analyzed: cittam cuddasa ṭṭhāna bhedena cuddasadhā bhave paṭisandhiyā vasena ca bhavaṅga vasena

original: ca cutiyā vasena ca āvajjanassa vasena ca pañcannaṃ dassanādīnaṃ kiccānaṃ vasena
analyzed: ca cutiyāḥ vasena ca āvajjanassa vasena ca pañcannam dassana ādīnam kiccānam vasena

original: ca sampaṭicchanacetaso vasena ca santīraṇassa vasena ca voṭṭhabbanajavanānaṃ vasena
analyzed: ca sampaṭicchana cetasaḥ vasena ca santīraṇassa vasena ca voṭṭhabbana javanānam vasena

original: ca, yathā evaṃ tadārammaṇacittassa vasena cāti evaṃ iminā pakārena ṭhānabhedato kiccabhedena
analyzed: ca yathā evam tad ārammaṇa cittassa vasena ca ati evam iminā pakārena ṭhāna bhedato kicca bhedena

original: cuddasadhā cittaṃ hoti, iti idaṃ vacanaṃ dhīro paridīpaye paridīpeyya.
analyzed: cuddasadhā cittam hoti iti idam vacanam dhīro paridīpaye paridīpeyya

original: 180. Bhūmipuggalanānattavasena bhūminānattavasena, puggalanānattavasena ca cittānaṃ pavattito idaṃ cittaṃ bahudhā hoti, iti vacanañca dhīro vibhāvaye pakāseyya.
analyzed: bhūmi puggala nānatta vasena bhūmi nānatta vasena puggala nānatta vasena ca cittānam pavattitaḥ idam cittam bahudhā hoti iti vacanam ca dhīraḥ vibhāvaye pakāseyya

original: 181. Idha imasmiṃ sāsane yo bhikkhu matimā imasmiṃ ekavidhādinaye kusalo cheko hoti,
analyzed: idha imasmim sāsane yaḥ bhikkhu matimā imasmin ekavidha ādinaye kusalaḥ chekaḥ hoti

original: abhidhamme pavattā atthā tassa bhikkhuno hatthagatā hatthapaviṭṭhā āmalakā viya suddhamaṇikā viya honti.
analyzed: abhidhamme pavattā atthā tassa bhikkhuno hattha gatā hattha paviṭṭhāḥ āmalakāḥ viya suddha maṇikāḥ viya honti

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Ekavidhādiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ekavidhādi niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Catuttho paricchedo.
analyzed: catutthaḥ paricchedo

original: 5. Pañcamo paricchedo
analyzed: pañcamo paricchedo

original: Bhūmipuggalacittuppattiniddesavaṇṇanā
Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, buddhivuddhikaraṃ nayaṃ;
analyzed: itas param pavakkhāmi buddhi vuddhi karam nayam

original: Cittānaṃ bhūmisuppattiṃ, puggalānaṃ vasena ca.
analyzed: cittānam bhūmi suppattim puggalānam vasena ca

original: Ahaṃ ito paraṃ buddhivuddhikaraṃ nayaṃ mativaddhikaraṃ nayaṃ pavakkhāmi desessāmi.
analyzed: aham itas param buddhi vuddhi karam nayam mati vaddhi karam nayam pavakkhāmi desessāmi

original: Cittānaṃ bhūmisuppattiṃ puggalānaṃ vasena ca bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ, puggalānaṃ
analyzed: cittānam bhūmi suppattim puggalānam vasena ca bhūmīsu cittānam uppattim puggalānam

original: vasena bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca pavakkhāmi.
analyzed: vasena bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca pavakkhāmi

original: 183. Devā ceva manussā ca, tisso ca apāyabhūmiyo honti, gatiyo pañca tesaṃ devamanussatiracchānapetanirayagatīnaṃ
analyzed: devā ca iva manussā ca tisso ca apāya bhūmiyaḥ honti gatiyaḥ pañca tesam deva manussa tiracchānapeta niraya gatīnam

original: vasena pañca gatiyo niddiṭṭhā satthunā dassitā bhagavatā. Tayo bhavā pana kāmarūpārūpabhavavasena
analyzed: vasena pañca gatiyaḥ niddiṭṭhā satthunā dassitā bhagavatā tayaḥ bhavā pana kāmarūpa arūpa bhava vasena

original: tayo satthunā niddiṭṭhā dassitā.
analyzed: tayo satthunā niddiṭṭhā dassitā

original: 184-5. Bhūmiyo tattha tiṃseva, tāsu tiṃseva puggalā tattha tesu tīsu bhavesu tiṃsa
analyzed: bhūmiyaḥ tattha tiṃsā iva tāsu tiṃsā iva puggalā tattha tesu tīsu bhavesu tiṃsa

original: eva bhūmiyo honti, tāsu bhūmīsu uppannā puggalā tiṃsa eva honti, etāsu bhūmīsu uppannā
analyzed: eva bhūmiyaḥ honti tāsu bhūmīsu uppannā puggalā tiṃsa eva honti etāsu bhūmīsu uppannā

original: sabbe ca pana puggalā paṭisandhikacittānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsati honti. Paṭisandhi ca
analyzed: sabbe ca pana puggalā paṭisandhika cittānam vasena ekūnavīsati honti paṭisandhi ca

original: nāmesā esā paṭisandhi ca nāma duvidhā dvippakārā samudīritā satthunā kathitā.
analyzed: nāma isā esā paṭisandhi ca nāma duvidhā dvippakārā samudīritā satthunā kathitā

original: 186. Acittakā paṭisandhi, sacittakā paṭisandhi ca iti duvidhā paṭisandhi hoti, asaññibrahmānaṃ
analyzed: acittakā paṭisandhi sa cittakā paṭisandhi ca iti duvidhā paṭisandhi hoti asaññi brahmānaṃ

original: paṭisandhi acittakā rūpapaṭisandhi hoti. Sesā rūpapaṭisandhito sesā sacittakā sacittakapaṭisandhi
analyzed: paṭisandhi acittakā rūpa paṭisandhi hoti sesā rūpa paṭisandhito sesā sa cittakā sa cittaka paṭisandhi

original: ñeyyā paṇḍitena jānitabbā. Sā pana sacittakā paṭisandhi ekūnavīsati hoti.
analyzed: ñeyyā paṇḍitena jānitabbā sā pana sa cittakā paṭisandhi ekūnavīsati hoti

original: 187. Paṭisandhivaseneva sacittakapaṭisandhivasena eva vīsati puggalā honti. Idha
analyzed: paṭisandhi vasena iva sacittaka paṭisandhi vasena eva vīsati puggalāḥ honti idha

original: imasmiṃ cittādhikāre cittādhikārattā acittakapaṭisandhi rūpapaṭisandhi na ca uddhaṭā na ca kathitā mayā.
analyzed: imasmin citta adhikāre citta adhikāra ttā acittaka paṭisandhi rūpa paṭisandhi na ca uddhaṭā na ca kathitā mayā

original: 188. Ahetudvitihetūti, puggalā tividhā siyuṃ ahetukadvihetukatihetukā iti tividhā
analyzed: puggalā tividhā siyum ahetuka dvi hetuka ti hetukāḥ iti tividhā

original: tippakārā puggalā siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ. Ariyā pana puggalā aṭṭha iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
analyzed: tippakārā puggalā siyum bhaveyyum ariyā pana puggalā aṭṭha iti evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena

original: sabbe puggalā ekādasa īritā kathitā bhagavatā.
analyzed: sabbe puggalāḥ ekādasaḥ īritā kathitā bhagavatā

original: 189. Bhūmīsu tiṃsabhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ etesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ pabhedato
analyzed: bhūmīsu tiṃsa bhūmīsu cittānam uppattim etesam pana sabbesam puggalānam pabhedato

original: bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca gaṇhato gaṇhantassa mama vacanaṃ nibodhatha, tumhe jānātha suṇātha.
analyzed: bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca gaṇhataḥ gaṇhantassa mama vacanam nibodhatha tumhe jānātha suṇātha

original: 190. Tīsu bhūmīsu kati cittāni jāyanti? Me mayhaṃ vada tāni cittāni tvaṃ kathehi, sabbāsu bhūmīsu cuddasa eva cittāni. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: tīsu bhūmīsu kati cittāni jāyanti me mayham vada tāni cittāni tvam kathehi sabbāsu bhūmīsu cuddasa eva cittāni tam yathā

original: Voṭṭhabbaṃ kāmapuññañca, viyuttāni ca diṭṭhiyā;
analyzed: voṭṭhabbam kāma puññam ca viyuttāni ca diṭṭhiyā

original: Uddhaccasahitañceva, honti sabbattha cuddasa.
analyzed: uddhacca sahitam ca iva honti sabbattha cuddasa

original: 191. Sadā vīsati cittāni, kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ vīsati cittāni kāmeyeva bhave sadā sabbasmiṃ kāle siyuṃ bhaveyyunti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: sadā vīsati cittāni kāmeya iva bhave siyum vīsati cittāni kāmeya iva bhave sadā sabbasmin kāle siyum bhaveyyun ti tam yathā

original: Kāme aṭṭha mahāpākā, domanassadvayampi ca;
analyzed: kāme aṭṭha mahā pākāḥ domanassa dvayam pi ca

original: Tathā ghānādiviññāṇattayaṃ pākā apuññajā.
analyzed: tathā ghāna ādi viññāṇa ttayam pākāḥ apuñña jā

original: Ghānādiviññāṇattayanti kusalavipākaghānādittayaṃ. Pākā apuññajā akusalato jātā ahetukā
analyzed: ghāna ādi viññāṇa ttayanti kusala vipāka ghāna ādi ttayam pākāḥ apuñña jāḥ akusalataḥ jātāḥ ahetukā

original: satta vipākā. Pañca rūpabhaveyeva pañca cittāni rūpabhaveyeva bhavanti. Cattāreva
analyzed: satta vipākā pañca rūpa bhaveya iva pañca cittāni rūpa bhaveya iva bhavanti cattāreva

original: arūpisu cattāri cittāni arūpīsuyeva honti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: arūpisu cattāri cittāni honti tam yathā

original: Rūpeva rūpapākā vāruppapākā arūpisu;
analyzed: rūpā iva rūpa pākāḥ arūpisu

original: Nava mahaggatā pākā, rūpārūpeva jāyare.
analyzed: nava mahaggatā pākāḥ

original: 192. Kāmarūpabhavesveva aṭṭhārasa cittāni bhavanti.
analyzed: kāma rūpa bhavesu eva aṭṭhārasa cittāni bhavanti

original: Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: tam yathā

original: Puññarūpāni pañceva, puññajaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ;
analyzed: puñña rūpāni pañca iva puñña jam sampaṭicchanam

original: Cakkhusotadvayaṃ puññapākaṃ santīraṇadvayaṃ.
analyzed: cakkhu sota dvayam puñña pākam santīraṇa dvayam

original: Puññapākaṃ hasituppādamanodhātukriyāpi ca;
analyzed: puññapākam hasituppāda manaḥ dhātu kriyā api ca

original: Aṭṭhārasādimaggena, pañca rūpakriyāpi ca;
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa ādi maggena pañca rūpa kriyā api ca

original: Kāmarūpabhavesveva, etāneva sadā siyuṃ.
analyzed: kāma rūpa bhavesu eva etān eva sadā siyum

original: Dvecattālīsa cittāni, honti tīsu bhavesupi dvecattālīsa cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: dvecattālīsa cittāni honti tīsu bhavesu pi dvecattālīsa cittāni honti tam yathā

original: Paṭighadvayavajjitāni, apuññāni daseva ca;
analyzed: paṭigha dvaya vajjitāni apuññāni dasa iva ca

original: Mahāpuññāni aṭṭheva, voṭṭhabbanakriyāni ca.
analyzed: mahā puññāni aṭṭha iva voṭṭhabbana kriyāni ca

original: Puññāruppāni cattāri, āruppakiriyāni ca;
analyzed: puññāruppāni cattāri āruppa kiriyāni ca

original: Kaniṭṭhamaggavajjāni, satta lokuttarāni ca;
analyzed: kaniṭṭha magga vajjāni satta lokuttarāni ca

original: Dvecattālīsa cittāni, honti tīsu bhavesupi.
analyzed: dvecattālīsa cittāni honti tīsu bhavesu pi

original: 193. Ṭhapetvā pana sabbesaṃ, catassopāyabhūmiyo catasso apāyabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā vajjetvā apāyato sesānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ chabbīsabhūmīsu terasa eva cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pana sabbesam catassaḥ upāya bhūmiyaḥ catassaḥ apāya bhūmiyaḥ ṭhapetvā vajjetvā apāyataḥ sesānam sabbesam puggalānam chabbīsa bhūmīsu terasaḥ eva cittāni honti tam yathā

original: Catutthārūpāvacaraṃ, anāgāmiphalādayo;
analyzed: anāgāmi phala ādayaḥ

original: Mahākriyā ca jāyanti, terasāpāyavajjitā.
analyzed: mahā kriyā ca jāyanti terasa apāya vajjitā

original: Anāgāmiphalādayoti ādi-saddena hi arahattaphalāni gahitāni.
analyzed: anāgāmi phala ādayaḥ ti ādi saddena hi arahatta phalāni gahitāni

original: 194. Aparāni catassopi, ṭhapetvāruppabhūmiyo catasso arūpabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu chabbīsabhūmīsu aparāni cha cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: aparāni catasso api ṭhapetvā āruppa bhūmiyaḥ catasso arūpa bhūmiyaḥ ṭhapetvā sesāsu chabbīsa bhūmīsu aparāni cha cittāni jāyanti tam yathā

original: Manodhātukriyañceva, puññajaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ;
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu kriyañca iva puñña jam sampaṭicchanam

original: Cakkhusotadvayaṃ puññapākaṃ santīraṇadvayaṃ;
analyzed: cakkhu sota dvayam puñña pākam santīraṇa dvayam

original: Cheva cittāni jāyanti, tathā uparivajjite.
analyzed: cheva cittāni jāyanti tathā uparivajjite

original: 195. Suddhāvāsikadevānaṃ, ṭhapetvā pañca bhūmiyo pañca bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavīsatibhūmīsu pañca cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: suddhāvāsika devānam ṭhapetvā pañca bhūmiyaḥ pañca bhūmiyaḥ ṭhapetvā pañcavīsati bhūmīsu pañca cittāni jāyanti tam yathā

original: Diṭṭhiyā sampayuttānaṃ, vicikicchāyutaṃ tathā;
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā sampayuttānam vicikicchā yutam tathā

original: Pañca sabbattha jāyanti, suddhāvāsavivajjite.
analyzed: pañca sabbattha jāyanti suddha āvāsa vivajjite

original: Aparāni duve honti, pañcavīsatibhūmisu;
analyzed: aparāni duve honti pañcavīsati bhūmisu

original: Ṭhapetvā nevasaññañca, catassopāyabhūmiyo.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā nevasaññam ca catasso upāya bhūmiyaḥ

original: Catassopāyabhūmiyo nevasaññānāsaññañca ṭhapetvāyeva pañcavīsatibhūmīsu aparāni duve cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: catasso upāya bhūmiyaḥ nevasaññānāsaññañca ṭhapetvāya iva pañcavīsati bhūmīsu aparāni duve cittāni honti tam yathā

original: Ṭhapetvā nevasaññañca, catassopāyabhūmiyo;
analyzed: ṭhapetvā nevasaññam ca catasso upāya bhūmiyaḥ

original: Sesāsu tatiyāruppajavanaṃ jāyati dvayaṃ.
analyzed: sesāsu tatiya āruppa javanam jāyati dvayam

original: 197. Dvepi cittāni jāyanti, catuvīsatibhūmisu catassopāyabhūmiyo ākiñcaññañca nevasaññañca ṭhapetvā sesāsu catuvīsatibhūmīsu dvepi cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: dve api cittāni jāyanti catuvīsati bhūmisu catasso upāya bhūmiyaḥ ākiñcaññam ca nevasaññam ca ṭhapetvā sesāsu catuvīsati bhūmīsu dve api cittāni jāyanti tam yathā

original: Catutthatatiyāruppaṃ, ṭhapetvāpāyabhūmiyo;
analyzed: catuttha tatiya āruppam ṭhapetvā apāya bhūmiyaḥ

original: Sesāsu dutiyāruppa-javanaṃ jāyati dvayaṃ.
analyzed: sesāsu dutiya āruppa javanam jāyati dvayam

original: 198. Apāyabhūmiyo hitvā catasso apāyabhūmiyo tisso upari arūpabhūmiyo hitvā chaḍḍetvā sesāsu tevīsatibhūmīsu dveyeva pana cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: apāya bhūmiyaḥ hitvā catassaḥ apāya bhūmiyaḥ tissaḥ upari arūpa bhūmiyaḥ hitvā chaḍḍetvā sesāsu tevīsati bhūmīsu dveyā iva pana cittāni honti tam yathā

original: Apāyabhūmiyo hitvā, tissocāruppabhūmiyo;
analyzed: apāya bhūmiyaḥ hitvā

original: Sesāsu paṭhamāruppaṃ, javanadvayaṃ jāyati.
analyzed: sesāsu paṭhama āruppam javana dvayam jāyati

original: 199. Arūpe ca apāye ca aṭṭha bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu bāvīsatibhūmīsu ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: arūpe ca apāye ca aṭṭha bhūmiyaḥ ṭhapetvā sesāsu bāvīsati bhūmīsu ekādasavidham cittam hoti tam yathā

original: Sabbaṃ rūpañca vipākaṃ, ṭhapetvā sitamānasaṃ;
analyzed: sabbam rūpam ca vipākam ṭhapetvā sita mānasam

original: Ekādaseva jāyati, apāyārūpavajjite.
analyzed: ekādasā iva jāyati

original: 200. Suddhāvāse apāye ca nava bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekavīsāsu bhūmīsu niccampi cattāro eva mānasā honti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: suddhāvāse apāye ca nava bhūmiyaḥ ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekavīsāsu bhūmīsu niccam pi cattāraḥ eva mānasāḥ honti tam yathā

original: Sotāpattiphalañceva, sakadāgāmiphalampi ca;
analyzed: sa utāpatti phalam ca iva sakadāgāmi phalam pi ca

original: Sakadāgāmimaggo ca, ṭhapetvāpāyasuddhake;
analyzed: sakadāgāmi maggo ca ṭhapetvā apāya suddhake

original: Anāgāmimaggo ceva, ekavīsāsu honti hi.
analyzed: anāgāmi maggo ca iva ekavīsāsu honti hi

original: 201. Ekaṃ sattarasasveva, cittaṃ jāyati bhūmisu suddhāvāsaapāyāruppabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā avasesāsu sattarasasu bhūmīsu ekaṃ cittaṃ jāyati. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: ekam satta rasasu eva cittam jāyati bhūmisu suddhāvāsa apāya āruppa bhūmiyaḥ ṭhapetvā avasesāsu satta rasasu bhūmīsu ekam cittam jāyati tam yathā

original: Suddhāvāse apāye ca, ṭhapetvāruppabhūmiyo;
analyzed: suddhāvāse apāye ca ṭhapetvā āruppa bhūmiyaḥ

original: Ādimaggo eko hoti, sattarasasu bhūmisu.
analyzed: ādimaggaḥ ekaḥ hoti sattarasasu bhūmisu

original: Dvādaseva tu jāyante, ekādasasu bhūmisu;
analyzed: dvādasā iva tu jāyante ekādasasu bhūmisu

original: Ṭhapetvā pana sabbāpi, bhūmiyo hi mahaggatā. –
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pana sabbā api bhūmiyaḥ hi mahaggatā

original: Ekūnavīsatibhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekādasasu bhūmīsu dvādasa cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: ekūnavīsati bhūmiyaḥ ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekādasasu bhūmīsu dvādasa cittāni jāyanti tam yathā

original: Domanassadvayāpuññapākā satta ca puññajaṃ;
analyzed: satta ca puñña jam

original: Ghānādittayaṃ sesāsu, hitvā sabbā mahaggatā.
analyzed: ghāna ādi ttayam sesāsu hitvā sabbā mahaggatā

original: 203. Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ vasena ca manussānaṃ vasena ca sattasu kāmāvacarabhūmīsu aṭṭha cittāni sabbadā jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: kāmāvacara devānam vasena ca manussānam vasena ca sattasu kāmāvacara bhūmīsu aṭṭha cittāni sabbadā jāyanti tam yathā

original: Kāme devamanussānaṃ, mahāpākāni jāyare;
analyzed: kāme deva manussānam mahā pākāni jāyare

original: Sadā sattasu etāni, hitvā tevīsa bhūmiyo.
analyzed: sadā sattasu etāni hitvā tevīsa bhūmiyaḥ

original: 204. Pañcamajjhānapākeko, jāyate chasu bhūmisu eko pañcamajjhānavipāko vehapphalādīsu
chasu bhūmīsu jāyati. Cattāri pana rūpavipākacittāni tīsu tīsu bhūmīsu jāyanti. Ayametthādhippāyo
analyzed: chasu bhūmīsu jāyati cattāri pana rūpa vipāka cittāni tīsu tīsu bhūmīsu jāyanti ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ

original: – eko paṭhamarūpavipāko brahmapārisajjabrahmapurohitamahābrahmānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati,
analyzed: ekaḥ paṭhama rūpa vipākaḥ brahma pārisajja brahmapurohita mahābrahmānam tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati

original: eko dutiyarūpavipāko, eko tatiyarūpavipāko ca parittābhāappamāṇābhāābhassarānaṃ tīsu
analyzed: ekaḥ dutiya rūpa vipāko ekaḥ tatiya rūpa vipāko ca tīsu

original: bhūmīsu jāyati, eko catuttharūpavipāko parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati.
analyzed: bhūmīsu jāyati ekaḥ catuttha rūpa vipāko tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati

original: 205. Cattāri pana cittāni, honti ekekabhūmisu arūpāvacaravipākānaṃ vasena cattāri
analyzed: cattāri pana cittāni honti ekeka bhūmisu arūpāvacara vipākānam vasena cattāri

original: pana cittāni ekekabhūmīsu ekekāsu bhūmīsu honti, iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
analyzed: pana cittāni ekeka bhūmīsu ekekāsu bhūmīsu honti iti evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena

original: sabbāsu bhūmīsu cittuppādaṃ paridīpaye paṇḍito katheyya.
analyzed: sabbāsu bhūmīsu cittuppādam paridīpaye katheyya

original: 206-7. Kusalākusalā kāme kāme vīsati kusalākusalā, tesaṃ pākā ahetukā tesaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ
analyzed: kusala akusalā kāme kāme vīsati kusala akusalā tesam pākāḥ ahetukā tesam kusala akusalānam

original: ahetukā pañcadasa vipākā āvajjanadvayañca iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sattatiṃsa
analyzed: ahetukā pañcadasa vipākāḥ āvajjana dvayam ca iti evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena sattatiṃsa

original: mānasā narakādīsu catūsu apāyesupi jāyare. Avasesāni dvipaññāsa cittāni kadācipi
analyzed: mānasāḥ naraka ādīsu catūsu apāyesu pi avasesāni dvipaññāsa cittāni kadāci pi

original: kismiñci kālepi nuppajjanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: kismiṃcid kāle pi na uppajjanti tam yathā

original: Pañcadasāni rūpe tu, arūpe dvādasīritā;
analyzed: pañcadasāni rūpe tu arūpe dvādasī īritā

original: Aṭṭha lokuttarāneva, kāmapākā sahetukā.
analyzed: aṭṭha kāmapākā sa hetukā

original: Aṭṭha mahākriyā ceva, hasituppādamānasaṃ;
analyzed: mahā kriyā ca iva hasituppāda mānasam

original: Dvipaññāsāni cittāni, apāyesu na jāyare.
analyzed: dvipaññāsāni cittāni apāyesu na jāyare

original: 208. Kāme devamanussānaṃ kāmāvacare devamanussānaṃ mahaggatā nava pākā neva jāyanti, asīti hadayā mānasā sadā jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: kāme deva manussānam kāmāvacare deva manussānam mahaggatāḥ nava pākāḥ na iva jāyanti asi iti hadayā mānasā sadā jāyanti tam yathā

original: Dvādasākusalāneva, kusalānekavīsati;
analyzed: dvādasa akusalān eva kusalān ekavīsati

original: Sattavīsati pākā ca, mahaggatavivajjitā.
analyzed: sattavīsati pākā ca mahaggata vivajjitā

original: Kāme devamanussānaṃ, kriyacittāni vīsati;
analyzed: kāme deva manussānam kriya cittāni vīsati

original: Honti asīti cittāni, viññeyyāni vibhāvinā.
analyzed: honti asi iti cittāni viññeyyāni vibhāvinā

original: 209-12. Kāme kāmāvacare aṭṭha mahāvipākā domanassadvayampi ca tathā ghānādiviññāṇattayaṃ
analyzed: kāme kāmāvacare aṭṭha mahā vipākāḥ domanassa dvayam pi ca tathā ghāna ādi viññāṇa ttayam

original: kusalavipākaṃ apuññajā satta pākā. Natthi āruppapākā ca, rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ arūpapākā
analyzed: kusala vipākam a puñña jāḥ satta pākā natthi āruppa pākā ca rūpāvacara bhūmiyam arūpa pākā

original: ca cattāro rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ natthi. Ayametthādhippāyo – rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ aṭṭha
analyzed: ca cattāro rūpāvacara bhūmiyam natthi ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ rūpāvacara bhūmiyam aṭṭha

original: mahāvipākā kāmasugatisattānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipākacittattā na honti, jhānena vikkhambhitattā
analyzed: mahā vipākā kāma sugati sattānam dvinnam vipāka citta ttāḥ na honti jhānena vikkhambhita ttā

original: domanassadvayampi natthi, ghānajivhākāyapasādavirahitattā kusalavipākaṃ ghānādittayaṃ
analyzed: domanassa dvayam pi natthi ghāna jivhā kāya pasāda virahita ttā kusala vipākam

original: natthi, aniṭṭhārammaṇānaṃ abhāvato satta akusalavipākā ca natthi, arūpapākā ca natthi.
analyzed: natthi aniṭṭha ārammaṇānaṃ abhāvato satta akusala vipākā ca natthi arūpa pākā ca natthi

original: Kasmā? Arūpānaṃ vipākacittattā. Imehi saha cittehi imehi catuvīsaticittehi saha tayo
analyzed: kasmai arūpānam vipāka citta ttā imehi saha cittehi imehi catuvīsati cittehi saha

original: maggā phaladvayaṃ sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo ca sotāpattiphalasakadāgāmiphalāni
analyzed: phala dvayam sotāpatti maggo sakadāgāmi maggo anāgāmi maggo ca sotāpatti phala sakadāgāmi phalāni

original: ca cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā vicikicchāsaṃyuttampi ca cattāro heṭṭhimā pākā ca suddhāvāse
analyzed: ca cattāraḥ diṭṭhi saṃyuttā vicikicchā saṃyuttam pi ca cattāro heṭṭhimā pākā ca suddhāvāse

original: na labbhare na labbhanti. Ayametthādhippāyo – puthujjanasotāpannasakadāgāmipuggalānaṃ
analyzed: na na labbhanti ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ puthujjana sotāpanna sakadāgāmi puggalānam

original: asādhāraṇattā suddho ca āvāso, atha vā ghorātikkamaṭṭhitattā anāgāmipuggalā suddhā
analyzed: asādhāraṇa ttā suddhaḥ ca āvāsaḥ atha vā ghora atikkama ṭṭhita ttā anāgāmi puggalā suddhā

original: nāma, caturoghatiṇṇattā khīṇāsavā suddhā nāma, tesaṃ suddhānaṃ dvinnaṃ uttamasattānaṃ
analyzed: nāma catur ogha tiṇṇattā khīṇa āsavā suddhāḥ nāma tesam suddhānam dvinnam uttamasattānam

original: āvāsotipi suddhāvāso, tasmiṃ.
analyzed: āvāsaḥ tipi suddha āvāsaḥ tasmin

original: Ayametthādhippāyo – suddhāvāse pana sotāpattimaggasotāpattiphalasakadāgāmimaggasakadāgāmiphalaanāgāmimaggā
analyzed: ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ suddhāvāse pana sotāpatti magga sotāpatti phala sakadāgāmi magga sakadāgāmi phala anāgāmi maggā

original: na vijjanti. Kasmāti ce? Anāgāmiphalaṭṭhānaṃyeva tasmiṃ uppajjanato cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā
analyzed: na vijjanti kasmā iti ce anāgāmi phala ṭṭhānam yeva tasmim uppajjanataḥ cattāraḥ diṭṭhi saṃyuttā

original: ca vicikicchāyuttañca pañca akusalacittānaṃ sotāpannena vināsitattā, iti tasmā kāraṇā

analyzed: na jāyanti cattāro heṭṭhima vipākāḥ heṭṭhimānam rūpa brahmānam vipāka citta ttā natthi

original: Sesāni ekapaññāsa cittāni suddhāvāse pana labbhanti. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: sesāni ekapaññāsa cittāni suddhāvāse pana labbhanti tam yathā

original: Diṭṭhiyā vippayuttāni, uddhaccasahagataṃ tathā;
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā vippayuttāni uddhacca sahagatam tathā

original: Kāmapuññāni aṭṭha ca, rūpapuññāni pañca vā.
analyzed: kāma puññāni aṭṭha ca rūpa puññāni pañca vā

original: Arūpakusalāneva, maggo khīṇāsavassa ca;
analyzed: maggo khīṇāsavassa ca

original: Cakkhusotamanodhātu, puññajā tīraṇā duve.
analyzed: cakkhu sota manaḥ dhātu puñña jā tīraṇā duve

original: Pañcamajjhānapāko ca, anāgāmiphalādayo;
analyzed: ca anāgāmi phala ādayaḥ

original: Suddhāvāsesu labbhanti, kriyacittāni vīsati.
analyzed: suddha āvāsesu labbhanti kriya cittāni vīsati

original: Rūpāvacarikā sabbe sabbāni rūpāvacarāni pañcadasa cittāni, kāmadhātuyā sabbe tevīsati vipākā.
analyzed: rūpāvacarikā sabbe sabbāni rūpāvacarāni pañcadasa cittāni kāmadhātuyā sabbe tevīsati vipākā

original: 213. Domanassādimaggo ca domanassadvayañca ādimaggo ca sotāpattimaggo ca, kriyā ca
analyzed: domanassa ādi maggo ca ādi maggo ca sa utāpatti maggo ca kriyā ca

analyzed: dve kiriyāni ca ati tecattālīsa cittāni

analyzed: viratta ttā natthi cakkhu sota viññāṇāni puññajāni pasāda rahita ttā natthi ghāna ādi viññāṇāni

original: pakatiyāyeva natthi. Kusalavipākā manodhātu cakkhādiggahitapañcārammaṇattā arūpānaṃ
analyzed: pakatiyāya iva natthi kusala vipākā manaḥ dhātu cakkhā ādi gahita pañca ārammaṇa ttā arūpānam

analyzed: rūpa kāya abhāvā natthi pubbā iva diṭṭha saccā ariyā rūpa bhūmikā tasmai ādimaggaḥ api natthi

original: 214. Evaṃ bhūmivaseneva, cittuppattiṃ vibhāvaye evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena bhūmivasena
analyzed: evam bhūmi vasena iva citta uppattim vibhāvaye evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena bhūmi vasena

original: dhīro vibhāvaye katheyya.

original: Kusalākusalā kāme,
analyzed: kusala akusalā kāme

original: Tesaṃ pākā ahetukā;
analyzed: tesam pākāḥ ahetukā

original: Āvajjanadvayañcāti,
analyzed: āvajjana dvayam ca ati

original: Sattatiṃseva mānasāti. –
analyzed: sattatiṃsā iva mānasā ati

original: Ayaṃ vuttatthā.
analyzed: ayam vuttatthā

analyzed: jāyante uppajjanti dve paññāsa avasesāni na jāyanti kadāci pi avasesāni dve paññāsa

original: cittāni kadācipi na jāyanti na uppajjanti, tāni sarūpato vuttāneva.
analyzed: cittāni kadācipi na jāyanti na uppajjanti tāni sarūpataḥ

original: 217. Ahetukassa sattassa uppajjantehi sattatiṃsacittehi saha duhetukā, catumahāvipākā cāti cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekakaṃ duhetukassa sattassa jāyanti.
analyzed: ahetukassa sattassa uppajjantehi sattatiṃsa cittehi saha du hetukā catu mahā vipākā ca ati cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekakam du hetukassa sattassa jāyanti

original: 218-23. Sabbe mahaggatā ceva sabbe sattavīsatividhā mahaggatā ceva sabbepi ca anāsavā
analyzed: sabbe mahaggatā ca iva sabbe sattavīsatividhā mahaggatā ca iva sabbe api ca anāsavā

original: sabbe aṭṭha lokuttarā ceva cattāro tihetukavipākā ca kāme hasituppādo sahetukamahākiriyā
analyzed: sabbe aṭṭha lokuttarā ca iva cattāro ti hetuka vipākā ca kāme hasita uppādo sa hetuka mahā kiriyā

original: cāti nava kriyāpi ceti cattālīsaṃ tathā aṭṭha ca duhetuno sattassa na jāyanti.
analyzed: ca ati nava kriyā api ca iti cattālīsam tathā aṭṭha ca du hetuno sattassa na jāyanti

original: Ayametthādhippāyo – duhetuno rūpārūpasamāpattiyā asamatthatāya sattavīsa mahaggatā
analyzed: ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ du hetuno rūpa arūpa samāpattiyāḥ asamattha tāya sattavīsa mahaggatā

original: na jāyanti, maggaphalaṃ adhigantuṃ asamatthatāya aṭṭha lokuttarā na jāyanti, tihetukavipākā

original: tihetukānaṃ sattānaṃ vipākacittattā na jāyanti, nava kiriyāni khīṇāsavānaṃyeva uppajjamānattā
analyzed: ti hetukānam sattānam vipāka citta ttāḥ na jāyanti nava kiriyāni khīṇa āsavānam yeva uppajjamāna ttā

original: na jāyantīti. Kāmāvacarasattassa, tihetupaṭisandhino puthujjanassa catupaññāsa mānasā
analyzed: na jāyanti iti kāmāvacara sattassa ti hetu paṭisandhino puthujjanassa catupaññāsa mānasā

original: jāyanti. Katamāni tāni? Duhetukassa vuttāni cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekañca kāmadhātuyaṃ

original: Puthujjanassa tihetuno kāmasattassa pañcatiṃsa cittāni na jāyare na jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –

original: Āvajjanadvayaṃ hitvā, aṭṭhārasa kriyāpi ca;

original: Nava mahaggatā pākā, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca.
analyzed: nava mahaggatā pākā aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca

original: Kāmaputhujjanasseva, tihetupaṭisandhino;

original: Pañcatiṃseva cittāni, na jāyanti kadācipi.
analyzed: pañcatiṃsā iva cittāni na jāyanti kadācid pi

original: Chadevesu manussesu cāti sattasu bhūmīsu jātassa sotāpannassa dehino sattassa paññāsa cittāni jāyanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro niddise katheyya. Taṃ yathā –

original: Diṭṭhiyā vippayuttāni, domanassadvayampi ca;
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā vippayuttāni domanassa dvayam pi ca

original: Uddhaccasahitañceva, kāmapuññāni aṭṭha ca.

original: Sabbe kāmavipākā ca, sotāpattiphalampi ca.
analyzed: sabbe kāma vipākā ca sotāpatti phalam pi ca

original: Āvajjanadvayaṃ hitvā, aṭṭhārasa kriyāpi ca;

original: Nava mahaggatā pākā, satta lokuttarāni ca.
analyzed: nava mahaggatā pākā satta lokuttarāni ca

original: Navatiṃsa na jāyanti, sotāpannassa dehino.
analyzed: navatiṃsa na jāyanti sotāpannassa dehino

original: 224. Paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā sotāpannassa puggalassa vuttāni cittāni attano sakadāgāmino phalena sakadāgāmiphalena saha sakadāgāmipuggalassa siyuṃ.

original: cittāni atthi, tāni anāgāmissa sattassa jāyanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise.
analyzed: cittāni atthi tāni anāgāmissa sattassa jāyanti iti vacanam dhīraḥ viniddise

original: jātassa arahato siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ. Taṃ yathā –

original: Tevīsa kāmapākāni, kriyacittāni vīsati;
analyzed: tevīsa kāma pākāni kriya cittāni vīsati

original: Arahattaphaleneva, kāme arahato siyuṃ.
analyzed: arahatta phalena iva kāme arahataḥ siyum

original: 227. Maggaṭṭhānaṃ catunnampi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ maggacittaṃ siyā bhaveyya. Ekacittakkhaṇā hi te hi saccaṃ taṃ mayā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ. Te maggā ekacittakkhaṇā.
analyzed: magga ṭṭhānam catunnam pi tesam puggalānam sakam sakam magga cittam siyā bhaveyya eka citta khaṇāḥ hi te hi saccam tam mayā vuttam vacanam te maggāḥ eka citta khaṇāḥ

original: 228. Puthujjanassa tīsveva, paṭhamajjhānabhūmisu tīsu eva paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa
analyzed: puthujjanassa tīsu eva paṭhamajjhāna bhūmisu tīsu eva paṭhamajjhāna bhūmīsu jātassa

original: uccāreyya. Taṃ yathā –

original: Domanassadvayaṃ hitvā, apuññāni daseva ca;

original: Āvajjanadvayañceva, puññajaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ;

original: Paṭhamajjhānapāko ca, pañcatiṃseva jāyare.
analyzed: ca pañcatiṃsā iva jāyare

analyzed: ghāna ādīsu pasādesu pavattam kusala vipākam viññāṇa ttayam satta apuñña jāḥ pākā

original: tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa sakadāgāmino brahmuno tesu cittesu paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ
analyzed: tīsu paṭhamajjhāna bhūmīsu jātassa sakadāgāminaḥ brahmunaḥ tesu cittesu paṭhamam phalam

original: saha ekatiṃseva cittāni jāyanti.

original: 296. Dharīyatīti gacchanto gacchanto janehi dharīyateti gandho. Gamu sappa gatimhi,

analyzed: tesam pañcannam cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam viññāṇānam tat ca gocaram manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu saṅkhātam

original: javanaṃ pana paccanubhoti. Iti vacanassa bhagavatā vuttattā paṭikkhipitabbā. Rūpādayo
analyzed: javanam pana paccanubhoti iti vacanassa bhagavatā vutta ttā paṭikkhipitabbāḥ rūpa ādayo

original: 304-6. Dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ, rūpādīneva gocarā tāni rūpādīni eva gocarā dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ
analyzed: dibba cakkhu ādi ñāṇānam rūpa ādīn eva gocarā tāni rūpa ādīni eva gocarā dibba cakkhu ādi ñāṇānam

analyzed: anāpātha gatānam eva pākaṭa bhāvam iti pi vacanam vuttam na yujjati yam

analyzed: dhamma jātam rūpa ārammaṇam bhavantam tam dhamma jātam katham kena pakārena dhamma ārammaṇam

original: chabbidhaṃ chappakāraṃ bhagavatā samudīritaṃ. Taṃ parittattikādīnaṃ vasena bahuppakārehi mataṃ.
analyzed: chabbidham cha ppakāram bhagavatā samudīritam tam paritta ttika ādīnam vasena bahu ppakārehi matam

original: 307. Sabbo kāmavipāko ca sabbo tevīsatikāmavipāko ca kriyāhetudvayampi ca manodhātuhasituppādavasena

original: 311. Terasetāni cittāni, jāyante kāmadhātuyaṃ etāni terasa cittāni kāmadhātuyaṃ jāyanti,
analyzed: terasa itāni cittāni jāyante etāni terasa cittāni kāmadhātuyam jāyanti

analyzed: cittāni jāyanti arūpisu arūpa bhūmīsu na iva ekam pi cittam na iva jāyati

original: 312-3. Mahāpākānamaṭṭhannaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ pavattiyaṃ chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ
analyzed: mahāpākānam aṭṭhannam aṭṭhannam mahā vipākānam pavattiyam chasu dvāresu tad ārammaṇa kiccānam

original: rūpādichaparittāni gocarā. Santīraṇattayassapi pavattiyaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇattayakiccassa,
analyzed: gocarā pañca dvāre

original: chadvāresu tadālambaṇakiccassa ca rūpādichaparittāni gocarā. Rūpādayo parittā cha,

original: 314-5. Dutiyāruppacittañca, catutthāruppamānasaṃ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena chabbidhaṃ

original: Dutiyāruppacittañca, catutthāruppamānasaṃ;
analyzed: dutiya āruppa cittam ca catuttha āruppa mānasam
