original: ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi. Kusalārammaṇaṃ kāme kāme aṭṭhavidhaṃ kusalaṃ aṭṭhavidhassa
analyzed: itas param pavakkhāmi kusala ārammaṇam kāme kāme aṭṭhavidham kusalam aṭṭhavidhassa

original: kāmāvacarakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Pubbeva kataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahākusalaṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalassa ārammaṇam hoti katham pubbe eva katam aṭṭhavidham mahākusalam

original: pacchā somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttacittadvayena vā somanassasahagatañāṇavippayuttacittadvayena
analyzed: pacchā somanassa sahagata ñāṇa sampayutta citta dvayena vā somanassa sahagata ñāṇa vippayutta citta dvayena

original: vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇasampayuttadvayena vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇavippayuttadvayena vā
analyzed: vā upekkhā sahagata ñāṇa sampayutta dvayena vā upekkhā sahagata ñāṇa vippayutta dvayena vā

original: anussaraṇakaālādīsu tassa aṭṭhavidhassa kusalassa javanakiccavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
analyzed: anussaraṇaka āla ādīsu tassa aṭṭhavidhassa kusalassa javana kicca vasena ārammaṇam hoti

original: vippaṭisārakālādīsu dvādasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, kusalassa abhiññāmānasassa
analyzed: vippaṭisāra kāla ādīsu dvādasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇam hoti kusalassa abhiññā mānasassa

original: ca kiriyassa abhiññāmānasassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, ekādasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākassa
analyzed: ca kiriyassa abhiññā mānasassa ca ārammaṇam hoti ekādasavidhassa kāmāvacara vipākassa

original: tadārammaṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Tathā kāmakriyassāti javanakiccavasena hasanassa
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa vasena ārammaṇam hoti tathā kāma kriyassa ati javana kicca vasena hasanassa

original: āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa javanakiccavasena mahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
analyzed: āvajjana kicca vasena voṭṭhabbanassa javana kicca vasena mahā kiriyassa ārammaṇam hoti

original: etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ siyā bhaveyya. Rūpāvacarapuññāni pañca tato charāsito
analyzed: etesam channam rāsīnam ārammaṇam siyā bhaveyya rūpāvacara puññāni pañca tato

original: kāmavipākaṃ vajjetvā pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇāni honti. Tadā lobhamūlamohamūlavasena
analyzed: kāma vipākam ārammaṇāni honti tadā lobha mūla moha mūla vasena

original: attanā paṭiladdhajhānānaṃ anussaraṇakāle tassa dasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: attanā paṭiladdha jhānānam anussaraṇa kāle tassa dasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ

original: hoti, tihetukapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa jhānaṃ paccavekkhato jhānārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: hoti ti hetuka paṭisandhino sattassa jhānataḥ parihīnassa jhānam paccavekkhato jhāna ārammaṇam

original: domanassayuttaṃ hoti, tadā tassa paṭighadvayassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kāmakriyassāti ekantaparittārammaṇāni
analyzed: domanassa yuttam hoti tadā tassa paṭigha dvayassa ārammaṇam hoti kāma kriyassa ati ekanta paritta ārammaṇāni

original: kiriyāmanodhātuhasanāni vajjetvā āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa, javanakiccavasena
analyzed: kiriyā manaḥ dhātu hasanāni vajjetvā āvajjana kicca vasena voṭṭhabbanassa javana kicca vasena

original: mahākiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: mahākiriyassa ca ārammaṇam hoti

original: 343. Āruppakusalañcāpi, tebhūmakusalassa ca mahākusalassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakusalassa
analyzed: āruppa kusalam ca api tebhūma kusalassa ca mahā kusalassa ca abhiññā kicca vasena pañcama rūpa kusalassa

original: ca dutiyacatutthaarūpakusalassa ca tebhūmakakriyassāpi voṭṭhabbanassa mahākiriyassa
analyzed: ca dutiya catuttha arūpa kusalassa ca tebhūmaka kriyassa api voṭṭhabbanassa mahā kiriyassa

original: ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca dutiyacatutthāruppakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ca abhiññā kicca vasena pañcama rūpa kiriyassa ca dutiya catuttha āruppa kiriyassa ca ārammaṇam

original: hoti, dutiyāruppakiriyassa ca paṭhamāruppakiriyāya ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, catutthāruppakiriyassa
analyzed: hoti dutiya āruppa kiriyassa ca paṭhama āruppa kiriyāya ārammaṇena bhavitabbam catuttha āruppa kiriyassa

original: ca tatiyāruppakiriyāya ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, evañca sati kathaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ
analyzed: ca tatiya āruppa kiriyāya ārammaṇena bhavitabbam evam ca sati katham paṭhama āruppa kusalam

original: dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tatiyāruppakusalañca catutthāruppakiriyassa
analyzed: dutiya āruppa kiriyassa ārammaṇam hoti tatiya āruppa kusalam ca catuttha āruppa kiriyassa

original: ārammaṇaṃ hotīti ce vattabbaṃ, yadā puthujjanayogī vā sekkho vā yogī rūpasamāpattiṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti iti ce vattabbam yadā puthujjana yogī vā sekkhaḥ vā yogī rūpa samāpattim

original: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā ākāsānañcāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamāruppasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
analyzed: samāpajjitvā tatas vuṭṭhahitvā ākāsa ānañca āyatana saṅkhātam paṭhama āruppa samāpattim samāpajjitvā

original: vītarāgo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā puthujjanasekkhakāle attanā anadhigataṃ
analyzed: vīta rāgaḥ hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyaḥ gahetvā puthujjana sekkha kāle attanā anadhigatam

original: dutiyaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajji, tadā khīṇāsavakāle samāpajjitaṃ dutiyaṃ arūpakiriyaṃ
analyzed: dutiyam arūpa samāpattim samāpajji tadā khīṇāsava kāle samāpajjitam dutiyam arūpa kiriyam

original: paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, evaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: paṭhama āruppa kusalam ārammaṇam karoti evam paṭhama āruppa kusalam dutiya āruppa kiriyassa ārammaṇam hoti

original: Yadā yogī rūpasamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakusalaṃ
analyzed: yadā yogī rūpa samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tatas vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhama āruppa kusalam dutiya āruppa kusalam

original: tatiyāruppakusalañca samāpajjitvā khīṇāsavo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā
analyzed: tatiya āruppa kusalam ca samāpajjitvā khīṇāsavaḥ hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyaḥ gahetvā

original: attanā anadhigataṃ catutthaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajji, tadā catutthāruppakiriyā
analyzed: attanā anadhigatam catuttham arūpa samāpattim samāpajji tadā catuttha āruppa kiriyā

original: tatiyāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, evaṃ catutthāruppakiriyassa tatiyāruppakusalaṃ
analyzed: tatiya āruppa kusalam ārammaṇam karoti evam catuttha āruppa kiriyassa tatiya āruppa kusalam

original: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, pacchā khīṇāsavakāle samāpajjitā rūpārūpasamāpattiyo honti. Yathā
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti pacchā khīṇāsava kāle samāpajjitāḥ rūpa arūpa samāpattiyaḥ honti yathā

original: hoti, tathā eva akusalassapi ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: hoti tathā eva akusalassa api ārammaṇam hoti

original: 344-7. Arūpāvacarapākānanti jātiniddhāraṇaṃ, catutthadutiyānaṃ arūpapākānampi ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: arūpa avacara pākānam ti jāti niddhāraṇam catuttha dutiyānam arūpa pākānam pi ārammaṇam

original: hoti, “catutthadutiyāna”nti vattabbe tiyānaṃ-saddassa lopaṃ katvā “catutthadū”ti
analyzed: hoti catuttha dutiyānam ti vattabbe tiyānaṃ saddassa lopam katvā catuttha dū ti

original: vuttaṃ, tadā dvinnaṃ arūpapākānaṃ paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppajavanāni ārammaṇāni honti,
analyzed: vuttam tadā dvinnam arūpa pākānam paṭhama āruppa tatiya āruppa javanāni ārammaṇāni honti

original: “yassa kusalassa jhānassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi hotī”ti vacanato
analyzed: yassa kusalassa jhānassa yam ārammaṇam gahetvā brahma loke paṭisandhi hoti iti vacanato

original: sakasakakusalānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāni ākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanāni tesaṃ dutiyacatutthāruppapākānaṃ
analyzed: sa kasaka kusalānam ārammaṇa bhūtāni ākāsa anañcāyatana ākiñcaññāyatanāni tesam dutiya catuttha āruppa pākānam

original: ārammaṇāni honti, evaṃ arūpakusalaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭharāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti. Apariyāpannapuññampi
analyzed: ārammaṇāni honti evam arūpa kusalam imesam aṭṭha rāsīnam ārammaṇa paccayaḥ hoti a pariyāpanna puññam pi

original: catubbidhalokuttarakusalampi kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa
analyzed: catubbidha lokuttara kusalam pi kāmāvacarato kāmāvacara vasena kusalassa ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kusalassa

original: ca kriyassa voṭṭhabbanassa, ñāṇasampayuttato kiriyassa ca rūpato rūpāvacaravasena
analyzed: ca kriyassa voṭṭhabbanassa ñāṇa sampayuttataḥ kiriyassa ca rūpataḥ rūpa avacara vasena

original: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa cāti catunnaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: pañcamassa rūpa kusalassa ca pañcamassa rūpa kiriyassa ca ati catunnam rāsīnam ārammaṇaṃ

original: sadā hoti, ayamettha adhippāyo – sekkhānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa, voṭṭhabbanassa,
analyzed: sadā hoti ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ sekkhānam ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kusalassa voṭṭhabbanassa

original: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca tividhaṃ lokuttarapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Khīṇāsavassa
analyzed: pañcamassa rūpa kusalassa ca tividham lokuttara puññam ārammaṇam hoti khīṇa āsavassa

original: voṭṭhabbanassa, ñāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca arahattapuññaṃ
analyzed: voṭṭhabbanassa ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kiriyassa pañcamassa rūpa kiriyassa ca arahatta puññam

original: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yathā tathā eva sabbaṃ akusalaṃ kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti yathā tathā eva sabbam akusalam kāmāvacarato kāmāvacara vasena kusalassa

original: mahākusalassa, kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato pana rūpāvacaravasena
analyzed: mahā kusalassa kriyassa hasana voṭṭhabbana mahā kiriyassa ca rūpāvacarataḥ pana rūpāvacara vasena

original: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, yathā tathā
analyzed: pañcamassa rūpa kusalassa pañcamassa rūpa kiriyassa ca ārammaṇam hoti yathā tathā

original: eva sabbassa akusalassa ca kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ tadārammaṇakiccavasena ekādasannañcāti
analyzed: eva sabbassa akusalassa ca kāmāvacara vipākānam tad ārammaṇa kicca vasena

original: channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ bhagavatā īritaṃ.
analyzed: channam ārammaṇam bhagavatā īritam

original: 348-352. Vipākārammaṇaṃ kāme sabbaṃ vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi kāmāvacaravasenapi
analyzed: vipāka ārammaṇam kāme sabbam vipāka ārammaṇam kāmāvacarataḥ pi kāmāvacara vasena api

original: kusalassa mahākusalassa, kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato
analyzed: kusalassa mahā kusalassa kriyassa hasana voṭṭhabbana mahā kiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato

original: ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca
analyzed: ca iva rūpāvacara vasena ca eva pañcamassa rūpa kusalassa pañcamassa rūpa kiriyassa ca

original: kāmāvacarapākānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekādasannañca tatheva akusalassa ca channaṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacara pākānam kāmāvacara vipākānam tathā iva akusalassa ca channam

original: rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Rūpe vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti rūpe vipāka ārammaṇam kāmāvacarataḥ api ca kāmāvacara vasena api

original: ca kusalassa mahākusalassa, kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato
analyzed: ca kusalassa mahā kusalassa kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbana mahā kiriyassa ca rūpa avacarato

original: ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva kusalassa ca apuññassa cāti pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocaro
analyzed: ca iva rūpāvacara vasena ca eva kusalassa ca apuññassa ca ati pañcannam rāsīnam gocaro

original: hoti, arūpāvacarapākesu ayaṃ nayo bhagavatā mato. Vaṭṭe na pariyāpannā nappaviṭṭhāti
analyzed: hoti arūpāvacara pākesu ayam nayaḥ bhagavatā mataḥ vaṭṭe na pariyāpannā na paviṭṭhā ati

original: apariyāpannā, tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pākāpi kāmato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa,
analyzed: apariyāpannā tesam puggalānam kāmataḥ kāmāvacara vasena kusalassa ñāṇa sampayutta mahākusalassa

original: kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa ca rūpatopi rūpāvacaravasenapi
analyzed: kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbana ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kiriyassa ca rūpataḥ api rūpāvacara vasena api

original: kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca evaṃ
analyzed: kusalassa pañcamassa rūpa kusalassa kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpa kiriyassa ca evam

original: ārammaṇaṃ hotīti. Etthāyamadhippāyo apariyāpannapuññe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti iti ettha ayam adhippāyaḥ apariyāpanna puññe vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: 353-6. Kāme idaṃ sabbakiriyacittaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi ca kusalassa
analyzed: kāme idam sabba kiriya cittam kāmāvacarataḥ pi ca kāmāvacara vasena api ca kusalassa

original: mahākusalassa, kriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena
analyzed: mahā kusalassa kriyassa ca hasana voṭṭhabbana mahā kiriyassa ca rūpāvacarataḥ ca iva rūpāvacara vasena

original: ca eva kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca
analyzed: ca eva kusalassa pañcamassa rūpa kusalassa kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpa kiriyassa ca

original: ekādasakāmāvacarapākassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ekādasa kāmāvacara pākassa ca tathā iva akusalassa ca etesam channam rāsīnam ārammaṇaṃ

original: hoti. Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe rūpāvacare yaṃ kiriyāmānasaṃ, kāmapākaṃ tato vinā tato
analyzed: yam kriyā mānasam rūpe rūpāvacare yam kiriyā mānasam kāma pākam tatas vinā

original: rāsito kāmapākaṃ vinā vajjetvā pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kāmāvacarato
analyzed: rāsito kāma pākam vinā vajjetvā pañcannam pana rāsīnam ārammaṇam hoti kāma avacarato

original: kāmāvacaravasena kiriyassa voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, hasanaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā
analyzed: kāmāvacara vasena kiriyassa voṭṭhabbana mahā kiriyassa ārammaṇam hoti hasanam ekanta paritta ārammaṇa ttā

original: rūpakiriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karoti. Kriyācittaṃ panāruppe arūpakiriyācittaṃ pana tesaṃ
analyzed: rūpa kiriyam ārammaṇam na karoti kriyā cittam pana āruppe arūpa kiriyā cittam pana tesam

original: pañcannaṃ eva ca rāsīnaṃ āruppakriyassāpi paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa
analyzed: pañcannam eva ca rāsīnam āruppa kriyassa api paṭhama āruppa kiriyam dutiya āruppa kiriyassa

original: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tatiyāruppakiriyaṃ catutthāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Iti channaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti tatiya āruppa kiriyam catuttha āruppa kiriyassa ārammaṇam hoti iti channam

original: rāsīnaṃ gocaro hotiyeva.
analyzed: rāsīnam gocaraḥ hotiyā iva

original: Rūpaṃ catusamuṭṭhānaṃ, rūpārammaṇasaññitaṃ;
analyzed: rūpam catu samuṭṭhānam rūpa ārammaṇa saññitam

original: Kāmāvacarapuññassa, tatheva kusalassa ca;
analyzed: kāmāvacara puññassa tathā iva kusalassa ca

original: Abhiññādvayacittassa, kāmapākakriyassa ca.
analyzed: abhiññā dvaya cittassa kāma pāka kriyassa ca

original: Dvicakkhuviññāṇamanodhātudvayasantīraṇattayamahāpākassa ca kāmakiriyassa cāti ekādasavidhassa kāmakiriyassa ca channaṃ etesaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
analyzed: dvi cakkhu viññāṇa manaḥ dhātu dvaya santīraṇa ttaya mahā pākassa ca kāmakiriyassa ca ati ekādasavidhassa kāmakiriyassa ca channam etesam rāsīnam ārammaṇa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 359-360. Nibbānārammaṇaṃ kāmarūpāvacarato kāmarūpāvacaravasena sekkhānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa,
analyzed: nibbāna ārammaṇam kāmarūpāvacarato kāmarūpāvacara vasena sekkhānam ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kusalassa

original: rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca kāmarūpakiriyassa ca khīṇāsavānaṃ voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa
analyzed: rūpāvacara vasena pañcamassa rūpa kusalassa ca kāmarūpa kiriyassa ca khīṇa āsavānam voṭṭhabbana ñāṇa sampayutta mahā kiriyassa

original: ca pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca ubhayassāpi cittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Apariyāpannato ceva
analyzed: ca pañcama rūpa kiriyassa ca ubhayassa api cittassa ārammaṇam hoti a pariyāpannato ca iva

original: lokuttaravasena ca eva phalassa, kusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
analyzed: lokuttara vasena ca eva phalassa kusalassa ca etesam channam rāsīnam ārammaṇa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 361-2. Nānappakārakaṃ sabbaṃ, paññattārammaṇaṃ pana tebhūmakassa puññassa mahākusalassa,
analyzed: nānā ppakārakam sabbam paññatta ārammaṇam pana tebhūmakassa puññassa mahā kusalassa

original: suddhajhānassa pañcavidhassa rūpakusalassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakusalassa ca tatheva
analyzed: suddha jhānassa pañcavidhassa rūpa kusalassa paṭhama āruppa tatiya āruppa kusalassa ca tathā iva

original: akusalassa ca rūpārūpavipākassa sabbassa rūpavipākassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppavipākassa
analyzed: akusalassa ca rūpa arūpa vipākassa sabbassa rūpa vipākassa paṭhama āruppa tatiya āruppa vipākassa

original: ca tebhūmakakriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa sabbassa rūpakiriyassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakiriyassa
analyzed: ca tebhūmaka kriyassa ca hasana voṭṭhabbana mahā kiriyassa sabbassa rūpa kiriyassa paṭhama āruppa tatiya āruppa kiriyassa

original: cāti navannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
analyzed: ca ati navannam pana rāsīnam ārammaṇa paccayaḥ hoti

Anantañāṇena niraṅgaṇena,

original: 380-1. Tihetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ tihetukaṃ

original: bhavanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise.
analyzed: bhavanti iti vacanam dhīraḥ viniddise

original: 404-6. Yathā cakkhudvāre dvādasa vipākāni honti, tathā evaṃ sotādīsu dvāresupi dvādasa
analyzed: yathā cakkhu dvāre dvādasa vipākāni honti tathā evam sota ādīsu dvāresu pi dvādasa

original: pākāni honti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro niddise, ime mayā vuttā vipākā samasaṭṭhi bhavanti.
analyzed: pākāni honti iti vacanam dhīraḥ niddise ime mayā vuttā bhavanti

original: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite samasaṭṭhi
analyzed: evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite

original: vipākāni uppajjanti, imasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi. Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu
analyzed: vipākāni uppajjanti imasmim vacane saṃsayaḥ natthi gahita a gahaṇena ittha ettha etesu

original: vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre dvādasa pākā, sotaviññāṇakādīni
analyzed: vipākesu gahitānam vipākānam aggahaṇena cakkhu dvāre dvādasa pākā sota viññāṇaka ādīni

original: cattāri cāti soḷasa pākāni honti.
analyzed: cattāri ca ati soḷasa pākāni honti

original: 407-11. Ekena tihetukakusalena asaṅkhārikena kammena āyūhite yathā, evameva sasaṅkhāratihetukakusalenāpi
analyzed: ekena ti hetuka kusalena asaṅkhārikena kammena āyūhite yathā evam eva sa saṅkhāra ti hetuka kusalena api

original: asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraupekkhāsahagatehipi kusalehi kamme āyūhite pavattite tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: asaṅkhāra sa saṅkhāra aupekkhā sahagatehi pi kusalehi kamme āyūhite pavattite tesam tiṇṇam

original: kusalānaṃ vipākehi tīhipi dinnāya paṭisandhiyā eseva nayo paṇḍitena jānitabbo. Idha
analyzed: kusalānam vipākehi tīhi pi dinnāya paṭisandhiyā esa iva nayaḥ paṇḍitena jānitabbaḥ idha

original: imasmiṃ upekkhāsahagatadvaye iṭṭhamajjhattagocarassa vasena vipākacittappavattiṃ
analyzed: imasmin upekkhā sahagata dvaye iṭṭham ajjhatta gocarassa vasena vipāka citta ppavattim

original: paṭhamaṃ dassetvā dassetabbātha pacchā tu, iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha atha pacchā mayā
analyzed: paṭhamam dassetvā dassetabbā atha pacchā tu iṭṭhasmin gocare atha pacchā mayā

original: vuttacittappavattito pacchākāle pana idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhagocare ekekasmiṃ pana dvādasa
analyzed: vutta citta ppavattitaḥ pacchā kāle pana idha imasmin iṭṭha gocare ekekasmin pana dvādasa

original: dvādasa pākā paṇḍitena dassetabbā. Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ
analyzed: dvādasa pākā paṇḍitena dassetabbā gahitā gahaṇena ittha ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānam

original: vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena soḷasa pākacittāni honti. Pubbe kāle mayā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ
analyzed: vipākānam aggahaṇena soḷasa pākacittāni honti pubbe kāle mayā vutta nayena iva sabbam

original: vacanaṃ asesato asesabhāvena paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ.
analyzed: vacanam asesataḥ asesa bhāvena paṇḍitena ñeyyam

original: 412-4. Tihetukena kammena, paṭisandhi tihetukā bhavati, iti ayaṃ vāro ettāvatā ettakena
analyzed: ti hetukena kammena paṭisandhi ti hetukā bhavati iti ayam vāraḥ ettāvatā ettakena

original: vacanena mayā vutto. Ekaṃ kammaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janeti, tato paṭisandhito
analyzed: vacanena mayā vuttaḥ ekam kammam ekasmin bhave ekam paṭisandhim janeti tatas paṭisandhito

original: aparaṃ aññaṃ dutiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ na janeti, pavattiyaṃ anekāni vipākāni sañjaneti.
analyzed: aparam aññam dutiyam paṭisandhim na janeti pavattiyam anekāni vipākāni sañjaneti

original: Hi saccaṃ “ekaṃ kamma”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Ekasmā bījā ekato bījato ekaṃ aṅkuraṃ jāyati,
analyzed: hi saccam ekam vacanam ekasmai bījā ekataḥ bījataḥ ekam aṅkuram jāyati

original: assa bījassa bahūni phalāni hetuppavattito salilādihetuppattiyā honti.
analyzed: assa bījassa bahūni phalāni hetu pavattitaḥ salila ādi hetu pattiyā honti

original: 415-21. Duhetukena kammena, paṭisandhi duhetukā hoti, iti vacanaṃ ayaṃ vāro anupubbena
analyzed: du hetukena kammena paṭisandhi du hetukā hoti iti vacanam ayam vāraḥ anupubbena

original: anupaṭipāṭiyā āgato. Idha imasmiṃ adhikāre duhetukena puññena somanassayuttena asaṅkhārikena
analyzed: anupaṭipāṭiyā āgataḥ idha imasmin adhikāre du hetukena puññena somanassa yuttena asaṅkhārikena

original: cittena kamme āyūhite pana duhetukena somanassayuttakusalena tulyena pākena yena
analyzed: cittena kamme āyūhite pana du hetukena somanassa yutta kusalena tulyena pākena yena

original: sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce, iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgate
analyzed: sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhu dvāre āpātham āgate

original: somanassayutte ñāṇahīne kusalamānase tasmiṃ duhetuke sattakkhattuṃ javitvāna gate
analyzed: somanassa yutte ñāṇa hīne kusala mānase tasmin du hetuke sattakkhattum gate

original: taṃ eva ārammaṇaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ tassa javanassa anantaraṃ taṃsarikkhakaṃ tena
analyzed: tam eva ārammaṇam katvā tad anantaram tassa javanassa anantaram taṃsarikkhakam tena

original: javanena sadisaṃ ekantaṃ asaṅkhārikamānasaṃ jāyati. Tanti taṃ cittaṃ mūlabhavaṅganti
analyzed: javanena sadisam ekantam asaṅkhārika mānasam jāyati cittam

original: mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma tadārammaṇamiccapi tadārammaṇaṃ nāma ubhayampi nāmaṃ tasseva nāmaṃ
analyzed: mūla bhavaṅgam nāma tad ārammaṇam icca api tad ārammaṇam nāma ubhayam pi nāmam tassa eva nāmam

original: tassa cittassa eva nāmaṃ. Iti evaṃ iminā pakārena bhagavatā paridīpitaṃ. Duhetuke
analyzed: tassa cittassa eva nāmam iti evam iminā pakārena bhagavatā paridīpitam du hetuke

original: sasaṅkhāre kusale javane javitepi ca taṃsamaṃ tena cittena sadisaṃ āgantukasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: sa saṅkhāre kusale javane javite pi ca taṃsamam tena cittena sadisam āgantuka saṅkhātam

original: tadārammaṇamānasaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa mānasam hoti

original: 422-9. Tatheva ca tathā eva ca iṭṭhamajjhattagocare duhetūnaṃ dvinnaṃ upekkhāyuttānaṃ
analyzed: tathā iva ca tathā eva ca iṭṭha majjhatta gocare du hetūnam dvinnam upekkhā yuttānam

original: javanānaṃ anantaraṃ tādisāni tehi javanehi sadisāni dve tadārammaṇamānasāni jāyante,
analyzed: anantaram tādisāni tehi javanehi sadisāni dve tad ārammaṇa mānasāni jāyante

original: tesaṃ tadārammaṇamānasānaṃ “piṭṭhibhavaṅga”nti nāmaṃ, “āgantukabhavaṅga”nti ca nāmaṃ
analyzed: tesam tad ārammaṇa mānasānam piṭṭhi bhavaṅganti nāmam āgantuka bhavaṅganti ca nāmam

original: hoti. Santīraṇadvayañceva dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ imāni dve bhavaṅgāni cāti aṭṭha
analyzed: hoti santīraṇa dvayam ca iva dassanam sampaṭicchanam imāni dve bhavaṅgāni ca ati aṭṭha

original: vipākā cakkhudvāre honti. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi ca aṭṭha
analyzed: vipākā cakkhu dvāre honti evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena pañcasu dvāresu pi ca aṭṭha

original: aṭṭha vipāke katvā pavattiyaṃ cattālīsa vipākāni bhavanti. Gahitāggahaṇenettha, cakkhudvāre
analyzed: aṭṭha vipāke katvā pavattiyam cattālīsa vipākāni bhavanti gahitā gahaṇena ittha cakkhu dvāre

original: panaṭṭha ca ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre aṭṭha
analyzed: ca ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānam vipākānam aggahaṇena cakkhu dvāre aṭṭha

original: ca vipākā sotaghānādinā vipākena saddhiṃ dvādasa eva vipākāni bhavanti. Ekāya cetanāyevaṃ
analyzed: ca sota ghāna ādinā vipākena saddhim dvādasaḥ eva vipākāni bhavanti ekāya cetanāya ivam

original: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite pana sati dvādaseva
analyzed: evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite pana sati dvādasā iva

original: vipākāni bhavanti. Iti vacanaṃ vijitakusalayuddhasaṅgāmena pakāsitaṃ desitaṃ. Duhetukattayenāpi,
analyzed: vipākāni bhavanti iti vacanam vijita kusala yuddha saṅgāmena pakāsitam desitam

original: sesena sadisena tu mayā vuttato duhetuto sesena duhetukattayenāpi sadisena pākena
analyzed: sesena sadisena tu mayā vuttataḥ du hetuto sesena du hetuka ttayena api sadisena pākena

original: ādinnasandhino gahitapaṭisandhikassa sattassa evaṃ nayo mato kathito niraṅgaṇena.
analyzed: ādinna sandhinaḥ gahita paṭisandhikassa sattassa evam nayaḥ mataḥ kathitaḥ niraṅgaṇena

original: Duhetukena kammena duhetukā paṭisandhi hoti. Iti ayaṃ vāro ca ettāvatā ettakena vacanena mayā vutto.
analyzed: du hetukena kammena du hetukā paṭisandhi hoti iti ayam vāraḥ ca ettāvatā ettakena vacanena mayā vutto

original: 430-8. Duhetukena kammena ahetukā paṭisandhi hoti, iti ayaṃ vāro anupubbena paṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: du hetukena kammena ahetukā paṭisandhi hoti iti ayam vāraḥ anupubbena paṭipāṭiyā

original: āgato. Tesu catūsupi duhetukesu kusalesu cittesu aññatareneva hetukena kamme āyūhite
analyzed: āgataḥ tesu catūsu pi du hetukesu kusalesu cittesu aññatarena iva hetukena kamme āyūhite

original: pavattite sati tasseva duhetukassa kusalajavanassa pākabhūtāya upekkhāsahagatāhetukāya
analyzed: sati tassa iva du hetukassa kusala javanassa pāka bhūtāya upekkhā sahagata ahetukāya

analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ādinna paṭisandhino sattassa sā paṭisandhi kamma sadisā nāma na

original: vattabbā paṇḍitehi. Hi saccaṃ “paṭisandhi na vattabbā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Kammaṃ duhetukaṃ
analyzed: vattabbā paṇḍitehi hi saccam paṭisandhi na vattabbā ati ādikam vacanam kammam du hetukam

original: hoti, paṭisandhi ahetukā hoti. Tassa dehino sattassa vuḍḍhimupetassa vuḍḍhiṃ upagatassa
analyzed: hoti paṭisandhi ahetukā hoti tassa dehino sattassa vuḍḍhim upetassa vuḍḍhim upagatassa

original: cakkhudvāre pana iṭṭhamajjhattagocare āpāthamāgate sati duhetukānaṃ catunnaṃ puññānaṃ

original: yassa kassaci javanassa avasānamhi idaṃ ahetukaṃ mano tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
analyzed: yassa kassaci javanassa avasānamhi idam ahetukam manaḥ tad ārammaṇa bhāvena jāyati

original: Ettha etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo sandeho natthi, taṃ ahetukacittaṃ mūlabhavaṅgañca tadārammaṇameva
analyzed: ettha etasmim vacane saṃsayaḥ sandehaḥ na atthi tam ahetuka cittam mūla bhavaṅgam ca tad ārammaṇam eva

original: ca hoti. Cakkhuviññāṇakādīsupi vīthicittesu jātesu upekkhāsahagataṃyeva santīraṇampi
analyzed: ca hoti cakkhu viññāṇaka ādīsu pi vīthi cittesu jātesu upekkhā sahagatam yā iva santīraṇam pi

analyzed: ca hoti tesu ekam tesu dvīsu santīraṇa tad ārammaṇa kiccesu

original: aggahaṇena idha iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe gaṇanūpagacittāni tīṇiyeva bhavanti.
analyzed: aggahaṇena idha iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe bhavanti

original: 439-41. Iṭṭhe ārammaṇe cakkhu-dvāre āpāthamāgate tadā santīraṇañceva somanassayuttaṃyeva
analyzed: iṭṭhe ārammaṇe cakkhu dvāre āpātham āgate tadā santi īraṇam ca iva somanassa yuttam yeva

original: hoti, tadārammaṇamānasañca somanassayuttaṃyeva hoti, tesu santīraṇatadārammaṇakiccesu
analyzed: hoti tad ārammaṇa mānasam ca somanassa yuttam yeva hoti tesu santi īraṇa tad ārammaṇa kiccesu

original: vipākesu ekekaṃ santīraṇakiccaṃ, tadārammaṇakiccaṃ vā cittaṃ gahetvā purimāni ca
analyzed: vipākesu ekekam santīraṇa kiccam tad ārammaṇa kiccam vā cittam gahetvā purimāni ca

original: tīṇi cattāri eva vipākāni bhavanti. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi
analyzed: tīṇi cattāri eva vipākāni bhavanti evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena pañcasu dvāresu pi

original: cattāri cattāri vipākacittānīti pavattiyaṃ vipākāni vīsati cittāni honti.
analyzed: cattāri cattāri vipāka cittāni iti pavattiyam vipākāni vīsati cittāni honti

original: 442-8. Cakkhudvāre tu cattāri, gahitāggahaṇenidha gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena
analyzed: cakkhu dvāre tu cattāri gahitānam vipākānam aggahaṇena

original: cakkhudvāre pana cattāri vipākāni idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe sotaghānādinā vipākena
analyzed: cakkhu dvāre pana cattāri vipākāni idha imasmin iṭṭha ārammaṇe sota ghāna ādinā vipākena

original: saddhiṃ ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ hoti eva. Ahetukapaṭisandhissa sattassa duhetukaṃ, tihetukaṃ
analyzed: saddhim ahetukam aṭṭhakam hoti eva ahetuka paṭisandhissa sattassa du hetukam ti hetukam

analyzed: vā tad ārammaṇam na bhave na bhaveyya du hetu paṭisandhino sattassa ti hetukam tad ārammaṇam

original: na bhave. Jātā sugatiyaṃ yena, pākena paṭisandhi tu sugatiyaṃ yena pākena paṭisandhi
analyzed: na bhave jātā sugatiyam yena pākena paṭisandhi tu sugatiyam yena pākena paṭisandhi

original: jātā, tena vipākena tulyampi, hīnaṃ vā tesaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya. Manussalokaṃ
analyzed: jātā tena vipākena tulyam pi hīnam vā tesam tad ārammaṇam bhaveyya manussa lokam

original: sandhāya, vuttañcāhetukaṭṭhakaṃ sugatiyaṃ ahetukaṭṭhakañca manussalokañca sandhāya
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam ca ahetuka ṭṭhakam sugatiyam ahetuka ṭṭhakañca manussa lokañca sandhāya

original: paṭicca kāraṇaṃ katvā mayā vuttaṃ. Catūsupi apāyesu pana apeto ayo patiṭṭhā etehīti
analyzed: paṭicca kāraṇam katvā mayā vuttam catūsu pi apāyesu pana apetaḥ ayaḥ patiṭṭhā etehi iti

original: apāyo, tesu. Pavatte ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ āpāyikehi labbhati. Thero nerayikānaṃ tu,
analyzed: apāyaḥ tesu pavatte ahetukam aṭṭhakam āpāyikehi labbhati theraḥ nerayikānam tu

original: dhammaṃ deseti vassati thiro thirakāradhammo yasmiṃ atthīti thero, dutiyaaggasāvakabhūto
analyzed: dhammam deseti vassati thiraḥ thirakāra dhammaḥ yasmin atthi iti theraḥ dutiya aggasāvaka bhūto

original: iddhimā moggallānatthero nerayikānaṃ niraye jātānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti vassati,
analyzed: iddhimā moggallāna theraḥ nerayikānam niraye jātānam sattānam dhammam deseti vassati

original: “ucchaṅge maṃ nisīditvā”tiādīsu viya devaṃ vassāpetīti attho. Gandhaṃ vāyuñca māpeti
analyzed: ucchaṅge mam nisīditvā ati ādīsu viya devam vassā apeti iti atthaḥ gandham vāyum ca mā apeti

original: yadā, tadā pana tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ tehi nerayikasattehi theraṃ disvā, dhammañca
analyzed: yadā tadā pana tesam nerayikānam sattānam tehi nerayika sattehi theram disvā dhammam ca

original: sutvā, gandhañca ghāyitvā jalaṃ udakañca pivataṃ pivantānaṃ muduṃ vāyuñca tehi phusataṃ
analyzed: sutvā gandhañca ghāyitvā jalam udakañca pivatam pivantānam mudum vāyuñca tehi phusatam

original: phusantānaṃ tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇakādīni pañcapi puññajāni eva kusalavipākāni
analyzed: phusantānam tesam nerayika sattānam cakkhu viññāṇaka ādīni pañca api puñña jāni eva kusala vipākāni

original: eva santīraṇadvayaṃ puññajaṃ eva kusalavipākaṃ eva puññajā eva ekā manodhātu iti aṭṭhakaṃ hoti.
analyzed: eva santīraṇa dvayam puñña jam eva kusala vipākam eva puñña jā eva ekā manaḥ dhātu iti aṭṭhakam hoti

original: 449-50. Ayaṃ tāva kathā “cakkhuviññāṇakādīni puññajānevā”tiādikā ayaṃ kathā iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattagocare
analyzed: ayam tāva kathā cakkhu viññāṇaka ādīni ayam kathā iṭṭha aiṭṭha majjhatta gocare

original: kāmāvacare puññānaṃ javanānaṃ vasena mayā vuttā. Tadārammaṇacetaso tadārammaṇacittassa
analyzed: kāmāvacare puññānam javanānam vasena mayā vuttā tad ārammaṇa cetasaḥ tad ārammaṇa cittassa

original: yaṃ niyamattaṃ “tadārammaṇamānasaṃ javanena niyāmita”ntiādivacanena mayā vuttaṃ,
analyzed: yam tad ārammaṇa mānasam javanena niyāmitam iti ādi vacanena mayā vuttam

original: taṃ niyamattaṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Somanassayutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi
analyzed: tam kusalam sandhāya vuttam somanassa yutte kāmāvacara kusale javite tad ārammaṇam pi

original: somanassayuttameva hoti, upekkhāyutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi upekkhāyuttameva
analyzed: somanassa yuttam eva hoti upekkhā yutte kāmāvacara kusale javite tad ārammaṇam pi upekkhā yuttam eva

original: hoti, netaṃ akusale upekkhāyutte vicikicchādike akusale javane pana javite somanassayuttampi
analyzed: hoti akusale upekkhā yutte vicikicchā ādike akusale javane pana javite somanassa yuttam pi

original: tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. Itipi vacanaṃ ācariyena dīpitaṃ.
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam hoti iti adhippāyaḥ vacanam ācariyena dīpitam

original: 451-7. Idha imasmiṃ adhippāye akusalacittesu somanassayuttesu catūsupi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe
analyzed: idha imasmin adhippāye akusala cittesu somanassa yuttesu catūsu pi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe

analyzed: ārabbha javane gate pi tad ārammaṇam na labbhate ācariyena tathā mahaggate dhamme

original: ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena, paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ ārabbha
analyzed: ārabbha javane javite pi tad ārammaṇam na labbhate ācariyena paṭisambhidā ñāṇam ārabbha

original: javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena. Manodvārepi sabbesaṃ javanānaṃ
analyzed: javane javite pi tad ārammaṇam na labbhate ācariyena manodvāre pi sabbesam javanānam

original: anantaraṃ anupubbato tadārammaṇacittāni bhavanti.
analyzed: anantaram anupubbataḥ tad ārammaṇa cittāni bhavanti

original: 533-4. Manodvāre ārammaṇaghaṭṭanā na vijjati. Bhavaṅgato cetaso vīthicittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre ārammaṇa ghaṭṭanā na vijjati bhavaṅgataḥ cetasaḥ vīthi cittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ

analyzed: katham kena pakārena manaḥ dvāre pi ghaṭṭanāya vinā ghaṭṭanam

original: āgacchanteva yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā vīthicittānaṃ sambhavo hoti.
analyzed: āgacchantā iva tasmāt vīthi cittānam sambhavaḥ hoti

original: 535-6. Dvādasāpuññacittānaṃ dvādasaakusalacittānaṃ vipākā sattasattati pāpapākā dvādasapāpacittānaṃ
analyzed: dvādasa apuñña cittānam dvādasa akusala cittānam vipākā satta sattati pāpa pākā dvādasa pāpa cittānam

original: vipākā caturāsīti pavattiyaṃ honti. Ekassa somanassayuttadiṭṭhisampayuttākusalassa
analyzed: vipākā caturāsīti pavattiyam honti ekassa somanassa yutta diṭṭhi sampayutta akusalassa

original: cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni, sampaṭicchanaṃ, upekkhāyuttasantīraṇāni cāti satta
analyzed: cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇāni sampaṭicchanam upekkhā yutta santīraṇāni ca ati satta

original: akusalapākā honti. Tathā sesānaṃ ekādasannaṃ akusalānampi satta vipākā honti. Ekādasavidhānaṃ
analyzed: akusala pākāḥ honti tathā sesānam ekādasannam akusalānam pi satta vipākāḥ honti ekādasa vidhānam

original: tu, hitvā uddhaccamānasaṃ uddhaccamānasaṃ hitvā ekādasavidhānaṃ paṭisandhiyo ekādasavidhā ceva bhavanti.
analyzed: tu hitvā uddhacca mānasam uddhacca mānasam hitvā ekādasa vidhānam paṭisandhiyaḥ ekādasavidhā ca iva bhavanti

original: 537-8. Kriyacittesu sabbesu yaṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ javanaṃ na ca hoti, taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ
analyzed: kriya cittesu sabbesu yam āvajjana dvayam javanam na ca hoti tam āvajjana dvayam

original: karaṇamattattā kiriyāmattattā vātapupphasamaṃ vātapupphena sadisaṃ mataṃ bhagavatā.
analyzed: karaṇa matta ttā kiriyā matta ttā vāta puppha samam vāta pupphena sadisam matam bhagavatā

original: Ayametthādhippāyo – khīṇāsave uppannakāle vā taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ
analyzed: ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ khīṇāsave uppanna kāle vā tam āvajjana dvayam kiriya cittam bhavitum

original: yuttaṃ. Sabbesu puthujjanesu uppannakāle kathaṃ kiriyā hotīti ce? Karaṇamattattā
analyzed: yuttam sabbesu puthujjanesu uppanna kāle katham kiriyā hoti iti ce karaṇa matta ttā

original: aphaladāyakaṃ vātapupphaṃ viya aphaladāyakaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttihāro kiriyā
analyzed: a phala dāyakam vāta puppham viya a phala dāyakam kiriya cittam bhavitum yutti hāraḥ kiriyā

original: pana hoti. Yaṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ kiccasādhanato javanakiccasādhanavasena javanattaṃ
analyzed: pana hoti yam sabbam kiriya cittam kicca sādhanataḥ javana kicca sādhana vasena javana ttam

original: javanabhāvaṃ pattaṃ chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ aphalaṃ hoti yathā, evaṃ chinnāvijjātaṇhāmūlassa
analyzed: javana bhāvam pattam chinna mūlassa rukkhassa puppham aphalam hoti yathā evam chinna avijjā taṇhā mūlassa

original: vītarāgassa taṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ aphalaṃ vipākavirahitaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
analyzed: vīta rāgassa tam sabbam kiriya cittam aphalam vipāka virahitam siyā bhaveyya

original: 539-40. Paṭicca pana etasmā, phalametīti paccayo ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca etasmā dhammato
analyzed: paṭicca pana etasmā phalam eti iti paccayaḥ ekam dhammam paṭicca etasmā dhammato

original: phalaṃ eti pavattati tasmā paccayo, yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā uppattiyāpi
analyzed: phalam eti pavattati tasmā paccayaḥ yaḥ dhammaḥ yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā uppattiyā api

original: upakāro nāma hoti, so dhammo tassa dhammassa paccayoti paccayo nāma paṇḍitena pavuccate.
analyzed: upakāraḥ nāma hoti saḥ dhammo tassa dhammassa paccayo ti paccayaḥ nāma paṇḍitena pavuccate

original: Sambhavo pabhavo hetu kāraṇaṃ paccayo mato bhagavatā. Idaṃ vacanaṃ aññattha dīpanavacanaṃ.
analyzed: sambhavaḥ pabhavaḥ hetu kāraṇam paccayaḥ mataḥ bhagavatā idam vacanam aññattha dīpana vacanam

original: 541. Lobhādi pana yo dhammo, mūlaṭṭhenupakārako yo lobhādi pana dhammo mūlabhāvena phaladhammassa upakārako, so lobhādidhammo phaladhammassa hetūti hetu nāma vibhāvinā viññātabbo.
analyzed: lobha ādi pana yaḥ dhammaḥ mūla ṭṭhena upakārakaḥ yaḥ lobha ādi pana dhammaḥ mūla bhāvena phala dhammassa upakārako so lobha ādi dhammaḥ phala dhammassa hetu uti hetu nāma vibhāvinā viññātabbo

original: 542. Lobho doso ca moho ca tathā alobhādayo tayo hetū, te cha eva hetuyo honti, jātito jātivasena kusalajātiakusalajātiabyākatajātivasena navadhā navahi koṭṭhāsehi siyuṃ.
analyzed: lobhaḥ doso ca moho ca tathā alobha ādayo tayo hetū te cha eva hetuyaḥ honti jātitaḥ jāti vasena kusala jāti akusala jāti abyākata jāti vasena navadhā navahi koṭṭhāsehi siyuṃ

original: 543-4. Dhammānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ, kusalādittasādhako yo dhammo kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: dhammānam kusala ādīnam kusala ādi tta sādhakaḥ yaḥ dhammaḥ kusala ādīnam dhammānam

original: kusalādittasādhako kusalādibhāvasādhako, so dhammo mūlaṭṭho nāma. Evaṃ vacanaṃ eke

original: ekacce ācariyā vadanti. Evaṃ sante kusalākusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhakavasena
analyzed: ekacce ācariyāḥ vadanti evam sante kusala akusala ādīnam dhammānam kusala ādi tta sādhaka vasena

original: mūlaṭṭhe sante taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpīsu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhānarūpesu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhitesu
analyzed: mūla ṭṭhe sante tad samuṭṭhāna rūpīsu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhāna rūpesu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhitesu

original: cittajarūpesu hetūnaṃ lobhādihetūnaṃ hetupaccayatā kadācipi neva sampajjati. Ayametthādhippāyo
analyzed: citta ja rūpesu hetūnam lobha ādi hetūnam hetu paccaya tā kadācipi na iva sampajjati ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ

original: – yadi cittesu rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentesu te lobhādayopi cittānaṃ sampayuttacittānaṃ
analyzed: yadi cittesu rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentesu te lobha ādayaḥ api cittānam sampayutta cittānam

original: ekuppādattā ca rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentiyeva. Tadā tesaṃ mate tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādittaṃ
analyzed: ca rūpāni tadā tesam mate tesam citta ja rūpānaṃ

original: siyā. Na ca kadāci rūpāni kusalādināmakāni dissanti yasmā, tasmā cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādibhāvañāpanatthaṃ
analyzed: siyā na ca kadāci rūpāni kusala ādi nāmakāni dissanti yasmā tasmā citta ja rūpānam kusala ādi bhāva ñāpana attham

original: tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ te lobhādayo hetupaccayā na honti, iti vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
analyzed: tesam citta ja rūpānam te lobha ādayaḥ hetu paccayāḥ na honti iti vacanam vattabbam siyā

original: Evañca sati cittajarūpāni nāma kadācipi viyuttāni caranti, tasmā kusalādittasādhako mūlaṭṭho na hoti.
analyzed: evam ca sati citta ja rūpāni nāma kadācipi viyuttāni caranti na hoti

original: 545-6. Hi saccaṃ “evaṃ sante tu hetūna”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Te lobhādayo hetū tesaṃ
analyzed: hi saccam evam sante tu vacanam te lobha ādayaḥ hetū tesam

original: rūpānaṃ kusalāditaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ na sādhenti na nipphādenti. Te hetū tesaṃ pana
analyzed: kusala āditam kusala ādi bhāvam na sādhenti na nipphādenti te hetū tesam pana

original: rūpānaṃ paccayā na ca na hontiyeva, tasmā kāraṇā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako
analyzed: rūpānam paccayāḥ na ca na tasmā kāraṇā kusala ādīnam dhammānam kusala ādi tta sādhako

original: yo dhammo, so dhammo mūlaṭṭhoti mūlasabhāvo nāma samayaññunā samayavijānanasīlena
analyzed: yaḥ dhammo saḥ dhammaḥ mūlaṭṭhaḥ ti mūla sabhāvaḥ nāma samaya ññunā samaya vijānana sīlena

original: viññunā gantabbo jānitabbo.
analyzed: viññunā gantabbaḥ jānitabbaḥ

original: 547. Suppatiṭṭhitabhāvassa, sādhanenupakārako suppatiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sādhanena upakārako
analyzed: su patiṭṭhita bhāvassa sādhanena upakārako su patiṭṭhita bhāvam sādhanena upakārako

analyzed: yaḥ attho saḥ atthaḥ hetūnam lobha ādīnam mūla ṭṭhaḥ mūla sabhāvaḥ iti ca gahaṇam vibhāvinā viññātabbam

original: 548-9. Kusalākusalā hetū kusalā hetū, akusalā hetū, kriyāhetū sabbaso sabbappakārena
analyzed: kusala akusalāḥ hetū kusalāḥ hetū akusalāḥ hetū kriyā hetū sabbaso sabba ppakārena

original: hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ cittajarūpānañca hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā,
analyzed: hetu paccaya tam yātā gatā tad samuṭṭhānānam citta ja rūpānam ca hetu paccaya tam yātā gatā

original: ete hetū catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā.
analyzed: ete hetū catuvokāra bhūmiyam sampayuttānam eva dhammānam hetu paccaya tam yātā gatā

original: 550-1. Kāme vipākahetūpi attanā sampayuttānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā, paṭisandhikkhaṇepi
analyzed: kāme vipāka hetū attanā sampayuttānam hetu paccaya tam yātā paṭisandhi khaṇe pi

analyzed: kamma ja rūpānaṃ uppādaḥ hoti yasmā kāraṇā pavattiyam citta jānam ca rūpānam hetu paccaya tam gatā

original: 552-5. Rūpe vipākahetū kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ hetuyo viya hetupaccayā honti, pañcavokāre
analyzed: rūpe vipāka hetū kāmāvacara bhūmiyam hetuyaḥ viya hetu paccayāḥ honti pañcavokāre

analyzed: honti catuvokāre lokuttara vipāka jāḥ hetavaḥ sampayuttānam eva catuvokāra bhūmiyam hetu paccayā

analyzed: bhavanti itare catuvokāre arūpa bhave vipāka jāḥ hetavaḥ eva

original: attano bhūmiyaṃ arūpabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti. Hetuttho hetūnaṃ attho hetuyo ceva
analyzed: attanaḥ bhūmiyam arūpa bhūmiyam hetu paccayāḥ honti hetutthaḥ hetūnam atthaḥ hetuyaḥ ca iva

original: Sañjāto sukhahetu yassāti sañjātasukhahetu, tena viññeyyo.
analyzed: sañjātaḥ sukha hetu yassa ati sañjāta sukha hetu tena viññeyyaḥ

original: 556-8. Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ vīmaṃsā cāti catudhādhipatī lokādhipatinā satthunā
analyzed: chando cittam ca vīriyam vīmaṃsā ca ati catudhā adhipatī loka adhipatinā satthunā

analyzed: so dhammaḥ adhipati iti adhipati nāma bhagavatā niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: Sumatimativibodhanaṃ vicittaṃ,
analyzed: sumati mati vibodhanam vicittam

original: Kumatimatindhanapāvakaṃ padhānaṃ;

analyzed: imam ati madhuram avedi yaḥ yaḥ

original: Jinavacanaṃ sakalaṃ avedi so so.
analyzed: jina vacanam sakalam avedi saḥ saḥ

original: matiyā vibodhanakaraṃ vicittaṃ kumatīnaṃ kucchitamatīnaṃ bālānaṃ matiindhane padhānaṃ
analyzed: matiyāḥ vibodhana karam vicittam kumatīnam kucchita matīnam bālānam mati indhane padhānam

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Pakiṇṇakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: puñña vipāka paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: catasso ca yoniyo, nirayagatitiracchānagatipetagatimanussagatidevagativasena gatipañcakaṃ,

original: nāma, dutiyajjhānabhūmi ekattakāyanānattasaññī nāma, tatiyajjhānabhūmivehapphalabhūmisuddhāvāsabhūmiyo
analyzed: nāma dutiya jhāna bhūmi ekatta kāya nānatta saññī nāma tatiya jhāna bhūmi vehapphala bhūmi suddhāvāsa bhūmiyo

original: ekattakāyaekattasaññī nāma, heṭṭhā ṭhitā rūpehi saddhiṃ sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, tiṭṭhanti
analyzed: ekatta kāya ekatta saññī nāma heṭṭhā ṭhitā rūpehi saddhim satta viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ tiṭṭhanti

original: viññāṇāni etthāti ṭhitiyo, viññāṇānaṃ ṭhitiyo viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, viññāṇassa abhāvato
analyzed: viññāṇāni ettha ati ṭhitiyaḥ viññāṇānam ṭhitiyaḥ viññāṇa ṭhitiyaḥ viññāṇassa abhāvato

original: asaññībhūmi na gayhate, catutthāruppabhūmi ca paṭuviññāṇābhāvato na gayhate. Sattāvāsavasena
analyzed: asaññī bhūmi na gayhate catuttha āruppa bhūmi ca paṭu viññāṇa abhāvataḥ na gayhate sattāvāsa vasena

original: asaññībhūmiṃ, catutthāruppabhūmiñca pana gahetvā te sattāvāsā nava eva honti.
analyzed: asaññībhūmim catuttha āruppa bhūmiñca pana gahetvā te sattāvāsāḥ nava eva honti

original: 563-8. Kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā pūrenti attano kārakaṃ pūrenti ca,
analyzed: kāme puñña abhisaṅkhāra saññitāḥ aṭṭha cetanāḥ pūrenti attano kārakam pūrenti ca

original: ajjhāsayaṃ pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattentīti puññāni, abhisaṅkharonti vipākaṃ, kammajarūpañcāti
analyzed: ajjhāsayam pujjam ca bhavam nibbattenti iti puññāni abhisaṅkharonti vipākam kamma ja rūpam ca ati

original: abhisaṅkhārā, puññāni eva abhisaṅkhārā puññābhisaṅkhārā, teyeva saññitā puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā,
analyzed: abhisaṅkhārā puññāni eva abhisaṅkhārā puñña abhisaṅkhārā teyā iva saññitā puñña abhisaṅkhāra saññitā

original: kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā. Navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ upekkhāyuttāhetukamahāvipākavasena
analyzed: kāme puñña abhisaṅkhāra saññitāḥ aṭṭha cetanāḥ navannam pāka cittānam upekkhā yuttā a hetuka mahā vipāka vasena

original: navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ pana nānā vattamānacetanākhaṇato paraṃ khaṇaṃ
analyzed: pāka cittānam kāma sugatiyam pana nānā vattamāna cetanā khaṇataḥ param khaṇam

original: etassāti nānākhaṇaṃ, taṃ eva nānakkhaṇikaṃ, tameva kammaṃ nānakkhaṇikakammaṃ, vattamānacetanāto
analyzed: etassa ati nānā khaṇam tam eva nānakkhaṇikam tam eva kammam nānakkhaṇika kammam vattamāna cetanātaḥ

original: parā atītacetanāti attho. Balavā nissayapaccayo upanissayapaccayo, balavattho cettha
analyzed: parā atīta cetanā ati atthaḥ balavā nissaya paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayaḥ balavattho ca ittha

original: upa-saddo, balavapaccayoti attho, nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayavasena balavapaccayavasena
analyzed: upasaddaḥ balava paccayaḥ ti atthaḥ nānakkhaṇika kamma paccaya vasena balava paccaya vasena

original: cāti attho. Dvedhā dvīhi pakārehi tesaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayā bhavanti, tā aṭṭha
analyzed: ca ati atthaḥ dvedhā dvīhi pakārehi tesam paṭisandhiyam paccayāḥ bhavanti tāḥ aṭṭha

original: kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā upekkhāsahitāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuyā vinā upekkhāsahagatāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacara mahā kusala cetanā upekkhā sahitā a hetu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā vinā upekkhā sahagatā a hetu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātum

original: vajjetvā parittapākānaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanasomanassayuttāhetukakusalavipākānaṃ
analyzed: vajjetvā paritta pākānam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya sampaṭicchana somanassa yuttā a hetuka kusala vipākānam

original: dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi pavattiyaṃ paccayā honti. Tāyeva cetanā
analyzed: dvedhā nānā khaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayehi pavattiyam paccayāḥ honti tāya iva cetanā

original: tā eva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā rūpabhave pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ
analyzed: tāḥ eva aṭṭha kāmāvacara mahā kusala cetanāḥ rūpa bhave pañcannam pāka cittānam kusala vipāka cittānam

original: cakkhusotasampaṭicchanasomanassayuttaupekkhāyuttasantīraṇānaṃ dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi
analyzed: cakkhu sota sampaṭicchana somanassa yutta upekkhā yutta santīraṇānam dvedhā nānā khaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayehi

original: pavattiyaṃ paccayā honti. Aṭṭhannaṃ tu parittānaṃ, kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā aṭṭhannaṃ
analyzed: pavattiyam paccayāḥ honti aṭṭhannam tu parittānam kāme duggatiyam tathā aṭṭhannam

original: parittānaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ, dvinnaṃ santīraṇānañca
analyzed: parittānam kusala vipākānam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya sampaṭicchanānam dvinnam santīraṇānam ca

original: pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pana paccayā
analyzed: pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe paccayāḥ honti paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe pana paccayāḥ

original: na honti. Vuttappakārāva kāme sugatiyaṃ yathāvuttappakārāva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā
analyzed: na honti vutta ppakārā ava kāme sugatiyam yathā vutta ppakārā ava aṭṭha kāmāvacara mahā kusala cetanā

original: kāmasugatiyaṃ tathā soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi
analyzed: kāma sugatiyam tathā soḷasannam kusala vipākānam pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe dvedhā nānā khaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayehi

original: paccayā honti, pavatte pavattikkhaṇe sattannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti. Paṭisandhiyaṃ
analyzed: paccayāḥ honti pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe sattannam kusala vipākānam paccayāḥ honti paṭisandhiyam

original: paṭisandhikkhaṇe navannaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ paccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe navannam kusala vipāka cittānam paccayāḥ honti

original: 569-74. Rūpe puññābhisaṅkhārā, rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ
analyzed: rūpe puñña abhisaṅkhārāḥ rūpāvacara bhūmiyam pañcannam pāka cittānam paṭisandhiyam

original: paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā hontimāpuññasaṅkhārā, kāme duggatiyaṃ dvidhā ime apuññābhisaṅkhārā,
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe paccayāḥ honti ime apuñña saṅkhārā kāme duggatiyam dvidhā ime apuñña abhisaṅkhārā

original: imā kusalapaṭipakkhā uddhaccavajjā ekādasa cetanā kāmaduggatiyaṃ ekassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
analyzed: imāḥ kusala paṭipakkhāḥ uddhacca vajjāḥ ekādasa cetanāḥ kāma duggatiyam ekassa paṭisandhi viññāṇassa

original: paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvidhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā
analyzed: paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe dvidhā nānā khaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayehi paccayā

original: honti. Dvādasa akusalacetanā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe eva channaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ
analyzed: honti dvādasa akusala cetanā pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe eva channam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya sampaṭicchanānam

original: akusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā no honti.
analyzed: akusala vipākānam paccayāḥ honti paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe paccayāḥ no honti

original: Sattannampi bhavanteva pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe akusalavipākāni
analyzed: bhavantā iva pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe akusala vipākāni

original: sattannaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanasantīraṇānaṃ paccayā bhavanti. Kāme
analyzed: sattannam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya sampaṭicchana santīraṇānam paccayāḥ bhavanti kāme

original: sugatiyaṃ tesaṃ, sattannampi tatheva ca dvādasākusalacetanā kāme sugatiyaṃ tatheva
analyzed: sugatiyam tesam tathā iva ca dvādasa akusala cetanā kāme sugatiyam tathā iva

original: ca tesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ
analyzed: ca tesam sattannam akusala vipākānam pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe paccayāḥ honti paṭisandhiyam

original: paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā na honti. Viññāṇānaṃ catunnampi, tesaṃ rūpabhave tathā tāyeva
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe paccayāḥ na honti viññāṇānam catunnam pi tesam rūpa bhave tathā tāya eva

original: dvādasākusalacetanā rūpabhave tesaṃ catunnaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotasampaṭicchanasantīraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: dvādasā akusala cetanāḥ rūpa bhave tesam catunnam akusala vipākānam cakkhu sota sampaṭicchana santīraṇa saṅkhātānam

original: viññāṇānaṃ tathā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: viññāṇānam tathā pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe paccayāḥ honti paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: paccayā na honti. So ca kāmabhaveniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ so ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: paccayāḥ na honti so ca so ca apuñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: kāmabhave aniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ amanāparūpādīni ārammaṇāni upaladdhiyaṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: kāma bhave aniṭṭha rūpa ādi upaladdhiyam amanāpa rūpa ādīni ārammaṇāni upaladdhiyam tesaṃ

original: catunnaṃ apuññajānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paccayo hoti. Hi saccaṃ “so ca kāmabhaveniṭṭha-rūpādiupaladdhiya”ntiādikaṃ
analyzed: catunnam apuññajānam viññāṇānam paccayaḥ hoti hi saccam saḥ ca kāma bhaveniṭṭha rūpa ādi upaladdhi yanti ādikam

original: vacanaṃ. Aniṭṭharūpādayo nāma visayā brahmaloke na vijjare na vijjanti.
analyzed: vacanam aniṭṭha rūpa ādayaḥ nāma visayāḥ brahma loke na vijjare na vijjanti

original: 575-6. Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro na iñjati na phandati na calatīti āneñjaṃ, āneñjañca
analyzed: tathā iva aneñja saṅkhāraḥ na iñjati na phandati na calati iti āneñjam āneñjam ca

original: taṃ saṅkhāro cāti āneñjasaṅkhāro, tathā eva āneñjasaṅkhāro arūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ catunnaṃ
analyzed: tam saṅkhāro ca ati āneñja saṅkhāro tathā eva āneñja saṅkhāraḥ arūpāvacara bhūmiyam

original: pākacittānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayo hoti. Bhavesvete
analyzed: pāka cittānam pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe paccayaḥ hoti bhavesu ete

original: bhavesu ete vuttappakārā paccayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīsu yathā ca yena
analyzed: bhavesu ete vutta pakārā paccayāḥ vutta ppakārena paṭisandhi pavattīsu yathā ca yena

original: yena ca pakārena nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā honti, tena paccayā
analyzed: yena ca pakārena nānā khaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayehi paccayāḥ honti tena paccayāḥ

original: tathā tena tena pakārena vibhāvinā vijānantena paṇḍitena ñeyyā.
analyzed: tathā tena tena pakārena vibhāvinā vijānantena paṇḍitena ñeyyā

original: 577. Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, yoniādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu eseva ca nayo
analyzed: esa iva ca nayaḥ ñeyyaḥ yoni ādīsu yoni gati viññāṇa ṭṭhiti sattā vāsesu esa iva ca nayo

original: bhavesu mayā vutto eva nayo paṇḍitena ñeyyo. Tatridaṃ tatra bhavesu ādito paṭṭhāya
analyzed: bhavesu mayā vuttaḥ eva nayaḥ paṇḍitena ñeyyaḥ tatra idam tatra bhavesu āditaḥ paṭṭhāya

original: vuttaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ upāyamattadīpanaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vuttam idam vacanam mukha matta nidassanam upāya matta dīpanam hoti

original: 578-81. Avisesena puññābhi-saṅkhāro dvibhavesupi kāmapuññābhisaṅkhāravasena, rūpapuññābhisaṅkhāravasena
analyzed: avisesena puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ dvi bhavesu pi kāma puñña abhisaṅkhāra vasena rūpa puñña abhisaṅkhāra vasena

original: ca puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena samānabhāvena dvīsu bhavesu kāmarūpabhavesu paṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: ca puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ avisesena samāna bhāvena dvīsu bhavesu kāma rūpa bhavesu paṭisandhim

original: datvā so saṅkhāro sabbapākaṃ janeti nibbatteti. Tathā catūsu viññeyyo, aṇḍajādīsu
analyzed: da tvā so saṅkhāraḥ sabba pākam janeti nibbattā iti tathā catūsu viññeyyaḥ aṇḍaja ādīsu

original: yonisu dvibhavesu puññābhisaṅkhāro viya tathā catūsu aṇḍajādīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: yonisu dvi bhavesu puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ viya tathā catūsu aṇḍaja ādīsu so puñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: paṇḍitena ñeyyo. “Aṇḍajādīsū”ti vacanaṃ padumapaccekabuddhānaṃ manussattaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: paṇḍitena ñeyyaḥ aṇḍaja ādīsu iti vacanam paduma paccekabuddhānam manussattam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Bahudevamanussānaṃ vasena dvīsu gatīsu eva ca tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena
analyzed: vuttam bahu deva manussānam vasena dvīsu gatīsu eva ca tathā so puñña abhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena

original: ñeyyo. Tathā nānattakāyādi-viññāṇānaṃ ṭhitīsupi nānattakāyanānattasaññīnānattakaāyaekattasaññī
analyzed: ñeyyaḥ tathā nānatta kāya ādi viññāṇānam ṭhitīsu pi nānatta kāya nānatta saññī nānattaka āya ekatta saññī

original: ekattakāyanānattasaññī ekattakāyaekattasaññīnaṃ vasena catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu so
analyzed: ekatta kāya nānatta saññī ekatta kāya ekatta saññīnam vasena catūsu viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu so

original: puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo. Nānattakāyanānattasaññīnānattakāyaekattasaññīekattakāyanānattasaññīekattakāyaekattasaññīnaṃ
analyzed: puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ paṇḍitena ñeyyaḥ nānatta kāya nānatta saññī nānatta kāya ekatta saññī ekatta kāya nānatta saññī ekatta kāya ekatta saññīnam

original: vasena vuttappakārasmiṃ catubbidhe sattāvāse tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena
analyzed: vasena vutta ppakārasmin catubbidhe sattāvāse tathā so puñña abhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena

original: ñeyyo. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññābhisaṅkhāro bhavādīsu bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
analyzed: ñeyyaḥ evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ bhava ādīsu bhava yoni gati viññāṇa ṭṭhiti sattā vāsesu

original: yathārahaṃ soḷasannaṃ kāmakusalapākānaṃ, pañcannaṃ rūpapākānañcāti ekavīsatipākānaṃ
analyzed: yathāraham soḷasannam kāma kusala pākānam pañcannam rūpa pākānam ca ati ekavīsati pākānam

original: dvidhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti.
analyzed: dvidhā nānā khaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ hoti

original: 582-3. Kāme apuññasaṅkhāro kāmabhave aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikayonivasena aṇḍajādīsu
analyzed: kāme apuñña saṅkhāro kāma bhave aṇḍa ja jalābu ja saṃseda ja opapātika yoni vasena aṇḍa ja ādīsu

original: yonīsu nirayagatipetagatitiracchānagativasena tīsu gatīsu nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena
analyzed: yonīsu niraya gati petagati tiracchāna gati vasena tīsu gatīsu nānatta kāya ekatta saññī vasena

original: ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ca ekasmiṃ pana sattāvāse dvidhā
analyzed: ekissā viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyā nānatta kāya ekatta saññī vasena ca ekasmin pana sattāvāse dvidhā

original: nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: nānā khaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayehi pavatte pavatti kkhaṇe paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: so apuññābhisaṅkhāro paccayo hoti.
analyzed: so apuñña abhisaṅkhāro paccayaḥ hoti

original: 584-6. Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro tathā eva āneñjasaṅkhāro, ekārūpabhave ekasmiṃ arūpabhave
analyzed: tathā iva aneñja saṅkhāraḥ tathā eva āneñja saṅkhāraḥ eka arūpa bhave ekasmin arūpa bhave

original: ekissā opapātikayoniyā ceva ekissā devagatiyāpi ca ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi
analyzed: ekissā opapātika yoniyā ca iva ekissā deva gatiyā api ca ākāsānañcāyatana bhūmi viññāṇañcāyatana bhūmi

original: ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmivasena tīsu eva cittaṭṭhitīsu catunnaṃ arūpabhūmīnaṃ vasena catubbidhe
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana bhūmi vasena tīsu eva citta ṭṭhitīsu catunnam arūpa bhūmīnam vasena catubbidhe

original: sattāvāse catunnaṃ arūpapākacittānaṃ dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammopanissayapaccayehi so
analyzed: sattāvāse catunnam arūpa pāka cittānam dvedhā nānākkhaṇika kamma upanissaya paccayehi so

original: āneñjābhisaṅkhāro paccayo hoti. Paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ, vasenevaṃ bhavādīsu evaṃ iminā
analyzed: āneñja abhisaṅkhāro paccayaḥ hoti paṭisandhi pavattīnam vasena ivam bhava ādīsu evam iminā

original: mayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena bhavādīsu yathā ye saṅkhārā esaṃ
analyzed: mayā vutta ppakārena paṭisandhi pavattīnam vasena bhava ādīsu yathā ye saṅkhārāḥ

original: pākacittānaṃ paccayā honti, tathā te saṅkhārā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena vijānitabbā.
analyzed: pāka cittānam paccayāḥ honti tathā te saṅkhārāḥ evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena paṇḍitena vijānitabbā

original: 587-90. Na rūpārūpadhammānaṃ, saṅkanti pana vijjati rūpadhammānaṃ, cittacetasikasaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: na rūpa arūpa dhammānam pana vijjati rūpa dhammānam citta cetasika saṅkhātānam

original: nāmadhammānañca saṅkanti pana saṅkamanaṃ pana na vijjati. Saṅkantibhāve asati atītabhavato
analyzed: nāma dhammānam ca saṅkanti pana saṅkamanam pana na vijjati saṅkanti bhāve asati atīta bhavato

original: idha imasmiṃ bhave rūpadhammānaṃ saṅkamanabhāve asati paṭisandhicittaṃ kathaṃ kena
analyzed: idha imasmin bhave rūpa dhammānam saṅkamana bhāve asati paṭisandhi cittam katham kena

original: pakārena siyā bhaveyya? Natthi cittassa saṅkanti, atītabhavato idha imasmiṃ bhave
analyzed: pakārena siyā bhaveyya natthi cittassa saṅkanti atīta bhavataḥ idha imasmin bhave

original: cittassa saṅkanti saṅkamanaṃ natthi, tato atītabhavato atītaṃ hetuṃ vinā vajjetvā
analyzed: cittassa saṅkanti saṅkamanam natthi tatas atīta bhavataḥ atītam hetum vinā vajjetvā

original: idha imasmiṃ bhave cittassa pātubhāvo na vijjati. Suladdhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ
analyzed: idha imasmin bhave cittassa pātubhāvaḥ na vijjati su laddha paccayam rūpa arūpa mattam

original: suṭṭhu laddhapaccayaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ
analyzed: suṭṭhu laddha paccayam rūpa nāma mattam jāyati evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena paccayam

original: labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena
analyzed: labhitvā uppajjamānam rūpa arūpa mattam rūpa nāma mattam jāyati evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena

original: paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ bhavantaraṃ aññabhavaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: paccayam labhitvā uppajjamānam rūpa arūpa mattam bhavantaram añña bhavam paṭisandhim

original: upeti upagacchati. Iti vacanaṃ samaññāya lokiyavohārena pavuccate, satto vā natthi,
analyzed: upeti upagacchati iti vacanam samaññāya lokiya vohārena pavuccate satto vā natthi

original: satto jīvoti vevacanaṃ, attā vāpi na vijjati.
analyzed: sattaḥ jīvaḥ iti vevacanam attā vā api na vijjati

original: 591-9. Tassidaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā, paṭisandhikkamaṃ pana tassa sattassa idaṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ
analyzed: tassa idam pākaṭam katvā paṭisandhikkamam pana tassa sattassa idam paṭisandhikkamam

original: sudubbudhaṃ atidubbijānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ahaṃ dassayissāmi, tametaṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ
analyzed: sudubbudham atidubbijānam pākaṭam katvā aham dassayissāmi tam etam paṭisandhikkamam

original: sādhu sādhukaṃ nibodhatha, sādhu sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, vividhesu ārammaṇesu lobhavasena
analyzed: sādhu sādhukam nibodhatha sādhu sādhukam manasi karotha vividhesu ārammaṇesu lobha vasena

original: cittaṃ anāmetvā vajiramañjūsāya anagghamaṇiratanaṃ pakkhipanto viya citte ṭhapetvāti
analyzed: cittam a nāmetvā vajira mañjūsāya anaggha maṇi ratanam pakkhipantaḥ viya citte ṭhapetvā ati

original: attho. Atītasmiṃ bhave tassa, āsannamaraṇassa hiito bhavato atītasmiṃ bhave āsannamaraṇassa
analyzed: atthaḥ atītasmin bhave tassa āsanna maraṇassa bhavataḥ atītasmin bhave āsanna maraṇassa

original: tassa sarīrasmiṃ ātape pakkhittaṃ haritaṃ tālapaṇṇaṃ viya sussamāne sati cakkhundriyādike
analyzed: tassa sarīrasmiṃ ātape pakkhittam haritam tāla paṇṇam viya sussamāne sati cakkhu indriya ādike

original: indriye naṭṭhe hadayavatthumattasmiṃ ṭhite kāyappasādike viññāṇe tasmiṃ khaṇe vatthusannissitaṃ

original: hadayavatthunissitaṃ. “Citta”nti vacanaṃ bhavaṅgamanodvārāvajjanajavanaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: hadaya vatthu nissitam cittan ti vacanam sandhāya

original: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Pubbānusevitanti ito kālā pubbakāle tena pana anusevitaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ti veditabbam pubba anusevitam ti itas kālā pubba kāle tena pana anusevitam anuciṇṇam

original: puññaṃ kammaṃ vā apuññaṃ eva vā kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā kammaphalena
analyzed: puññam kammam vā apuññam eva vā kammam kamma nimittam gati nimittam vā kamma phalena

original: dvāresu paccupaṭṭhitaṃ ālambitvā manodvārāvajjanajavanavasena sevitacittaṃ pavattati.
analyzed: dvāresu paccupaṭṭhitam ālambitvā sevita cittam pavattati

original: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pavattamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ taṃ javanacittaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ
analyzed: evam iminā mayā vutta ppakārena pavattamānam tat viññāṇam tat javana cittam laddha paccayam

original: laddhārammaṇapaccayaṃ. Avijjāya paṭicchannādīnave visayeti akusalajavane javite tassa
analyzed: laddha ārammaṇa paccayam avijjāya paṭicchanna ādīnave visayeti akusala javane javite tassa

original: javanassa avijjāya appaṭicchannadose tasmiṃ kammādike ārammaṇe kusalajavane javite
analyzed: javanassa avijjāya appaṭicchanna dose tasmin kamma ādike ārammaṇe kusala javane javite

original: tato cittavīthito pubbabhāge pavattāya avijjāya paṭicchannadose tasmiṃ kammādike
analyzed: tatas citta vīthitaḥ pubba bhāge pavattāya avijjāya paṭicchanna dose tasmin kamma ādike

original: ārammaṇe. Taṇhāti akusalajavanena sahajo lobho, akusalajavane vā javite tato vīthicittato
analyzed: ārammaṇe akusala javanena sahajaḥ lobhaḥ akusala javane vā javite tatas vīthi cittato

original: pubbabhāge pavatto lobho taṇhā. Nametīti aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggāhāpetvā daḷhaggāhavasena
analyzed: pubba bhāge pavattaḥ lobhaḥ taṇhā nameti iti aññam ārammaṇam aggāhāpetvā daḷha ggāha vasena

original: taṃ eva kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāpetīti attho. Sahajā saṅkhārā
analyzed: tam eva kamma nimitta gati nimitta saṅkhātam ārammaṇam gaṇhāpeti iti attho sahajā saṅkhārā

original: pana tassa cittassa sahajā ekato jātā cetanā pana tasmiṃ yevārammaṇe khipanti pavattanti.
analyzed: pana tassa cittassa sahajā ekatas jātā cetanā pana tasmin yā iva ārammaṇe khipanti pavattanti

original: Imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave ekasantativasā pavattāya taṇhāya namīyamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ
analyzed: imasmin paccuppanna bhave eka santati vasā pavattāya taṇhāya namīyamānam tam viññāṇam

original: orimā tīramhā rajjukaṃ ālambitvā mātikātikkamo puriso viya etaṃ purimaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ
analyzed: tīramhā rajjukam ālambitvā puriso viya etam purimam nissaya bhūtam

original: hadayavatthuṃ jahati chaḍḍeti, cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhatīti attho. Aparaṃ kammasambhūtaṃ
analyzed: hadaya vatthum jahati chaḍḍeti cuti cittam uppajjitvā nirujjhati iti attho aparam kamma sambhūtam

original: nissayaṃ aparaṃ aññakammato sambhūtaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ labhitvā vā alabhitvāpi
analyzed: nissayam aparam añña kammataḥ sambhūtam nissaya bhūtam hadaya vatthum labhitvā vā a labhitvā api

analyzed: vuttam ettha etesu cittesu purimam jahati iti vacanena vuttam ca iva cittam cuti cittam

analyzed: pacchimam ārammaṇa ādīhi paccayehi pavattati iti vacanena vuttam ca iva cittam paṭisandhi cittam

original: paṇḍitena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṇḍitena veditabbam

original: 600-6. Tadetaṃ taṃ etaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ purimā bhavato idha imasmiṃ pacchimabhave
analyzed: tat etam tam etam paṭisandhi cittam purimāḥ bhavataḥ idha imasmin pacchima bhave

analyzed: ettha etasmim vacane etassa paṭisandhi cittassa purimā bhavataḥ idha imasmin paccuppanna bhave

original: anāgamane atītabhavahetūhi atītabhave kammādipaccayehi etassa paṭisandhicittassa
analyzed: anāgamane atīta bhava hetūhi atīta bhave kamma ādi paccayehi etassa paṭisandhi cittassa

analyzed: atīta bhavataḥ anāgamane atīta bhave hetūhi sambhave paṭighosa dīpa mudda ādi attha nidassanā

analyzed: upamāḥ bhavanti aññatra aññasmin paṭighosa ādīnam atthānam pavatti ṭṭhāne āgantvā sadda ādi hetukā

analyzed: sadda ādayaḥ paccayāḥ honti yathā idam vuttam hoti imasmin ṭhāne janehi

analyzed: atthānam hetukāḥ honti tesu sadda ādīsu paccayesu santesu ye te paṭighosa ādayaḥ honti

analyzed: a santesu na honti yathā evam eva ca viññāṇam atīta bhavataḥ paccuppanna bhava viññāṇa vasena

analyzed: pavattam viññāṇam vibhāvinā veditabbam santāna bandhato santāna bandha vasena ekatā

original: atītabhavapaccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattassa viññāṇassa ekībhāvo natthi, nānatāpi

analyzed: sabbadā paggharaṇa sabhāva khīram eva bhaveyya ati atthaḥ atha api aparaḥ nayaḥ api sā ekanta nānatā

analyzed: tassa viññāṇassa so ekanta nānābhāvaḥ yadi bhaveyya khīra sāmikaḥ saḥ puggalaḥ dadhi sāmi

analyzed: uppajjamāna kāle tassa dadhissa issaraḥ na bhaveyya tatas khīra sāmikaḥ aññaḥ puggalo

analyzed: tassa dadhissa anissaraḥ asāmikaḥ bhaveyya ati atthaḥ yasmā kāraṇā ettha etasmin paṭisandhi kkama vinicchaye

analyzed: ekanta ekatā api vā ekanta nānatā api vā samayaññunā viññunā na ca iva upagantabbā

original: 607-10. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena asaṅkantipātubhāve saṅkantipātubhāvarahite

analyzed: etesam idha imasmin manussatta bhāve idha imasmin manussatta bhāve janehi

analyzed: katassa tassa kammassa phala hetunaḥ phalassa paccaya bhūtassa parattha parasmin loke

original: āgamato ceva evaṃ aññassa sattassa aññato kammato hi tato sattato aññena sattena
analyzed: āgamataḥ ca iva evam aññassa sattassa aññatas kammataḥ hi tatas sattataḥ aññena sattena

analyzed: katataḥ aññatas ca iva kammataḥ tam phalam siyā bhaveyya aññassa sattassa ati vacanena

analyzed: titthiya sattassa api kammam aññassa ca phalam dadeyya ati attho tasmā kāraṇā etam sabbam

analyzed: eva ca tumhehi vutta vidhānam na sundaram ettha āha ati etasmin ṭhāne codakaḥ āha

original: – nanu evaṃ “asaṅkantipātubhāve bhave satī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ niyatīti? Vuccate – santāne
analyzed: nanu evam asaṅkanti pātubhāve bhave sati iti ādikam vacanam niyati iti vuccate santāne

analyzed: yam phalam etam ekasmin santāne pavattamānam yam etam phalam aññassa sattassa na

original: hoti, aññato kammato na ca hoti, bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ santāne”tiādikassa
analyzed: hoti aññatas kammataḥ na ca hoti bījānam abhisaṅkhāraḥ etassa atthassa ekasmin santāne iti ādikassa

original: etassa atthassa sādhako nipphādako hoti.
analyzed: etassa atthassa sādhakaḥ nipphādakaḥ hoti

original: 611-5. Ekasmiṃ pana santāne, vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana aññassa sattassāpi vā na hoti,
analyzed: ekasmin pana santāne vattamānam phalam pana aññassa sattassa api vā na hoti

original: taṃ phalaṃ aññato kammato na hoti. Bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ pana
analyzed: tat phalam aññatas kammataḥ na hoti bījānam abhisaṅkhāraḥ etassa atthassa ekasmin pana

analyzed: aññasmin kāle madhuraḥ hoti hi saccam vacanam tāni

analyzed: madhura bhāvam vā phalaṭṭham vā na pāpuṇanti evam iminā pakārena idam mayā

original: vuttaṃ “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ. Api ca aparo nayo.
analyzed: vuttam ekasmin pana santāne iti ādikam vacanam paṇḍitena ñeyyam api ca aparaḥ nayo

original: Bālakāle taruṇakāle tena taruṇena payuttena vijjāsipposadhādinā kammenāpi tassa vuddhakālasmiṃ

original: phaladānasīlena ayaṃ “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādiko attho paṇḍitena dīpetabbo.
analyzed: phala dāna sīlena ayam ekasmin pana santāne iti ādikaḥ atthaḥ paṇḍitena dīpetabbaḥ

original: 616-20. Codako punāha – evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena kamme

analyzed: kaṅkha cheda karam piyakkaram pema karam sadā paṭhati suṇāti tassa bhikkhuno mati

original: idha sāsane ṭhite vikasati paṭiphullati.
analyzed: idha sāsane ṭhite vikasati paṭiphullati

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

analyzed: rūpāvacara samādhi bhāvanā niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: manussānaṃ lokiyadhammato uttaribhūtañāṇadassanalokuttaraṃ. Saṅkassarasamācāreti
analyzed: manussānam lokiya dhammato uttari bhūta ñāṇa dassana lokuttaram saṅkassara samācārā iti

analyzed: saṅkāya kaṅkhāya saritabba samācāre acchiddam akkhaṇḍam a kammāsam attha kāmena ati attanaḥ hita kāmena

original: 797. Duvidhalakkhaṇaṃ cārittavārittalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: duvidha lakkhaṇam cāritta vāritta lakkhaṇam

original: 805. Tesaṃ caritānaṃ vomissakanayā.
analyzed: tesam caritānam vomissaka nayā

analyzed: sa vaṇṇa kasiṇā ati nīla pīta odāta lohita vaṇṇa kasiṇā

original: 808. Taṃ ekakaṃ ānāpānaṃ assāsapassāso.
analyzed: tam ekakam āna apānam assāsa passāsaḥ

original: 809-10. Maraṇūpasamāyuttā satīti maraṇānussati upasamānussati. Āhāranissitasaññāti āhāre paṭikūlasaññā. Dhātuvavatthānanti catudhātuvavatthānaṃ.
analyzed: maraṇa upasamāyuttā satīti maraṇa anussati upasama anussati āhāra nissita saññā ati āhāre paṭikūla saññā dhātu vavatthānam ti catu dhātu vavatthānam

original: 811-2. Anukūlā ime sabba-caritānanti vaṇṇitāti yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ saddhācaritassa anukūlaṃ,
analyzed: anukūlāḥ ime sabba caritānam ti vaṇṇitā ati yam kammaṭṭhānam saddhā caritassa anukūlam

original: tameva paññācaritassa anukūlanti adhippāyo. Idaṃ sabbaṃ pana vacanaṃ ekantavipaccanīkabhāvato
analyzed: tam eva paññā caritassa anukūlanti adhippāyaḥ idam sabbam pana vacanam ekanta vipaccanīka bhāvato

original: 835. Vipassanābhavasampatti-sukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ vipassanāsampattisukhānaṃ bhavasampattisukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ.
analyzed: vipassanā bhava sampatti sukhānam paccayā siyum vipassanā sampatti sukhānam bhava sampatti sukhānam paccayā siyum

original: 838. Sammaṭṭhānaṃ manobhunoti manobhuhadayo tassa hadayassa sammaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: sammaṭṭhānam manobhuno ti manobhu hadayo tassa hadayassa sammaṭṭhānam

original: 844. Pattukāmena dhīmatā kasiṇaṃ kattabbaṃ.
analyzed: pattu kāmena dhīmatā kasiṇam kattabbam

analyzed: saṃhārimanti itas citas ca haritabba kasiṇam tatraṭṭhakanti tasmin ṭhāne ṭhitam itas citas ca an āharitabbam kasiṇam

analyzed: vivaṭṭam pana micchatā ati nibbānam icchantena vidatthi catur aṅgulam vaṭṭam kātum tam kasiṇam vaṭṭati

original: 851-2. Hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ, tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalāti tato kasiṇamaṇḍalato hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ padese vidatthicaturaṅgule ucce. Parimukhaṃ satinti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ.
analyzed: hattha pāsa pamāṇasmim tamhā tatas kasiṇa maṇḍalataḥ hattha pāsa ppamāṇasmim padese vidatthi catur aṅgule ucce parimukham kammaṭṭhāna abhimukham satiṃ

original: 853-4. Nekkhammanti jhānaṃ. Khemato daṭṭhuṃ disvā ahaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā addhā ekantena pavivekasukhassa nibbānasukhassa bhāgī assaṃ bhaveyyaṃ.
analyzed: nekkhammam ti jhānam khemataḥ daṭṭhum disvā aham imāya paṭipattiyā addhā ekantena paviveka sukhassa nibbāna sukhassa bhāgī assam bhaveyyam

original: 856. So kasiṇassa vaṇṇo tena yoginā na pekkhitabbo, kasiṇassa lakkhaṇaṃ na pekkhitabbaṃ ussadassa vasena vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā.
analyzed: so kasiṇassa vaṇṇo tena yoginā na pekkhitabbo kasiṇassa lakkhaṇam na pekkhitabbam ussadassa vasena vaṇṇam a muñcitvā

original: 860. Evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena ekaggacetaso ekaggacittassa yogino nimīletvā āvajjantassa
analyzed: evam iminā vutta ppakārena ekagga cetasaḥ ekagga cittassa yoginaḥ nimīletvā āvajjantassa

original: yathā yena pakārena kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti ummīlite kālepi, tathā tena pakārena taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: yathā yena pakārena kammaṭṭhānam hoti ummīlite kāle pi tathā tena pakārena tam kammaṭṭhānam

original: āpāthaṃ yāti ce yadi āgacchati, uggahameva uggahanimittaṃ.
analyzed: āpātham yāti ce yadi āgacchati uggaham eva uggaha nimittam

original: 864. Pādānaṃ dhovane papañcaparihāratthaṃ. Ekatalikāti ekatalamattā.
analyzed: pādānam dhovane eka talikā ati eka tala mattā

original: 865. Taṃ saṃhārimaṃ kasiṇamādāya.

analyzed: samannāharitabbanti kammaṭṭhānam sumanena āharitabbam manasikātabbam ti attho takka āhaṭam ti vitakkena āhaṭam phusitam kare kareyya

original: 868. Tanti taṃ nimittaṃ.
analyzed: tanti tam nimittam

analyzed: thavikāḥ nīharitam ādāsa maṇḍalam majjitam viya toyade kāḷa meghe seta balākāḥ viya

original: Tadā taṃ uggahanimittaṃ padāletvāva niggataṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Tato uggahanimittato.
analyzed: tadā tam uggaha nimittam padāletvā ava niggatam paṭibhāga nimittam tatas uggaha nimittataḥ

original: Tanti taṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Saṇṭhānavantañca vaṇṇavantañca na ca upaṭṭhākāramattaṃ.

original: Paññajanti paññāya jātaṃ.
analyzed: paññajanti paññāya jātam

analyzed: upacāra khaṇe tassa ati tassa samādhinaḥ upacāra kkhaṇe nīvaraṇa ppahānena samādhinaḥ paṭilābha khaṇe pana aṅgānam vitakka ādīnam pātubhāvena iti dvīhi ākārehi

analyzed: cakkavattiya gabbhā uva ratanam viya assa anena su dullabham

analyzed: ayanti paṭisandhi santhāro

analyzed: samatam vīriyassa iva ati vīriya sama bhāvam layam līna bhāvam yantam gacchantam mānasam āvajjana cittam

original: Tāni javanāni appanāyānulomattā anulomāni eva ca vuccanti. Ettha anulomakesu yaṃ

analyzed: gotrabhu diṭṭhanti gotrabhu nāma uddiṭṭham

original: ābhidhammiko ācariyo āha. Chinnataṭe mukhaṃ yassa chinnataṭamukho.
analyzed: ābhidhammikaḥ ācariyaḥ āha chinna taṭe mukham yassa chinna taṭa mukhaḥ

original: 908. Paccavekkhaṇā hetu yassa āvajjanassāti paccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ.
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇā hetu yassa āvajjanassa ati paccavekkhaṇa hetukam

analyzed: kāmacchandassa nānā visaye paluddhassa cetasaḥ ekasmin visaye samādhānena samādhi

original: 915. Sayañca atisantato sukhaṃ avūpasantasabhāvassa uddhaccakukkuccadvayassa paṭipakkhato vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sayam ca ati santataḥ sukham a vūpasanta sabhāvassa uddhacca kukkucca dvayassa paṭipakkhataḥ vuttam

original: 917. Pañcaṅgavippayuttanti pañcanīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ. Pañcaṅgasaṃyutanti vitakkādīhi yuttaṃ.
analyzed: pañcaṅga vippayuttanti pañca nīvaraṇa vippayuttam pañcaṅga saṃyutam ti vitakka ādīhi yuttam

original: 920-1. Vepullanti kammaṭṭhānassa vipulabhāvaṃ. Tañca paṭibhāganimittaṃ upacāraṃ vicāretvā vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vepullanti kammaṭṭhānassa vipula bhāvam tat ca paṭibhāga nimittam upacāram vicāretvā vaḍḍhetum vaṭṭati

analyzed: sati santā saṃvijjamānā santiṭṭhate santiṭṭhati tam jhānam mandassa yogino

original: pāpuṇātīti attho. Nibbidāsaṃyutā saññā, manakkārāti nibbidāvipassanāsaṃyuttā saññāmanakkārā.
analyzed: pāpuṇāti iti atthaḥ nibbidā saṃyutā saññā manakkārā ati nibbidā vipassanā saṃyuttā saññā manakkārā

original: Nibbedhabhāgiyanti lokuttarabhāgiyaṃ, lokuttaramaggabhāgiyanti attho.
analyzed: nibbedha bhāgiyanti lokuttara bhāgiyam lokuttara magga bhāgiyanti attho

original: 933. Ayaṃ samāpatti āsannākusalārayo āsannākusalārikā yasmā takkacārānaṃ thūlattā ca, tasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ samāpatti aṅgadubbalā.

original: 935. Nikantinti taṇhaṃ. Pariyādāyāti sosāpetvā.
analyzed: taṇham pariyādāya ati sosāpetvā

original: 936. Vidhināti pubbe vuttavidhinā. Satassāti satisampannassa.
analyzed: vidhinā ti pubbe vutta vidhinā satassa ati sati sampannassa

original: 938. Nimittaṃ tu tadeva cāti tameva paṭhamanimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”iti evaṃ manasā karontassa.
analyzed: nimittam tu tat eva ca ati tam eva paṭhama nimittam pathavī pathavī iti evam manasā karontassa

original: 943. Sampasādananti saddhā. Majjhattanti tatramajjhattatā.
analyzed: sampasādananti saddhā

original: 944. Duvaṅgahīnanti vitakkavicārahīnaṃ.
analyzed: duvaṅga hīnam ti vitakka vicāra hīnam

original: 948. Pīti nāma cetaso cittassa uppilāpanaṃ uppilāpitattaṃ yato yasmā kāraṇā.
analyzed: pīti nāma cetasaḥ cittassa uppilāpanam uppilāpi tattam yatas yasmā kāraṇā

original: 961-2. Āsannapītidosāti pītiyeva dosā. Ettha etasmiṃ tatiyajjhāne yadeva yaṃ eva
analyzed: āsanna pīti dosā ati dosā ettha etasmin tatiya jhāne yad eva yaṃ eva

original: sukhaṃ iti evaṃ sukhaṃ cetaso ābhogo manasikāro. Evaṃ iminā pakārena sukhassa thūlattā
analyzed: sukham iti evam sukham cetasaḥ ābhogaḥ manasikāraḥ evam iminā pakārena sukhassa thūla ttā

original: ayaṃ samāpatti aṅgadubbalā hoti.
analyzed: ayam samāpatti aṅga dubbalā

original: 974-5. Sukhaṃ upekkhāya āsevanaṃ pana na hoti yasmā upekkhāya āsevanaṃ pana na hoti, yasmā upekkhāsahagatāni javanāni javanti, tasmā catutthajjhānaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ samudīritaṃ.
analyzed: sukham upekkhāya āsevanam pana na hoti yasmai upekkhāya āsevanam pana na hoti yasmai upekkhā sahagatāni javanāni javanti tasmai catuttha jhānam upekkhā sahagatam samudīritam

original: 976. Dutiyajjhānaṃ dvidhā dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: dutiya jhānam dvidhā dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi ṭhitam

original: 979. Ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro sumadhuravarataravacano kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati, atinisitavisado
analyzed: ayam abhidhammāvatāraḥ su madhura varatara vacanaḥ kam nu janam na iva rañjayati ati nisita visadaḥ

original: buddhippacāro yassa so atinisitavisadabuddhippacāro, so tena janena vedanīyo jānitabbo.
analyzed: buddhi ppacāraḥ yassa saḥ ati nisita visada buddhi ppacāraḥ saḥ tena janena vedanīyaḥ jānitabbo

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Rūpāvacarasamādhibhāvanāniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpāvacara samādhi bhāvanā niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Cuddasamo paricchedo.
analyzed: paricchedaḥ

original: 15. Pannarasamo paricchedo
analyzed: pannarasamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Arūpāvacarasamādhibhāvanāniddesavaṇṇanā
982-3. Rūpe kho vijjamānasminti rūpakāye vijjamāne daṇḍādānādayo daṇḍaggahaṇādayo. Iti rūpe rūpakāye ādīnavaṃ disvā.
analyzed: rūpe kho vijjamānasmin ti rūpa kāye vijjamāne daṇḍa ādāna ādayaḥ daṇḍa ggahaṇa ādayaḥ iti rūpe rūpa kāye ādīnavam disvā

original: 984. Sūkarābhihatova sāti sūkaraṃ anubandhito sā sunakho viya.
analyzed: sūkara abhihatā uva sā ati sūkaram su nakhaḥ

original: 985. Vasīti yogī.
analyzed: vasīti yogī

original: 988-990. Phuṭṭhokāsañca tena tanti tena cittena phuṭṭhaṃ tamokāsaṃ “ananto ākāso”iti
analyzed: phuṭṭha ukāsam ca tena tanti tena cittena phuṭṭham tama ukāsam anantaḥ ākāsaḥ iti

original: ca manasā karonto eva ugghāṭeti. Iti vacanaṃ vuccate, ayamañño nayo, “ākāso” iti
