original: anicchite tasmiṃ ṭhāne na yujjati, aññasmiṃ pana ṭhāne maggavīthiyaṃ āvajjanaparikammajavanānaṃ
analyzed: an icchite tasmin ṭhāne na yujjati aññasmim pana ṭhāne magga vīthiyam āvajjana parikamma javanānam

original: kasiṇādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, gotrabhulokuttaracittānañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
analyzed: kasiṇa ādikam ārammaṇam hoti gotrabhu lokuttara cittānaṃ ca nibbānam ārammaṇam hoti

original: ettha ārammaṇajavanānaṃ ekārammaṇatā anicchatā.
analyzed: ettha ārammaṇa javanānam eka ārammaṇa tā anicchatā

original: 1134-41. “Ekabbhavaparicchinnaṃ, paccuppannanti pacchima”nti vatvā puna aññena pariyāyena
analyzed: eka ap bhava paricchinnam paccuppannam ti pacchiman ti vatvā puna aññena pariyāyena

original: taṃ paccuppannaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ addhākhyaṃ addhānāma paccuppannaṃ javanavārato dīpetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tam paccuppannam dassetum idam addhā ākhyam addhā nāma paccuppannam javana vārataḥ dīpetabbam

original: Iti vacanaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ. Yadā iddhimā yogī parassa cittaṃ ñātuṃ āvajjati, tassa āvajjanamano
analyzed: iti vacanam niddiṭṭham yadā iddhimā yogī parassa cittam ñātum āvajjati tassa āvajjana manaḥ

original: paccuppannakhaṇavhayaṃ paccuppannaṃ manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā tena cittena
analyzed: paccuppanna khaṇa vhayam paccuppannam manaḥ dvāra āvajjana cittam ārammaṇam katvā tena cittena

original: saddhiṃ nirujjhati, tesu niruddhesu tassa yogino cattāri, pañca vā javanāni jāyanti.
analyzed: saddhim nirujjhati tesu niruddhesu tassa yogino cattāri pañca vā javanāni jāyanti

original: Etesaṃ catunnaṃ, pañcannaṃ javanānaṃ yaṃ pacchimaṃ cittaṃ iddhicittamudīritaṃ. Iddhicittato

analyzed: sesāni kāmāvacara cittāni etesam kāmāvacare iddhi javanānam tat eva ca para cittam ārammaṇam

original: hoti yasmā, tasmā sabbāni tāni javanāni ekārammaṇataṃ yanti, tesaṃ javanānaṃ nānārammaṇatā
analyzed: hoti yasmā tasmā sabbāni tāni javanāni eka ārammaṇatam yanti tesam javanānam nānā ārammaṇa tā

original: addhāvasā na bhaveyya, paccuppannārammaṇato tesaṃ javanānaṃ ekārammaṇabhāvepi iddhimānasameva
analyzed: addhāvasā na bhaveyya paccuppanna ārammaṇato tesam javanānam eka ārammaṇa bhāve pi iddhi mānasam eva

original: ca parassa cittaṃ jānāti. Itarāni kāmāvacarāni pana cittāni parassa cittaṃ na jānanti.

original: Yathā cakkhudvāre tu viññāṇanti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ passati, tathā itaraṃ cittaṃ na passati.
analyzed: yathā cakkhu dvāre tu viññāṇanti cakkhu viññāṇam rūpam passati tathā itaram cittam na passati

original: 1161. Anāgataṃsañāṇassāti anāgataṃsañāṇassa anāgataṃ dhammaṃ agocaraṃ, gocaraṃ na hotiyevāti attho.
analyzed: anāgataṃsañāṇassa ati anāgataṃsañāṇassa anāgatam dhammam agocaram gocaram na attho

original: 1169. Vividhatthāni vaṇṇapadāni yasmiṃ so vividhatthavaṇṇapado, taṃ madhuratthamatinīharaṃ uttamaṃ sotujanassa hadayaṃ pītikaraṃ sacetano ko nāma manujo na suṇeyya.
analyzed: vividha atthāni vaṇṇa padāni yasmin saḥ vividha attha vaṇṇa padaḥ tam madhura attham ati nīharam uttamam sotu janassa hadayam pīti karam sa cetanaḥ kaḥ nāma manujaḥ na suṇeyya

analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

analyzed: sattarasamaḥ paricchedaḥ

analyzed: diṭṭhivisuddhi niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 1175. Yā sañjānanamattaṃva, saññā nīlādito panāti sā saññā nīlādivasena sañjānanamattaṃva karoti. Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhanti aniccādilakkhaṇapaṭibujjhanaṃ.

original: 1177. Taṃ viññāṇaṃ ussakkitvā uddhaṃ sakkaṃ katvā satte maggaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: tam viññāṇam ussakkitvā uddham sakkam katvā satte maggam pāpetum na sakkoti

original: 1178-9. Sabbesaṃ pana dhammānaṃ sabhāvapaṭivedhanaṃ aviparītavasena paṭibujjhanaṃ paññāya lakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: sabbesam pana dhammānam sabhāva paṭivedhanam aviparīta vasena paṭibujjhanam paññāya lakkhaṇam

original: 1180. Samādhi āsannakāraṇaṃ etāyāti samādhāsannakāraṇā.
analyzed: samādhi āsanna kāraṇam samādhā āsanna kāraṇā

analyzed: lakkhaṇena ekadhā ti sabba dhammam paṭibujjhana lakkhaṇena ekadhā vuttā

original: 1183. Bhūripaññenāti bhūte atthe aviparīte atthe ramatīti bhūri, bhūri paññā etassāti bhūripañño, tena.
analyzed: bhūri paññena ati bhūte atthe aviparīte atthe ramati iti bhūri bhūri paññā etassa ati bhūri paññaḥ tena

original: 1186-91. Tīsu atthadhammaniruttīsu ca ñāṇesu atthadhammaniruttīsu jātesu ñāṇesu ca
analyzed: tīsu attha dhamma niruttīsu ca ñāṇesu attha dhamma niruttīsu jātesu ñāṇesu ca

analyzed: ñāṇam yam kiñci paccaya uppannam phalam dhamma jātam bhāsita tthaḥ ti pāḷiyā atthaḥ ete

analyzed: dhamma saññitā ati dhamma nāmakā sabhāva nirutti iti aviparīta vohāro pariyatti iti

original: sikkhanaṃ. Savanādhigamehi pubbayogena pubbe pavattanāya.

original: 1192. Bhūmibhūtesūti vipassanāya bhūmibhūtesu.

original: 1194. Jananāditoti jātiādito bhītena paññā bhāvetabbā.

analyzed: ekāsītiyā cittena ati lokuttara citta vajjitena vipassanā bhūmi bhūtena ekāsītiyā cittena

analyzed: satta sammoha ghāta attham ti satto ti sammohassa

original: 1211. Nirīhakanti īhavirahitaṃ byāpāravirahitaṃ, dārurajjusamāyoge.
analyzed: nirīhakam ti īha virahitam byāpāra virahitam dāru rajju samāyoge

analyzed: diṭṭhivisuddhi niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: icca evamādi bāttiṃsa koṭṭhāsānam paccayassa hetu paccaye tāva yogī manasā pariggaṇhāti

original: 1233. Hetvaṅkurassa bījaṃ tu bījaṃ aṅkurassa hetujanakaṃ, pathavādayo aṅkurassa paccayā.

analyzed: pañca dhammā ti avijjā taṇhā upādāna kamma āhārāḥ hetu paccayāḥ dhammā

original: 1235. Kammaṃ puttassa janako pitā viya nāmarūpassa janakaṃ.
analyzed: kammam puttassa janakaḥ pitā viya nāma rūpassa janakam

original: 1238. Paccayāti paccayena.
analyzed: paccayā ati paccayena

analyzed: yā sā ati yā sā kaṅkhā pubba ante pubba koṭṭhāse

analyzed: sabbathā sabba koṭṭhāsataḥ anavasesā ava tassa yogino sā kaṅkhā pahiyyati na āsīyate

analyzed: attha sādhikā ati kusala pakkhe dāna ādi attha sādhikā akusala pakkhe pāṇātipāta ādi attha sādhikā

original: Taṃ vipākanti upaghātakakammassa taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ eko yogī kammavipākavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
analyzed: tam vipākam ti upaghātaka kammassa tam vipākam uppannam nāma hoti evam ekaḥ yogī kamma vipāka vasena nāma rūpassa paccaya pariggaham karoti

analyzed: hetu phalassa sambandha vasena ati hetu phala sambandha vasena idam nāma rūpam kevalam ekantena pavattati iti sammā aviparīta ākārena saṃ anupassati

analyzed: pāka ppavattitaḥ uddham pāka paṭivedakam na passati na jāniyate

analyzed: appavatti nāma na dissati upapannam dissati titthiyā etam attham an aññāya

analyzed: sambhārehi iti sūriya ādi sambhārehi

analyzed: suññam tam nāma rūpa dhammam

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

1264. Paccuppannassa dhammassāti paccuppannassa nāmarūpadhammassa.

original: 1266-8. Uppajjato uppajjantassa nāmarūpadhammassa rāsito nicayato āgamanañca natthi. Disāgamananti disāya gamanaṃ. Niruddhassāpi nāmarūpadhammassa ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nicayoti ca natthi.
analyzed: uppajjataḥ uppajjantassa nāma rūpa dhammassa rāsitaḥ nicayataḥ āgamanañca natthi disāgamananti disāya gamanam niruddhassa api nāma rūpa dhammassa ekasmim ṭhāne nicayo ti ca natthi

original: 1270-1. Avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho. Taṇhāsamudayā rūpasamudayo,
analyzed: avijjā samudayā rūpa samudayaḥ avijjā nirodhā rūpa nirodho taṇhā samudayā rūpa samudayaḥ

original: taṇhānirodhā rūpanirodho. Kammasamudayā rūpasamudayo, kammanirodhā rūpanirodho. Āhāranirodhā
analyzed: taṇhā nirodhā rūpa nirodho kamma samudayā rūpa samudayo kamma nirodhā rūpa nirodho āhāra nirodhā

original: rūpanirodho. Dhammeti saṅkhāradhamme.
analyzed: rūpa nirodhaḥ dhamme ti saṅkhāra dhamme

original: 1280. Sampattapaṭivedhassāti sampattalokuttarasaṅkhātamaggaphalassa sotāpannādipuggalassa. Vippaṭipannassāti paṭipattiyaṃ appaṭipannassa, viruddhavasena paṭipannassa vā.
analyzed: sampatta paṭivedhassa ati sampatta lokuttara saṅkhāta magga phalassa sotāpanna ādi puggalassa vippaṭipannassa ati paṭipattiyam appaṭipannassa viruddha vasena paṭipannassa vā

original: 1286. Kāyacittānīti kāyāti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārā. Cittanti viññāṇaṃ.
analyzed: kāya cittāni iti kāyā ati vedanā saññā saṅkhārā cittam ti viññāṇam

original: 1290. Yato yato paccayādito. Yaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ vijānataṃ vijānantānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ, tehi labhitabbaṃ amataṃ, amataṃ viya pītipāmojjaṃ vā.
analyzed: yatas yatas paccaya āditas yam amatam nibbānam vijānatam vijānantānam pīti pāmojjam tehi labhitabbam amatam amatam viya pīti pāmojjam vā

original: 1293. Appatteti attani maggaphalasmiṃ appatte. Pattasaññīti maggaphale ahaṃ patto asmi iti saññito hoti.
analyzed: appatta iti attani magga phalasmim appatte patta saññī iti magga phale aham pattaḥ asmi iti saññitaḥ hoti

original: 1297. Sāravedinoti sārajānanasīlā. Tanti taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ. Idaṃ ñāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassananti maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ nāma.

1299. Upallesavimuttaṃ suvisadaṃ ñāṇanti aṭṭhavidhañāṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: upallesa vimuttam su visadam ñāṇam ti aṭṭhavidha ñāṇam sandhāya āha

analyzed: bodhi pakkhiya dhammānam uddham ca anulomataḥ ti uddham vattamānānam bodhi pakkhiya dhammānam

analyzed: anulomataḥ idam anuloma ñāṇam vuṭṭhāna gāminiyā pariyosānam nāma bhāsitam mahesinā

analyzed: kathitam sacca anuloma ñāṇam āhacca uppannā sabba ppakārena gotra bhu pariyosānam

analyzed: tattha ati vipassanāya

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

analyzed: dvāvīsatimaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: attho. Taṃ gotrabhucittaṃ maggacittassa āvajjaniyaṭhānattā. Paṭipadāñāṇadassanaṃ
analyzed: attho tam gotrabhu cittam magga cittassa āvajja niya ṭhāna ttā paṭipadā ñāṇa dassanam

original: kudācanaṃ na ca bhajati, tatheva ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ kudācanaṃ na bhajateva. Ubhinnaṃ
analyzed: kudācanam na ca bhajati tathā iva ñāṇa dassana visuddhim kudācanam na bhajatā iva

original: ñāṇānaṃ antarā ekaṃ abbohārikaṃ vohāre niyuttanti vohārikaṃ, na vohārikaṃ abbohārikaṃ.
analyzed: ñāṇānam antarā ekam abbohārikam vohāre niyuttanti vohārikam na vohārikam abbohārikam

original: Vipassanāya sotasmiṃ vipassanāya sote patitattā vipassanā nāma voharitabbā. Tato nibbānato.
analyzed: vipassanāya sotasmim vipassanāya sote patita ttā vipassanā nāma voharitabbā tatas nibbānato

original: 1325. Sūraṃ tikkhaṃ vipassananti gotrabhucittaṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: sūram tikkham vipassananti gotrabhu cittam sandhāya āha

original: 1326-9. Visaṅkhāranti saṅkhārehi vigataṃ. Paṭhamāvajjanañcevāti paṭhamāvajjanaṃ viya.
analyzed: saṅkhārehi vigatam paṭhama āvajjanam ca iva ati paṭhama āvajjanam

original: Paṭhamābhogatāpi cāti paṭhamamanasikārā viya. Maggassa anantarādīhi paccayehi. Tassāti
analyzed: paṭhama ābhoga tā api ca ati paṭhama manasikārā viya maggassa anantara ādīhi paccayehi tassa ati

original: maggassa. Sikhāpattāya tāya vipassanāya muddhamhi matthake. Anāvattanti anivattaṃ.
analyzed: maggassa sikhāpattāya tāya vipassanāya muddhamhi matthake an āvattanti anivattam

original: 1330-3. Ekena āvajjanena ekissāyeva vīthiyā. Anulomagotrabhucetasanti anulomagotrabhucittānaṃ
analyzed: ekena āvajjanena ekissāya iva vīthiyā anuloma gotra bhu cetasanti anuloma gotra bhu cittānam

original: nānārammaṇatā vuttā. Taṃ gotrabhucittaṃ anāvajjanampi maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā.
analyzed: na anārammaṇa tā vuttā tam gotrabhu cittam anāvajjanam pi maggassa āvajjana ṭhāne ṭhatvā

original: Saññaṃ datvā viyāti “ahaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karomi, tvampi tamevārammaṇaṃ karohi”
analyzed: saññam da tvā viya ati aham nibbānam ārammaṇam karomi tvam pi tam eva ārammaṇam karohi

original: iti saññaṃ datvā viyāti adhippāyo. Saññitanti saññaṃ. Kadācipi anibbiddhapubbaṃ maggo
analyzed: iti saññam da tvā viya ati adhippāyaḥ saññitam ti saññam kadācipi a nibbiddha pubbam maggo

original: esa eso maggo pubbe anibbiddhapubbo.
analyzed: esaḥ esaḥ maggaḥ pubbe a nibbiddha pubbaḥ

original: 1336. Ujjhatīti chindati.
analyzed: ujjhati iti chindati

original: 1338. Anekesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ dāyakena ādimaggena saṃyuttaṃ. Paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: anekesam ānisaṃsānam dāyakena ādi maggena saṃyuttam paṭhama magga ñāṇam

original: 1341. Ekassāsevanaṃ natthi ekassa cittuppādassa āsevanapaccayo natthi, tasmā kāraṇā
analyzed: ekassa āsevanam na atthi ekassa cittuppādassa āsevana paccayaḥ na atthi tasmā kāraṇā

original: dve cittuppādā anulomakā. Tehīti cittuppādehi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhā labhitvā tatiyaṃ
analyzed: dve cittuppādā anulomakā tehi iti cittuppādehi āsevana paccayam laddhā labhitvā tatiyam

original: cittaṃ gotrabhu hoti.
analyzed: cittam gotrabhu hoti

original: 1345-7. Maggapekkhanahetu yassa āvajjanamanaso, taṃ maggapekkhanahetukaṃ. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: magga pekkhana hetu yassa āvajjana manasaḥ tam magga pekkhana hetukam tasmin

original: niruddheti tasmiṃ āvajjanacitte niruddhe maggassa paccavekkhaṇasaññitāni satta javanāni
analyzed: niruddhā iti tasmin āvajjana citte niruddhe maggassa paccavekkhaṇa saññitāni satta javanāni

original: paṭipāṭiyā jāyante. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni ekūnavīsati honti.
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyā jāyante paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇāni ekūnavīsati honti

original: 1351. Tato tadā vipassanāvīthiṃ otarati. Dutiyamaggañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: tatas tadā vipassanā vīthim otarati dutiya magga ñāṇam

original: 1361. Mūlaghātanti mūlaghātanaṃ. Tatiyamaggañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: mūla ghātanti mūla ghātanam tatiya magga ñāṇam

original: 1363. Anāvattisabhāvatoti anivattato. Catutthamaggañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: anāvatti sabhāvataḥ ti a nivattataḥ catuttha magga ñāṇam

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ñāṇa dassana visuddhi niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dvāvīsatimo paricchedo.
analyzed: dvāvīsatimaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 23. Tevīsatimo paricchedo
analyzed: tevīsatimaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Kilesapahānaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kilesa pahāna niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 1375. Idha pana imasmiṃ panādhikāre kāraṇūpacārena lābhādikāraṇassa vohārena, lābho ādi vatthu yassa anunayassāti lābhādivatthuko, tassa.
analyzed: idha pana imasmin pana adhikāre kāraṇa upacārena lābha ādi kāraṇassa vohārena lābhaḥ ādi vatthu yassa anunayassa ati lābha ādi vatthuko tassa

original: Sukhumāti kāmarāgapaṭighā sukhumā.
analyzed: sukhumā ati kāma rāga paṭighā sukhumā

original: 1376. Yena yena paṭhamamaggādiñāṇena yo yo saṃyojanādiko pahātabbo dhammo ghātaṃ vināsaṃ yāti, so so dhammo tena tena asesena ñāṇena evaṃ sādhu mayā sandassito.
analyzed: yena yena paṭhama magga ādi ñāṇena yaḥ yaḥ saṃyojana ādikaḥ pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ ghātam vināsam yāti so saḥ dhammaḥ tena tena asesena ñāṇena evam sādhu mayā sandassitaḥ

original: 1383. Pariññābhisamayenāti paricchinditvā jānanena. Dukkhaṃ abhisametīti dukkhaṃ paṭivijjhati.
analyzed: pariññā abhisamayena ati paricchinditvā jānanena dukkham abhisameti iti dukkham paṭivijjhati

original: 1394. Yo yogī imaṃ viditvā hitabhāvanaṃ vanaṃ vanetabbaṃ viditvā jānitvā ve ekantena
analyzed: yaḥ yogī imam viditvā hita bhāvanam vanam vanetabbam viditvā jānitvā ekantena

original: padaṃ aviggahakaṃ sarīrarahitaṃ padaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ ñātabbaṃ padaṃ nibbānaṃ upeti pāpuṇāti ca.
analyzed: padam aviggahakam sarīra rahitam padam paṭipajjitabbam ñātabbam padam nibbānam upeti pāpuṇāti ca

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Kilesapahānaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kilesa pahāna niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Tevīsatimo paricchedo.
analyzed: tevīsatimaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Paccayaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 1395. Rūpaṃ rūpassāti rūpaṃ rūpassa. Arūpassa nāmassa.
analyzed: rūpam rūpassa ati rūpam rūpassa arūpassa nāmassa

original: 1396. Missakassāti nāmarūpamissakassāti attho.
analyzed: missakassa ti nāma rūpa missakassa ati attho

analyzed: ti pañca ca ati pannarasa ca

analyzed: ekaḥ ti kamma paccayaḥ dvekāliko ti atīta paccuppanna kāla vasena dvīsu kālesu niyuttaḥ dassito ti bhagavatā desitaḥ

original: Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
analyzed: iti abhidhammāvatāra ṭīkāya

original: Paccayaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paccaya niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Catuvīsatimo paricchedo.
analyzed: catuvīsatimaḥ paricchedo

analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1401. Sumatimativicārabodhanoti sumatīnaṃ sundarapaññānaṃ kavīnaṃ matiyā vicārassa
analyzed: sumati mati vicāra bodhano ti sumatīnam sundara paññānam kavīnam matiyā vicārassa

analyzed: bodhanaḥ vimati vimoha vināsanaḥ ti vimatīnam bālānam vimohassa vināsanaḥ kumati mati mahā tamaḥ nāsaḥ ti

original: tikkhapaññāya obhāsakaro.
analyzed: tikkhapaññāya obhāsakaro

original: 1402. Sumatināmako bhikkhu asamānato asadisāya pūjāya mama āyācito yato yasmā kāraṇā,
analyzed: sumati nāmakaḥ bhikkhu asamānataḥ asadisāya pūjāya mama āyācitaḥ yatas yasmai kāraṇā

analyzed: bhāvanā ati hita pakāsanāya bhāvanāya mayā racitaḥ atha vā aham sumatinā bhikkhunā

analyzed: a samānataḥ mānataḥ āyācitaḥ yatas yasmai tatas tasmai

original: 1405. Tividhā byappathānañhi gatiyoti byappathānaṃ vacanānaṃ atthaganthayuttivasena tividhā gatiyo.
analyzed: tividhā byappathānam hi gatiyaḥ ti byappathānam vacanānam attha gantha yutti vasena tividhā

original: 1406. Nikāyantaraladdhīhīti aññasmiṃ nikāye laddhīhi. Vācanāmagganissitoti vacanappabandhanissito.
analyzed: nikāya antara laddhīhi iti aññasmin nikāye laddhīhi vācanā magga nissito ti vacana ppabandha nissito

original: 1410. Asaṃkiṇṇakulākuleti asammissakulehi ākiṇṇe. Supasannasitodaketi madhurasītodake.
analyzed: a saṃkiṇṇa kula ākulā iti a sammissa kulehi ākiṇṇe su pasanna sita udakā iti madhura sīta udake

original: 1411. Saṅkaṭeti sambādhe.
analyzed: saṅkaṭa iti sambādhe

analyzed: kelāsa sikhara ākāra pāsāda paṭimaṇḍitā iti rajata pabbata matthaka nibhehi pāsādehi alaṅkate

original: 1413. Vividhākāracārupākāragopureti vividhasaṇṭhānamanuññapākāradvārakoṭṭhake.
analyzed: vividha ākāra cāru pākāra gopura iti

original: 1414. Sallekhāti sallekhavutti. Sākhalyeti sakhilabhāve. Satāti satisampannena.

analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: abhidhammāvatārapurāṇa ṭīkā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: paṭhamaḥ bhāgaḥ

analyzed: gantha ārambha kathā

analyzed: gantha ārambha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Ettha ca ratanattayappaṇāmaṃ kattukāmo tathāgatamūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ paṭhamaṃ

original: Thomanāpubbaṅgamena hi paṇāmena satthu guṇātisayayogo, tato cassa anuttaravandanīyabhāvo,

analyzed: hetu bhāvaḥ ca dassito hoti

original: iminā aparakālakiriyāvacanena saha sambandho. Buddhanti vandanakiriyāya kammaniddeso.

original: Sirasāti uttamaṅgena karaṇabhūtena. Abujjhi, bodhetīti vā buddho. Ayañhi catusaccadhamme
analyzed: sirasā iti uttamaṅgena karaṇa bhūtena abujjhi bodheti iti vā buddhaḥ ayan hi catu sacca dhamme

original: sayampi abujjhi, parepi bodheti, tasmā bujjhanabodhanaṭṭhena “buddho”ti vuccati.
analyzed: sayam pi abujjhi pare pi bodheti tasmā bujjhana bodhana ṭṭhena buddhaḥ ti vuccati

original: Yathāha “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”ti. Atha vā budha-saddassa
analyzed: yathā āha bujjhitā saccāni iti buddhaḥ pajāyāti buddhaḥ iti atha vā budha saddassa

original: jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato abujjhi savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṃ vigato,
analyzed: jāgaraṇa vikasana atthesu pi pavattanataḥ abujjhi sa vāsana sammoha niddāya accantam vigataḥ

original: buddhiyā vikasitavāti vā buddho. Bhagavā hi vatthusabhāvadassanavibandhikāya avijjāsaṅkhātāya
analyzed: vā buddhaḥ bhagavā hi vatthu sabhāva dassana vibandhikāya avijjā saṅkhātāya

original: niddāya ariyamaggañāṇena saha vāsanāya samucchinnattā tato accantaṃ vigato. Paramarucirasirisobhaggasamāgamena
analyzed: niddāya ariya magga ñāṇena saha vāsanāya tatas accantam vigataḥ parama rucira siri sobhagga samāgamena

original: vikasitamiva padumaṃ aparimitaguṇagaṇālaṅkatasabbaññutaññāṇasamāgamena vikasito vikāsamanuppatto,
analyzed: vikasitam iva padumam aparimita guṇa gaṇa alaṅkata sabbaññuta ññāṇa samāgamena vikasitaḥ vikāsam anuppattaḥ

original: tasmā jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasenapi “buddho”ti vuccati.
analyzed: tasmā buddhaḥ ti vuccati

original: Ettāvatā ca dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti attahitasampattito, parahitapaṭipattito
analyzed: ettāvatā ca dvīhi ākārehi bhagavataḥ thomanā katā hoti atta hita sampattitaḥ para hita paṭipattitaḥ

original: ca. Tāsu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamo savāsanasakalasaṃkilesānamaccantappahānaṃ
analyzed: ca tāsu atta hita sampatti anāvaraṇa ñāṇa adhigamo

original: anupādisesanibbānādhigamo ca, parahitapaṭipatti pana āsayappayogavasena duvidhaṃ

original: parahitasamīhanaṃ. Tattha dhammadesanāya abhājanesu devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi
analyzed: para hita samīhanam tattha dhamma desanāya abhājanesu devadatta ādīsu virodhi sattesu pi

original: niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā aparipākagatindriyānaṃ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca āsayo nāma.
analyzed: niccam āsayaḥ nāma

original: Tadaññasattānaṃ pana lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa yānattayamukhena sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanā
analyzed: tad añña sattānam pana lābha sakkāra ādi nirapekkha cittassa yāna ttaya mukhena sabba dukkha niyyānika dhamma desanā

original: payogo nāma. Duvidhāsu panetāsu parahitapaṭipattīsu, tividhāsu ca attahitasampattīsu
analyzed: payogaḥ nāma duvidhāsu panetāsu para hita paṭipattīsu tividhāsu ca atta hita sampattīsu

original: pakāsitāti veditabbā.
analyzed: pakāsitā iti veditabbā

original: Apica hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehipi bhagavato thomanā pavattatīti

analyzed: ānubhāva sampadā rūpa kāya sampadā ca ati tāsu sabbaññuta ññāṇa padaṭṭhānam magga ñāṇam

analyzed: magga ñāṇa padaṭṭhānam sabbaññu taññāṇam tad mūlakāni ca dasa bala ādi ñāṇāni ñāṇa sampadā

original: nāma. Aggamaggabhāvanāya sabbakilesānaṃ saha vāsanāhi anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ pahānasampadā.
analyzed: nāma aggamagga bhāvanāya sabba kilesānam saha vāsanāhi anuppatti dhamma tā āpādanam pahāna sampadā

original: Acinteyyāparimitānaṃ sabbalokahitānaṃ nipphādane, sadevakalokābhibhavane ca ādhipaccaṃ
analyzed: acinteyya aparimitānam sabbaloka hitānam nipphādane sa devaka loka abhibhavane ca ādhipaccam

original: ānubhāvasampadā. Sakalalokanayanābhisekabhūtā pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitā

analyzed: veditabbaḥ imāsu pana ananta karuṇā vacanena tathā āgata ṭṭhena ca tathāgata saddena

original: hetusampadā dassitā. Phalasampadāsu ñāṇasampadā ceva pahānasampadā ca anantapaññā-vacanena,
analyzed: hetu sampadā dassitā phala sampadāsu ñāṇa sampadā ca iva pahāna sampadā ca ananta paññā vacanena

analyzed: abhisamaya paridīpakena tathāgata saddena bujjhana jāgaraṇa vikasana ṭṭhena ca buddha saddena

original: dassitā, ānubhāvasampadāpi abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgata-saddena, anuttara-vacanena

original: ca vibhāvitā, rūpakāyasampadā pana rūpaggappattidīpakena anuttara-saddena dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: “Rāgavirāgamanejamasokaṃ,
analyzed: rāga virāgam anejam asokam

original: Dhammamasaṅkhatamappaṭikūlaṃ;
analyzed: dhammam asaṅkhatam appaṭikūlam

original: Madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattaṃ,
analyzed: madhuram imam paguṇam su vibhattam

original: Dhammamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. ;
analyzed: dhammam imam saraṇa attham upehi iti

analyzed: ettha hi kāma rāga ādi bhedaḥ sabbaḥ api rāgaḥ virajjati etena ati rāga virāgaḥ ti maggo kathito

original: Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya, antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā

analyzed: anejam asokam ti phalam kathitam kenacid paccayena asaṅkhata ttā dhammam asaṅkhatanti

analyzed: suṭṭhu vibhajita ttā ca appaṭikūla nti ādinā sabbaḥ api pariyatti dhammo kathito tattha

original: Dvāraṃ patvā tadārammaṇañhi vibhāvanaṭṭhena cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ. Tathā

original: ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Vacanatthato pana na kusalanti akusalaṃ, kusalapaṭipakkhanti

original: ayaṃ kāmo avacarati, tasmā kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacarasaññitoti attho.
analyzed: ayam kāmaḥ avacarati tasmai kāmaḥ ettha avacarati iti kāma avacara saññitaḥ ti attho

original: 15. Saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā yebhuyyena apetāti apāyā. Nirayādivasena
analyzed: saggamokkha hetu bhūtā puñña sammatā ayā yebhuyyena apetā ati apāyā niraya ādi vasena

original: channaṃ devalokānaṃ. Merupādavāsino pana asurā tāvatiṃsesuyeva saṅgayhantīti na tehi
analyzed: pana asurāḥ

original: saddhiṃ sattannanti vuttaṃ. Manaso ussannatāya manussā, satisūrabhāvabrahmacariyayogyatādiguṇavasena

original: veditabbā. Yathāha –
analyzed: veditabbā yathā āha

original: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse. Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti.
analyzed: tīhi bhikkhave ṭhānehi jambudīpakāḥ manussāḥ uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse katamehi tīhi sūrā satimantaḥ idha brahmacariya vāsā iti

original: Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi “manussā”icceva
analyzed: tehi pana samāna rūpa āditāya saddhim paritta dīpa vāsīhi itara mahā dīpa vāsinaḥ pi

original: caturāpāyesu tiracchānapettivisayānaṃ visuṃ paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvepi yattha

original: te araññasamuddapabbatapādādike nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti, tādisassa ṭhānassa gahitattā ekādasavidho.

original: 16. Nanu cettha aññesampi dhammānaṃ pavattisambhavato kāmasseva avacaraṇavasena kathaṃ
analyzed: nanu ca ittha aññesam pi dhammānam pavatti sambhavato kāmassa iva avacaraṇa vasena katham

original: Abhilakkhitattāti ekādasavidhe padese pākaṭattā. Atha vā assāti karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
analyzed: abhilakkhita ttā ati ekādasavidhe padese pākaṭa ttā atha vā assa ati karaṇa atthe sāmivacanam

analyzed: tasmai anena duvidhena kāmena ekādasavidhassa padesassa abhilakkhita ttā paññāpita ttā ati

original: jātasomanassāti attho. Sahasāti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ dātukāmatāya uppattisamakālameva.

original: Ettha ca “paṭipattidassanenā”ti iminā paresaṃ payogābhāvamāha, “jātaparicayā”ti attano

original: paricayā”ti iminā asaṅkhārikabhāvassa “bālakā bhikkhū…pe… jātā”ti ca imehi ñāṇavippayuttasomanassasahagatabhāvassa
analyzed: paricayā ti iminā asaṅkhārika bhāvassa bālakā bhikkhu upe jātā ati ca imehi ñāṇa vippayutta somanassa sahagata bhāvassa

original: ca dīpitattā “sahasā”ti vacanena yathāvuttameva ñāṇavippayuttaasaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ pakāseti.

original: Teti te ñātakā, te bālakāti vā attho. “Somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgammā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ

original: rūpāni passatī”ti, tassa ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. Teneva hi tattha vā idha vā “bahiddhā
analyzed: rūpāni passati iti tassa ca kāraṇa vacanam tena iva hi tattha vā idha vā bahiddhā

analyzed: rūpāniyā iva abhibhavitabbāni iti tattha eva vuttam an abhibhavanīya tā ca ajjhatta rūpānam

original: Desanāvilāso hi nāma vineyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vijjamānasseva pariyāyassa vibhāvanaṃ,

original: “Kenaṭṭhena pana vimokkho veditabboti? Adhimuccanaṭṭhena. Ko ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho
analyzed: kenaṭṭhena pana vimokkhaḥ veditabbaḥ ti adhimuccana ṭṭhena kaḥ ayam adhimuccana ṭṭho

analyzed: nāma paccanīka dhammehi ca suṭṭhu vimuccana aṭṭho ārammaṇe ca abhirati vasena suṭṭhu adhimuccana aṭṭho ti

original: Yadi vasibhāvappattameva vimokkho, kathamassa ārammaṇacatukke parittatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttā.

original: Lokuttarakusalavaṇṇanā

analyzed: evam tividham pi lokiya kusalam niddisitvā idāni lokuttara kusalam niddisantaḥ āha itaram

original: panā”tiādi. Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko, so tividho – saṅkhāraloko sattaloko bhājanalokoti.
analyzed: pana atiādi lujjana palujjana aṭṭhena loko so tividho saṅkhāra loko satta loko bhājana loko ti

original: Tato idaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ. Cattāropi hi maggā upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātasaṅkhāralokato
analyzed: tatas idam uttarati iti lokuttaram cattāraḥ api hi maggāḥ upādāna kkhandha saṅkhāta saṅkhāra lokato

original: uttaranti anāsavabhāvena. Sattalokesu ca sotāpattimaggo anariyalokato uttarati, sakadāgāmimaggo
analyzed: uttaranti anāsava bhāvena satta lokesu ca sotāpatti maggo anariya lokataḥ uttarati sakadāgāmi maggo

original: sotāpannalokato, anāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmilokato, arahattamaggo anāgāmilokato uttarati.
analyzed: sotāpanna lokataḥ anāgāmi maggo sakadāgāmi lokataḥ arahatta maggo anāgāmi lokataḥ uttarati

original: Bhājanalokesu pana paṭhamamaggo apāyalokato uttarati, sakadāgāmimaggo kāmalokekadesato,
analyzed: bhājana lokesu pana paṭhama maggaḥ apāya lokataḥ uttarati sakadāgāmi maggo kāma loka ikadesato

original: anāgāmimaggo sakalakāmalokato, arahattamaggo rūpārūpalokato uttarati. Iti catubbidhampi
analyzed: anāgāmi maggo sakala kāma lokataḥ arahatta maggo rūpa arūpa lokataḥ uttarati iti catubbidham pi

original: maggacittaṃ tividhalokato uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ, kucchitasalanādito pana kusalaṃ,
analyzed: magga cittam tividha lokataḥ uttarati iti lokuttaram pana kusalam

original: cintanādito cittañcāti lokuttarakusalacittaṃ. Phalaṃ pana lokato uttiṇṇattā lokuttaraṃ,
analyzed: cintana āditas cittam ca ati lokuttara kusala cittam phalam pana lokataḥ lokuttaram

original: ubhayampi vā saha nibbānena upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātalokato uttaraṃ visiṭṭhataranti
analyzed: ubhayam pi vā saha nibbānena upādānakkhandha saṅkhāta lokataḥ uttaram visiṭṭhataranti

original: lokuttaraṃ. Yathāha “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ
analyzed: lokuttaram yathā āha yāvatā bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatāḥ vā asaṅkhatāḥ vā virāgo tesam

original: dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
analyzed: dhammānam aggam akkhāyati iti

original: Niyatāniyatavatthukabhedatoti sotāpattimaggassa paratoghosapaccayena vinā anuppajjanato
analyzed: niyata aniyata vatthuka bhedato ti sotāpatti maggassa paratoghosa paccayena vinā anuppajjanato

original: arūpabhave sambhavo natthīti taṃ niyatavatthukaṃ, itaraṃ pana sattavidhampi paratoghosaṃ
analyzed: arūpa bhave sambhavaḥ natthi iti tam niyata vatthukam itaram pana sattavidham pi paratoghosam

original: vināpi vipassanābaleneva nipphajjanato tatthāpi sambhavatīti aniyatavatthukaṃ.
analyzed: vinā api vipassanā balena iva nipphajjanato tattha api sambhavati iti aniyata vatthukam

original: Tīhi…pe… tividhanti lokuttaravimokkhānaṃ dvārabhāvato vimokkhamukhasaṅkhātāhi suññatānupassanādīhi
analyzed: tividhanti lokuttara vimokkhānam dvāra bhāvataḥ vimokkha mukha saṅkhātāhi suññatā anupassanā ādīhi

original: tīhi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāhi pattabbato idaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ tividhaṃ suññataṃ
analyzed: tīhi vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāhi idam lokuttara kusalam tividham suññatam

original: animittaṃ appaṇihitanti. Katame pana te lokuttaravimokkhāti? Nava lokuttaradhammā.
analyzed: animittam appaṇihitam ti katame pana te lokuttara vimokkhā ati nava lokuttara dhammā

original: Yathāha “cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca, ayaṃ anāsavo
analyzed: yathā āha cattāro ca ariya maggā cattāri ca sāmañña phalāni nibbānam ca ayam anāsavaḥ

original: vimokkho”ti. Imāni hi saṃkilesadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttattā vimokkhā nāma. Tāni pana
analyzed: vimokkho ti imāni hi saṃkilesa dhammehi suṭṭhu vimutta ttā vimokkhāḥ nāma tāni pana

original: paccekaṃ suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkhoti tividhāni. Yathāha
analyzed: paccekam suññataḥ vimokkhaḥ animittaḥ vimokkhaḥ appaṇihitaḥ vimokkhaḥ tividhāni yathā āha

original: “tayome, bhikkhave, vimokkhā – suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho”ti.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave vimokkhā suññataḥ vimokkhaḥ animittaḥ vimokkhaḥ appaṇihitaḥ vimokkho ti

original: Idha pana kusalādhikārattā catumaggasaṅkhātāyeva lokuttaradhammā adhippetā.
analyzed: idha pana kusala adhikāra ttā catu magga saṅkhātāya iva lokuttara dhammā adhippetā

original: Suññatādināmalābho ca nesaṃ āgamanato, saguṇato, ārammaṇato ca veditabbo. Tathā hi
analyzed: suññatā ādi nāma lābho ca na isam āgamanataḥ sa guṇataḥ ārammaṇataḥ ca veditabbo tathā hi

original: āgacchati maggo, phalañca etenāti āgamanaṃ. Tañhi duvidhaṃ maggāgamanaṃ, phalāgamanañca.
analyzed: āgacchati maggo phalam ca etena ati āgamanam tat hi duvidham magga āgamanam phala āgamanañca

original: Tesu vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā maggāgamanaṃ, ariyamaggo phalāgamanaṃ. Tattha maggassa

original: āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṃ gahetabbaṃ, phalassa āgataṭṭhāne phalāgamanaṃ. Idha pana
analyzed: āgata ṭṭhāne magga āgamanaṃ gahetabbam phalassa āgata ṭṭhāne phala āgamanam idha pana

original: maggassa āgatattā maggāgamanaṃ gahitanti. Tato āgamanato. Saguṇatoti sabhāvato. Ārammaṇatoti ārammaṇadhammato.
analyzed: maggassa āgata ttā magga āgamanam gahitan ti tatas āgamanataḥ saguṇataḥ ti sabhāvataḥ ārammaṇataḥ ti ārammaṇa dhammato

original: Yo hi sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ anattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya anattānupassanāya vasena
analyzed: yaḥ hi sabba saṅkhārānam anatta lakkhaṇa paṭivedha vasa ppavattāya anatta anupassanāya vasena

analyzed: maggam paṭilabhati tassa sā anupassanā a suññatta karānam attā abhinivesa paccayānam

original: diṭṭhekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ vikkhambhitabhāvena tebhūmakadhammānaṃ attasuññatāya yāthāvato

analyzed: gahaṇato suññatā anupassanā nāma hoti tāya pana paṭiladdha maggo suññatāya āgata ttā

original: suññato nāma. Tenāha “anattato manasikaronto suññatavimokkhena vimuccatī”ti.
analyzed: suññataḥ nāma tena āha anattataḥ manasikarontaḥ suññata vimokkhena vimuccati iti

original: Yo pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ aniccalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya aniccānupassanāya
analyzed: yaḥ pana sabba saṅkhārānam anicca lakkhaṇa paṭivedha vasa ppavattāya anicca anupassanāya

analyzed: maggam paṭilabhati tassa sā anupassanā nicca nimitta ādi gāha karānam kilesānam vikkhambhita ttā

original: dhuvabhāvūpaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaniccanimittādino aggahaṇato animittānupassanā nāma. Tāya

analyzed: pana laddha maggaḥ animittāya āgata ttā animittaḥ nāma tena āha aniccataḥ manasikaronto

original: animittavimokkhena vimuccatī”ti.
analyzed: a nimitta vimokkhena vimuccati iti

original: Yo pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya dukkhānupassanāya
analyzed: yaḥ pana sabba saṅkhārānam dukkha lakkhaṇa paṭivedha vasa ppavattāya dukkha anupassanāya

analyzed: vasena maggam paṭilabhati tassa sā anupassanā taṇhā paṇidhānassa vikkhambhanena paṇidhi virahita ttā

analyzed: appaṇihita anupassanā nāma tāya pana laddha maggaḥ appaṇihitāya āgata ttā appaṇihitaḥ

original: nāma. Tenāha “dukkhato manasikaronto appaṇihitavimokkhena vimuccatī”ti. Ayaṃ tāvassa
analyzed: nāma tena āha dukkhataḥ manasikarontaḥ appaṇihita vimokkhena vimuccati iti ayam tāva assa

original: āgamanavasena nāmalābho.
analyzed: āgamana vasena

original: Attano pana rāgādīhi suññatattā, niccanimittādivirahitattā, taṇhāpaṇidhiabhāvato

analyzed: sa guṇa ārammaṇehi nāma lābho daṭṭhabbo so ca kho suttanta pariyāyena iva no abhidhamma pariyāyena

analyzed: āgamanataḥ pana abhidhamma pariyāyena api vavatthāna kara bhāvena tena iva

original: suttantapariyāyeneva labbhati abhidhamme maggaṃ pati animittanāmassa anuddhatattā.
analyzed: suttanta pariyāyena iva labbhati abhidhamme maggam pati a nimitta nāmassa an uddhata ttā

original: Anuddhaṭattaṃ pana na anuddharitabbatāmattena, atha kho nippariyāyato tassa magge

original: pana anissajjanato na nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ labhati. Yaṃ panetaṃ sutte –
analyzed: pana a nissajjanataḥ na nippariyāyataḥ animitta nāmam labhati yam pana itam sutte

original: “Animittañca bhāvehi, mānānusayamujjaha;
analyzed: animittam ca bhāvehi māna anusayam ujjaha

original: Tato mānābhisamayā, upasanto carissasī”ti. –
analyzed: tatas māna abhisamayā upasantaḥ carissasi iti

original: Maggassa animittabhāvavacanaṃ, taṃ yathāvuttapariyāyavasena labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: maggassa animitta bhāva vacanam tam yathā vutta pariyāya vasena labbhamānam gahetvā vuttam

original: Abhidhamme pana yā sayampi nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ na labhati, sā kathaṃ maggassa
analyzed: abhidhamme pana yā sayam pi nippariyāyataḥ animitta nāmam na labhati sā katham maggassa

original: taṃ dadeyyāti maggassa animittanāmaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ. Yadi evaṃ suññatanāmenapi idaṃ
analyzed: tam dadeyya ati maggassa animitta nāmam na uddhaṭam yadi evam idam

original: samānaṃ. Anattānupassanāpi hi kiñcāpi puggalasuññataṃ gaṇhāti, dhammasuññataṃ pana

analyzed: na gaṇhāti iti sayam nippariyāyena suññata anupassanā nāma na hoti iti suññata nāmam pi maggassa

original: na dadeyya. Atha puggalasuññatāggahaṇamattena sayaṃ suññatānupassanā hutvā maggassa

original: taṃ dadeyya, aniccānupassanāpi saṅkhāranimittassa gahaṇepi niccanimittādiugghāṭanato

original: sayaṃ animittānupassanā hutvā maggassa animittanāmaṃ dadeyyāti? Na idamevaṃ, niccādinimittugghāṭanena
analyzed: sayam animitta anupassanā hutvā maggassa animitta nāmam dadeyyāti na idam evam nicca ādi nimitta ugghāṭanena

original: animittabhāvassa nippariyāyena magge alabbhanato niccādinimittugghāṭanassapi pariyāyabhāvato.
analyzed: animitta bhāvassa nippariyāyena magge alabbhanataḥ nicca ādi nimitta ugghāṭanassa api pariyāya bhāvataḥ

original: Nanu idampi sabbattha samānaṃ. Suññataappaṇihitabhāvopi hi nippariyāyena amagge na
analyzed: nanu idam api sabbattha samānam suññata appaṇihita bhāvaḥ api hi nippariyāyena amagge na

original: labbhati puggalasuññataggahaṇassa, paṇidhisosanassa ca ujukaṃ maggeneva nipphajjanato,
analyzed: labbhati puggala suññata ggahaṇassa paṇidhi sosanassa ca ujukam maggena iva nipphajjanato

original: tasmā suññatānupassanāpi appaṇihitānupassanāpi pariyāyeneva taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ labhantīti

original: maggassa nippariyāyato nāmaṃ na dentīti? Na, tato laddhaariyamaggassa nippariyāyato
analyzed: maggassa nippariyāyataḥ nāmam na denti iti na tatas laddha ariya maggassa nippariyāyataḥ

original: sampayuttadhammavaseneva suññataappaṇihitanāmasambhavato. Kathaṃ? Ṭhapetvā buddhuppādaṃ

original: sarabhaṅgasatthārādikālepi dubbijānīyabhāvena sukhumassa anattalakkhaṇassa paññāya
analyzed: sarabhaṅga satthāra ādi kāle pi dubbijānīya bhāvena sukhumassa anatta lakkhaṇassa paññāya

original: eva gocarabhāvato anattānupassanāya anupassanato maggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ

original: hoti. Yathāha – “anattato manasikaroto paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti.
analyzed: hoti yathā āha an attataḥ manasikaroto paññindriyam adhimattam hoti iti

original: Tañca pana sayaṃ attābhinivesasamugghāṭanato, ariyamaggapariyāpannattā ca nippariyāyatova
analyzed: tat ca pana sayam attā abhinivesa samugghāṭanataḥ ariya magga pariyāpanna ttā ca nippariyāyataḥ uva

original: suññatanāmaṃ labhati. Dukkhānupassanāya samādhivipaccanīkassa paṇidhisaṅkhātarāgassa

original: sosanato tassā vasena anupassantassa maggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.

original: Yathāha – “dukkhato manasikaroto samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti. Tañca pana sayaṃ

original: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ pana aniccabhāvaṃ āgamanato sutvā pacchā sayaṃ paccakkhato passato

original: “aniccameva vata so bhagavā ‘anicca’nti āhā”ti bhagavati saddhābāhullapaṭilābhato

original: aniccānupassanāya manasikaroto maggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Yathāha
analyzed: anicca anupassanāya manasikarotaḥ magga kkhaṇe saddhi indriyam adhimattam hoti yathā āha

original: – “aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti. Taṃ pana sayaṃ saṅkhāranimittato

original: tasmā yathā kāyakammādhikaṃ cittaṃ “kāyakamma”nti vuccati, evaṃ suññatasaṅkhātapaññindriyādhimatto
analyzed: tasmā yathā kāya kamma adhikam cittam kāya kammanti vuccati evam suññata saṅkhāta paññindriya adhimattaḥ

original: maggo suññatanāmaṃ labhati, appaṇihitasaṅkhātasamādhindriyādhimatto appaṇihitanāmaṃ,
analyzed: maggo suññata nāmam labhati appaṇihita saṅkhāta samādhi indriya adhimattaḥ appaṇihita nāmam

original: saddhindriyādhimatto pana saddhāya animittanāmālābhato sayampi taṃ na labhati. Yadi
analyzed: pana saddhāya animitta nāma alābhataḥ sayam pi tam na labhati yadi

original: sampayuttadhammavasena suññatādināmālābho, atha kathaṃ “āgamanato”ti vuttaṃ? Saccaṃ,
analyzed: sampayutta dhamma vasena suññatā ādinām alābhaḥ atha katham āgamanato ti vuttam saccam

original: āgamanato adhimattassa pana indriyassa vasena laddhanāmampi āgamanatova laddhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: āgamanataḥ adhimattassa pana indriyassa vasena laddha nāmam pi āgamanataḥ va laddham hoti

original: Atha vā abhidhammapariyāyenapi suññatabhāvo nāma puggalasuññatāyevāti puggalasuññataggāhitāya
analyzed: atha vā abhidhamma pariyāyena api suññata bhāvaḥ nāma puggala suññatāya iva ati puggala suññata ggāhitāya

original: anattānupassanāya suññatanāmaṃ nippariyāyatova labbhati. Paṇidhi nāma rāgādikā evāti

analyzed: rāga ādi sositāya dukkha anupassanāya appaṇihita nāmam pi nippariyāyataḥ uva labbhati

original: Nimittanti pana ṭhapetvā suttantapariyāyaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena saṅkhāranimittaṃ

original: hotīti saṅkhāranimittaggāhitāya aniccānupassanāya animittanāmaṃ nippariyāyato na

analyzed: labbhati tasmā nippariyāyataḥ suññata appaṇihita nāmikānam anatta dukkha anupassanānam

original: vasena paṭiladdhamaggo āgamanato suññataappaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati, animittanāmaṃ pana
analyzed: vasena paṭiladdha maggaḥ āgamanataḥ suññata appaṇihita nāmam labhati animitta nāmam pana

analyzed: vimokkhānam pavesana dvāra bhāvato suññatā anupassanā ādi nāmikāḥ anattā anupassanā ādikā tisso

analyzed: veditabbāni vuttam ha etam

analyzed: paratas samanupassana tāya suñña tāya ca dhātuyā citta sampakkhandana tāya imāni tīṇi

original: vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
analyzed: vimokkha mukhāni loka niyyānāya saṃvattanti iti

original: Ettha hi paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato
analyzed: ettha hi udaya bbaya vasena paricchedato ca iva parivaṭumato

original: ca. Aniccānupassanā hi “udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthī”ti paricchinditvā tesaṃ gatiṃ
analyzed: ca anicca anupassanāḥ hi udayataḥ pubbe saṅkhārāḥ na atthi iti paricchinditvā tesam gatim

original: Manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāya. Dukkhānupassanena hi saṅkhāresu cittaṃ

analyzed: saṃvijjati paratas samanupassana tāya ati na aham na evam anattataḥ samanupassana tāya

analyzed: iti imāni tīṇi padāni anicca anupassanā ādīnam tiṇṇam vasena vuttāni iti veditabbāni tena eva

original: ca tadanantare pañhāvissajjane –
analyzed: ca tad anantare pañhā vissajjane

original: “Aniccato manasikaroto khayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti, dukkhato manasikaroto bhayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti, anattato manasikaroto suññato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī”ti –

original: Vuttaṃ. Nanu cettha abhidhammāvatārassa bhāsamānattā abhidhammapariyāyeneva vimokkhamukhāni

original: Catumaggayogabhedatoti sotāpattiādīhi catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayogappabhedato. Ariyamaggānaṃ

original: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto tāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā, tikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vā vigatā cikicchā ñāṇapatikāro imissāti vicikicchā. Sā pana –

analyzed: kaṅkhati katham nu kha iti saṇṭhāna ākāram nissāya dīghaḥ nu kha rassa odāta kāḷa ādīnam ca

analyzed: kaṅkhati iti vadanti kim hutvā kim ahosin ti jāti ādīni nissāya khattiyaḥ hutvā nu kho

original: saṅgaho veditabbo. Kāmānaṃ vāti anubhuyyamānānaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ. Vā-saddena parasantakassa

original: ayathādhippetatāya yaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ gahetabbanti gahaṇādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: ayathā adhippeta tāya yam laddham tam gahetabbam ti gahaṇa ādikam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Sampayuttadhammavasena bhedābhāvato dosamūlaṃ asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikabhedato duvidhaṃ.
analyzed: sampayutta dhamma vasena bheda abhāvataḥ dosa mūlam asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārika bhedataḥ duvidham

original: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayutta”nti vuttaṃ? Asādhāraṇadhammehi
analyzed: yadi evam kasmā domanassa sahagatam paṭigha sampayuttan ti vuttam asādhāraṇa dhammehi

original: tassa cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṃ. Pāṇassa atīva, atikkamitvā vā pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto.
analyzed: tassa cittassa upalakkhaṇa attham pāṇassa atīva atikkamitvā vā pātanam pāṇātipāto

original: Ādi-saddena adinnādānamusāvādapesuññapharusasamphappalāpabyāpāde saṅgaṇhāti. Dasaakusalakammapathesu
analyzed: ādi saddena adinnādāna musāvāda pesuñña pharusa samphappalāpa byāpāde saṅgaṇhāti dasa akusala kamma pathesu

original: hi kāmesumicchācāraabhijjhāmicchādiṭṭhisaṅkhātā tayova kammapathā iminā na sijjhanti.
analyzed: hi kāmesu micchā ācāra abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhi saṅkhātā tayo uva kamma pathāḥ iminā na sijjhanti

original: Sabhāvatikkhaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhārameva hoti, itaraṃ sasaṅkhāranti
analyzed: sabhāvatikkham hutvā pavattamānam cittam asaṅkhāram eva hoti itaram sa saṅkhāranti

original: adhippāyenāha “tikkhamandappavattikāle”ti. Mandaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānaṃ ekaṃsena
analyzed: adhippāyena āha tikkha manda ppavatti kāle ti mandam pana hutvā pavattamānam ekaṃsena

original: sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkāva viññātuṃ. Yaṃ sasaṅkhārena sappayogena pavattati, taṃ
analyzed: sa saṅkhāram eva ati na sakkā ava viññātum yam sa saṅkhārena sa payogena pavattati tam

original: mandameva hotīti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: mandam eva hoti iti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbam

original: Mohamūlaṃ cittaṃ mūlantaravirahato atimūḷhaṃ vicikicchuddhaccayogato cañcalañcāti
analyzed: moha mūlam cittam mūla antara virahataḥ ati mūḍham cañcalam ca ati

original: upekkhāsahagatameva hoti, na tassa kadācipi sabhāvatikkhatā atthi. Ārammaṇe hi saṃsappanavasena,
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam eva hoti na tassa kadācipi sabhāva tikkha tā atthi ārammaṇe hi saṃsappana vasena

original: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kiṃ tādise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
analyzed: vikkhipana vasena ca pavattamānassa citta dvayassa kim tādise kicce sabhāva tikkha tāya

original: ussāhetabbatāya vā bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā na tattha saṅkhārabhedo atthi. Nanu ca uddhaccaṃ
analyzed: ussāhetabba tāya vā bhavitabbam tasmā na tattha saṅkhāra bhedaḥ atthi nanu ca uddhaccam

original: sabbākusalasādhāraṇaṃ, kasmā pana etameva tena visesetvā vuttaṃ “uddhaccasahagata”nti.
analyzed: sabba akusala sādhāraṇam kasmā pana etam eva tena visesetvā vuttam uddhacca sahagatan ti

original: Visesato balavabhāvato. Idañhi etasmiṃ citte balavaṃ, tasmā sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ
analyzed: visesataḥ balava bhāvataḥ idam hi etasmim citte balavam tasmā sampayutta dhammesu padhānam

original: hutvā pavattatīti idameva tena visesitabbaṃ. Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ sesākusalesu uddhaccaṃ
analyzed: hutvā pavattati iti idam eva tena visesitabbam tena iva hi pāḷiyam sesa akusalesu uddhaccam

original: yevāpanakavasena āgataṃ, idha pana sarūpatoyeva niddiṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃ asādhāraṇappadhānadhammavasena
analyzed: āgatam idha pana sarūpataḥ yā iva niddiṭṭham evam asādhāraṇa ppadhāna dhamma vasena

original: mohamūlaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ uddhaccasampayuttanti duvidhaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: moha mūlam vicikicchā sampayuttam uddhacca sampayuttanti duvidham vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Asanniṭṭhānaṃ saṃsayo, vikkhepo avūpasamo, bhantatāti attho. Tattha vicikicchāsahagatassa
analyzed: a sanniṭṭhānam saṃsayaḥ vikkhepaḥ a vūpasamaḥ bhanta tā ati atthaḥ tattha vicikicchā sahagatassa

original: asanniṭṭhānakāle, uddhaccasahagatassa vikkhepakāle ca pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: a saṃniṭṭhāna kāle uddhacca sahagatassa vikkhepa kāle ca pavatti veditabbā

original: Yathānurūpanti paṭisandhijanakājanakassa, kammapathabhāvappattāpattassa ca anurūpato.
analyzed: yathā anurūpanti paṭisandhi janaka ajanakassa kammapatha bhāva patta āpattassa ca anurūpataḥ

original: Atha vā yathānurūpanti yo yassa hetu, tadanurūpato. Yebhuyyena hi lobhamūlakena khuppipāsādinirantarapetavisaye
analyzed: atha vā yathā anurūpanti yaḥ yassa hetu tad anurūpataḥ yebhuyyena hi lobha mūlakena khuppipāsā ādi nirantara peta visaye

original: uppajjanti, dosamūlakena doso viya caṇḍajātatāya taṃsarikkhake niraye, mohamūlakena
analyzed: uppajjanti dosa mūlakena dosaḥ viya caṇḍa jāta tāya taṃsa rikkhake niraye moha mūlakena

original: niccasammūḷhāya tiracchānayoniyaṃ, tasmā lobhādihetuanurūpato tattha tattha apāye
analyzed: nicca sammūḍhāya tasmai tattha apāye

original: upapattiṃ nipphādetīti āha “yathānurūpaṃ…pe… upapattiyā”ti. Akusalavipākānaṃ dukkhappadhānatāya
analyzed: upapattim nipphādeti iti āha upapattiyā ati akusala vipākānam dukkha ppadhāna tāya

original: “dukkhavisesassā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dukkha visesassa ti vuttam

original: 31. Apāpena alāmakena pāpāpāpappahīnena pāpāpāpesu mānasesu yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttaṃ,
analyzed: apāpena alāmakena pāpa apāpa pahīnena pāpa apāpesu mānasesu yam pāpamānasam vuttam

original: pāpāpāpesu puggalesu apāpena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti vā sambandho.
analyzed: pāpa apāpesu puggalesu apāpena pāpa apāpa ppahīnena yam pāpa mānasam vuttan ti vā sambandhaḥ

original: Atha vā pāpāpāpesu mānasesu pāpena pāpamānasena pāpavasena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ
analyzed: atha vā pāpa apāpesu mānasesu pāpena pāpa mānasena pāpa vasena pāpa apāpa pahīnena yam

original: pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti yojanā. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – asammāsambuddhena tāva dhammasabhāvassa
analyzed: pāpa mānasam vuttanti yojanā ayam pana ittha adhippāyaḥ asammāsambuddhena tāva dhamma sabhāvassa

original: dubbijānīyattā kusalampi akusalato, akusalampi kusalato vucceyya, bhagavato pana
analyzed: dubbijānīya ttā kusalam pi a kusalataḥ akusalam pi kusalataḥ vucceyya bhagavato pana

original: saha vāsanāhi viddhaṃsitākusalassa kammakkhayakarañāṇena paccayavekallato viddhaṃsitakusalakammassa
analyzed: saha vāsanāhi viddhaṃsita akusalassa kamma kkhaya kara ñāṇena paccaya vekallataḥ viddhaṃsita kusala kammassa

original: ca sammāsambuddhabhāvato ekanteneva akusaladesanā akusaladhammavasenevāti.
analyzed: ca sammāsambuddha bhāvataḥ ekantena iva akusala desanā akusala dhamma vasena iva ati

original: Akusalavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: akusala vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Abyākatavaṇṇanā
analyzed: abyākata vaṇṇanā

original: Aññamaññavisiṭṭhānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ pākanti vipākaṃ, vipakkabhāvamāpannānamarūpadhammānametamadhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: aññamañña visiṭṭhānam kusala akusalānam pākam ti vipākam vipakka bhāvam āpannānam arūpa dhammānam etam adhivacanam

original: Yathā hi loke sālibījādīnaṃ phalāni taṃsadisāni nibbattāni vipakkāni nāma honti,
analyzed: yathā hi loke sāli bīja ādīnam phalāni taṃsadisāni nibbattāni vipakkāni nāma honti

original: vipākaniruttiñca labhanti, na mūlaṅkurapattadaṇḍanaḷādīni, evaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ phalāni
analyzed: vipāka niruttim ca labhanti na mūla aṅkura patta daṇḍa naḷa ādīni evam kusala akusalānam phalāni

original: arūpadhammabhāvena, sārammaṇabhāvena ca taṃsadisāni vipakkabhāvamāpannānīti vipākaniruttiṃ
analyzed: arūpa dhamma bhāvena sa ārammaṇa bhāvena ca tad sadisāni vipakka bhāvam āpannāni iti vipāka niruttim

original: labhanti, na pana kammābhinibbattāpi rūpadhammā kammavisadisattā. Vipākameva cittaṃ
analyzed: labhanti na pana kamma abhinibbattā api rūpa dhammā kamma visadisa ttā vipākam eva cittam

original: vipākacittaṃ. Karaṇamattaṃ kiriyā phaladānāsambhavato. Yena pana kāraṇena tassa phaladānaṃ
analyzed: vipāka cittam karaṇa mattam kiriyā phala dāna asambhavataḥ yena pana kāraṇena tassa phala dānam

original: na sambhavati, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Kiriyā eva cittaṃ kiriyacittaṃ. Vipākassa kāmāvacarādibhāvo
analyzed: na sambhavati tam heṭṭhā vuttam eva kiriyā eva cittam kiriya cittam vipākassa kāmāvacara ādi bhāvo

original: kusale vuttanayena yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbo. Alobhādisampayuttahetūhi saha vattanato
analyzed: kusale vutta nayena yathāsambhavam veditabbaḥ alobha ādi sampayutta hetūhi saha vattanato

original: sahetukaṃ. Tadabhāvato ahetukaṃ. Nibbattakahetuvasena sijjhamānampi hetaṃ sampayuttahetuvaseneva
analyzed: sa hetukam tad abhāvataḥ ahetukam nibbattaka hetu vasena sijjhamānam pi hetam sampayutta hetu vasena iva

original: “sahetukamahetuka”nti vuccati, itarathā vavatthānābhāvato.
analyzed: sa hetukam ahetukanti vuccati itarathā vavatthāna abhāvato

original: Sakakusalaṃ viyāti attano janakaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya. Janakajanitabbasambandhavasena hi taṃ taṃ kusalaṃ tassa tassa vipākassa sakaṃ nāmaṃ hoti.
analyzed: saka kusalam viya ati attanaḥ janakam kāmāvacara kusalam viya janaka janitabba sambandha vasena hi tam tam kusalam tassa tassa vipākassa sakam nāmam hoti

original: “Sakakusalaṃ viyā”ti vuttattā pavattākāraārammaṇādito cassa taṃsadisatā āpajjeyyāti
analyzed: saka kusalam viyā ti vutta ttā pavatta ākāra ārammaṇa āditaḥ ca ssa taṃsadisa tā āpajjeyya āti

original: taṃnivāraṇatthamāha “yathā panā”tiādi. Chasu ārammaṇesūti parittādiatītādiajjhattādibhedesu
analyzed: tad nivāraṇa attham āha yathā pana atiādi chasu ārammaṇesu iti paritta ādi atīta ādi ajjhatta ādi bhedesu

original: chasu rūpādiārammaṇesu. Bhavantarapaṭisandhānato paṭisandhi. Avicchedappavattihetubhāvena
analyzed: chasu rūpa ādi ārammaṇesu bhava antara paṭisandhānato a viccheda ppavatti hetu bhāvena

original: bhavassa aṅganti bhavaṅgaṃ. Nibbattitabhavato parigaññatāya cutihetutāya cuti. Parittadhammapariyāpannesūti
analyzed: bhavassa aṅganti bhavaṅgam nibbattita bhavataḥ parigañña tāya cuti hetutāya cuti paritta dhamma pariyāpannesu iti

original: kāmāvacaradhammapariyāpannesu. Kāmāvacaradhammā hi kilesavikkhambhanādīsu asamatthabhāvena
analyzed: kāmāvacara dhamma pariyāpannesu kāmāvacara dhammāḥ hi kilesa vikkhambhana ādīsu asamattha bhāvena

original: parittānubhāvatāya, oḷārikāhi vā kāmataṇhādīhi parito gahitattā “parittā”ti vuccanti.
analyzed: paritta anubhāva tāya oḷārikāhi vā kāma taṇhā ādīhi paritas gahita ttā parittā ati vuccanti

original: Vipākassa saṅkappetvā ārammaṇaggahaṇābhāvato kammānurūpameva pavattatīti parittakammavipāko
analyzed: vipākassa saṅkappetvā ārammaṇa ggahaṇa abhāvataḥ kamma anurūpam eva pavattati iti paritta kamma vipāko

original: parittārammaṇeyeva pavattitumarahati, na mahaggataappamāṇārammaṇeti vuttaṃ “parittadhammapariyāpannesū”ti.
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇā iya iva pavattitum arahati na mahaggata appamāṇa ārammaṇā iti vuttam paritta dhamma pariyāpannesu iti

original: Yadi evaṃ mahaggatavipākopi mahaggatārammaṇeyeva āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, saññāyattārammaṇassa
analyzed: yadi evam mahaggata vipākaḥ api mahaggata ārammaṇe iva āpajjati iti na āpajjati saññā āyatta ārammaṇassa

original: samādhippadhānassa kammassa appanāpattassa tādiseneva vipākena bhavitabbattā. Vaṇṇalakkhaṇādikañhi
analyzed: samādhi ppadhānassa kammassa appanā āpattassa tādisena iva vipākena bhavitabbattā vaṇṇa lakkhaṇa ādikam hi

original: aggahetvā lokasaññānurodheneva gahite pathavādike parikammasaññāya samuppāditaṃ paṭibhāganimittasaṅkhātamārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: aggahetvā loka saññā anurodhena iva gahite pathavā ādike parikamma saññāya samuppāditam paṭibhāga nimitta saṅkhātam ārammaṇam

original: saññāvasaṃ saññāyattaṃ hoti, tasmā tadārammaṇassa samādhippadhānassa appanāpattassa
analyzed: saññā vasam saññā āyattam hoti tasmā tad ārammaṇassa samādhi ppadhānassa appanā āpattassa

original: kammassa vipākena samādhippadhānaappanāpattehi viya saññāyattārammaṇatāya nibbiseseneva
analyzed: kammassa vipākena samādhi ppadhāna appanā āpattehi viya saññā āyatta ārammaṇa tāya nibbisesena iva

original: bhavitabbaṃ. Parittavipāko pana mahaggataappamāṇapaññattārammaṇakammanibbattopi hoti,
analyzed: bhavitabbam paritta vipākaḥ pana mahaggata appamāṇa paññatta ārammaṇa kamma nibbattaḥ api hoti

original: so parato āgamissati.
analyzed: saḥ paratas āgamissati

original: Mukhanimittaṃ viyāti mukhaṃ paṭicca uppannanimittaṃ viya. Yathā hi taṃ nirīhaṃ aparaṃ
analyzed: mukha nimittam viya ati mukham paṭicca uppanna nimittam viya yathā hi tam nirīham aparam

original: mukhanimittaṃ uppādetuṃ, aññaṃ vā kiñci attano balena kātuṃ na sakkoti, evametampi
analyzed: mukha nimittam uppādetum aññam vā kiñci attanaḥ balena kātum na sakkoti evam etam pi

original: vipākuppādanādīsu na ussahati. Tenāha “nirussāha”nti. Ussāhoti cettha anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmānānusayasmiṃ
analyzed: vipāka uppādana ādīsu na ussahati tena āha nirussāhanti ussāhaḥ iti ca ittha

original: santāne vipākuppādanasamatthatāsaṅkhāto, āsevanapaccayabhāvasaṅkhāto, viññattijanakatāsaṅkhāto
analyzed: santāne vipāka uppādana samattha tā saṅkhātaḥ āsevana paccaya bhāva saṅkhātaḥ viññatti janaka tā saṅkhātaḥ

original: ca byāpāro. So vipāke natthi kammavegukkhittattā patitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānassa
analyzed: ca byāpāraḥ saḥ vipāke natthi kamma vegu khitta ttā patitam viya hutvā pavattamānassa

original: tassa ekantena dubbalabhāvatoti taṃ nirussāhaṃ.
analyzed: tassa ekantena dubbala bhāvato ti tam nirussāham

original: Vipaccanaṭṭhānanti vipaccanavasena pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ, paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena
analyzed: vipaccana ṭhānanti vipaccana vasena pavattana ṭhānam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti tad ārammaṇa vasena

original: catukiccānametesaṃ pavattiokāsoti attho. Tattha cutibhavaṅgānaṃ antarāḷaṃ paṭisandhikiccānaṃ
analyzed: catu kiccānam etesam pavatti okāsaḥ ti atthaḥ tattha cuti bhavaṅgānam paṭisandhi kiccānam

original: ṭhānaṃ, paṭisandhiāvajjanānaṃ, tadārammaṇāvajjanānaṃ, javanāvajjanānaṃ, voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānañca
analyzed: ṭhānam paṭisandhi āvajjanānam tad ārammaṇa āvajjanānam javana āvajjanānam voṭṭhabbana āvajjanānam ca

original: antarāḷaṃ bhavaṅgakiccānaṃ ṭhānaṃ, tadārammaṇapaṭisandhīnaṃ, javanapaṭisandhīnaṃ,
analyzed: antarāḷam bhavaṅga kiccānam ṭhānam tad ārammaṇa paṭisandhīnam javana paṭisandhīnam

original: bhavaṅgapaṭisandhīnaṃ vā antarāḷaṃ cutikiccānaṃ ṭhānaṃ, javanabhavaṅgānaṃ antarāḷaṃ
analyzed: bhavaṅga paṭisandhīnam vā antarāḷam cuti kiccānam ṭhānam javana bhavaṅgānam antarāḷam

original: tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ ṭhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ ṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃkiccavasena
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa kiccānam ṭhānanti daṭṭhabbam yasmā pana itam ṭhānam dhammānam taṃ taṃ kicca vasena

original: pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmā ṭhānaṃ veditabbanti ṭhānaṃ uddharitvā pākaṭakiccavaseneva taṃ
analyzed: pākaṭam hoti tasmā ṭhānam veditabbanti ṭhānam uddharitvā pākaṭa kicca vasena iva tam

original: pakāsetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā kiccampi kiccavantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena
analyzed: pakāsetum imāni hi itiādi vuttam atha vā kiccam pi kiccavantānam pavatti ṭṭhāna bhāvena

original: gayhatīti ṭhānantipi kiccameva uddhaṭanti taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: gayhati iti kiccam eva uddhaṭanti tam sarūpataḥ dassetum imāni hi itiādi vuttam

original: 32. Aṇḍajajalābujayonisambhavānaṃ manussānaṃ, vinipātikāsurānañca ahetukapaṭisandhiyāpi
analyzed: aṇḍa ja jalābu ja yoni sambhavānam manussānam vinipātika asurānam ca ahetuka paṭisandhiyā api

original: sabbhāvato āha “duhetukatihetūna”nti. Paṭisandhiviññāṇasampayuttā dve alobhādayo
analyzed: sabbhāvataḥ āha du hetu kati hetūnam ti paṭisandhi viññāṇa sampayuttāḥ dve alobha ādayo

original: hetū yesaṃ te duhetukā. Esa nayo tihetukesupi. Tattha duhetukānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttāni
analyzed: hetū yesam te du hetukāḥ esa nayaḥ ti hetukesu pi tattha du hetukānam ñāṇa vippayuttāni

original: cattāri, tihetukānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttāni cattāri paṭisandhiyo honti, tathā bhavaṅgacutiyopi.
analyzed: cattāri ti hetukānam ñāṇa sampayuttāni cattāri paṭisandhiyaḥ honti tathā bhavaṅga cutiyaḥ pi

original: Yena yena hi cittena paṭisandhi hoti, taṃ tadeva bhavaṅgacutivasenapi pavattati.
analyzed: yena yena hi cittena paṭisandhi hoti tam tat eva bhavaṅga cuti vasena api pavattati

original: Tadārammaṇaṃ pana avisesena daṭṭhabbaṃ duhetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇassa icchitattā.

analyzed: etena āgamanataḥ hīna ādi bhāvam vibhāveti vineyya santāna gata kilesa mala vidhamanena tassa

original: punanato puñño vādo vacīghoso etassa, vuttanayeneva puññaṃ vadatīti vā puññavādī,
analyzed: punanataḥ puññaḥ vādaḥ vacī ghoso etassa vutta nayena iva puññam vadati iti vā puñña vādī

original: tena puññavādinā. “Ekantena savatthuka”nti vuttepi rūpaloke pavatti anivāritāti āha
analyzed: tena puñña vādinā ekantena sa vatthukanti vutte api rūpa loke pavatti a nivāritā iti āha

original: “kāmalokasmi”nti. “Na panaññattha jāyate”ti iminā pana byatirekato laddhamatthaṃ dassetīti.
analyzed: kāma lokasmin ti na pana aññattha jāyata iti iminā pana byatirekataḥ laddham attham dasseti iti

original: Evaṃ tāva sahetukavipāke niddisitvā idāni ahetuke niddisituṃ “ahetukavipākacittaṃ
analyzed: evam tāva sa hetuka vipāke niddisitvā idāni ahetuke niddisitum ahetuka vipāka cittam

original: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kasmā pana sahetukassa kammassa ahetukavipāko hotīti? Vuccate
analyzed: pana atiādi vuttam kasmā pana sa hetukassa kammassa ahetuka vipākaḥ hoti iti vuccate

original: – cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ ārammaṇābhinipātamattattā alobhādisampayogo na
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam tāva pañcannam ārammaṇa abhinipāta matta ttā alobha ādi sampayogaḥ na

original: sambhavati, tathā mandatarakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti evaṃ hetūnaṃ uppattiyā
analyzed: sambhavati tathā mandatara kiccesu sampaṭicchana santīraṇesu iti evam hetūnam uppattiyā

original: asambhavato ca nesaṃ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā. Upekkhādiyoge pana cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva
analyzed: asambhavato ca nesam ahetuka tā daṭṭhabbā upekkhā ādi yoge pana cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam tāva

original: catunnaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇepi pavattamānānaṃ vatthārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanāya dubbalabhāvato

original: upekkhāsahagatatā, kāyaviññāṇassa ca tāya balavabhāvato sukhasahagatatā hoti. Sampaṭicchanaṃ
analyzed: upekkhā sahagata tā kāya viññāṇassa ca tāya balava bhāvato sukha sahagata tā hoti sampaṭicchanam

original: pana ārammaṇaghaṭṭanayogyabhāvena oḷārikattā, catucittakkhaṇātītavasena cirajātattā
analyzed: pana ārammaṇa ghaṭṭana yogya bhāvena oḷārika ttā catu citta kkhaṇa atīta vasena cira jāta ttā

original: ca dubbalamattano nissayena saha asamānajātikañca cakkhādivatthuṃ nissāya uppannehi
analyzed: ca dubbala mattanaḥ nissayena saha asamāna jātikam ca cakkha ādi vatthum nissāya uppannehi

original: cakkhuviññāṇādīhi laddhānantarapaccayatāya, apubbanissayatāya ca ārammaṇarasassāde
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīhi laddha anantara paccaya tāya apubba nissaya tāya ca ārammaṇa rasa ssāde

original: dubbalanti iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu upekkhāsahagatameva. Santīraṇaṃ pana vuttaviparītato
analyzed: dubbalanti iṭṭha ādīsu ārammaṇesu upekkhā sahagatam eva santīraṇam pana vutta viparītato

original: iṭṭhārammaṇe sukhasahagataṃ, iṭṭhamajjhatte ca upekkhāsahagatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Manoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇe sukha sahagatam iṭṭha majjhatte ca upekkhā sahagatam ti daṭṭhabbam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: viya visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato manomattā nissattanijjīvādiatthehi dhātu cāti manodhātu.
analyzed: viya visiṭṭha manana kicca abhāvataḥ manomattā nissatta nijjīva ādi atthehi dhātu ca ati manodhātu

original: Sā hi satipi viññāṇabhāve manoviññāṇato sambhavassa visiṭṭhamananakiccassa akaraṇato
analyzed: sā hi sati api viññāṇa bhāve manaḥ viññāṇataḥ sambhavassa visiṭṭha manana kiccassa a karaṇato

original: mananamattāyeva hoti. Vuttalakkhaṇaviparītato pana mano ca taṃ viññāṇañcāti manoviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: manana mattāya iva hoti vutta lakkhaṇa viparītato pana mano ca tam viññāṇam ca ati manoviññāṇam

original: tadeva yathāvuttaṭṭhena dhātūti manoviññāṇadhātu.
analyzed: tat eva yathāvutta ṭṭhena dhātu uti manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Viññāṇapañcakaṃ niyatārammaṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ rūpādiekekasseva ārammaṇakaraṇato. Sesattayamaniyatārammaṇaṃ pañcārammaṇikachaḷārammaṇikabhāvato.
analyzed: viññāṇa pañcakam niyata ārammaṇam yathākkamam rūpa ādi eka ekassa iva ārammaṇa karaṇato sesa ttayam aniyata ārammaṇam pañca ārammaṇika chaḷārammaṇika bhāvato

original: Daṭṭhabbatāya diṭṭhaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ. Sotabbatāya sutaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ. Munitabbatāya
analyzed: daṭṭhabba tāya diṭṭham rūpa āyatanam sotabba tāya sutam sadda āyatanam munitabba tāya

original: mutaṃ, sampattasseva gahetabbatāyāti attho, gandhādittayassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Cakkhādīhi
analyzed: mutam sampattassa iva gahetabba tāya ati atthaḥ gandha ādi ttayassa etam nāmam cakkha ādīhi

original: vinā kevalaṃ manasā eva vijānitabbatāya viññātaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ. Anāmaṭṭhakālavisesavacanattā
analyzed: vinā kevalam manasā eva vijānitabba tāya viññātam dhamma āyatanam anāmaṭṭha kāla visesa vacana ttā

original: ca nesaṃ atītānāgatāpi rūpādayo diṭṭhādisaddehi vuccanti. Teneva hi “daṭṭhabbatāyā”tiādinā
analyzed: ca rūpa ādayaḥ diṭṭha ādi saddehi vuccanti tena iva hi daṭṭhabba tāya ati ādinā

original: kālasāmaññena nesaṃ nibbacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yassa taṃ diṭṭhārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: kāla sāmaññena na isam nibbacanam vuttam diṭṭham ārammaṇam yassa tam diṭṭha ārammaṇam

original: Evaṃ sutārammaṇādīsu.
analyzed: evam suta ārammaṇa ādīsu

original: Cakkhuto pavattanti cakkhudvāratova pavattaṃ sabbavākyānaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā. Tena
analyzed: cakkhutaḥ pavattanti cakkhu dvārataḥ va pavattam sabba vākyānam avadhāraṇa phala ttā tena

original: manodhātuādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇabhāvo nivārito hoti tesaṃ dvārantaratopi pavattisambhavato.
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu ādīnam cakkhu viññāṇa bhāvo nivāritaḥ hoti tesam dvāra antarataḥ pi pavatti sambhavato

original: Atha vā “cakkhuto pavatta”nti idaṃ sañjātippavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na sañcaraṇappavattiṃ,
analyzed: atha vā cakkhutaḥ pavattanti idam sañjāti ppavattim sandhāya vuttam na sañcaraṇa ppavattim

original: tasmā yathā kuṇḍamukhato udakaṃ sañcaraṇavasena pavattati, na evaṃ pavattamidha gahitaṃ.
analyzed: tasmai yathā kuṇḍa mukhataḥ udakam sañcaraṇa vasena pavattati na evam gahitam

original: Yathā pana candakantapāsāṇato udakaṃ sañjātivasena pavattati, evaṃ pavattameva cakkhuto
analyzed: yathā pana canda kanta pāsāṇataḥ udakam sañjāti vasena pavattati evam pavattam eva cakkhutaḥ

original: pavattanti gahitaṃ. Yathā ca kiṃ? Yathā kucchito samuṭṭhitaṃ pittasemharuhirādi mukhato
analyzed: pavattanti gahitam yathā ca kim yathā kucchitaḥ samuṭṭhitam pitta semha ruhira ādi mukhataḥ

original: sandantampi “mukhassavo”ti na vuccati, mukhatoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato savantaṃ
analyzed: na vuccati mukhato yā iva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tatas savantam

original: kheḷaṃ “mukhassavo”ti vuccati, evaṃ hadayavatthusannissayato samuṭṭhahitvā cakkhuto
analyzed: kheḷam mukhassavaḥ ti vuccati evam hadaya vatthu sannissayato samuṭṭhahitvā cakkhutaḥ

original: pavattamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma na hoti. Cakkhutoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato pavattamānaṃ
analyzed: pavattamānam cakkhu viññāṇam nāma na hoti cakkhuto yā iva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tatas pavattamānam

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāmāti. Yo pana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanamattasseva abhinivisitvā
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam nāma ati yaḥ pana imam attham a saṃlakkhetvā byañjana mattassa iva abhinivisitvā

original: taṃdvārappavattānaṃ sesānampi cakkhuviññāṇabhāvaṃ maññeyya, taṃ nivāretuṃ pakārantarenapi
analyzed: tad dvāra ppavattānam sesānam pi cakkhu viññāṇa bhāvam maññeyya tam nivāretum pakāra antarena api

original: viggahaṃ dassento āha “cakkhumhi sannissita”nti. Yathā cakkhuto pavattaṃ, cakkhusannissitaṃ
analyzed: viggaham dassentaḥ āha cakkhumhi sannissitanti yathā cakkhutaḥ pavattam cakkhu sannissitam

original: vā viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, evaṃ sotaviññāṇādīsupi “sotato pavattaṃ, sotasmiṃ sannissitaṃ
analyzed: vā viññāṇam cakkhu viññāṇam evam sota viññāṇa ādīsu pi sotataḥ pavattam sotasmim sannissitam

original: vā viññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇa”ntiādinā yojanaṃ atidisanto āha “tathā sotaviññāṇādīnī”ti.
analyzed: vā viññāṇam sota viññāṇa nti ādinā yojanam atidisantaḥ āha tathā sota viññāṇa ādīni iti

original: Cakkhusannissitaṃ hutvā rūpassa vijānanalakkhaṇametassāti cakkhusannissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: cakkhu sannissitam hutvā rūpassa vijānana lakkhaṇam etassa ati cakkhu sannissita rūpa vijānana lakkhaṇam

analyzed: tattha cakkhu sannissita vacanena dibba cakkha ādikam aññam rūpa ārammaṇam viññāṇam nivatteti

original: Vijānana-ggahaṇena cakkhusannissite phassādidhamme nivatteti. Cakkhurūpa-ggahaṇena
analyzed: vijānana ggahaṇena cakkhu sannissite phassa ādi dhamme nivatteti cakkhu rūpa ggahaṇena

analyzed: nissayataḥ ārammaṇataḥ ca cittam vibhāveti ubhaya adhīna vuttika ttā yadi hi cakkhu nāma

analyzed: na siyā andhā api rūpam passeyyum na ca passanti yadi ca nīla ādi rūpam nāma na siyā

original: desādiniyamena na bhavitabbaṃ, attheva ca niyamo. Ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti
analyzed: desa ādi niyamena na bhavitabbam atthā iva ca niyamaḥ ekanta sārammaṇa tā ca cittassa vuttā ati

analyzed: ārammaṇena vinā nīla ādi ābhāsam cittam pavattati iti evam pavattaḥ vādaḥ micchāvādaḥ ti gahetabbo

original: Tenāha bhagavā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādi. Ettha siyā
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇa nti ādi ettha siyā

original: – kiṃ panetaṃ cakkhu, rūpañca viññāṇassa paccayo hontaṃ ekameva paccayo hoti, udāhu
analyzed: kim pana etam cakkhu rūpañca viññāṇassa paccayaḥ hontam ekam eva paccayaḥ hoti udāhu

original: anekanti? Cakkhu tāva ekampi, rūpaṃ pana anekameva saṅgataṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Paccayabhāvavisesato.
analyzed: anekam ti cakkhu tāva ekam pi rūpam pana anekam eva saṅga tam kim kāraṇam paccaya bhāva visesato

original: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ
analyzed: cakkhu hi cakkhu viññāṇassa nissaya purejāta aindriya vippayutta paccayehi paccayaḥ hontam

analyzed: atthi bhāvena iva hoti tasmin sati tassa bhāvataḥ asati abhāvataḥ yatas tam atthi avigata paccayehissa

analyzed: paccayaḥ ti vuttam svāyam paccaya bhāvaḥ na ekasmin na sambhavati iti ekam pi cakkhu viññāṇassa

original: paccayo hoti. Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti rūpam pana yadi api cakkhu viya purejāta atthi avigata paccayehi paccayo

original: hoti puretaraṃ uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā, tathāpi anekameva
analyzed: hoti puretaram uppannam hutvā vijjamāna kkhaṇeya iva upakāraka ttā tathā api anekam eva

original: saṅgataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato. Yañhi taṃ ārammaṇaṃ tassa yathā tathā
analyzed: saṅgatam hutvā paccayaḥ hoti ārammaṇa bhāvataḥ yat hi tam ārammaṇam tassa yathā tathā

original: upalabbhanīyavaseneva ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo, viññāṇassa ca indriyādhīnavuttikassa
analyzed: upalabbhanīya vasena iva ārammaṇa paccaya bhāvaḥ viññāṇassa ca indriya adhīna vuttikassa

original: paccayo hotīti. Amumeva hi visesaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti iti amum eva hi visesam vibhāvetum cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca ati pāḷiyam

original: vacanabhedo katoti. Evaṃ sotaviññāṇepi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. Ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ pana
analyzed: vacana bhedo kato ti evam sota viññāṇe pi yathāraham vattabbam ghāna viññāṇa ādīnam pana

analyzed: attanaḥ nissayena saha allīnassa iva gahaṇataḥ eka kalāpa gatam pi gandha ādikam

original: tesaṃ uppattiyā paccayo hoti.
analyzed: tesam uppattiyāḥ paccayaḥ hoti

original: Rūpamattārammaṇarasanti rūpāyatanamattasseva ārammaṇakaraṇarasaṃ. Matta-saddena yathā
analyzed: rūpa matta ārammaṇa rasanti rūpa āyatana mattassa iva ārammaṇa karaṇa rasam matta saddena yathā

original: ārammaṇantaraṃ nivatteti, evaṃ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti. Na

original: Tenāha bhagavā – “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammam paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipāta mattā ati

original: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gaṇhātīti

original: vuttaṃ “rūpābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti. Attano anantaraṃ uppajjamānānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam rūpa abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam ti attanaḥ anantaram uppajjamānānam arūpa dhammānam

original: samanantaravigatā arūpadhammā pavattiokāsadānena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatapaccayehi
analyzed: samanantara vigatāḥ arūpa dhammāḥ pavatti okāsa dānena anantara samanantara natthi vigata paccayehi

original: upakārakā, nissayārammaṇā dhammā viya āsannakāraṇāti dassento āha “rūpārammaṇāya
analyzed: upakārakāḥ nissaya ārammaṇāḥ dhammāḥ viya āsanna kāraṇā ti dassentaḥ āha rūpa ārammaṇāya

original: kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhāna”nti. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
analyzed: kiriyā manaḥ dhātuyāḥ apagama padaṭṭhānam ti sota viññāṇa ādīsu pi vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Kiriyāmanodhātuyā ārammaṇabhedato bhinnasabhāvattā āha “kiriyāmanodhātūna”nti. Cakkhuviññāṇādīhi
analyzed: kiriyā manaḥ dhātuyāḥ ārammaṇa bhedataḥ bhinna sabhāva ttā āha kiriyā manaḥ dhātūnan ti cakkhu viññāṇa ādīhi

original: gahitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṃ katvā sampaṭicchantaṃ gaṇhantaṃ

original: viya hotīti vuttaṃ “rūpādisampaṭicchanarasa”nti. Tathābhāvena sampaṭicchanabhāvena
analyzed: viya hoti iti vuttam tathābhāvena sampaṭicchana bhāvena

original: paccupaṭṭhātīti tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: paccupaṭṭhāti iti tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Chasu ārammaṇesu kadāci pañcannaṃ jaccandhādivasena tatopi ūnānaṃ, brahmaloke ca
analyzed: chasu ārammaṇesu kadāci brahma loke ca

original: dvinnameva vijānanasabhāvāpi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā vuttā taṃsabhāvānativattanato,
analyzed: dvinnam eva vijānana sabhāvā api chaṣ ārammaṇa vijānana lakkhaṇā vuttā tad sabhāva an ativattanato

original: chasveva vā itaresaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ antogadhattā. Santīraṇādirasāti yathāsambhavaṃ santīraṇatadārammaṇādikiccā,
analyzed: chasu eva vā itaresam ārammaṇānam yathāsambhavam santīraṇa tad ārammaṇa ādi kiccā

original: santīraṇatadārammaṇapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutikiccāti adhippāyo. “Hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā”ti
