analyzed: pana tasmin khaṇe vijjamānānam chanda ādīnam adhipati paccaya bhāvena hoti na āgamana vasena

original: Tathā hi ekameva jhānaṃ nānakkhaṇesu nānādhipateyyaṃ hoti, tasmā vipākassa āgamanavasena
analyzed: tathā hi ekam eva jhānam nānā khaṇesu nānā ādhipateyyam hoti tasmā vipākassa āgamana vasena

original: chandādhipateyyāditā na gahitā. Tenāha “abhāvodhipatīna”nti. Tadabhāvatova sarasato
analyzed: chanda ādhipateyī ādi tā na tena āha

original: tassa hīnāditā na sambhavatīti sāpi jhānāgamanatova vuttā.
analyzed: tassa hīna ādi tā na sambhavati iti sā api jhāna āgamanataḥ va vuttā

original: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacara vipāka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Lokuttaravipākavaṇṇanā
Maggacittassa viya phalacittassa maggayogato bhedābhāvena “catumaggayogato”ti avatvā
analyzed: magga cittassa viya phala cittassa magga yogataḥ bheda abhāvena catu magga yogato ti avatvā

original: “catumaggasampayuttacittaphalattā”ti vuttaṃ, catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayuttakusalacittassa
analyzed: catu magga sampayutta citta phala ttā iti vuttam catūhi ariya maggehi sampayutta kusala cittassa

original: phalattā catubbidhasāmaññaphalasampayuttacittabhāvatoti attho. Sotāpattimaggassa
analyzed: phalattā catubbidha sāmañña phala sampayutta citta bhāvato ti attho sotāpatti maggassa

original: phalaṃ cittaṃ sotāpattimaggaphalacittaṃ. Evaṃ sesesu. Maggavīthiyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ,
analyzed: phalam cittam sotāpatti magga phala cittam evam sesesu magga vīthiyam dvi kkhattum

original: tikkhattuṃ vā phalasamāpattiyā aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsveva ṭhānesu
analyzed: tikkhattum vā phala samāpattiyāḥ aparicchinna parimāṇam pavattamānam pi dvīsu eva ṭhānesu

original: pavattiyā duvidhameva hotīti āha “maggavīthiphalasamāpattivasena pavattito duvidha”nti.
analyzed: pavattiyā duvidham eva hoti iti āha magga vīthi phala samāpatti vasena pavattitaḥ duvidhanti

original: 50-1. Maggassānantare phale labbhanti maggāgamanatoti adhippāyo. Maggo hi āgamanato
analyzed: maggassa anantare phale labbhanti magga āgamanato ti adhippāyaḥ maggaḥ hi āgamanato

original: “suññato”ti laddhanāmo saguṇālambaṇavasena animittaappaṇihitanāmampi labhatīti phalassa
analyzed: suññato ti laddha nāmo sa guṇa ālambaṇa vasena animitta appaṇihita nāmam pi labhati iti phalassa

original: nāmattayampi deti, tathā āgamanato appaṇihito maggo saguṇārammaṇavasena animittasuññataappaṇihitanāmakoti
analyzed: nāmattayam pi deti tathā āgamanataḥ appaṇihitaḥ maggo sa guṇa ārammaṇa vasena animitta suññata appaṇihita nāmakaḥ ti

original: phalassa nāmattayampi deti. Evañca katvā abhidhamme ekekassa phalassa tīṇi tīṇi nāmāni
analyzed: phalassa nāmattayam pi deti evañca katvā abhidhamme ekekassa phalassa tīṇi tīṇi nāmāni

original: vuttāni. Nanu ca abhidhamme “saguṇārammaṇato nāmaṃ anadhippeta”nti vuttaṃ? Saccaṃ
analyzed: vuttāni nanu ca abhidhamme sa guṇa ārammaṇataḥ nāmam an adhippetan ti vuttam saccam

original: vuttaṃ, taṃ pana nāmalābhaṃ sandhāya, na nāmadānaṃ. Tattha hi vavatthānakarattābhāvato
analyzed: vuttam tam pana nāma lābham sandhāya na nāma dānam tattha hi vavatthānaka ratta abhāvato

original: tathā anadhippetaṃ, na alabbhanato. Idha pana ekekassa phalaṃ nāmattayampi labhatīti
analyzed: tathā anadhippetam na a labbhanataḥ idha pana ekekassa phalam labhati iti

original: vavatthānappayojanābhāvato saguṇārammaṇehi laddhanāmadānassa adhippetattā tividhampi
analyzed: vavatthāna payojana abhāvato sa guṇa ārammaṇehi laddha nāma dānassa adhippeta ttā tividham pi

original: nāmaṃ deti. Ekantena cetaṃ evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, itarathā vipassanāpi vipassato
analyzed: nāmam deti ekantena ca itam evam sampaṭicchitabbam itarathā vipassanā api vipassato

original: laddhanāmamaggassa taṃ na dadeyyāti. Parabhāgasminti aparabhāge. Vaḷañjanaphalesūti
analyzed: laddha nāma maggassa tam na dadeyya ati parabhāgasmin ti aparabhāge vaḷañjana phalesu iti

original: samāpajjanavasena anubhavitabbaphalesu. “Vaḷañjanaphalesu nā”ti maggāgamanaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: samāpajjana vasena anubhavitabba phalesu vaḷañjana phalesu na ati magga āgamanam sandhāya

original: paṭikkhittanti āha “vipassanāvasenevā”tiādi. Vaḷañjanaphalañhi visuṃ vipassanāvaseneva
analyzed: paṭikkhittanti āha vipassanā vasena iva atiādi vaḷañjana phalam hi visum vipassanā vasena iva

original: nibbattatīti tassa taṃvasena nāmalābho. Yadi evaṃ maggassa viya animittanāmalābho
analyzed: nibbattati iti tassa tad vasena nāma lābhaḥ yadi evam maggassa viya animitta nāma lābhaḥ

original: na siyā? Taṃ na, yathā maggānantarassa phalassa viya vaḷañjanakaphalasamāpattiyāpi
analyzed: na siyā tam na yathā magga anantarassa phalassa viya vaḷañjanaka phala samāpattiyā api

original: maggāgamanato ca jhānapaṭipadābhedo hoti, evaṃ animittanāmampi labbhatīti.
analyzed: magga āgamanato ca jhāna paṭipadā bhedaḥ hoti evam animitta nāmam pi labbhati iti

original: 52-3. Honti sādhipatīnevāti ettha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Maggabhāvenāti soḷasahi ākārehi
analyzed: honti sa adhipatīn eva ati ettha kāraṇam vuttam eva magga bhāvena ati soḷasahi ākārehi

original: catusaccapaṭivedhakamaggabhāvena, kilesamāraṇavasena gamanasaṅkhātena, nibbānatthikehi
analyzed: catu sacca paṭivedhaka magga bhāvena kilesa māraṇa vasena gamana saṅkhātena nibbānatthikehi

original: maggitabbabhāvasaṅkhātena vā maggabhāvena. Phalaṃ…pe… vuccatīti sayaṃ phalabhāvampi
analyzed: maggitabba bhāva saṅkhātena vā magga bhāvena vuccati iti sayam phala bhāvam pi

original: maggassa phalattā, taṃsadisatāya vā tamupādāya maggoti vuccati “maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”ntiādīsūti adhippāyo.
analyzed: maggassa phalattā tad sadisa tāya vā tam upādāya maggaḥ iti vuccati maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna nti ādīsu uti adhippāyaḥ

original: Lokuttaravipākavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: lokuttara vipāka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Akusalavipākavaṇṇanā
analyzed: akusala vipāka vaṇṇanā

original: Yathā atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasambhavato kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: yathā ati iṭṭhe iṭṭha majjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanā bheda sambhavato kusala vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā, upekkhāsahagatāti, evaṃ atianiṭṭhe aniṭṭhamajjhatte
analyzed: duvidhā hoti somanassa sahagatā upekkhā sahagatā ati evam ati aniṭṭhe aniṭṭha majjhatte

original: ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo natthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ekavidhāvāti “sattākusalavipākānī”ti
analyzed: ca ārammaṇe vedanā bhedaḥ natthi iti akusala vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu eka vidhau āti satta akusala vipākāni iti

original: vuttaṃ. Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena bhavitabbaṃ, na ca paṭighena
analyzed: vuttam sati hi tattha vedanā bhede ati aniṭṭhe domanassena bhavitabbam na ca paṭighena

original: vinā domanassaṃ uppajjatīti. Kāyaviññāṇassa dukkhasahagatā kusalavipāke vuttavipariyāyena
analyzed: vinā domanassam uppajjati iti kāya viññāṇassa dukkha sahagatā kusala vipāke vutta vipariyāyena

original: veditabbā. Ettha ca akusalavipākesu labbhamānadukkhaṃ viya nātikaṭukāpi upekkhā ekantanihīnassa
analyzed: veditabbā ettha ca akusala vipākesu labbhamāna dukkham viya na ati kaṭukā api upekkhā ekanta nihīnassa

original: akusalassa vipākabhāvato dukkhasabhāvattā hīnā eva. Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho
analyzed: akusalassa vipāka bhāvataḥ dukkha sabhāva ttā hīnāḥ eva na hi akusalassa vipākaḥ adukkhaḥ

original: hoti, upekkhābhāvo panassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭipaharituṃ asakkontassa dubbalapurisassa
analyzed: hoti upekkhā bhāvaḥ panassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭipaharitum a sakkontassa dubbala purisassa

original: tena kariyamānabādhassa upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imāni…pe… cittānīti imāni satta
analyzed: tena kariyamāna bādhassa upekkhanā viya ati daṭṭhabbam cittāni iti imāni satta

original: ekekassa akusalassa vipākacittāni, na pana kusalavipāke viya tihetukādipuññavisesena.
analyzed: ekekassa akusalassa vipāka cittāni na pana kusala vipāke viya ti hetuka ādi puñña visesena

original: Uddhaccasahagatassapi hi pavattiyaṃ satteva vipākā labbhanti. Kasmā panettha yathā
analyzed: uddhacca sahagatassa api hi pavattiyam sattā iva vipākāḥ labbhanti kasmā pana ittha yathā

original: kusalavipākaṃ sahetukampi uddhaṭaṃ, na evaṃ akusalavipākanti? Hetūnaṃ asambhavato.
analyzed: kusala vipākam sa hetukam pi uddhaṭam na evam akusala vipākam ti hetūnam asambhavataḥ

original: Lobhādīnañhi ekantasāvajjatāya ayonisomanasikārahetukānaṃ natthi vipākabhāvo, alobhādīnampi
analyzed: lobha ādīnam hi ekanta sāvajja tāya a yoniso manasikāra hetukānam natthi vipāka bhāvaḥ alobha ādīnam pi

original: ekantamanavajjasabhāvānaṃ vā kāraṇassa tabbidūratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvo.
analyzed: ekantam anavajja sabhāvānam vā kāraṇassa tad bidūra tāya nattha iva akusala vipāka bhāvaḥ

original: Na hi alobhādīnaṃ paṭipakkhalobhādayo te abhinipphādenti, tasmā idaṃ sabbathā sahetuppavattiyā
analyzed: na hi alobha ādīnam paṭipakkha lobha ādayaḥ te abhinipphādenti tasmai idam sabbathā sa hetu ppavattiyā

original: asambhavato ahetukamevāti.
analyzed: asambhavataḥ ahetukam eva iti

original: Kammakammanimittagatinimittesūti ettha atītabhave āyūhitaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ,
analyzed: kamma kamma nimitta gati nimittesu iti ettha atīta bhave āyūhitam apara apariya vedanīyam

original: upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā kammaṃ kammaṃ nāma. Kammakaraṇakāle cetanāya gahitamārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: upapajja vedanīyam vā kammam kammam nāma kamma karaṇa kāle cetanāya gahitam ārammaṇam

original: kammanimittaṃ nāma. Upapajjitabbabhavapariyāpanno narakādīsu aggijālādivaṇṇo gatinimittaṃ nāma.
analyzed: kamma nimittam nāma upapajjitabba bhava pariyāpannaḥ naraka ādīsu aggi jāla ādi vaṇṇaḥ gati nimittam nāma

original: 54. Imeti akusalavipākā. Tesaṃ aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu pavattivacanena tabbipariyāyena
analyzed: ime ti akusala vipākā tesam aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhatta visayesu pavatti vacanena tad bipariyāyena

original: kusalavipākānaṃ iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu pavatti atthato āpannāti sā visuṃ na
analyzed: kusala vipākānaṃ iṭṭha aiṭṭha majjhatta visayesu pavatti atthataḥ āpannā ati sā visum na

original: vuttā. Sukhādittayayuttāti sukhasomanassupekkhāyuttā.
analyzed: vuttā sukha ādi taya yuttā ati sukha so manaḥ upekkhā yuttā

original: “Eva”ntiādi yathāvuttavipākānaṃ nigamanaṃ.
analyzed: evam ti ādi yathā vutta vipākānam nigamanam

original: Akusalavipākavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: akusala vipāka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Vipākacittavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vipāka citta vaṇṇanā

original: 55. Pākassa asurakaññānaṃ gabbhaparipākassa sāsanato vināsanato, pākasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: pākassa asura kaññānam gabbha paripākassa sāsanataḥ vināsanataḥ pāka saṅkhātassa

original: vā asurassa vināsanato pākasāsano vuccati sakko devarājā, tena pūjito pākasāsanapūjito.
analyzed: vā asurassa vināsanataḥ pākasāsanaḥ vuccati sakkaḥ devarājā tena pūjitaḥ pākasāsana pūjito

original: Pākaṃ vā paripakkaṃ sāsanametesūti pākasāsanā, khīṇāsavā, tehi pūjitoti pākasāsanapūjito.
analyzed: pākam vā paripakkam sāsanam etesu iti pāka sāsanā khīṇa āsavā tehi pūjitaḥ iti pāka sāsana pūjitaḥ

original: Vipākacittavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vipāka citta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dānādivasenāti pavattākāramattato dānādivasena, na pana puññakiriyavatthuvasena khīṇāsavasantānagatassa puññakiriyabhāvābhāvatoti vuttovāyamattho.
analyzed: dāna ādi vasena ati pavatta ākāra mattataḥ dāna ādi vasena na pana puñña kiriya vatthu vasena khīṇāsava santāna gatassa puñña kiriya bhāva abhāvato ti vuttaḥ uva ayam attho

original: Āvajjatīti āvajjanaṃ, ābhuñjati oṇojeti pariṇāmeti vāretīti vā attho. Tañhi āpāthagataṃ
analyzed: āvajjati iti āvajjanam ābhuñjati oṇojā iti pariṇāmeti vāreti iti vā tat hi āpātha gatam

original: ārammaṇaṃ paṭhamamābhuñjati, cakkhuviññāṇādīni vīthicittāni āpāthagatārammaṇābhimukhaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam paṭhamam ābhuñjati cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni vīthi cittāni āpātha gata ārammaṇa abhimukham

original: oṇojeti, cittasantānaṃ vā purimākārato aññathā pariṇāmeti, anuppabandhato pavattanakaṃ
analyzed: oṇoje ti citta santānam vā purima ākārataḥ aññathā pariṇāmeti an uppabandhataḥ pavattanakam

original: bhavaṅgacittasantānaṃ parato pavattituṃ adatvā āpāthagataṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ aññattha
analyzed: bhavaṅga citta santānam paratas pavattitum a datvā āpātha gatam vā ārammaṇam aññattha

original: gantuṃ adatvā vāreti. Hasitaṃ uppajjati, uppādīyati vā etenāti hasituppādaṃ, tadeva
analyzed: gantum a datvā vāreti hasitam uppajjati uppādīyati vā etena ati hasita uppādam tat eva

original: cittanti hasituppādacittaṃ. Voṭṭhapetīti voṭṭhabbanaṃ. Kasmā panettha āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanāni
analyzed: cittam ti hasita uppāda cittam voṭṭhapeti iti voṭṭhabbanam kasmā pana ittha āvajjana voṭṭhabbanāni

original: upekkhāsahagatāni, hasituppādañca somanassasahagatanti? Vuccate – āvajjanaṃ tāva
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatāni hasita uppādam ca somanassa sahagatanti vuccate āvajjanam tāva

original: apubbārammaṇe sakideva ca pavattamānasantativicchedavasena pavattanato, dubbalabhavaṅgapaccayaṃ
analyzed: apubba ārammaṇe sakid eva ca pavattamāna santati viccheda vasena pavattanataḥ dubbala bhavaṅga paccayam

original: vā sabbathā visayarasamanubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttameva
analyzed: vā sabbathā visaya rasam anubhavitum na sakkoti iti iṭṭha ādīsu sabbattha upekkhā yuttam eva

original: hoti. Voṭṭhabbanañca vuttavipariyāyena vedanābhedārahampi samānaṃ vipākappabandhaṃ
analyzed: hoti voṭṭhabbanam ca vutta vipariyāyena vedanā bheda araham pi samānam vipāka ppabandham

original: vicchinditvā visadisacittappabandhassa nibbattanato santatipariṇāmaneyeva kiccantare
analyzed: vicchinditvā visadisa citta ppabandhassa nibbattanato santati pariṇāmaneyā iva kicca antare

original: byāvaṭattā vipākaṃ viya ārammaṇarasassāde asamatthamevāti sabbattha upekkhāsahagatameva.
analyzed: vipākam viya ārammaṇa rasa ssāde asamattham eva ati sabbattha upekkhā sahagatam eva

original: Hasituppādaṃ pana vuttaviparītato parihīnavipallāsānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ santāne iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva
analyzed: hasita uppādam pana vutta viparītataḥ parihīna vipallāsānam khīṇa āsavānam santāne iṭṭha ārammaṇe eva

original: uppajjanato sabbathā somanassasahagatamevāti.
analyzed: uppajjanato sabbathā somanassa sahagatam eva ati

original: Lakkhaṇādito panetāsu purimaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purecaraṃ rūpādivijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana itāsu purimam cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam purecaram rūpa ādi vijānana lakkhaṇam

original: āvajjanarasaṃ, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, bhavaṅgavicchedapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Dutiyaṃ chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: āvajjana rasam tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānam bhavaṅga viccheda padaṭṭhānam dutiyam chaṭṭha ārammaṇa vijānana lakkhaṇam

original: arahataṃ anoḷārikesu vatthūsu hasituppādarasaṃ, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ekantato
analyzed: arahatam anoḷārikesu vatthūsu hasita uppāda rasam tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānam ekantato

original: hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ. Tatiyampi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ, pañcadvāramanodvāresu
analyzed: hadaya vatthu padaṭṭhānam tatiyam pi chaṭṭha ārammaṇa vijānana lakkhaṇam pañca dvāra manaḥ dvāresu

original: voṭṭhabbanāvajjanarasaṃ, tathābhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ahetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātubhavaṅgānaṃ
analyzed: voṭṭhabbana avajjana rasam tathābhāva paccupaṭṭhānam ahetuka vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu bhavaṅgānam

original: aññatarāpagamapadaṭṭhānanti.
analyzed: aññatara apagama padaṭṭhānam ti

original: Bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭayamānāti bhavaṅgasantānaṃ āvaṭṭayantī viya. Sādhāraṇāti sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
analyzed: bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭayamānā ati bhavaṅga santānam āvaṭṭayantī viya sādhāraṇā ati sekkha asekkha puthujjanānam

original: sādhāraṇā. Asādhāraṇāti asekkhānaṃyeva āveṇikā. Tenāha “khīṇāsavassā”ti. Chasu dvāresu…pe…
analyzed: sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇā ti asekkhā anaṃyeva āveṇikā tena āha khīṇa āsavassa iti chasu

original: ārammaṇesūti cakkhādīsu chasu dvāresu, padhānasāruppaṭṭhānādigatesu chasu rūpādiārammaṇesu.
analyzed: ārammaṇesu ti cakkha ādīsu chasu dvāresu padhāna sāruppa ṭṭhāna ādi gatesu chasu rūpa ādi ārammaṇesu

original: Padhānasāruppañhi ṭhānaṃ disvā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthāya “sāruppamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: padhāna sāruppam hi ṭhānam disvā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra atthāya sāruppam idam ṭhānam

original: mayā laddha”nti tusantassa cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe, bhaṇḍabhājanaṭṭhāne mahāsaddaṃ
analyzed: mayā laddhanti tusantassa cakkhu dvāre rūpa ārammaṇe bhaṇḍa bhājana ṭṭhāne mahā saddaṃ

original: sutvā “evarūpā loluppataṇhā me pahīnā”ti tusantassa sotadvāre saddārammaṇe, gandhehi
analyzed: sutvā evarūpā loluppa taṇhā me pahīnā ati tusantassa sota dvāre sadda ārammaṇe gandhehi

original: vā pupphehi vā cetiyapūjanakāle “evarūpena vata sugandhena bhagavantaṃ pūjemī”ti
analyzed: vā pupphehi vā cetiya pūjana kāle evarūpena vata sugandhena bhagavantam pūjemi iti

original: tusantassa ghānadvāre gandhārammaṇe, rasasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saha

original: bhājetvā paribhuñjanakāle “sāraṇīyadhammo vata me pūrito”ti tusantassa jivhādvāre

original: rasārammaṇe, ābhisamācārikavattapūraṇakāle “kāyena vattapaṭivattaṃ pūremī”ti tusantassa

original: kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇeti evaṃ pañcadvāresu pañcārammaṇesu pavattati.
analyzed: kāya dvāre phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇā iti evam pañca dvāresu pañca ārammaṇesu pavattati

original: Manodvāre pana yathāvuttesveva pañcasu paccuppannārammaṇesu ghaṭikārasuttādīsu viya

original: bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇena pariññāte atītārammaṇe, “aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho
analyzed: bhagavato pubbenivāsa ñāṇena pariññāte atīta ārammaṇe aṭṭhissaraḥ nāma paccekabuddho

original: bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhānādīsu viya anāgataṃsañāṇena paricchinne anāgatārammaṇe cāti

original: evaṃ chasvevārammaṇesu hasitaṃ uppādetīti veditabbaṃ. Nanu ca atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatādīsu
analyzed: evam chasu eva ārammaṇesu hasitam uppādeti iti veditabbam nanu ca atīta aṃsa ādīsu appaṭihata ādīsu

analyzed: appaṭihata ñāṇam vatvā imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavataḥ sabbam

original: kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatta”nti vacanato vicāraṇapaññārahitāya etāya
analyzed: kāya kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamam ñāṇa anuparivattanti vacanataḥ vicāraṇa paññā rahitāya etāya

original: kathaṃ bhagavato uppatti yujjeyyāti? Hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato
analyzed: katham bhagavataḥ uppatti yujjeyya ati hasita uppāda cittena pavattiyamānam pi bhagavataḥ

original: sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyeva,
analyzed: sita karaṇam pubbenivāsa anāgata aṃsa sabbaññu taññāṇānam anuvattaka ttā ñāṇa anuparivattiyā iva

original: evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷivirodho. Evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ

analyzed: icchitabbam itarathā aññassa api viññatti samuṭṭhāpakassa ahetuka cittassa bhagavataḥ

analyzed: uppatti na yujjeyya na hi viññatti samuṭṭhāpakassa tad samuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāya kamma ādi bhāvam

original: āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti. Evañca katvā pañcadvāre iminā cittena somanassuppādanamattaṃ
analyzed: āpajjana bhāvaḥ vibandhati iti evañca katvā pañca dvāre iminā cittena

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ, na hāsuppādanaṃ pañcadvārikacittānaṃ aviññattijanakattā. Manodvāre pana
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam na hāsuppādanam pañcadvārika cittānam a viññatti janaka ttā manaḥ dvāre pana

original: hāsuppādanaṃ. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pañcadvāre “somanassito hotī”ti ettakameva
analyzed: hāsa uppādanam tena iva hi aṭṭhakathā ayam pañca dvāre somanassito hoti iti ettakam eva

original: vuttaṃ, manodvāre ca “hāsayamāna”nti. Idha pana “hasituppādakiccā”ti avisesavacanaṃ

original: sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Hasituppādakiccāti hasitasseva uppādanakiccā. Teneva

original: hi taṃ “hasituppāda”nti vuccati, na pana aññesaṃ hasituppādacittānaṃ abhāvato. Tathā

original: hi vakkhati “kusalato catūhī”tiādi.

original: Cha asādhāraṇañāṇānīti āsayānusayañāṇaṃ, indriyaparopariyañāṇaṃ, yamakapāṭihāriyañāṇaṃ,

analyzed: asādhāraṇāni ñāṇāni nanu ca sabbaññu taññāṇam eva anāvaraṇa ñāṇam itarathā sabbaññu tā anāvaraṇa ñāṇānam

original: asabbaññutasāvaraṇañāṇatā ca āpajjeyya, tathā hi yadi sabbaññutaññāṇato aññamanāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
analyzed: a sabbaññu ta sāvaraṇa ñāṇa tā ca āpajjeyya tathā hi yadi sabbaññu ta ññāṇataḥ aññam anāvaraṇa ñāṇam

original: siyā, tassa sāvaraṇattā sāvaraṇe ca visaye sabhāvapaṭivedhābhāvato sabbaññubhāvaṃ

original: na sijjheyya, anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāvena yattha taṃ na pavattati,
analyzed: na sijjheyya anāvaraṇa ñāṇassa ca asabba dhamma ārammaṇa bhāvena yattha tam na pavattati

original: tatthāvaraṇasambhavato anāvaraṇabhāvopi na siyāti? Saccametaṃ, ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha āvaraṇa sambhavataḥ anāvaraṇa bhāvaḥ api na siyāti saccam etam ekam eva tam ñāṇam

original: anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayattā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato
analyzed: anavasesa saṅkhata asaṅkhata sammuti dhamma visaya ttā sabbaññuta ññāṇam tattha ca āvaraṇa abhāvato

original: dvedhā vuttanti. Yathāha –
analyzed: dvedhā vuttanti yathā āha

original: “Sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi.
analyzed: sabbam saṅkhatam asaṅkhatam anavasesam jānāti iti sabbaññuta ññāṇam tattha āvaraṇam natthi iti anāvaraṇa ñāṇa tiādi

original: Idha ṭhatvāti hasitassa uppādanato hasitassa uppādananti vuttacittassa āgataṭṭhāne

original: 57. Yasmā pana bhāvanāvasena pavattākāramattaṃ vinā bhāvanāya kātabbassa nīvaraṇappahānādikiccassa
analyzed: yasmā pana bhāvanā vasena pavatta ākāra mattam vinā bhāvanāya kātabbassa nīvaraṇa ppahāna ādi kiccassa

analyzed: puna samāpajjanataḥ puthujjana kālasmim abhinibbattita samāpatti sadisā ettha sā eva tathā vuttā

original: 61. Ekacittakkhaṇattāti ekacittakkhaṇeyeva pavattanato. Yadi hi so punappunaṃ uppajjeyya,
analyzed: eka citta khaṇa ttā ti eka citta khaṇe iva pavattanataḥ yadi hi saḥ punappunam uppajjeyya

original: tadāssa arahato uppattiyā kiriyabhāvo icchitabbo siyā. Sakiṃyeva pana pavattati catusaccapaṭivedhakiccassa

original: ekavāreneva pariniṭṭhānato, takkiccena ca vinā tassa anupalabbhanīyattā. Tenāha –

original: 62. Kriyā…pe… desakoti yā āpattiyo kāyavācāhi akātabbaṃ katvā āpajjati, tā kiriyā,

original: yā pana āpattiyo kāyavācāhi kātabbaṃ akaronto āpajjati, tā akiriyā, kiriyā ca akiriyā

original: Yaṃ kiriyākiriyaṃ cittanti sambandho. Pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ jitattā jino. Hitāhitānanti
analyzed: yam kiriyā akiriyam sambandho

original: atthānatthānaṃ. Sāti so jino. Kriyākriyāratoti sabbasattānaṃ hitassa karaṇe, ahitassa

original: ca akaraṇe nirato. Atha vā ekantamiṭṭhavipākattā hitāti kusalānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: ca a karaṇe atha vā ekantam iṭṭha vipāka ttā adhivacanam

original: Tappaṭipakkhattā ahitāti akusalānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathākkamaṃ tesaṃ kiriyāyaṃ,

original: akiriyāyañca ratoti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato. Atha vā hitāhitāti kusalākusalā eva, tesaṃ

original: kiriyākiriyāmattamavipākabhāvaṃ kātuṃ icchatīti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato. Atha vā hitāhitānaṃ
analyzed: kiriyā akiriyā mattama vipāka bhāvam kātum icchati iti atha vā hita ahita anaṃpe

original: puggalānaṃ sakiriyākiriyāya attano attano kiccassa idhalokaparalokanipphādanassa
analyzed: puggalānam sa kiriyā akiriyāya attanaḥ attanaḥ kiccassa idhaloka paraloka nipphādanassa

original: karaṇe rato abhiratoti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato.

analyzed: sabbe lokuttare aṭṭha katvā ye ekūnanavuti cittuppādā vuttā tāni cittāni mayā

original: hi sakkā uggahaṇamattenevettha sabbathā sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantunti adhippāyo. Abhidhammamahodadhinti

analyzed: ṭhitam vā taranti iti attha ggahaṇa vasena uttaranti suta maya ñāṇa mūlakena

analyzed: vā bhāvanā ñāṇena otaranti iti attho imam lokan ti paccuppanna bhavam param lokan ti

analyzed: anāgata bhavam taranti iti atikkamanti idha lokasmin hi chanda rāga pahāna vasena imam

original: Iti abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma

original: 2. Dutiyo paricchedo
analyzed: dutiyaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Cetasikaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: cetasika niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 67. Ettāvatā ca cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhesu catūsu dhammesu
analyzed: ettāvatā ca cittam cetasikam rūpam nibbānan ti evam uddiṭṭhesu catūsu dhammesu

original: cittaṃ tāva jātibhūmisampayogappavattākārādivasena vibhāgena niddisitvā idāni tadanantaraṃ
analyzed: cittam tāva jāti bhūmi sampayoga ppavatta ākāra ādi vasena vibhāgena niddisitvā idāni tad anantaram

original: uddiṭṭhe cetasikadhamme niddisituṃ “cittānantaramuddiṭṭhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Vibhājananti
analyzed: uddiṭṭhe cetasika dhamme niddisitum citta anantaram uddiṭṭha ati ādi āraddham vibhājananti

original: jātibhūmiādivasena vibhāgaṃ, tesu tesu cittesu yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena visuṃ visuṃ bhājanañca.
analyzed: jāti bhūmi ādi vasena vibhāgam tesu tesu cittesu yathāraham sampayoga vasena visum visum bhājanam ca

original: Katame pana cetasikā, yesaṃ vibhājanaṃ vuccatīti te saha nibbacanena sarūpato dassetuṃ
analyzed: katame pana cetasikāḥ yesam vibhājanam vuccati iti te saha nibbacanena sarūpataḥ dassetuṃ

original: “tattha cittasampayuttā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “cittasampayuttā”ti idaṃ cetasikalakkhaṇadassanaṃ.
analyzed: tattha citta sampayutta atiādi vuttam tattha citta sampayuttā ti idam cetasika lakkhaṇa dassanaṃ

original: Tena ye cittena saha sampayogalakkhaṇena yuttā, teyeva cetasikāti dasseti. Kiṃ pana
analyzed: tena ye cittena saha sampayoga lakkhaṇena yuttā te yeva cetasikā ati dasseti kim pana

original: taṃ sampayogalakkhaṇanti? Ekuppādaekanirodhaekavatthukaekārammaṇasaṅkhātā pakārā.
analyzed: tam sampayoga lakkhaṇan ti eka uppāda eka nirodha eka vatthuka eka ārammaṇa saṅkhātā pakārā

original: Samaṃ pakārehi yuttāti hi sampayuttā. Tattha yadi ekuppādatāmatteneva ca sampayuttatā
analyzed: samam pakārehi yuttā ati hi sampayuttā tattha yadi eka uppāda tā mattena iva ca sampayutta tā

original: adhippetā, sahuppattikānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññasampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha-ggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: adhippetā sahuppattikānam rūpa arūpa dhammānam aññamañña sampayutta tā āpajjeyya ti eka nirodha ggahaṇam

original: Evampi avinibbhogarūpānaṃ aññamaññasampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekavatthuka-ggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: evam pi a vinibbhoga rūpānam aññamañña sampayutta tā āpajjeyya ati eka vatthuka ggahaṇam

original: Evampi “avinibbhogarūpesu ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ sesamahābhūtopādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayo
analyzed: evam pi avinibbhoga rūpesu ekam mahābhūtam sesa mahābhūta upādā rūpānam nissaya paccayo

original: hotīti tasmā tāni ekavatthukānīti, cakkhādīnaṃ nissayabhūtāni vā bhūtāni ekaṃ vatthu
analyzed: hoti iti tasmā tāni eka vatthukāni iti cakkha ādīnam nissaya bhūtāni vā bhūtāni ekam vatthu

original: etesu nissitanti ekavatthukānī”ti kappentassa tesaṃ sampayuttatāpatti siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: etesu nissitanti eka vatthukāni iti kappentassa tesam sampayutta tā āpatti siyāti tad nivāraṇa attham

original: ekārammaṇa-ggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: eka ārammaṇa ggahaṇam

original: Paṭilomato vā “ekārammaṇā”ti vutte ekavīthiyaṃ pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanādīnaṃ, nānāvīthiyaṃ
analyzed: paṭilomataḥ vā eka ārammaṇā ti vutte eka vīthiyam pañca viññāṇa sampaṭicchana ādīnam nānā vīthiyam

original: parasantāne ca ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ bhinnavatthukānaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti
analyzed: para santāne ca ekasmin ārammaṇe uppajjamānānam bhinna vatthukānam sampayutta tā āpajjeyya ati

original: ekavatthuka-ggahaṇaṃ. Evampi maraṇāsannavīthiyaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇādīnaṃ sampayuttatā
analyzed: eka vatthuka ggahaṇam evam pi maraṇa āsanna vīthiyam sampaṭicchana santīraṇa ādīnam sampayutta tā

original: āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha-ggahaṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana nānuppādāpi evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā honti,
analyzed: āpajjeyya ti eka nirodha ggahaṇam kim pana na anuppādā api evam tividha lakkhaṇāḥ honti

original: atha ekuppādā evāti vicāraṇāya ekuppādā eva evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā hontīti dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: atha ekuppādāḥ eva ati vicāraṇāya ekuppādāḥ eva evam tividha lakkhaṇāḥ honti iti dassana ttham

original: “ekuppādā”ti vuttaṃ. Iti imehi catūhi sampayogalakkhaṇehi ye cittasampayuttā, te
analyzed: eka uppādā ti vuttam iti imehi catūhi sampayoga lakkhaṇehi ye citta sampayuttā te

original: cetasikā nāmāti evaṃ cetasikalakkhaṇaṃ ṭhapitaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ panete cetasikā nāmāti
analyzed: cetasikāḥ nāma ati evam cetasika lakkhaṇam ṭhapitam hoti katham pana ete cetasikāḥ nāma ati

original: āha “citte bhavā”ti. “Cetasi bhavā cetasikā”ti vattabbe citta-saddassapi ceto-saddena
analyzed: āha citte bhavā ati cetasi bhavā cetasikā ati vattabbe citta saddassa api cetaḥ saddena

original: saha samānatthatāya atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “citte bhavā cetasikā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: saha samāna attha tāya atthamattam dassetum citte bhavā cetasikā iti vuttam

original: Niyatāti niyatuppattikā, karuṇāmuditādayo viya kadāci anuppajjitvā yadā yadā taṃ
analyzed: niyata ati niyata uppattikā karuṇā muditā ādayaḥ kadāci an uppajjitvā yadā yadā tam

original: cittaṃ uppajjati, tadā tadāva tena avinibhuttā hutvā jāyamānāti attho. Sarūpena āgatāti
analyzed: cittam uppajjati tadā tadā ava tena a vinibhuttā hutvā jāyamānā ati attho sarūpena āgatā ati

original: chandādayo viya “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino
analyzed: chanda ādayaḥ viya ye vā pana tasmin samaye aññe pi atthi paṭiccasamuppannāḥ arūpino

original: dhammā”ti evaṃ yevāpanakavasena anāgantvā “phasso hoti, vedanā hotī”tiādinā sarūpeneva
analyzed: dhammā ti evam an āgantvā phassaḥ hoti vedanā hoti iti ādinā sarūpena iva

original: pāḷiyaṃ āgatā. Yevāpanāti evaṃ desanā etesanti yevāpanakā. Ekūnatiṃsa dhammāti kiccabhedaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam āgatā yevāpanā ti evam desanā etesanti yevāpanakāḥ ekūnatiṃsa dhammāḥ ti kicca bhedam

original: anāmasitvā kevalaṃ asambhinnadhammavaseneva ekenūnā tiṃsa dhammā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana cittena
analyzed: an āmasitvā kevalam asambhinna dhamma vasena iva eka nūnā tiṃsa dhammā pāḷiyam pana cittena

original: saha tiṃsa dhamme gahetvā tesaṃ kiccabhedato gahaṇena chappaññāsa dhammā vuttā. Seyyathidanti
analyzed: saha tiṃsa dhamme gahetvā tesam kicca bhedato gahaṇena chappaññāsa dhammāḥ vuttā

original: sarūpapucchā. Phasso…pe… cittujukatāti yathāpucchitānaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. Iti-saddo
analyzed: sarūpa pucchā yathā pucchitānam sarūpa dassanam iti saddaḥ

original: parisamāpane, nidassane vā. Puna tettiṃsa hontīti sambandho. Tettiṃsa hontīti teyeva
analyzed: parisamāpane nidassane vā puna tettiṃsa honti iti sambandhaḥ tettiṃsa honti iti teyā eva

original: ekūnatiṃsa dhammāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ekūnatiṃsa dhammā ati adhippāyo

original: “Kadāci uppajjantī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “imesū”tiādi. Karuṇāmuditāvasenāti
analyzed: kadāci uppajjanti iti vuttam tam katham daṭṭhabbanti āha imesu utiādi karuṇā muditā vasena ati

original: paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya gotrabhupariyosānappavattitakaruṇāmuditāparikammavasena.
analyzed: paṭhama samannāhārataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: Karuṇāpubbabhāgoti karuṇāya pubbabhāgo, parikammappanāvasena pavattakaruṇābhāvanāya
analyzed: karuṇā pubbabhāgaḥ ti karuṇāya pubbabhāgaḥ parikamma ppanā vasena pavatta karuṇā bhāvanāya

original: appanākoṭṭhāsato purimakoṭṭhāso, paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya gotrabhupariyosānappavattaparikammakoṭṭhāso
analyzed: appanā koṭṭhāsataḥ purima koṭṭhāso paṭhama samannāhārataḥ paṭṭhāya gotra bhu pariyosāna pavatta parikamma koṭṭhāso

original: hutvāti attho. Evaṃ “muditāpubbabhāgo”ti etthāpi. Bhāga-saddassa drabyavuttitāya
analyzed: hutvā iti atthaḥ evam muditā pubbabhāgaḥ ti ettha api bhāga saddassa drabya vutti tāya

original: tappurisassa ca uttarapadatthappadhānatāya “karuṇāpubbabhāgo”tiādinā pulliṅgena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tappurisassa ca uttara padattha ppadhāna tāya karuṇā pubbabhāga uti ādinā pulliṅgena vuttam

original: Eta-saddassa pana guṇavuttitāya guṇavisesavati vattamāno tassa liṅgavasena pariṇamatīti
analyzed: pana guṇa vutti tāya guṇa visesavati vattamāno tassa liṅga vasena pariṇamati iti

original: karuṇāmuditāpekkhāya “etā”ti itthiliṅgavasena vuttanti. Na panekato uppajjanti, kiñcarahi
analyzed: karuṇā muditā apekkhāya etā ti itthi liṅga vasena vuttanti na pana ekatas uppajjanti kiñcarahi

original: visuṃ visuṃyevāti attho. Teneva hi “karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā muditāpubbabhāgo vā”ti vikappo
analyzed: visum visuṃyeva āti attho tena iva hi karuṇā pubba bhāgaḥ vā muditā pubba bhāgaḥ vā ati vikappaḥ

original: vuttoti. Kasmā panetā dve ekato nuppajjantīti? Bhinnārammaṇattā. Karuṇā hi dukkhitasatte
analyzed: vuttaḥ ti kasmā pana itā dve ekatas nuppajjanti iti bhinna ārammaṇa ttā karuṇā hi dukkhita satte

original: ārabbha tesaṃ dukkhāpanayanakāmatāvasena pavattati, muditā sukhitasatte ārabbha tesaṃ
analyzed: ārabbha tesam dukkha apanayana kāma tā vasena pavattati muditā sukhita satte ārabbha tesam

original: sukhānumodanavasena, tasmā ubhinnampi bhinnavisayattā na ekasmiṃ citte uppatti sambhavatīti.
analyzed: sukha anumodana vasena tasmai bhinna visaya ttā na ekasmin citte uppatti sambhavati iti

original: Micchākammantādīhīti ādi-saddena micchāvācāmicchājīvānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sammākammantādīni
analyzed: micchā kammanta ādīhi iti ādi saddena micchā vācām icchājīvānam gahaṇam sammā kammanta ādīni

original: paripūrentīti sammākammantasammāvācāsammāājīvāni paripūrenti. Ko viratīti tīsu ekā
analyzed: paripūrenti iti sammā kammanta sammāvācā sammāājīvāni paripūrenti kaḥ virati iti tīsu ekā

analyzed: pūrentī tatiyā virati uppajjati iti attho karuṇā muditāhi saha na uppajjanti tāsam

original: paññattārammaṇattā, viratiyā ca ekantaparittārammaṇattā. Aññamaññena ca na uppajjanti

analyzed: aññam aññassa api bhinna visaya ttā micchā kammanta ādīnam hi ārammaṇān eva yathākkamam sammā kammanta ādīnam

original: ārammaṇāni tato viratibhāvato. Etesūti imesu pañcasu.
analyzed: ārammaṇāni tatas virati bhāvataḥ etesu iti imesu pañcasu

original: 68. Viratīnampi saṅgahaṇatthaṃ “karuṇāmuditādīsū”ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ

analyzed: kim pana ittha kāraṇam catūsu brahmavihāresu dve idha niddiṭṭhā na itarā ti

analyzed: satthā abyāpādena mettā gahitā tassa iva hita ākāra pavatti kāle mettā bhāva upagamanato

original: Teneva hesa “mettā mettāyanā”tiādinā niddiṭṭho. Tatramajjhattatāya upekkhā gahitā

original: duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa purisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ, pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ
analyzed: duṭṭhitam purisam disvā bhūmiyam ṭhitassa purisassa jaṅgha calanam pisāca ādibhāyitabbam

original: disvā ūrupatthambhoti evamādi viya daṭṭhabbā. Soti so yathāvuttalakkhaṇādiko phasso.
analyzed: disvā ūru patthambhaḥ ti evamādi viya daṭṭhabbā sā ti saḥ yathāvutta lakkhaṇa ādiko phasso

original: Sundaranti sukhavedanāsampayuttattā pasatthaṃ. Manoti viññāṇaṃ. Sumanassa bhāvoti
analyzed: sundaranti sukha vedanā sampayutta ttā pasattham manoti viññāṇam su manassa bhāvaḥ ti

original: sumanasaṅkhātassa viññāṇassa bhāvo. Yvāyaṃ saddappavattinibandhano attho, so somanassaṃ.
analyzed: sumana saṅkhātassa viññāṇassa bhāvaḥ yvā ayam sadda ppavatti nibandhanaḥ attho so somanassaṃ

original: Somanassavedanāsampayuttattā hi sumana-saddo tasmiṃ viññāṇe pavattati. Vedena anubhavanākārena
analyzed: somanassa vedanā sampayutta ttā hi sumana saddaḥ tasmim viññāṇe pavattati vedena anubhavana ākārena

original: ayitaṃ pavattaṃ vedayitaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇamassāti vedayitalakkhaṇā. Iṭṭhassa iṭṭhākāratova
analyzed: pavattam vedayitam tam lakkhaṇam assa ati vedayita lakkhaṇā iṭṭhassa iṭṭha ākārataḥ va

original: anubhavanaṃ kiccamassāti iṭṭhākārānubhavanarasā. Sā hi sabhāvato iṭṭhamārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: anubhavanam kiccam assa ati iṭṭha ākāra anubhavana rasā sā hi sabhāvataḥ iṭṭham ārammaṇam

original: iṭṭhavasena, itarañca iṭṭhākāreneva anubhavati, tattha iṭṭhākārānubhavanaṃ kusalākusalacittasampayuttavedanāya
analyzed: iṭṭha vasena itarat ca iṭṭha ākārena iva anubhavati tattha iṭṭha ākāra anubhavanam kusala akusala citta sampayutta vedanāya

original: labbhati tassā aniṭṭhassapi kappanāvasena iṭṭhākārena gahaṇato, sabhāvato pana iṭṭhānubhavanaṃ
analyzed: labbhati tassā aniṭṭhassa api kappanā vasena iṭṭha ākārena gahaṇato sabhāvataḥ pana iṭṭha anubhavanam

original: abyākatacittasampayuttāyapi labbhati tassā vipallāsaggāhābhāvato. “Rājā viya subhojanarasa”nti
analyzed: labbhati tassā

original: iminā imaṃ dīpeti – phassassa phusanamattameva hoti, saññāya sañjānanamattameva,
analyzed: iminā imam dīpeti phassassa phusana mattam eva hoti saññāya sañjānana mattam eva

original: cetanāya sañcetanāmattameva, viññāṇassa vijānanamattameva, ekaṃsato pana issaravatāya
analyzed: cetanāya sañcetanā mattam eva viññāṇassa vijānana mattam eva ekaṃsataḥ pana issaravatāya

original: sāmibhāvena vedanāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati, rājā viya sūdakārena sampāditasubhojanarasanti.
analyzed: sāmi bhāvena ārammaṇa rasam anubhavati rājā sūdakārena

original: Assādīyatīti assādo, sukhavedanā. Tenāha bhagavā – “yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhe
analyzed: assādīyati iti assādaḥ sukha vedanā tena āha bhagavā yam bhikkhave pañca upādāna khandhe

original: paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhesu
analyzed: paṭicca uppajjati sukham somanassam ayam vuccati bhikkhave pañca upādānakkhandhesu

original: assādo”ti. Cetosannissitattā cetasi bhavo assādoti cetasikaassādo, tathā paccupaṭṭhātīti
analyzed: assādo ti cetaḥ sannissita ttā cetasi bhavaḥ assādo ti cetasika assādo tathā paccupaṭṭhāti iti

original: cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānā. Passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyatīti āha “passaddhipadaṭṭhānā”ti.
analyzed: cetasika assāda paccupaṭṭhānā passaddha kāyo sukham āha passaddhi padaṭṭhānā ti

original: Idaṃ pana nirāmisasomanassavasena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam pana nirāmisa somanassa vasena veditabbam

original: Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ tameva saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti
analyzed: nīla ādi bhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanam tam eva saññam katvā jānanam lakkhaṇam etassa ati

original: sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasāti pati abhiññāyati etenāti paccābhiññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: sañjānana lakkhaṇā pacca abhiññāṇa karaṇa rasā ati abhiññāyati etena ati pacca abhiññāṇam

original: tadevetanti puna paccābhiññāṇanimittaṃ saṇṭhānādiko ākāro, tassa karaṇaraso kiccamassāti
analyzed: tat eva itanti puna pacca abhiññāṇa nimittam saṇṭhāna ādikaḥ ākāro tassa karaṇa raso kiccam assa ati

original: paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasā. Sā hi uppajjamānā pacchā sañjānanassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ saṇṭhānādikaṃ
analyzed: pacca abhiññāṇa karaṇa rasā sā hi uppajjamānā pacchā sañjānanassa kāraṇa bhūtam saṇṭhāna ādikam

original: ākāraṃ gahetvā uppajjatīti. Idañca nimittakārikāya nimittena sañjānantiyā ca sabbāya
analyzed: ākāram gahetvā uppajjati iti idam ca nimitta kārikāya nimittena sañjānantiyā ca sabbāya

original: samānasaññāya yojetabbaṃ. Nimittena sañjānantīpi hi puna aparāya saññāya ca sañjānanassa
analyzed: samāna saññāya yojetabbam nimittena sañjānanti ipi hi puna aparāya saññāya ca sañjānanassa

original: nimittaṃ karotīti. Tañca kusalākusalakiriyājavanasaññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nimittam karoti iti tat ca kusala akusala kiriyā javana saññam dhuram katvā veditabbam

original: Taṃ panetaṃ abhiññāṇakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇakaraṇamivā”ti.
analyzed: tam pana itam abhiññāṇa karaṇam katham daṭṭhabbanti āha vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇa karaṇam iva ati

original: Yathā vaḍḍhakissa dārūsu “idaṃ uddhaṃ, idaṃ adho”ti evaṃ pacchā sañjānanapaccayabhūtassa
analyzed: yathā vaḍḍhakissa dārūsu idam uddham idam adhas ti evam pacchā sañjānana paccaya bhūtassa

original: saññāṇassa karaṇaṃ, evamassā puna sañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Hatthidassakaandho
analyzed: saññāṇassa karaṇam evam assā puna sañjānana paccaya nimitta karaṇam ti vuttam hoti hatthi dassaka andho

original: viya “idameva sacca”nti saññāya yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesakaraṇato yathā…pe…
analyzed: viya idam eva saccanti saññāya yathā gahita nimitta vasena abhinivesa karaṇataḥ

original: paccupaṭṭhānā. Etena saññāya ākāraggahaṇaṃ katvā ṭhitassa diṭṭhiādīnaṃ uppajjanato
analyzed: paccupaṭṭhānāḥ etena saññāyaḥ ākāra ggahaṇam katvā ṭhitassa diṭṭhi ādīnam uppajjanataḥ

original: akusalasaññāya anurūpavasena phalapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Atha vā abhinivesakaraṇanti
analyzed: akusala saññāya anurūpa vasena phala paccupaṭṭhānam dassitam hoti atha vā abhinivesa karaṇam ti

original: “idameva sacca”nti saññābhinivesamattameva, tasmā upaparikkhābhāvena yathāgahitanimittavasena
analyzed: idam eva saccanti saññā abhinivesa mattam eva tasmai upaparikkhā bhāvena yathā gahita nimitta vasena

original: abhinivesākārena upaṭṭhānato ākārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ
analyzed: abhinivesa ākārena upaṭṭhānataḥ ākāra paccupaṭṭhānam vuttam tiṇa purisakesu miga potakānam

original: “purisā”ti uppannasaññā viya avikappasabhāvattā yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā. Ettha
analyzed: purisa ati uppanna saññā viya avikappa sabhāva ttā yathā upaṭṭhita visaya padaṭṭhānā ettha

original: ca ñāṇavippayuttasaññāya ākāraggahaṇavasena uppajjanakāle cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ saññānugatikaṃ
analyzed: ca ñāṇa vippayutta saññāyaḥ ākāra ggahaṇa vasena uppajjana kāle cittam abbohārikam saññā anugatikam

original: hoti. Ñāṇasampayutte citte pana sasambhārapathaviyā anugatā sesadhātuyo viya saññācittañca
analyzed: hoti ñāṇa sampayutte citte pana sa sambhāra pathaviyāḥ anugatā sesa dhātuyaḥ viya saññā cittam ca

original: abbohārikaṃ ñāṇānugatikaṃ hoti.
analyzed: abbohārikam ñāṇa anugatikam hoti

original: Abhisandahatīti pabandhati pavatteti, “gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti vadantī viya sampayuttadhamme
analyzed: abhisandahati iti pabandhati pavattā iti gaṇhatha gaṇhatha ati vadantī viya sampayutta dhamme

original: ārammaṇe payojeti, sakasakakicce ca paṭṭhapetīti attho. Cetayitalakkhaṇāti niddokkantassa
analyzed: ārammaṇe payojeti saka saka kicce ca paṭṭhapeti iti attho cetayita lakkhaṇā ti niddokkantassa

original: pabuddhakkhaṇe sambhamappavatti viya cetaso ussāhatāva lakkhaṇā. Atha vā “abhisandahatī”ti
analyzed: pabuddha kkhaṇe viya cetasaḥ ussāha tā va lakkhaṇā atha vā abhisandahati iti

original: vuttattā payojanalakkhaṇātveva attho. Āyūhanarasāti cetasikairiyanarasā, payogarasāti
analyzed: vutta ttā payojana lakkhaṇā tu eva attho āyūhana rasā ati cetasika airiyana rasā payoga rasā ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Kusalākusalakiriyājavanasampayuttāyayeva panetaṃ labbhati. Saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānāti
analyzed: vuttam hoti kusala akusala kiriyā javana sampayuttā yayā iva pana etam labbhati saṃvidahana paccupaṭṭhānā ti

original: “tvaṃ idaṃ karohī”ti vicārentī viya hotīti vicāraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā. Etāya hi pavattamānāya
analyzed: tvam idam karohi iti vicārentī viya hoti iti vicāraṇa paccupaṭṭhānā etāya hi pavattamānāya

original: sabbepi sampayuttadhammā yathā sakiccapasutā honti, teneva hesā sakiccaparakiccasādhikā
analyzed: sabbe pi sampayutta dhammā yathā honti tena iva ha esā sa kicca para kicca sādhikā

original: vuttā. Jeṭṭhasisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati. Tasmiñhi sajjhāyituṃ
analyzed: vuttā jeṭṭha sisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayam pi sajjhāyati tasmin hi sajjhāyitum

original: āraddhe sesasissāpi sajjhāyanti. Mahāvaḍḍhakismimpi vaḍḍhakikammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe
analyzed: āraddhe sesa sissā api sajjhāyanti mahāvaḍḍhakismim pi vaḍḍhaki kammam kātum āraddhe

original: itarepi karonti yevāti āha “jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viyā”ti. Ādi-saddena jeṭṭhantevāsikādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: itare api karonti yeva iti āha jeṭṭha sissa mahāvaḍḍhaki ādayaḥ viyā ti ādi saddena jeṭṭha antevāsika ādīnam gahaṇam

original: Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: yathāpaccayam pavattamānānam dhammānam na atthi kāci vasa vatti tā ati vasa vatti bhāva nivāraṇa attham

original: “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ. Ūhanaṃ ārammaṇassa parikappanaṃ, tasmiṃ abhiniropananti
analyzed: vitakkanam vitakko ti vuttam ūhanam ārammaṇassa parikappanam tasmim abhiniropanan ti

original: vā vuttaṃ hoti. Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiruḷhaṃ viya hoti, tasmā
analyzed: vā vuttam hoti yasmā cittam vitakka balena ārammaṇam abhiruḷham viya hoti tasmā

original: vuttaṃ “ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo”ti. Yathā hi koci gāmavāsī puriso
analyzed: vuttam ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropana lakkhaṇaḥ ti yathā hi koci gāma vāsī purisaḥ

original: rājavallabhaṃ, taṃsambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati, evaṃ
analyzed: rāja vallabham tad sambandhinam mittam vā nissāya rāja geham ārohati anupavisati evam

original: vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: vitakkam nissāya cittam ārammaṇam ārohati yadi evam katham a vitakka cittam ārammaṇam

original: ārohati, na hi dvipañcaviññāṇadutiyajjhānādike vitakko upalabbhati, yassa balena
analyzed: ārohati na hi dvi pañca viññāṇa dutiya jhāna ādike vitakkaḥ upalabbhati yassa balena

original: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati, tasmā sabhāvato bhāvanābalena tattha anuppajjanako? Saccaṃ,
analyzed: tam ārammaṇam ārohati tasmā sabhāvataḥ bhāvanā balena tattha anuppajjanakaḥ saccam

original: tampi vitakkabalena ārohati. Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko
analyzed: tam pi vitakka balena ārohati yathā hi saḥ purisaḥ paricayena tena vinā api nirāsaṅkaḥ

original: rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
analyzed: rāja geham pavisati evam paricayena vitakkena vinā api avitakka cittam ārammaṇam ārohati

original: Paricayoti cettha santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattacittabhāvanāsaṅkhāto paricayo. Vitakkassa
analyzed: paricayaḥ ti ca ittha santāne abhiṇham pavatta citta bhāvanā saṅkhāto paricayaḥ vitakkassa

original: hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhirohanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ,
analyzed: hi santāne abhiṇham pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇa abhirohanam cira paricitam

original: tena taṃ cittaṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha vattateva. Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā
analyzed: tena tam cittam kadāci vitakkena vinā api tattha vattate iva yathā tam ñāṇa sahitam hutvā

original: sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati, yathā
analyzed: sammasana vasena cira paricitam kadāci ñāṇa rahitam pi sammasana vasena pavattati yathā

original: vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena
analyzed: vā kilesa sahitam hutvā pavattam sabbaso kilesa rahitam pi paricayena kilesa vāsanā vasena

original: pavattati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: pavattati evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam

original: Atha vā dvipañcaviññāṇaṃ avitakkampi vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanassa balavatāya, dutiyajjhānādīni
analyzed: atha vā dvi pañca viññāṇam avitakkam pi vattha ārammaṇa ghaṭṭanassa balavatāya dutiya jhāna ādīni

original: ca heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimabhāvanāya balavatāya ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti. Ādito, abhimukhaṃ vā
analyzed: ca heṭṭhima heṭṭhima bhāvanāya balavatāya ārammaṇam ārohati iti āditas abhimukham vā

original: hananaṃ paharaṇamattaṃ āhananaṃ, parito, parivattetvā vā hananaṃ visesena paharaṇaṃ
analyzed: hananam paharaṇa mattam āhananam paritas vā hananam visesena paharaṇam

original: pariyāhananaṃ, taṃ kiccamassāti āhananapariyāhananaraso. Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro
analyzed: pariyāhananam tam kiccam assa ati āhanana pariyāhanana rasaḥ tathā hi tena yoga avacaraḥ

original: ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati. Ānayanaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe
analyzed: ārammaṇam vitakka āhatam vitakka pariyāhatam karoti iti vuccati ānayanam cittassa ārammaṇe

original: upanayanaṃ, ākaḍḍhanaṃ vā, tathā hutvā paccupaṭṭhānamassāti ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: upanayanam ākaḍḍhanam vā tathā hutvā paccupaṭṭhānam assa ati ānayana paccupaṭṭhānaḥ

original: Tenāti tena vicārena karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā cittaṃ ārammaṇe vicarati anuvicarati,
analyzed: tena ati tena vicārena karaṇa bhūtena hetu bhūtena vā cittam ārammaṇe vicarati anuvicarati

original: avicāracittassa pana avitakkacitte vuttānusārena pavatti veditabbā. Vicaraṇaṃ anusañcaraṇaṃ
analyzed: avicāra cittassa pana avitakka citte vutta anusārena pavatti veditabbā vicaraṇam anusañcaraṇam

original: anuparigamanaṃ. Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno javanasantāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: anuparigamanam su ayam viseso santānamhi labbhamānaḥ javana santāne pākaṭaḥ hoti iti daṭṭhabbo

original: Esa nayo sesesupi. Ārammaṇassa anumajjanaṃ anumasanaṃ parimajjanamassa lakkhaṇanti
analyzed: esa nayo sesesu pi ārammaṇassa anumajjanam anumasanam parimajjanam assa lakkhaṇanti

original: ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo. Tathā hi vicāro parimajjanahattho viya, saṃsaraṇahattho
analyzed: ārammaṇa anumajjana lakkhaṇaḥ tathā hi vicāraḥ parimajjana hatthaḥ viya saṃsaraṇa hattho

original: viyāti vuccati. Tatthāti ārammaṇe. Sahajātānaṃ anuyojanaṃ ārammaṇe anuvicaraṇasaṅkhātaanumajjanavasena
analyzed: viya ti vuccati tattha ati ārammaṇe sahajātānam anuyojanam ārammaṇe anuvicaraṇa saṅkhāta anumajjana vasena

original: veditabbaṃ. Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi. Tathāgahetabbākāro
analyzed: veditabbam dhammānam hi sabhāva vinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi tathāgahetabba ākāraḥ

original: bodhaneyyajanānurodhena paramatthato ekasabhāvopi sabhāvadhammo pariyāyavacanehi
analyzed: bodhaneyya jana anurodhena paramatthataḥ eka sabhāvaḥ api sabhāva dhammaḥ pariyāya vacanehi

original: visayasamāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati. Evañhi so suṭṭhu pakāsito hotīti.
analyzed: visaya samāropita rūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati evañhi so suṭṭhu pakāsito hoti iti

original: Anupabandhapaccupaṭṭhānoti ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavattipaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: an upabandha paccupaṭṭhāno ti ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavatti paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Tathā hi so anusandhānatāti niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ anusandhāna tā ati niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: Ettha ca vicārato oḷārikaṭṭhena tasseva pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena paṭhamaghaṇṭābhiravo viya
analyzed: ettha ca vicārataḥ oḷārika ṭṭhena tassa iva pubbaṅgama ṭṭhena paṭhama ghaṇṭā abhiravaḥ viya

original: cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko, anuravo viya anusañcaraṇaṃ vicāro. Yathā hi ghaṇṭābhighātajo

analyzed: alagga bhāvaḥ ārammaṇam nissāya pavattantassa api tattha anāsatta tā tena āha kamala dale

analyzed: karoti iti karuṇā kim karoti kesam kim nimittan ti āha para dukkhe sati sādhūnam hadaya kampanam ti

original: Kampananti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa asahanākārena cittassa aññathattaṃ, tadidaṃ
analyzed: ca paresam dukkham disvā tassa a sahana ākārena cittassa aññathattam tat idam

original: sappurisānaṃyeva hotīti āha “sādhūna”nti. Sappurisā hi attahitaparahitasādhanena
analyzed: āha sappurisāḥ hi atta hita para hita sādhanena

original: “sādhū”ti vuccanti. “Kiṇātī”ti imassa atthamāha “vināsetī”ti, adassanaṃ gameti apanetīti
analyzed: sādhu iti vuccanti kiṇāti iti imassa attham āha vināseti iti adassanam gameti apaneti iti

original: attho. Tenāha “paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā”ti. Paresaṃ dukkhassa apanayanaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ tena āha para dukkha apanayana ākāra ppavatti lakkhaṇā ti paresam dukkhassa apanayanam

original: hotu vā, mā vā, so paradukkhāpanayanākāro, tathāpavattilakkhaṇāti para…pe… lakkhaṇā.
analyzed: hotu vā mā vā so para dukkha apanayana ākāraḥ tathā pavatti lakkhaṇā ati para pe lakkhaṇā

original: Apanetukāmatāya paresaṃ dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ paradukkhāsahanaṃ. Na vihiṃsā
analyzed: apanetu kāma tāya paresam dukkhassa asahanam an adhivāsanam para dukkha a sahanam na vihiṃsā

original: avihiṃsā, sattānaṃ aviheṭhanaṃ, taṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti, vihiṃsāya vā paṭipakkhabhāvena
analyzed: avihiṃsā sattānam a viheṭhanam tam paccupaṭṭhāpeti vihiṃsāya vā paṭipakkha bhāvena

original: paccupaṭṭhātīti avihiṃsāpaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: paccupaṭṭhāti iti avihiṃsā paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Pamodanalakkhaṇāti parasampattiyā pamodanalakkhaṇā. Anissāyanarasāti issāyanassa
analyzed: pamodana lakkhaṇā ati para sampattiyā pamodana lakkhaṇā a nissāyana rasā ati issāyanassa

original: usūyanassa paṭipakkhabhāvakiccā. Pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu ca aramaṇaṃ
analyzed: usūyanassa paṭipakkha bhāva kiccā panta senāsanesu adhi kusala dhammesu ca aramaṇam

original: arati. Sā atthato issādhikaṃ domanassasahagataṃ, thinamiddhādhikañca uddhaccaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: arati sā atthataḥ issā adhikam domanassa sahagatam thinam iddha adhikam ca uddhaccam tattha

original: purimaṃ parasampattivisayaṃ, dutiyaṃ pantasenāsanādivisayanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aratiyā
analyzed: purimam para sampatti visayam dutiyam daṭṭhabbam aratiyā

original: vihananākārena paccupaṭṭhāti, tassā vighātaṃ vā vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: vihanana ākārena paccupaṭṭhāti tassāḥ vighātam vā vūpasamam paccupaṭṭhāpeti iti arati vighāta paccupaṭṭhānā

original: “Aniyate icchantī”ti iminā cetasikantarabhāvena icchantīti dasseti.
analyzed: aniyate icchanti iti iminā cetasika antara bhāvena icchanti iti dasseti

original: Kāyaduccaritatoti vatthuvītikkamasaṅkhātaduccaritato. Kāyaduccaritādivatthūnanti
analyzed: kāya duccaritato ti

original: parapāṇaparadhanaparaitthiādīnaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnamālambaṇabhūtānameva vatthūnaṃ.
analyzed: para pāṇa para dhana para aitthi ādīnam kāya duccarita ādīnam ālambaṇa bhūtānam eva

original: Avītikkamalakkhaṇāti amaddanalakkhaṇā. Kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanakiriyāpadesena
analyzed: avītikkama lakkhaṇā ati a maddana lakkhaṇā kāya duccarita ādi vatthutaḥ saṅkocana kiriyā apadesena

original: kāyaduccaritāditoyeva saṅkocanakiriyā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno
analyzed: kāya duccarita ādi toyā iva saṅkocana kiriyā vuttā iti daṭṭhabbam na hi viratiyaḥ duccarita vatthuno

original: akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti, atha kho duccaritasseva, viratīnañca soraccavasena
analyzed: akiriya paccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti atha kho duccaritassa iva viratīnam ca soracca vasena

original: saṅkocanaṃ, akiriyā ca hirottappānaṃ jigucchādivasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Saddhā…pe…
analyzed: saṅkocanam akiriyā ca jigucchā ādi vasena ati ayam etesam visesaḥ saddhā pe

original: padaṭṭhānāti ettha saddhādayo sabbeva dhammā kāyasucaritādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāti eke.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānā ti ettha saddhā ādayaḥ sabbe eva dhammā kāya su carita ādīnam padaṭṭhānā ati eke

original: Apare pana “kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ saddahantassa kāyaduccaritādiakaraṇato, hirottappasampannassa
analyzed: apare pana kammam kamma phalam saddahantassa kāya duccarita ādi akaraṇataḥ hiraḥ uttappa sampannassa

original: musāvādādiakathanato, appicchasantuṭṭhīsallekhaguṇasamannāgatassa micchājīvavivajjanato
analyzed: musāvāda ādi a kathanataḥ appiccha santuṭṭhī sallekha guṇa samannāgatassa micchājīva vivajjanato

original: ca saddhādayo tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ yathākkamena padaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino.
analyzed: ca saddhā ādayaḥ tiṇṇam dhammānam yathākkamena padaṭṭhānā ti vadanti keci iti abhayagiri vāsino

original: Imāsūti imāsu tīsu viratīsu. Ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti aññaṃ ekaṃ catutthaniyataviratimicchanti.
analyzed: imāsu uti imāsu tīsu viratīsu ekekam niyatam viratim icchanti iti aññam ekam catuttha niyata viratim icchanti

original: Atha vā niddhāraṇatthe bhummavasena imāsaṃ antare ekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti
analyzed: atha vā niddhāraṇa atthe bhumma vasena imāsam antare ekam niyatam viratim icchanti iti

original: attho. Ubhayathāpi pana tesaṃ icchā na yujjati aparāya viratiyā dhammasenāpatināpi
analyzed: atthaḥ ubhayathā api pana tesam icchā na yujjati aparāya viratiyā dhamma senāpatinā api

original: adesitattā, visayassa ca sadā sannihitattābhāvena niyatāya eva ekissā abhāvato. Teneva
analyzed: adesita ttā visayassa ca sadā sannihita ttā abhāvena niyatāya eva ekissā abhāvato tena iva

original: hi abhayagirivāsinoyeva ca keci imāsaṃ tividhattaṃ aniyatattameva ca icchanti. Vuttañhi tehi –
analyzed: hi ca keci imāsam tividha ttam ca icchanti vuttam hi tehi

original: “Karuṇāmuditā sammāvācākammantaājivā;
analyzed: karuṇā muditā

original: Yebhuyyato aniyatā, honti gocarabhedato”ti. –
analyzed: aniyatāḥ honti

original: Ettha pana “yebhuyyato”ti vacanaṃ lokuttaracittesu sabbadā ekatoyeva ca labbhamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ettha pana yebhuyyatas iti vacanam lokuttara cittesu sabbadā ekatoyā iva ca labbhamāna tam sandhāya vuttam

original: Dutiyacittena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti sambandho. Yathā cittaṃ, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpīti
analyzed: dutiya cittena sampayogam gacchanti iti sambandhaḥ yathā cittam evam tad sampayutta dhammā api iti

original: dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti āha “sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso”ti. Tathāti yathā
analyzed: dutiye sa saṅkhārāḥ evā iti āha tathā ati yathā

original: tatiye, tathā catutthepi pītiyā sukhapadaṭṭhānattā. Sukhassa cettha abhāvato āha
analyzed: tatiye tathā catutthe pi pītiyā sukha padaṭṭhāna ttā sukhassa ca ittha abhāvataḥ āha

original: “ṭhapetvā pīti”nti. Nanu ca “karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagate na sambhavantī”ti vadanti,
analyzed: ṭhapetvā nanu ca karuṇā muditāḥ upekkhā sahagate na sambhavanti iti vadanti

original: tasmā yathā pītiyā, evaṃ tāsampi paṭikkhepo kātabboti? Na kātabbo, appanāpattito
analyzed: tasmā yathā pītiyā evam tāsam pi paṭikkhepaḥ kātabbaḥ iti na kātabbaḥ appanā āpattito

original: pubbe karuṇāmuditānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānampi sambhavato. Karuṇāmuditābhāvanākāle hi
analyzed: pubbe karuṇā muditānam upekkhā sahagatānam pi sambhavataḥ karuṇā muditā bhāvanā kāle hi

original: appanāvīthito pubbe upekkhāsahagatacittenāpi parikammaṃ hoti, appanāvīthiyaṃ pana
analyzed: appanā vīthitaḥ pubbe upekkhā sahagata cittena api parikammam hoti appanā vīthiyam pana

original: somanassasahagatacitteneva ekāvajjanavīthiyā vedanāparivattanābhāvato, tasmā pubbabhāgavaseneva
analyzed: somanassa sahagata cittena iva eka āvajjana vīthiyā vedanā parivattana abhāvato tasmā pubba bhāga vasena iva

original: karuṇāmuditānampi upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavo hotīti ācariyā. Apare pana sabbadāpi
analyzed: karuṇā muditānam pi upekkhā sahagatesu sambhavaḥ hoti iti ācariyāḥ apare pana sabbadā api

original: tāsaṃ upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavaṃ na icchanti. “Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantī”ti
analyzed: tāsam upekkhā sahagatesu sambhavam na icchanti avasesā pañcamena sampayogam gacchanti iti

original: avisesena vuttattā idāni visesadassanatthamāha “somanassaṭṭhāne cā”tiādi.
analyzed: avisesena vutta ttā idāni visesa dassana attham āha somanassa ṭṭhāne ca atiādi

original: 81. Karuṇāmuditādayoti karuṇāmuditā ceva viratittayañca. Tenāha “pañcā”ti.
analyzed: karuṇā muditā ādayaḥ iti karuṇā muditā ca iva tena āha pañca ati

original: Evaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayutte dassetvā idāni rūpāvacarakusalacittasampayuttadhamme
analyzed: evam kāmāvacara kusala citta sampayutte dassetvā idāni rūpāvacara kusala citta sampayutta dhamme

original: dassetuṃ “avasesesu panā”tiādimāha. Tattha ṭhapetvā viratittayanti viratittayaṃ vajjetvā.
analyzed: dassetum avasesesu pana ati ādim āha tattha ṭhapetvā viratittayan ti viratittayam vajjetvā

original: Kasmā panettha viratittayaṃ pariccattanti? Vuccate – suvisuddhakāyakammādikassa cittasamādhānavasena
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha virati ttayam pariccattanti vuccate su visuddha kāya kamma ādikassa citta samādhāna vasena

original: rūpārūpāvacarakusalappavatti, na kāyakammādīnaṃ sodhanavasena, nāpi duccaritadurājīvānaṃ
analyzed: rūpa arūpāvacara kusala ppavatti na kāya kamma ādīnam sodhana vasena na api duccarita durājīvānam

original: samucchindanavasena. Tathā hi nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ avatthattayaṃ hoti vītikkamāvatthā
analyzed: samucchindana vasena tathā hi nīvaraṇa ādi dhammānam avattha ttayam hoti vītikkama avatthā

original: pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā anusayāvatthāti. Tattha vītikkamāvatthāya paṭipakkhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhāna avatthā anusaya avatthā ti tattha vītikkama avatthāya paṭipakkham kāmāvacara kusalam

original: pariyuṭṭhānāvatthāya rūpārūpāvacaraṃ, anusayāvatthāya lokuttarakusalaṃ. Duccaritadurājīvānaṃ
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhāna avatthāya rūpa arūpāvacaram anusaya avatthāya lokuttara kusalam duccarita durājīvānam

original: pana ṭhapetvā vītikkamāvatthaṃ, anusayāvatthañca vītikkamāvatthāya visuṃ pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā
analyzed: pana ṭhapetvā vītikkamā vattham anusayā vattham ca vītikkamā vatthāya visum pariyuṭṭhāna avatthā

original: na upalabbhati. Yassā vipaccanīkaṃ rūpārūpāvacarakusalaṃ siyā, tasmā taṃ neva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
analyzed: na upalabbhati yassā vipaccanīkam rūpa arūpāvacara kusalam siyā tasmai tam na iva kāmāvacara kusalam

original: viya tesaṃ vītikkamāvatthaṃ sodheti, na ca lokuttaraṃ viya anusayāvatthaṃ samucchindati,
analyzed: viya tesam vītikkama avattham sodheti na ca lokuttaram viya anusaya avattham samucchindati

original: paṭipassambheti vā. Sīlavisuddhiyaṃ sīlasodhanavasena kāmāvacarakusaleneva vigatavītikkamassa
analyzed: paṭipassambheti vā sīla visuddhiyam sīla sodhana vasena kāmāvacara kusalena iva vigata vītikkamassa

original: parisuddhakāyakammādikassa yogino cittasamādhānavasena pavattatīti mahaggatacittuppāde
analyzed: parisuddha kāya kamma ādikassa yogino citta samādhāna vasena pavattati iti mahaggata cittuppāde

original: viratīnaṃ asambhavoyeva. Imameva hi atthaṃ sādhetuṃ “viratiyo panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: viratīnam imam eva hi attham sādhetum āraddham

original: Tettiṃsa vā karuṇādijhānavasena pavattanakāle. Tatoti tato tatiye vuttacetasikato.
analyzed: tettiṃsa vā karuṇā ādi jhāna vasena pavattana kāle tatoti tato tatiye vutta cetasikato

original: Karuṇāmuditānaṃ appanāpattānamekantasomanassasahagatattā āha “pañcamena…pe… karuṇāmuditāvajjā”ti.
analyzed: karuṇā muditānam appanā pattānam ekanta somanassa sahagata ttā āha

original: Rūpāvacarapañcame vuttanayenāti tiṃsevāti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ rūpāvacarato ko visesoti
analyzed: rūpāvacara pañcame vutta nayena ati tiṃsā iva ati adhippāyaḥ yadi evam rūpāvacarato kaḥ viseso ti

original: āha “arūpāvacarabhāvovettha viseso”ti, pañcame rūpasaññābhāvato rūpāvacarabhāvo,
analyzed: āha viseso ti pañcame rūpa saññā bhāvato rūpāvacara bhāvo

original: idha pana rūpasaññāsamatikkamena pattabbattā arūpāvacarabhāvoti ayamevassa tato visesoti attho.
analyzed: idha pana rūpa saññā samatikkamena pattabba ttā arūpāvacara bhāvo ti ayam eva assa tatas visesaḥ ti attho

original: Paṭhamajjhāniketi paṭhamajjhānavati. Maggacitteti catubbidhepi maggañāṇe. Dutiyajjhānikādibhedeti
analyzed: paṭhama jhānikā iti paṭhama jhāna vati magga citta iti catubbidhe api magga ñāṇe dutiya jhānika ādi bhede iti

original: dutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānike. Vuttanayenāti “dutiyena vitakkavajjā”tiādinā
analyzed: dutiya tatiya catuttha pañcama jhānike vutta nayena ati dutiyena vitakkavat jāti ādinā

original: vuttanayena. Kiṃ avisesenāti ce, noti āha “karuṇāmuditāna”ntiādi. Maggadhammesu pādakajjhānādivasena
analyzed: vutta nayena kim avisesena ati ce no ti āha karuṇā mudita ananti ādi magga dhammesu pādaka jjhāna ādi vasena

original: kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā, na pana virativiraho, kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchinnavaseneva
analyzed: kadāci sammā saṅkappa virahaḥ siyā na pana virati virahaḥ kāya duccarita ādīnam samucchinna vasena iva

original: ariyamaggassa pavattanatoti āha “niyataviratibhāvo”ti. Lokuttarabhāvoti chabbisuddhiparamparāya
analyzed: ariya maggassa pavattanato ti āha niyata virati bhāvaḥ ti lokuttara bhāvaḥ ti chabbi suddhi paramparāya

original: pattabbattā lokato uttaraṇabhāvo.
analyzed: pattabba ttā lokataḥ uttaraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: Evaṃ kusalacetasikānaṃ sampayogavacanatthalakkhaṇādīni dassetvā idāni akusalacetasikāni
analyzed: evam kusala cetasikānam sampayoga vacana ttha lakkhaṇa ādīni dassetvā idāni akusala cetasikāni

original: dassetuṃ “akusalā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Cha yevāpanakāti kiñcāpi paṭhame aniyatayevāpanakā
analyzed: dassetum akusalā pana ati ādi āraddham cha yevāpanakā ati kiñca api paṭhame aniyata yevāpanakā

original: na labbhanti, akusalesu pana labbhamānakayevāpanadhamme ekattha dassetuṃ tesampi
analyzed: na labbhanti akusalesu pana labbhamāna kayevāpana dhamme ekattha dassetum tesam pi

original: idheva vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca katvā upari dhammānaṃ uddesānantaraṃ “evaṃ yevāpanā”tiādi
analyzed: idha iva vacanam daṭṭhabbam evam ca katvā upari dhammānam uddesa anantaram evam yevāpana atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Vicikicchāsahagate chandādhimokkhānaṃ, uddhaccasahagate chandassa ca abhāvato
analyzed: vuttam vicikicchā sahagate chanda adhimokkhānam uddhacca sahagate chandassa ca abhāvato

original: vuttaṃ “paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesū”ti.
analyzed: vuttam paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesu iti

original: 82. Niddiṭṭhāti nissesena dassitā. Hatā vihatā viddhastā pāpā apāyādidukkhapāpanato
analyzed: niddiṭṭhā ti nissesena dassitā hatā vihatā viddhastā pāpā apāya ādi dukkha pāpanato

original: “pāpā”ti saṅkhātā akusaladhammā yena so bhagavā hatapāpo, tena. Lābho alābho, yaso
analyzed: pāpā ati saṅkhātāḥ akusala dhammāḥ yena saḥ bhagavā hata pāpo tena lābhaḥ alābhaḥ

original: ayaso, nindā pasaṃsā, sukhaṃ dukkhanti imesu aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu akampanaṭṭhena
analyzed: ayasaḥ nindā pasaṃsā sukham dukkhanti imesu aṭṭhasu loka dhammesu a kampana ṭṭhena

original: tādinā sammāsambuddhena. So hi lābhādīsu yādiso, alābhādīsupi tādisoyevāti “tādī”ti vuccati.
analyzed: tādinā sammāsambuddhena saḥ hi lābha ādīsu yādisaḥ alābha ādīsu pi tādisaḥ yeva ati tādī iti vuccati

original: Na hirīyatīti na lajjati. Ahirikoti puggalo dhammasamūho vā. “Ahirikka”nti vattabbe
analyzed: na hirīyati iti na lajjati ahirikaḥ ti puggalaḥ dhamma samūhaḥ vā ahirikkam ti vattabbe

original: ekassa ka-kārassa lopaṃ katvā “ahirika”nti vuttaṃ. Na ottappanti ottappassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
analyzed: ekassa kakārassa lopam katvā ahirikanti vuttam na ottappanti ottappassa paṭipakkha bhūtam

original: dhammamāha. Ajigucchanaṃ ahīḷanaṃ. Alajjanaṃ avilā. Ajigucchanalakkhaṇanti sabhāvavasena
analyzed: dhammam āha a jigucchanam a hīḷanam a lajjanam a vilā a jigucchana lakkhaṇanti sabhāva vasena

original: vuttaṃ, alajjanalakkhaṇanti kusalābyākatassa sādhāraṇāya hiriyā paṭipakkhavasena.
analyzed: vuttam alajjana lakkhaṇam ti kusala abyākatassa sādhāraṇāya hiriyā paṭipakkha vasena

original: Tehevāti kāyaduccaritādīhi eva. Asārajjanaṃ nibbhayatā. Anuttāso asambhamo. Rasādīni
analyzed: tehi iva ati kāya duccarita ādīhi eva rasa ādīni

original: hiriottappesu vuttapaṭipakkhavasena gahetabbānīti na tāni idha vuttāni. Tesu hi alajjanākārena
analyzed: hiri ottappesu vutta paṭipakkha vasena gahetabbāni iti na tāni idha vuttāni tesu hi alajjana ākārena

original: pāpānaṃ karaṇarasaṃ ahirikaṃ. Anuttāsākārena anottappaṃ. Vuttappakāreneva pāpato
analyzed: pāpānam karaṇa rasam ahirikam an uttāsa ākārena anottappam vutta ppakārena iva pāpataḥ

original: asaṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāni. Attani, paresu ca agāravapadaṭṭhānāni. Gāmasūkarassa viya
analyzed: a saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānāni attani paresu ca agārava padaṭṭhānāni gāma sūkarassa viya

original: asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti. Salabhassa viya aggito pāpato anuttāso
analyzed: a sucitaḥ kilesa a sucitaḥ a jigucchanam ahirikena hoti salabhassa viya aggitaḥ pāpataḥ anuttāsaḥ

original: anottappena hoti. Yathāhu porāṇā –
analyzed: anottappena hoti yathā āhu porāṇā

original: “Jigucchati nāhiriko, pāpā gūthāva sūkaro;
analyzed: jigucchati nā ahirikaḥ pāpā sūkaraḥ

original: Na bhāyati anottappo, salabho viya pāvakā”ti.
analyzed: na bhāyati anottappaḥ salabhaḥ viya

original: Ettha ca yathā hiriyā balavabhāve ottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ hoti, ottappassa balavabhāve
analyzed: ettha ca yathā hiriyāḥ balava bhāve ottappam abbohārikam hoti ottappassa balava bhāve

original: hirī abbohārikā, evaṃ ahirikassa balavabhāve anottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ, anottappassa
analyzed: hirī abbohārikā evam ahirikassa balava bhāve anottappam abbohārikam anottappassa

original: balavabhāve ahirikaṃ abbohārikaṃ hotīti keci, taṃ na yujjati. Yathā hi asucinā attānaṃ
analyzed: balava bhāve ahirikam abbohārikam hoti iti keci tam na yujjati yathā hi asucinā attānam

original: makkhento, sappamukhe hatthaṃ pavesento bāladārako tattha paṭikkūlabhāvassa, ādīnavassa
analyzed: makkhentaḥ sa pamukhe hattham pavesentaḥ bāla dārako tattha paṭikkūla bhāvassa ādīnavassa

original: ca anupaparikkhanato neva jigucchati, na ca uttasati, evamevaṃ dhammasabhāvassa aññāṇato
analyzed: ca an upaparikkhanataḥ na iva jigucchati na ca uttasati evam evam dhamma sabhāvassa aññāṇato

original: moho pāpato neva jigucchati, na uttasati, tasmā taṃsampayuttacittuppāde ubhayampi balavataraṃ hotīti.
analyzed: mohaḥ pāpataḥ na iva jigucchati na uttasati tasmā tad sampayutta cittuppāde ubhayam pi balavataram hoti iti

original: Lubbhantīti abhigijjhanti, allīyantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇoti ettha
analyzed: lubbhanti iti abhigijjhanti allīyanti iti vuttam hoti ārammaṇa ggahaṇa lakkhaṇo ti ettha

original: ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ nāma “mama ida”nti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa
analyzed: ārammaṇa ggahaṇam nāma mama idam ti taṇhā abhinivesa vasena abhiniviṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa

original: avissajjanaṃ, na ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṃ. Abhisaṅgo atisayavatāya āsattiyā dummocanīyabhāvo.
analyzed: a vissajjanam na ārammaṇa karaṇa mattam abhisaṅgaḥ ati sayava tāya āsattiyāḥ dummocanīya bhāvaḥ

original: Apariccāgo avijahanaṃ. Telañjanarāgo viyāti dhovitvāpi pariccajituṃ asakkuṇeyyo telamakkhitaañjanarāgo
analyzed: a pariccāgaḥ tela añjana rāgaḥ viyāti dhovitvā api pariccajitum a sakkuṇeyyaḥ tela makkhita añjana rāgaḥ

original: viya. “Assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti vacanato vuttaṃ “assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno”ti.
analyzed: viya assāda anupassinaḥ taṇhā pavaḍḍhati iti vacanataḥ vuttam assāda dassana padaṭṭhānaḥ ti

original: Tattha assādavasena dassanaṃ assādadassanaṃ. Nanu ca assādadassanampi atthato lobhoyevāti
analyzed: tattha assāda vasena dassanam assāda dassanam nanu ca assāda dassanam pi atthataḥ

original: kathaṃ sayaṃ attano padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti? Saccaṃ, paṭhamaṃ nātibalavalobhavasena assādadassano
analyzed: katham sayam attano padaṭṭhānam hoti iti saccam paṭhamam na ati balava lobha vasena assāda dassano

original: pacchā balavalobho hotīti tassa taṃpadaṭṭhānatā vuttā. Teneva ca “taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti
analyzed: pacchā balava lobho hoti iti tassa taṃ pada ṭṭhāna tā vuttā tena iva ca taṇhā pavaḍḍhati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Apare pana “assādo nāma sukhavedanā, assādadassananti assādadiṭṭhī”ti vadanti.
analyzed: vuttam apare pana assādaḥ nāma sukha vedanā assāda dassananti assāda diṭṭhī iti vadanti

original: Sukhavedanāya vā kāraṇabhūtaṃ subhanimittaṃ assādo nāma, asubhe “subha”nti pavattā
analyzed: sukha vedanāya vā kāraṇa bhūtam subha nimittam assādaḥ nāma asubhe pavattā

original: tayo vipallāsā assādadassanaṃ nāmāti keci.
analyzed: tayaḥ vipallāsāḥ assādadassanam nāma ati keci

original: Muyhantīti na bujjhanti. Dhammasabhāvassa yāthāvato adassanaṃ cittassa andhabhāvo.
analyzed: muyhanti iti na bujjhanti dhamma sabhāvassa yāthāvataḥ adassanam cittassa andha bhāvo

original: Aññāṇaṃ ñāṇapaṭipakkho dhammo. Tattha purimalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvavasena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ
analyzed: aññāṇam ñāṇa paṭipakkhaḥ dhammo tattha purima lakkhaṇam sabhāva vasena vuttam itaram

original: paṭipakkhavasena. Atha vā aññāṇalakkhaṇoti kiccavasena vuttaṃ. So hi asampaṭivedharasoti
analyzed: paṭipakkha vasena atha vā aññāṇa lakkhaṇo ti kicca vasena vuttam so hi a sampaṭivedha rasaḥ ti

original: vutto. Dhammasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthatā asampaṭivedho. Ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanarasoti
analyzed: vuttaḥ dhamma sabhāvam paṭivijjhitum asamattha tā asampaṭivedhaḥ ārammaṇa sabhā vacchādana rasaḥ ti

original: yathā aññāṇaṃ, mohasamaṅgipuggalo vā ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na labhati, mohassa
analyzed: yathā aññāṇam moha samaṅgi puggalaḥ vā ārammaṇa sabhāvam paṭivijjhitum na labhati mohassa

original: tathā pavatti ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaṃ. Ettha ca ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathāsabhāvato jānāti,
analyzed: tathā pavatti ārammaṇa sabhāva chādanam ettha ca ñāṇam ārammaṇam yathā sabhāvataḥ jānāti

original: diṭṭhi yathāsabhāvaṃ vijahitvā ayāthāvato gaṇhāti, moho pana na kathañci vijānāti.
analyzed: yathā sabhāvam vijahitvā a yāthāvataḥ gaṇhāti mohaḥ pana na kathañci vijānāti

original: Yadi evaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇakālo kathaṃ tadā so ārammaṇaṃ jānātevāti? Tadāpi na jānāti.
analyzed: yadi evam ārammaṇa ggahaṇa kālo katham tadā saḥ ārammaṇam jānātā iva ati tadā api na jānāti

original: Yathā pana phassādayo phusanākārādimattavaseneva ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanti, na jānanavasena,
analyzed: yathā pana phassa ādayaḥ phusana ākāra ādimatta vasena iva ārammaṇam gaṇhanti na jānana vasena

original: evamayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppajjamāno paṭicchādanākāreneva gaṇhāti, na pana jānanākārenāti.
analyzed: evam ayam ārammaṇam gahetvā uppajjamānaḥ paṭicchādana ākārena iva gaṇhāti na pana jānana ākārena ati

original: Yassa uppajjati, tassa andhakaraṇaṃ andhakāro, tathā paccupaṭṭhāti, taṃ vā paccupaṭṭhāpetīti
analyzed: yassa uppajjati tassa andha karaṇam andhakāraḥ tathā paccupaṭṭhāti tam vā paccupaṭṭhāpeti iti

original: andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: andhakāra paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Micchā passantīti dhammasabhāvassa viparītavasena aniccādiṃ niccādivasena passanti.
analyzed: micchā passanti iti dhamma sabhāvassa viparīta vasena anicca ādim nicca ādi vasena passanti

original: Ayoniso abhiniveso uppathābhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato niccādito
analyzed: ayonisaḥ abhinivesaḥ uppatha abhinivesaḥ dhamma sabhāvam atikkamitvā paratas nicca āditas

original: vā parappaccayato vā āmasanaṃ parāmāso, viparītaggāhavasena “idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti
analyzed: vā para paccayataḥ vā āmasanam parāmāsaḥ viparīta ggāha vasena idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: abhinivesanaṃ micchābhiniveso. Ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādīti ādi-saddena saddhammaasotukāmatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: abhinivesanam micchā abhinivesaḥ ariyānam a dassana kāma tā ādi iti ādi saddena saddhamma a sotu kāma tā ādim saṅgaṇhāti

original: Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttadhammā vā, so dhammo uddhaccaṃ.
analyzed: yassa dhammassa vasena uddhatam hoti cittam tad sampayutta dhammā vā saḥ dhammo uddhaccam

original: Tenāha “uddhatabhāvo”ti. Avūpasamoti asannisinnabhāvo. Vātā…pe… paṭākā viyāti yathā
analyzed: tena āha uddhata bhāvaḥ iti asannisinna bhāvaḥ vātāpe paṭākā viyāti yathā

original: paṭākā yottabalena dhajayaṭṭhiṃ amuñcantīpi vātābhighātena ettha avaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
analyzed: paṭākā vāta abhighātena ettha avaṭṭhātum na sakkoti

original: evamidampi adhimokkhabalena ārammaṇaṃ amuñcantampi ayonisomanasikārabalena ārammaṇe
analyzed: evam idam pi adhimokkha balena ārammaṇam a muñcantam pi a yoniso manasikāra balena ārammaṇe

original: acalaṃ avaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkotīti vātappahāreneva caladhajapaṭākā viya anavaṭṭhānakiccaṃ.

original: Bhantattaṃ paribbhamanākāro. Uddhaccassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā, aññesañca akusalasādhāraṇānaṃ
analyzed: bhantattam paribbhamana ākāraḥ uddhaccassa sabba akusala sādhāraṇa ttā aññesam ca akusala sādhāraṇānam

original: visuṃ padaṭṭhānassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ “ayoniso…pe… padaṭṭhāna”nti. Yenākārena
analyzed: visum padaṭṭhānassa labbhamāna ttā vuttam ayonisope padaṭṭhānam ti yena ākārena

original: vā manasikaroto uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, tenākārena manasikaraṇaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro.
analyzed: vā manasikarotaḥ uddhaccam uppajjati tena ākārena manasikaraṇam idha a yoniso manasikāro

original: Atha vā uddhaccanimittassa ārammaṇassa manasikaraṇaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro.
analyzed: atha vā uddhacca nimittassa ārammaṇassa manasikaraṇam a yoniso manasikāro

original: Maññatīti abhimaññati, ahaṃkāraṃ karotīti attho. Seyyādivasena uccato namanaṃ uṇṇati.
analyzed: maññati iti abhimaññati ahaṃkāram karoti iti seyyā ādi vasena uccatas namanam

original: Sampaggaharasoti uṇṇativaseneva attano, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā sampaggaṇhanakicco,
analyzed: sampaggaha rasaḥ ti uṇṇati vasena iva attanaḥ sampayutta dhammānam vā sampaggaṇhana kicco

original: na vīriyaṃ viya taṃtaṃkiccasādhanena. Abhibhussahanavasena hīnassa attānaṃ nīcaṃ

original: katvā gahaṇampi paggaṇhanavasenevāti veditabbaṃ. Ketu…pe… paccupaṭṭhānoti ettha ketu

analyzed: vuccati idha pana tam ketu bhāva saṅkhātam

original: ketuṃ kamyatīti ketukamyaṃ, yassa dhammassa vasena taṃ ketukamyaṃ, so ketukamyatā.
analyzed: ketum kamyati iti ketu kamyam yassa dhammassa vasena tam ketu kamyam sā u ketu kamya tā

analyzed: ahanti pavattanataḥ mānassa diṭṭhi sadisī pavattati iti diṭṭhi mānāḥ eka cittuppāde na

original: pavattanti, dve kesarasīhā viya ekaguhāyaṃ, tasmā māno diṭṭhivippayuttacitte sabbadā

original: anuppajjamānopi diṭṭhisampayuttacitte niyamena anuppajjanato diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno.

original: Māno dhammasamūhaggahaṇe balavaṃ hutvā attukkaṃsanabhāvena pavattati, diṭṭhi ekekadhammampi
analyzed: mānaḥ dhamma samūha ggahaṇe balavam hutvā attukkaṃsana bhāvena pavattati diṭṭhi ekeka dhammam pi

original: diṭṭhīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
analyzed: diṭṭhi iti ayam etesam visesaḥ

original: Issatīti usūyati. Tatthevāti parasampattīsuyeva. Issāvasena parasampattīsu atussanato vuttaṃ “anabhiratirasā”ti. Tenevetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: issati iti usūyati tattha iva ati para sampattīsu yeva issā vasena para sampattīsu atussanataḥ vuttam an abhirati rasā ati tena iva etam vuccati

original: “Issānalasikhā yesaṃ, hadaye jalatīdha te;
analyzed: issā anala sikhā hadaye jalati idha te

original: Neva vindanti pāmojjaṃ, sambuddhādīhi sevita”nti.
analyzed: na iva vindanti pāmojjam sambuddha ādīhi

original: Maccharayogena maccharini pavattaṃ macchara-saddaṃ gahetvā āha “maccharabhāvo macchariya”nti.
analyzed: mad śara yogena mad śarini pavattam mad śara saddam gahetvā āha mad śara bhāvaḥ

original: Niruttinayena pana “mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu, mayhaṃva hotū”ti macchariyanti
analyzed: nirutti nayena pana mā idam acchariyam aññesam hotu mayham va hotu uti macchariyanti

original: porāṇā. Niguhaṇaṃ attano sampattiyā paresaṃ adassanaṃ. Saṅkocanaṃ attasampattīnaṃ
analyzed: porāṇāḥ niguhaṇam attanaḥ sampattiyā paresam a dassanam saṅkocanam atta sampattīnam

original: parehi sādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇassa aruccanākārena paṭikuṭanaṃ. “Mā idaṃ parassa hotū”ti

original: paresu paṭihananavasena attasantakassa ārammaṇakaraṇato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesveva

original: Parehi sādhāraṇabhāve paṭihananavasena pana taṃ ārabbha pavattanato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesu
analyzed: parehi sādhāraṇa bhāve paṭihanana vasena pana tam ārabbha pavattanataḥ maccheram paṭigha cittesu

original: uppajjatīti yuttaṃ. Attasampattīti āvāsādisampatti.
analyzed: uppajjati iti yuttam atta sampatti iti āvāsa ādi sampatti

original: Kucchitaṃ katanti ettha katampi akatampi garahitabbattā kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: kucchitam katanti ettha katam pi a katam pi garahitabbattā kucchitam katam nāma hoti

original: Evañhi vattāro honti “yaṃ mayā na kataṃ, taṃ kukata”nti. Tathā hi vakkhati “katākatānusocanarasa”nti.
analyzed: evam hi vattāraḥ honti yam mayā na katam tam kukatanti tathā hi vakkhati kata akata anusocana rasanti

original: Evaṃ katākataṃ duccaritaṃ sucaritampi kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma. Sucaritampi hi garahantassa
analyzed: evam kata akatam duccaritam su caritam pi kucchitam katam nāma su caritam pi hi gara hantassa

original: kucchitaṃ katanti hoti. Yathā pana pathavīkasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ, evaṃ
analyzed: kucchitam hoti yathā pana pathavī kasiṇa ārammaṇam jhānam pathavī kasiṇam evam

original: kukataṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya idha kukatanti
analyzed: kukatam ārabbha vippaṭisāra vasena pavattam cittam idha kukatam ti

original: gahetabbaṃ. Atha vā katākataṃ ārabbha uppajjanakavippaṭisāracittaṃyeva garahitabbato
analyzed: gahetabbam atha vā kata akatam ārabbha uppajjanaka vippaṭisāra cittam yā iva garahitabbataḥ

original: “kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukata”nti vuccati. Yassa dhammassa vasena taṃ cittaṃ kukataṃ nāma
analyzed: kucchitam katam kukatanti vuccati yassa dhammassa vasena tam cittam kukatam nāma

original: hoti, so dhammo kukkuccaṃ. Tenāha “kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo”ti. Pacchā anutappanaṃ viheṭhanaṃ
analyzed: hoti so dhammo kukkuccam tena āha kukatam tassa bhāvaḥ ti pacchā anutappanam viheṭhanam

original: pacchānutāpo. Katākatānusocanaṃ katākatassa sucaritaduccaritassa anusocanaṃ, “akataṃ
analyzed: pacchā anutāpaḥ kata akata anusocanam kata akatassa su carita duccaritassa anusocanam a katam

original: vata me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā anutappanaṃ, “akataṃ mayā pubbe kalyāṇakammaṃ, ito dāni
analyzed: vata me kalyāṇa nti ādinā anutappanam a katam mayā pubbe kalyāṇa kammam itas dāni

original: paṭṭhāya karomī”ti pavattaṃ pana kusalapakkhikaṃ vīriyameva, na katākatānusocanaṃ,
analyzed: paṭṭhāya karomi iti pavattam pana kusala pakkhikam vīriyam eva na kata akata anusocanam

original: katākatākāravisiṭṭhassa sucaritaduccaritassa anusocanavasena virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ
analyzed: kata akata ākāra visiṭṭhassa su carita duccaritassa anusocana vasena virūpam paṭisaraṇam
