analyzed: vippaṭisāro kata a kata anusocanam hi a vaḍḍhi sampādanataḥ virūpam paṭisaraṇam tam parāyatta tā hetutāya

original: dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti, evaṃ kukkucce
analyzed: dāsabyam viya daṭṭhabbam yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyattaḥ hoti evam kukkucce

original: sati taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo. Na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti. Atha
analyzed: sati tad samaṅgī puggalaḥ na hi saḥ attanaḥ dhamma tāya kusale pavattitum sakkoti atha

original: vā katākatakusalākusalānusocanavasena āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī

analyzed: samāsatas ti vitthāra apekkhāya vuttam na itas pi samāsassa abhāvataḥ atisaṅkhepato

original: pana ekūnanavuti cittuppādā honti. Etesūti imesu cittuppādesu. Tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ
analyzed: pana ekūnanavuti cittuppādāḥ honti etesu iti imesu cittuppādesu tesam phassa ādīnam

original: dhammānaṃ uppattiṃ ekekaṃ uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya pavakkhāmīti
analyzed: dhammānam uppattim ekekam uddharitvā citta cetasikesu bhikkhūnam pāṭava tthāya pavakkhāmi iti

original: sambandho. Ekakanti ekekaṃ, gāthābandhavasena e-kāralopo.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ ekakam ti ekekam gāthābandha vasena ekāra lopaḥ

original: 93. Cetasikavibhāgaṃ vattukāmopi avinibbhogadhamme dassetuṃ cittena saha ekato katvā
analyzed: cetasika vibhāgam vattu kāmaḥ api avinibbhoga dhamme dassetum cittena saha ekatas katvā

original: āha “phassapañcaka”nti. Ekato uppādo etesanti ekuppādā, saha khīyantīti sahakkhayā,
analyzed: āha phassa pañcakam ti ekatas uppādaḥ etesanti eka uppādā saha khīyanti iti saha khayā

original: ekato uppajjitvā ekato nirujjhanakāti attho.
analyzed: ekatas uppajjitvā ekatas nirujjhanakā ati attho

original: 94. Sabbesveva ekavīsasatesu cittesu samupalabbhanato sabbasādhāraṇā. Kiñcāpi anantaragāthāya
analyzed: sabbesu eva ekavīsa satesu cittesu samupalabbhanato sabba sādhāraṇā kiñca api anantara gāthāya

original: cittena saha ekuppādādibhāvakathaneneva imesaṃ sabbasādhāraṇatā vuttā, tattha pana
analyzed: cittena saha eka uppāda ādi bhāva kathanena iva imesam sabba sādhāraṇa tā vuttā tattha pana

original: ekuppādādimattakathanameva icchitaṃ, na sabbasādhāraṇatā. Vuttopi vāyamattho tattha
analyzed: ekuppāda ādimatta kathanam eva icchitam na sabba sādhāraṇa tā vuttaḥ api vā ayam attho tattha

original: apākaṭattā puna pākaṭaṃ katvā idha vuttoti.
analyzed: puna pākaṭam katvā idha vuttaḥ ti

original: 95-100. Dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitacatucattālīsakāmāvacaracittesu, lokiyalokuttaravasena
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjita catu cattālīsa kāmāvacara cittesu lokiya lokuttara vasena

original: ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu cāti pañcapaññāsacittesu vitakkassa desitattā āha
analyzed: ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānika cittesu ca ati pañca paññāsa cittesu vitakkassa desita ttā āha

original: “vitakko…pe… samudīrito”ti. Vicāro pañcapaññāsasavitakkacittesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānikacittesu
analyzed: vitakka upe samudīritaḥ ti vicāro pañca paññāsasa vitakka cittesu ca iva ekādasasu dutiya jjhānika cittesu

original: cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu uppajjatīti āha “cāro…pe… jāyate”ti.
analyzed: ca ati cha saṭṭhi cittesu uppajjati iti āha ca ārope jāyata iti

original: Ekapaññāsacittesu pītīti kāyaviññāṇavajjitesu aṭṭhārasasu somanassasahagatakāmāvacaracittesu
analyzed: ekapaññāsa cittesu pīti iti kāya viññāṇa vajjitesu aṭṭhārasasu somanassa sahagata kāmāvacara cittesu

original: ceva catutthapañcamajjhānavajjitatettiṃsarūpajjhānikacittesu cāti ekapaññāsacittesu
analyzed: ca iva catuttha pañcama jhāna vajjita tettiṃsa rūpa jjhānika cittesu ca ati ekapaññāsa cittesu

original: pīti jāyati. Tesaṭṭhiyā sukhanti ekapaṇṇāsasappītikacittesu ceva ekādasasu catutthajjhānikacittesu,
analyzed: pīti jāyati ekapaṇṇāsasappītika cittesu ca iva ekādasasu catuttha jhānika cittesu

original: kusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tesaṭṭhiyā cittesu sukhaṃ jāyati. Tesaṭṭhisukhasahagatacittāni
analyzed: kusala vipāka kāya viññāṇe ca ati tesaṭṭhiyā cittesu sukham jāyati tesaṭṭhi sukha sahagata cittāni

original: ceva tīṇi ca dukkhasahagatānīti chasaṭṭhicitte vajjetvā avasesapañcapaṇṇāsacittesu
analyzed: ca iva tīṇi ca dukkha sahagatāni iti cha saṭṭhi citte vajjetvā avasesa pañcapaṇṇāsa cittesu

original: upekkhā uppajjatīti āha “upekkhā pañcapaññāsacittesū”ti. Dukkhaṃ tīsūti dvīsu paṭighacittesu
analyzed: upekkhā uppajjati iti āha upekkhā pañca paññāsa cittesu iti dukkham tīsu iti dvīsu paṭigha cittesu

original: ceva akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tīsu cittesu dukkhaṃ jāyati. Hoti…pe… somanassindriyanti
analyzed: ca iva akusala vipāka kāya viññāṇe ca ati tīsu cittesu dukkham jāyati somanassa indriya nti

original: tesaṭṭhiyā sukhasahagatacittesu ekameva kāyaviññāṇaṃ apanetvā avasesesu somanassindriyaṃ
analyzed: sukha sahagata cittesu ekam eva kāya viññāṇam apanetvā avasesesu somanassa indriyam

original: hoti. Akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇavasena ekameva dukkhindriyasahagataṃ, tathā kusalavipākakāyaviññāṇameva
analyzed: hoti akusala vipāka kāya viññāṇa vasena ekam eva dukkha indriya sahagatam tathā kusala vipāka kāya viññāṇam eva

original: sukhindriyasampayuttanti āha “dukkhindriyaṃ…pe… sukhindriya”nti.
analyzed: sukha indriya sampayuttanti āha sukha indriyaṃ pe

original: Ahetukavipākakiriyāmanodhātuvajjitesu majjhimagaṇanāya pañcādhikasataparimitesu kusalākusalavipākakiriyācittesu
analyzed: ahetuka vipāka kiriyā manaḥ dhātu vajjitesu majjhima gaṇanāya pañca adhika sata parimitesu kusala akusala vipāka kiriyā cittesu

original: vīriyaṃ desitanti āha “pañcuttara…pe… āhā”ti. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthesu satte
analyzed: vīriyam desitanti āha āha iti diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika tthesu satte

original: vineti, vigato vā nāyako imassa, visiṭṭho vā sabbalokassa nāyako sāmi, visesena vā
analyzed: vineti vigataḥ vā nāyakaḥ imassa visiṭṭhaḥ vā sabba lokassa sāmi visesena vā

original: vineyyasatte nibbānapuraṃ netīti vināyako. Samādhindriyaṃ vicikicchāvajjitavīriyasahagatacittesu
analyzed: vineyya satte nibbāna puram neti iti vināyakaḥ samādhi indriyam vicikicchā vajjita vīriya sahagata cittesu

original: vuttanti āha “catuttarasate”tiādi.
analyzed: vuttam iti āha catuttara sata itiādi

original: Aṭṭhārasa ahetukacittāni, dve ekahetukacittāni ca vajjetvā avasesaekuttarasate citte
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa ahetuka cittāni dve eka hetuka cittāni ca vajjetvā avasesa ekuttara sate citte

analyzed: chandaḥ uppajjati iti dassetum sabba ahetuka cittāni itiādi vuttam dasa viññāṇe ti kusala akusala vipāka vasena

original: dviguṇite cakkhādike pañcaviññāṇe.
analyzed: dvi guṇite cakkhu ādike pañca viññāṇe

original: 102-6. Niyatā na yevāpanakā viya kadācīti attho. Kathaṃ panete ekanavutiyā cittesveva
analyzed: niyatāḥ na viya kadāci iti attho katham pana ete ekanavutiyā cittesu eva

original: jāyantīti āha “ahetukesū”tiādi. Ekūnāsītiyāti dvādasa ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarāni,
analyzed: jāyanti iti āha ahetukesu itiādi dvādasa ñāṇa sampayutta kāmāvacarāni

original: pañcadasa rūpāvacarāni, dvādasa arūpāvacarāni, samacattālīsa lokuttaracittānīti evaṃ
analyzed: pañcadasa rūpāvacarāni dvādasa arūpāvacarāni sama cattālīsa lokuttara cittāni iti evam

original: ekūnāsītiyā tihetukacittesu. Aṭṭhavīsatiyā citteti soḷasasu kāmāvacarakusalamahākiriyāsu,
analyzed: ekūnāsītiyā ti hetuka cittesu aṭṭhavīsatiyā citta iti soḷasasu kāmāvacara kusala mahā kiriyāsu

original: dvādasasu ca lokiyacatutthajjhānacittesu cāti aṭṭhavīsaticittesu. Sāṭṭhake cattālīsavidheti
analyzed: dvādasasu ca lokiya catuttha jjhāna cittesu ca ati aṭṭhavīsati cittesu sa aṭṭhake cattālīsavidhā iti

original: aṭṭhasahite cattālīsavidhe, aṭṭhacattālīsavidheti vuttaṃ hoti. Cha yugaḷānīti kāyapassaddhicittapassaddhādīni
analyzed: aṭṭha sahite cattālīsavidhe aṭṭha cattālīsavidhā iti vuttam hoti cha yugaḷāni iti kāya passaddhi citta passaddha ādīni

original: cha yugaḷāni. Kusalābyākatā cāti kusalacittasampayogato kusalā, abyākatacittasampayogato
analyzed: kusalā abyākatā ca ati kusala citta sampayogato kusalāḥ abyākata citta sampayogato

original: abyākatāti kusalenapakāsanavidhānesu chekena satthunā pakāsitā desitāti attho.
analyzed: abyākatā ati chekena satthunā pakāsitā desitā ati attho

original: 108-111. Saṃsayoti vicikicchā. Sā hi saṃseti samantato seti, “evaṃ nu kho, no nu
analyzed: vicikicchā sā hi saṃseti samantataḥ sā iti evam nu khalu no nu

original: kho”ti parisappatīti saṃsayo. Mahante sīlakkhandhādike esati gavesatīti mahesī. Tena
analyzed: khoti parisappati iti saṃsayaḥ mahante sīla kkhandha ādike esati gavesati iti mahesī tena

original: mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. Aṭṭhasūti aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittesu. Catūsūti tesveva
analyzed: mahesinā sammāsambuddhena aṭṭhasu ati aṭṭha lobha sahagata cittesu catūsu iti tesu eva

original: diṭṭhisahagatacittesu. Diṭṭhiviyuttesu catūsūti sambandho. Dvīsvevāti dvīsu dosamūlakacittesu.
analyzed: diṭṭhi sahagata cittesu diṭṭhi viyuttesu catūsu iti sambandhaḥ dvīsu eva ati dvīsu dosa mūlaka cittesu

original: Dvīsu jāyanti no sahāti dosamūlesveva dvīsu jāyanti, saha pana na uppajjanti, usūyanakāle
analyzed: dvīsu jāyanti no saha ati dosa mūlesu eva dvīsu jāyanti saha pana na uppajjanti usūyana kāle

original: issā, maccharaṇakāle maccherantiādinā nānā hutvāva uppajjanti. Pañcasūti pañcasu
analyzed: issāḥ mad śaraṇa kāle mad cheranti ādinā nānā hutvā ava uppajjanti pañcasu iti pañcasu

original: sasaṅkhārikacittesu.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārika cittesu

original: 112. Cittassa cetasikattābhāvepi kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ gaṇanaṭṭhānato “mano”ti cittampi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cittassa cetasika ttā abhāve pi kusala akusala abyākata dhammānam gaṇana ṭṭhānataḥ manaḥ ti cittam pi vuttam

original: 114-5. Ettāvatā cetasikavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni ekekasmiṃ cittuppāde labbhamānarāsīsu
analyzed: dassetvā

original: aṅgavibhāgadassanatthaṃ “ekūnatiṃsacittesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nanu ca phassapañcamakarāsi
analyzed: aṅga vibhāga dassana ttham ekūnatiṃsa cittesu itiādi vuttam nanu ca phassa pañcama karā asi

original: sabbapaṭhamaṃ āgatā, sā kasmā na vuttāti? Sabbasādhāraṇabhāvato. Na hi so cittuppādo
analyzed: sabba paṭhamam āgatā sā kasmā na vuttā ati sabba sādhāraṇa bhāvataḥ na hi so cittuppādaḥ

original: atthi, yo phassapañcamakavinimuttoti. Ekādasa paṭhamajjhānikāni somanassasahagatāni,
analyzed: atthi yaḥ phassa pañcamaka vinimutto ti ekādasa paṭhamajjhānikāni somanassa sahagatāni

original: dvādasa sahetukakāmāvacarāni, tathā cattāri akusalāni, sukhasantīraṇahasituppādāni
analyzed: dvādasa sa hetuka kāmāvacarāni tathā cattāri akusalāni sukha santīraṇa hasita uppādāni

original: dveti ekūnatiṃsacittesu pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ pañcakarāsisaṅkhātaṃ mataṃ. Catu…pe… niddiseti
analyzed: dve iti ekūnatiṃsa cittesu pañcaṅgikam jhānam pañcaka rāsi saṅkhātam matam catupe niddiseti

original: ekādasa dutiyajjhānikāni, kusalavipākakiriyāvasena dvādasa upekkhāsahagatasahetukakāmāvacarāni,
analyzed: ekādasa dutiya jhānikāni kusala vipāka kiriyā vasena dvādasa upekkhā sahagata sa hetuka kāmāvacarāni

original: upekkhādomanassasahagatāni aṭṭha akusalāni, dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaupekkhāsahagatāni
analyzed: upekkhā domanassa sahagatāni aṭṭha akusalāni dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjita aupekkhā sahagatāni

original: cha ahetukacittāni cāti imāni sattatiṃsa cittāni yathāyogaṃ catūhi jhānaṅgehi yuttāni.
analyzed: ahetuka cittāni ca ati imāni sattatiṃsa cittāni yathāyogam catūhi jhān aṅgehi yuttāni

original: Ettha hi ekādasa dutiyajjhānikāni vicārapītisukhasamādhīhi sahagatāni, itarāni yathāyogaṃ
analyzed: ettha hi ekādasa dutiya jhānikāni vicāra pīti sukha samādhīhi sahagatāni itarāni yathāyogam

original: upekkhādomanassesu ekekena vitakkavicārasamādhīhīti catūhi sampayuttāni.
analyzed: upekkhā domanassesu ekekena vitakka vicāra samādhīhi iti catūhi sampayuttāni

original: Ekādasavidhanti ekādasavidhaṃ tatiyajjhānikacittaṃ pītisukhacittekaggatāyogato tivaṅgikamudīritaṃ.
analyzed: ekādasavidham ti ekādasavidham tatiya jhānika cittam pīti sukha citta ekagga tā yogataḥ tivaṅgikam udīritam

original: Catuttiṃsa…pe… mudīritanti dvādasa arūpāvacaracittāni, dvāvīsati catutthapañcamajjhānikāni
analyzed: dvādasa arūpāvacara cittāni dvāvīsati catuttha pañcama jhānikāni

original: sāsavānāsavānīti catuttiṃsa cittāni yathāyogaṃ upekkhekaggatāyogato, sukhekaggatāyogato
analyzed: sa āsava anāsavāni iti catuttiṃsa cittāni yathāyogam upekkhā ikagga tā yogato sukha ekagga tā yogato

original: ca duvaṅgikamudīritaṃ. Catutthajjhānikāni hi ekādasa sukhekaggatāsahitāni, sesāni
analyzed: ca duvaṅgikam udīritam catuttha jjhānikāni hi ekādasa sukha ikagga tā sahitāni sesāni

original: tevīsati upekkhekaggatāsahitāni.
analyzed: tevīsati upekkhā ikagga tā sahitāni

original: 116. Sabhāvenāvitakkesūti dutiyajjhānādayo viya bhāvanābalena vinā sabhāveneva avitakkesu
analyzed: sa bhāvena a vitakkesu iti dutiya jhāna ādayaḥ bhāvanā balena vinā sa bhāvena iva a vitakkesu

original: dvipañcaviññāṇesu. Tesu hi vijjamānānipi sesajhānaṅgāni vitakkavirahena upanijjhānakiccesu
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇesu tesu hi vijjamānāni api sesa jhāna aṅgāni vitakka virahena upanijjhāna kiccesu

original: asamatthāni. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyampi “vitakkapacchimakañhi jhānaṅgaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: asamatthāni tena iva hi aṭṭhakathāyam pi vitakka pacchimakam hi jhāna aṅgam nāma ati vuttam

original: Bhāvanāya avitakkabhāvappattāni pana bhāvanābaleneva upanijjhānakiccesu paṭutarā,
analyzed: bhāvanāya avitakka bhāva pattāni pana bhāvanā balena iva upanijjhāna kiccesu paṭutarā

original: tasmā sabhāvenāvitakkesu jhānaṅgāni na uddhareyya. “Na uddhaṭā”ti vā pāṭho, na uddhaṭānīti attho.
analyzed: tasmā sa bhāvena a vitakkesu jhānaṅgāni na uddhareyya na uddhaṭāni iti atthaḥ

original: Yadi evaṃ kasmā dvipañcaviññāṇesu sarūpeneva cittekaggatā vuttā, nanu tassā vitakkavirahena
analyzed: yadi evam kasmā dvi pañca viññāṇesu sarūpena iva citta ekagga tā vuttā nanu tassā vitakka virahena

original: jhānaṅgakicce asamatthatāya rāsibhajanābhāvato yevāpanakavasena vacanaṃ yuttanti?
analyzed: jhā naṅga kicce asamattha tāya rāsi bhajana abhāvataḥ yevāpanaka vasena vacanam yuttan ti

original: Vuccate – kusalākusalesu avijjamānadhammassa vipākesupi anupalabbhanato jhānaṅgakiccassa
analyzed: vuccate kusala akusalesu avijjamāna dhammassa vipākesu pi an upalabbhanataḥ jhāna aṅga kiccassa

original: akaraṇepi kusalākusalesu desitaniyāmeneva sarūpena idhāpi vuttā. Hotu tāva etaṃ,
analyzed: akaraṇe pi kusala akusalesu desita niyāmena iva sarūpena idha api vuttā hotu tāva etam

original: jhānarāsiyaṃ vedanā kasmā vuttā. Sā hi sabbacittasādhāraṇabhāvato phassapañcakarāsimhi
analyzed: jhāna rāsiyam vedanā kasmā vuttā sā hi sabba citta sādhāraṇa bhāvato phassa pañcaka rāsimhi

original: ceva, upekkhādiindriyabhāvato indriyarāsimhiyeva vattabbā, na itarattha tadabhāvatoti?
analyzed: ca iva upekkhā ādi indriya bhāvataḥ vattabbā na itarattha tad abhāvato ti

original: Saccaṃ, vedanā pana sabbavedanānaṃ sāmaññasabhāvena phassapañcake āgatavedanā ca
analyzed: saccam vedanā pana sabba vedanānam sāmañña sabhāvena phassa pañcake āgata vedanā ca

original: aparena visesavacanena tattha niddiṭṭhā, na tattha antokaraṇatthaṃ. Teneva hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ
analyzed: aparena visesa vacanena tattha niddiṭṭhāḥ na tattha antokaraṇa attham tena iva hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyam

original: dvipañcaviññāṇesu saṅgahavāre jhānaṅgarāsi na uddhaṭāti rūpadhātuyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇesu saṅgaha vāre na tiṇṇam mahābhūtānam

original: appaṭighabhāvepi kāmadhātuyaṃ sappaṭighamahābhūtehi samānabhāvato tatthāpi sappaṭighabhāvo
analyzed: appaṭigha bhāve pi kāmadhātuyam sa paṭigha mahābhūtehi samāna bhāvato tattha api sa paṭigha bhāvo

original: viya dvipañcaviññāṇesu vedanācittekaggatānaṃ vitakkaviyogena jhānakiccākaraṇepi savitakkacittesu
analyzed: viya dvi pañca viññāṇesu vedanā citta ekagga tānam vitakka viyogena jhāna kicca akaraṇe pi sa vitakka cittesu

original: jhānacittasamaṅgīvedanādīhi samānattā jhānaṅgabhāvena vacanaṃ nāma yuttaṃ. Teneva
analyzed: jhāna citta samaṅgī vedanā ādīhi vacanam nāma yuttam tena iva

original: ca nāmarūpasamāse “phassapañcakarāsijhānadukarāsiindriyattikarāsī”ti vuttanti. Atha
analyzed: ca nāma rūpa samāse phassa pañcaka rāsi jhāna duka rāsi indriya ttika rāsi iti vuttam ti atha

original: vā kiṃ etāya yutticintāya, dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena dhammasabhāvaṃ avirajjhitvā
analyzed: vā kim etāya yutti cintāya dhamma sabhāva vedinā tathāgatena dhamma sabhāvam a virajjhitvā

original: desitanti na ettha anuyogo kātabboti. Ahetukacittānaṃ ārammaṇe suppatiṭṭhitatābhāvena
analyzed: desitanti na ettha anuyogo kātabbo ti ahetuka cittānam ārammaṇe suppatiṭṭhita tā bhāvena

original: aniyyānikattā vuttaṃ “sabbā…pe… na uddhare”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyampi “hetupacchimako maggo”ti.

original: Sabbo kāmavipāko cāti sahetukāhetukabhinno sabbo tevīsatividho kāmāvacaravipāko ca.
analyzed: sabbo kāma vipāko ca ati sa hetuka ahetuka bhinno sabbo tevīsatividho kāmāvacara vipāko ca

original: Ādimaggoti sotāpattimaggo. So hi sabbalokuttaresu ādito uppajjanato, aṭṭhasu ariyapuggalesu
analyzed: ādimaggo ti sotāpatti maggo so hi sabba lokuttaresu āditaḥ uppajjanato aṭṭhasu ariya puggalesu

original: ādipuggalassa sambandhīti vā “ādimaggo”ti vuccati. Vinā vatthunti sakasakavatthuṃ
analyzed: ādi puggalassa sambandhī iti vā ādimaggo ti vuccati vinā vatthunti saka saka vatthum

original: vinā nuppajjanti. Teneva hetāni arūpabhave nuppajjanti tattha vatthūnaṃ abhāvato.
analyzed: vinā nu uppajjanti tena iva ha etāni arūpa bhave nu uppajjanti tattha vatthūnaṃ abhāvato

original: “Nuppajjanti vinā vatthu”nti ca idaṃ antobhāvitakāraṇatthaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Tena yasmā
analyzed: nuppajjanti vinā vatthun ti ca idam antar bhāvita kāraṇa attham katvā vuttam tena yasmā

original: vatthuṃ vinā nuppajjanti, tasmā ekantena savatthukāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vatthum vinā nuppajjanti tasmai ekantena sa vatthukā iti vuttam hoti

original: Ekantena avatthukā arūpabhaveyeva paṭisandhādivasena pavattanato. Kathaṃ pana rūpasannissayena
analyzed: ekantena avatthukā paṭisandhā ādi vasena pavattanato katham pana rūpa sannissayena

original: vinā tattha arūpaṃ pavattati, kasmā na pavattati pañcavokāreti? Tathā adassanato.
analyzed: vinā tattha arūpam pavattati kasmā na pavattati pañcavokāra iti tathā a dassanato

original: Yadi evaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārenapi vinā rūpadhātuyaṃ rūpena pavattitabbaṃ, kiṃ kāraṇā?
analyzed: yadi evam kabaḷīkāra āhārena api vinā rūpa dhātuyam rūpena pavattitabbam kim kāraṇā

original: Kāmadhātuyaṃ tathā adassanato. Api tu yassa cittasantānassa pavattikāraṇaṃ rūpe avigatataṇhaṃ,
analyzed: tathā a dassanataḥ api tu yassa citta santānassa pavatti kāraṇam rūpe avigata taṇham

original: tassa saha rūpena pavatti. Yassa pana nibbattikāraṇaṃ rūpe vigatataṇhaṃ, tassa vinā
analyzed: tassa saha rūpena pavatti yassa pana nibbatti kāraṇam rūpe vigata taṇham tassa vinā

original: rūpena pavatti kāraṇassa taṃvimukhatāyāti rūpasannissayena vinā tattha arūpaṃ pavattati.
analyzed: rūpena kāraṇassa tad vimukha tāya ati rūpa sannissayena vinā tattha arūpam pavattati

original: Dvecattālīsa sesānīti manodvārāvajjanaṃ kusalakiriyāvasena soḷasa kāmāvacarāni, tatheva
analyzed: sesāni iti kusala kiriyā vasena soḷasa kāmāvacarāni tathā iva

original: aṭṭha arūpāvacarāni, paṭhamamaggavajjāni satta lokuttarāni, paṭighadvayavajjitadasaakusalāni
analyzed: aṭṭha arūpāvacarāni paṭhama magga vajjāni satta lokuttarāni paṭigha dvaya vajjita dasa akusalāni

original: ceti dvecattālīsa vuttāvasesacittāni.
analyzed: ca iti dvecattālīsa vutta avasesa cittāni

original: 135-7. Rūpādīsu ekekameva ārammaṇaṃ imassāti ekekārammaṇaṃ. Tassa tassa ārammaṇassa
analyzed: rūpa ādīsu ekekam eva ārammaṇam imassa ati ekeka ārammaṇam tassa tassa ārammaṇassa

original: āpāthagatakāle taṃtaṃvijānanavasena pañcapi ārammaṇāni imassāti pañcārammaṇaṃ. Evampīti
analyzed: āpātha gata kāle taṃ taṃ vijānana vasena ārammaṇāni imassa ati pañca ārammaṇam evam pi iti

original: na kevalaṃ savatthukādivaseneva, atha kho ekekārammaṇāditopi. Abhiññāvajjitānaṃ sabbamahaggatānampi
analyzed: na kevalam sa vatthuka ādi vasena iva atha kho eka eka ārammaṇa āditaḥ pi abhiññā vajjitānam sabba mahaggatānam pi

original: dhammārammaṇabhāvena ekārammaṇattā āha “sabbaṃ mahaggata”nti. Paṇṇattārammaṇato ekārammaṇanti
analyzed: dhamma ārammaṇa bhāvena eka ārammaṇa ttā āha sabbam mahaggatam ti paṇṇatta ārammaṇato eka ārammaṇam ti

original: keci. Taṃ arūpāvacaradutiyacatutthajjhānāni patvā na yujjati tesaṃ mahaggatārammaṇattā.
analyzed: keci tam arūpāvacara dutiya catuttha jjhānāni patvā na yujjati tesam mahaggata ārammaṇa ttā

original: Abhiññādvayassa chaḷārammaṇikabhāvena, tassa ca rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānato abhinnattā
analyzed: abhiññā dvayassa chaṭṭha ārammaṇika bhāvena tassa ca rūpāvacara pañcamajjhānataḥ abhinna ttā

original: taṃ pahāya “tecattālīsā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tam pahāya tecattālīsā iti vuttam

original: 141. Puññavipākakiriyato kāme dvādasāti sambandho. Dhāti nipātamattaṃ. Puññavipākakriyatoti ñāṇavippayuttakusalavipākakiriyato.
analyzed: puñña vipāka kiriyataḥ kāme dvādasā ati sambandhaḥ nipāta mattam puñña vipāka kriyataḥ ti ñāṇa vippayutta kusala vipāka kiriyataḥ

original: 143-9. Iriyāya kāyikāya kiriyāya pavattipathabhāvato iriyāpatho, gamanādi. Atthato
analyzed: iriyāya kāyikāya kiriyāya pavatti patha bhāvataḥ iriyāpathaḥ gamana ādi atthato

original: tadavatthā rūpappavatti. Kāmañcettha rūpavinimutto iriyāpatho, viññatti vā natthi,
analyzed: tad avatthā rūpa ppavatti kāmañca ittha rūpa vinimuttaḥ iriyāpathaḥ vā natthi

original: tathāpi sabbaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ iriyāpathupatthambhakaṃ, viññattivikāruppādanañca
analyzed: tathā api sabbam rūpa samuṭṭhāpaka cittam iriyāpathu patthambhakam viññatti vikāra uppādanam ca

original: hoti. Yaṃ pana cittaṃ viññattijanakaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsato itaradvayassa janakaṃ avinābhāvato,
analyzed: hoti yam pana cittam viññatti janakam tam ekaṃsataḥ itara dvayassa janakam avinābhāvato

original: tathā iriyāpathupatthambhakaṃ rūpassāti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ “rūpīriyāpathaviññatti-janakājanakādito”ti
analyzed: tathā iriyāpatha upatthambhakam rūpassa ati imassa visesassa dassana ttham rūpi iriyāpatha viññatti janaka ajanaka āditaḥ ti

original: iriyāpathaviññattīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Janakājanakāditoti tiṇṇampi janakato, kassacipi
analyzed: iriyāpatha viññattīnam visum gahaṇam janaka ajanaka āditaḥ ti tiṇṇam pi janakataḥ kassaci pi

original: ajanakato, dvinnaṃ ekassa ca janakato. Kānici hi cittāni rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, iriyāpathaṃ
analyzed: ajanakataḥ dvinnam ekassa ca janakataḥ kānici hi cittāni rūpam samuṭṭhāpenti iriyāpatham

original: kappenti, viññattiṃ janayanti. Kānici rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, iriyāpathaṃ kappenti,
analyzed: kappenti viññattim janayanti kānici rūpam samuṭṭhāpenti iriyāpatham kappenti

original: viññattiṃ na janayanti. Kānici rūpameva samuṭṭhāpenti, itaradvayaṃ na karonti. Kānici
analyzed: viññattim na janayanti kānici rūpam eva samuṭṭhāpenti itara dvayam na karonti kānici

original: tīṇi na karonteva. Tathā ceva dasseti “dvādasākusalā”tiādi. Evañcāpi hi taṃ cittanti
analyzed: tīṇi na karontā iva tathā ca iva dasseti dvādasa akusala ati ādi evam ca api hi tam cittam ti

original: na kevalaṃ ahetukāditova, evaṃ rūpādijanakāditopi taṃ catubbidhaṃ. “Evañcādimhi ta”ntipi
analyzed: na kevalam evam rūpa ādi janaka āditaḥ api tam catubbidham evam ca ādimhi

original: likhanti. Tassa pana ādimhi nikkhittaṃ cittaṃ evañca catubbidhanti atthaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: likhanti tassa pana ādimhi nikkhittam cittam evañca catubbidhanti attham vadanti

original: Tatthāti tesu rūpajanakādīsu. Dasa kiriyāti manodhātuvajjā dasa kiriyā.
analyzed: tattha ati tesu rūpa janaka ādīsu dasa kiriyā ati manaḥ dhātu vajjāḥ dasa kiriyā

original: Samuṭṭhāpenti rūpānīti attano uppādakkhaṇeyeva attanā janetabbarūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti.
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpenti rūpāni iti attanaḥ uppāda khaṇeya iva attanā janetabba rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti

original: Kappentīti sannāmenti. Yathāpavattaṃ iriyāpathaṃ upatthambhenti. Yathā hi antarantarā
analyzed: kappenti iti sannāmenti yathāpavattam iriyāpatham upatthambhenti yathā hi antar antarā

original: uppajjamānehi vīthicittehi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti, pavedhantā
analyzed: uppajjamānehi vīthi cittehi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti pavedhantā

original: viya honti, na evaṃ dvattiṃsavidhesu vakkhamānesu ca chabbīsatividhesu jāgaraṇacittesu
analyzed: viya honti na evam dvattiṃsavidhesu vakkhamānesu ca chabbīsatividhesu jāgaraṇa cittesu

original: pavattamānesu. Tadā pana aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattairiyāpathabhāveneva pavattanti.
analyzed: pavattamānesu tadā pana aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathā pavatta iriyāpatha bhāvena iva pavattanti

original: Janayanti ca viññattinti manodvāre pavattā eva viññattiṃ janayanti, na pana pañcadvāre
analyzed: janayanti ca viññattim ti manaḥ dvāre pavattāḥ eva viññattim janayanti na pana pañca dvāre

original: pavattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: pavattā iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ jhānaṅgayogābhāvena rūpājanakattā āha “dvepañcaviññāṇā”ti. Jhānaṅgāni
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇānam jhāna aṅga yoga abhāvena rūpa ajanaka ttā āha dve pañca viññāṇā ti jhāna aṅgāni

original: hi cittena saha rūpasamuṭṭhāpakāni, tesaṃ anubalappadāyakāni maggaṅgādīni tesu vijjamānesu
analyzed: hi cittena saha rūpa samuṭṭhāpakāni tesam anubala ppadāyakāni maggaṅga ādīni tesu vijjamānesu

original: savisesaṃ rūpappavattidassanato. Arūpavipākā pana rūpavirāgabhāvanāya nibbattattā
analyzed: sa visesam rūpa ppavatti dassanato arūpa vipākā pana rūpa virāga bhāvanāya nibbatta ttā

original: hetuno taṃvimukhatāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpentīti āha “vipākā ca arūpisū”ti.
analyzed: rūpam na samuṭṭhāpenti iti āha ca

original: 150. Sabbesaṃ sandhicittanti sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ. Tañhi vatthudubbalatāya,
analyzed: sabbesam sandhi cittan ti sabbesam sattānam paṭisandhi cittam tat hi vatthu dubbala tāya

original: appatiṭṭhitatāya, paccayavekallato, āgantukatāya ca rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā
analyzed: a patiṭṭhita tāya paccaya vekallataḥ āgantuka tāya ca rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti tathā

original: hi paṭisandhiviññāṇena sahajātaṃ vatthu pacchājātapaccayarahitaṃ, āhārādīhi ca anupatthaddhaṃ
analyzed: hi paṭisandhi viññāṇena sahajātam vatthu pacchājāta paccaya rahitam āhāra ādīhi ca anupatthaddham

original: dubbalaṃ, tassa ca dubbalattā tannissitaviññāṇampi dubbalanti. Yathā ca papāte patito
analyzed: dubbalam tassa ca dubbala ttā tad nissita viññāṇam pi dubbalanti yathā ca papāte patitaḥ

original: aññassa nissayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ tampi bhinnasantatiyaṃ kammakkhittatāya
analyzed: aññassa nissayaḥ bhavitum na sakkoti evam tam pi bhinna santatiyam kamma kkhitta tāya

original: papāte patitaṃ viya appatiṭṭhitaṃ na rūpasamuṭṭhāpane ussahati ca vatthuno ca attanā
analyzed: papāte patitam viya appatiṭṭhitam na rūpa samuṭṭhāpane ussahati ca vatthuno ca attanā

original: saha apacchā apure uppajjamānattā purejātapaccayassa alābhato. Yathā pana āgantuko
analyzed: saha apacchā apure uppajjamāna ttā purejāta paccayassa alābhato yathā pana āgantukaḥ

original: puriso agatapubbaṃ desaṃ gato aññesaṃ “etha bho antogāme vo annapānagandhamālādīni
analyzed: puriso a gata pubbam desam gataḥ aññesam etha bho antogāme vaḥ anna pāna gandha mālā ādīni

original: dassāmī”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti attano avisayatāya, appahutāya ca, evamevaṃ paṭisandhicittampi
analyzed: dassāmi iti vattum na sakkoti attanaḥ avisaya tāya appahutāya ca evam evam paṭisandhi cittam pi

original: āgantukanti. Evaṃ vatthudubbalatādīhi kāraṇehi rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti. Apica āhārindriyādivasena
analyzed: āgantukam ti evam vatthu dubbala tā ādīhi kāraṇehi rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti api ca āhāra indriya ādi vasena

original: yehākārehi cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ cittacetasikā paccayā honti, tehi sabbehi paṭisandhiyaṃ
analyzed: yehākārehi citta samuṭṭhāna rūpānam citta cetasikāḥ paccayāḥ honti tehi sabbehi paṭisandhiyam

original: cittacetasikā samatiṃsakammajarūpānaṃ yathāyogaṃ paccayā honti. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭṭhāne –
analyzed: yathāyogam paccayāḥ honti vuttam ha etam paṭṭhāne

original: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
analyzed: paṭisandhi khaṇe vipāka abyākatā āhārā sampayuttānam khandhānam kaṭattā ca rūpānam āhāra paccayena paccayaḥ tiādi

original: Tasmā samatiṃsakammajarūpāni cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā ṭhitānīti paṭisandhicittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā sama tiṃsa kamma ja rūpāni citta samuṭṭhāna rūpānam ṭhānam gahetvā ṭhitāni iti paṭisandhi cittam rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti iti veditabbam

original: Cuticittañcārahatoti ettha khīṇāsavassa cuticittaṃ upasantavaṭṭamūlasmiṃ santāne
analyzed: ettha khīṇāsavassa cuti cittam upasanta vaṭṭa mūlasmin santāne

original: sātisayaṃ santavuttitāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti, anāgāmiādīnaṃ tadabhāvatoti vadanti.
analyzed: sa atisayam santa vutti tāya rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti anāgāmi ādīnam tad abhāvato ti vadanti

original: Ṭīkākāro pana ānandācariyo bhaṇati –
analyzed: ṭīkākāraḥ pana ānandācariyaḥ bhaṇati

original: “Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchima cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ

original: pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare, arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ, ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ,
analyzed: pacchima cittam uppajjissati rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānam ye ca rūpāvacaram

original: arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ, tesaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro
analyzed: arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam cavantānam tesam vacī saṅkhāro

original: nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti vacanato aññesampi cuticittaṃ
analyzed: nirujjhissati no ca tesam kāya saṅkhāro nirujjhissati iti vacanataḥ aññesam pi cuti cittam

original: rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetī”ti.
analyzed: rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti iti

original: Ācariyassa hi ayamadhippāyo – “kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassā”ti etena avisesena
analyzed: ācariyassa hi ayam adhippāyaḥ kāma avacarānam pacchima cittassa ati etena avisesena

original: kāmāvacarasattānaṃ cuticittassa, “ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ…pe… nirujjhissatī”ti iminā kāmabhavato
analyzed: kāmāvacara sattānam cuti cittassa ye ca nirujjhissati iti iminā kāma bhavato

original: cavitvā rūpārūpabhavūpapajjanakānaṃ kāmāvacaracuticittassāpi uppādakkhaṇato uddhaṃ
analyzed: cavitvā rūpa arūpa bhava upapad janakānam kāmāvacara cuti cittassa api uppāda khaṇato uddham

original: vacīsaṅkhārassa nirodhaṃ vatvā kāyasaṅkhārassa tadabhāvavacanato cuticittassa kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanaṃ
analyzed: vacī saṅkhārassa nirodham vatvā kāya saṅkhārassa tad abhāva vacanataḥ cuti cittassa kāya saṅkhāra asamuṭṭhāpanam

original: siddhaṃ. Yadaggena ca taṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti, tadaggena taṃ sesarūpampi
analyzed: siddham yad aggena ca tam kāya saṅkhāram na samuṭṭhāpeti tad aggena tam sesa rūpam pi

original: na janeti. Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakassa gabbhagatatādivibandhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpane
analyzed: na jana iti na hi rūpa samuṭṭhāpakassa gabbha gata tā ādi vibandha abhāve kāya saṅkhāra asamuṭṭhāpane

original: kāraṇaṃ atthi. Na ca yuttaṃ cutito uddhaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa rūpaṃ pavattatīti,
analyzed: kāraṇam atthi na ca yuttam cutitaḥ uddham citta samuṭṭhānam ca assa rūpam pavattati iti

original: nāpi “cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī”ti pāḷi atthi, na cāpi vaṭṭamūlānupasamo cuticittassa
analyzed: na api cuti cittam rūpam samuṭṭhāpeti iti atthi na ca api vaṭṭa mūla anupasamaḥ cuti cittassa

original: rūpuppādane kāraṇaṃ cuticittena na uppannānampi tato purimatarehi uppannānaṃ viya
analyzed: rūpa uppādane kāraṇam cuti cittena na uppannānam pi tatas purimatarehi uppannānam viya

original: bhavantare anuppajjanato, tasmā sabbesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti. Yadi
analyzed: bhavantare anuppajjanato tasmā sabbesam pi cuti cittam rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti iti yadi

original: kāyasaṅkhārasamuṭṭhāpanameva rūpajananārahabhāvaṃ sādheti, tadā catutthajjhāne kathanti?
analyzed: kāya saṅkhāra samuṭṭhāpanam eva rūpa janana araha bhāvam sādha iti tadā catuttha jhāne kathanti

original: Nāyaṃ doso, tassa bhāvanābalena sātisayaṃ santavuttitāya kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanepi
analyzed: na ayam doso tassa bhāvanā balena sa atisayam santa vutti tāya kāya saṅkhāra a samuṭṭhāpane pi

original: maraṇāsannacittānaṃ viya paridubbalattābhāvato rūpasamuṭṭhāpane vibandho natthīti.
analyzed: maraṇa āsanna cittānam viya paridubbala tta abhāvato rūpa samuṭṭhāpane vibandho natthi iti

original: Kuto pana paṭṭhāya cittajarūpaṃ nuppajjatīti? Yato paṭṭhāya kāyasaṅkhāre nuppajjati.
analyzed: kutas pana paṭṭhāya citta ja rūpam nuppajjati iti yatas paṭṭhāya kāya saṅkhāre nuppajjati

original: Kadā ca kāyasaṅkhāro nuppajjatīti? Cutito pubbe dvattiṃsamacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: kadā ca kāya saṅkhāro nuppajjati iti cutitaḥ pubbe dvattiṃsama citta kkhaṇato paṭṭhāya

analyzed: tividhaḥ hoti gocaro ti paritta mahaggata appamāṇa vasena tividhaḥ api gocaraḥ hoti katham

original: Kusalakiriyāvasena aṭṭha ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ sakkaccadānapaccavekkhaṇadhammassavanavipassanādīsu
analyzed: kusala kiriyā vasena aṭṭha ñāṇa sampayutta cittuppādā sekha puthujjana khīṇa āsavānam sakkacca dāna paccavekkhaṇa dhamma ssavana vipassana ādīsu

original: kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattakāle kāmāvacarārammaṇikaabhiññāya parikammānulomakāle
analyzed: kāmāvacara dhamme ārabbha pavatta kāle kāmāvacara ārammaṇika abhiññāya parikamma anuloma kāle

original: ca parittārammaṇā. Paṭhamajjhānādipaccavekkhaṇakāle mahaggatārammaṇajhānādīnaṃ parikammakāle
analyzed: ca paritta ārammaṇā paṭhama jhāna ādi paccavekkhaṇa kāle mahaggata ārammaṇa jhāna ādīnam parikamma kāle

original: mahaggatadhamme ārabbha sammasanakāle ca mahaggatārammaṇā honti. Yathālābhaṃ gotrabhuvodānakāle
analyzed: mahaggata dhamme ārabbha sammasana kāle ca mahaggata ārammaṇāḥ honti yathālābham gotra bhuvo udāna kāle

original: pana lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle ca nibbānārammaṇābhiññāya parikammakāle
analyzed: pana lokuttaram dhammam paccavekkhaṇa kāle ca nibbāna ārammaṇa abhiññāya parikamma kāle

original: ca appamāṇārammaṇā. Paṇṇattipaccavekkhaṇakāle paṇṇattārammaṇikajhānābhiññānaṃ parikammakāle
analyzed: ca appamāṇa ārammaṇā paṇṇatti paccavekkhaṇa kāle paṇṇatta ārammaṇika jhāna abhiññānam parikamma kāle

original: ca navattabbā. Abhiññādvayassa parittādiārammaṇataṃ sattarasamaparicchede vakkhati.
analyzed: ca abhiññā dvayassa paritta ādi ārammaṇatam sattarasama paricchede vakkhati

original: Kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi yathāvuttadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ purecaraṃ
analyzed: kiriyā voṭṭhabbanam pi yathāvutta dhammānam taṃ taṃ ārammaṇe pavattamānānam purecaram

original: hutvā taṃ tadeva āvajjantaṃ pavattatīti parittādiārammaṇaṃ. Pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena
analyzed: hutvā tam tat eva āvajjantam pavattati iti paritta ādi ārammaṇam pañca dvāre voṭṭhabbana vasena

original: pavattiyaṃ parittārammaṇameva.
analyzed: pavattiyam paritta ārammaṇam eva

original: Vuttāvasesānīti yathāvuttehi avasiṭṭhāni pannarasa rūpāvacarāni paṭhamatatiyāni,
analyzed: vutta avasesāni iti yathā vuttehi avasiṭṭhāni pannarasa rūpāvacarāni paṭhama tatiyāni

original: cha arūpāvacarakusalavipākakiriyacittānīti ekavīsati cittāni. Navattabbārammaṇānīti
analyzed: cha arūpāvacara kusala vipāka kiriya cittāni iti ekavīsati cittāni nava ttabba ārammaṇāni iti

original: parittādivasena navattabbassa kasiṇādinimittasattapaññattiākāsaviññāṇābhāvassa ārammaṇakaraṇato
analyzed: paritta ādi vasena kasiṇa ādi nimitta satta paññatti ākāsa viññāṇa abhāvassa ārammaṇa karaṇato

original: navattabbārammaṇāni.
analyzed: nava ttabba ārammaṇāni

original: Parittārammaṇattikaṃ samattaṃ.
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇa ttikam samattam

original: 321-2. Evaṃ parittārammaṇattikavasena visayīvibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā appamāṇārammaṇaniddeseneva
analyzed: evam paritta ārammaṇa ttika vasena visayi vibhāgam dassetvā idāni yasmai appamāṇa ārammaṇa niddesena iva

original: maggārammaṇattikasaṅgahitopi visayīvibhāgo niddiṭṭho hoti, tasmā taṃ pahāya atītārammaṇattikavasena
analyzed: magga ārammaṇa ttika saṅgahitaḥ api visayī vibhāgaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ hoti tasmā tam pahāya atīta ārammaṇa ttika vasena

original: dassetuṃ “dutiyāruppacittañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha dutiyāruppacittaṃ atītassa paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa
analyzed: dassetum dutiya āruppa cittam ca atiādi vuttam tattha dutiya āruppa cittam atītassa paṭhama āruppa viññāṇassa

original: ārammaṇakaraṇato, catutthāruppaṃ tatiyāruppassa ārammaṇakaraṇato ekantaatītārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ārammaṇa karaṇato catuttha āruppam tatiya āruppassa ārammaṇa karaṇato ekanta atīta ārammaṇam

original: Paccuppannāva gocarāti rūpādimhi dharamāneyeva pañcadvārikacittānaṃ uppajjanato.
analyzed: paccuppannā ava gocarā ti rūpa ādimhi pañcadvārika cittānam uppajjanato

original: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ pana niyataṃ kiñci natthi anāgataṃsañāṇassapi pañcamajjhānato abhinnattā.
analyzed: anāgata ārammaṇam pana niyatam kiñci natthi anāgataṃsañāṇassa api pañcama jhānataḥ abhinna ttā

original: 324-6. Siyā…pe… nāgatagocarāti aṭṭha tāva mahāvipākā devamanussānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle
analyzed: siyāpe nāgata gocarā ti aṭṭha tāva mahā vipākāḥ deva manussānam paṭisandhi ggahaṇa kāle

original: kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha pavattiyaṃ atītārammaṇā. Bhavaṅgacutikālepi eseva
analyzed: kammam vā kamma nimittam vā ārabbha pavattiyam atīta ārammaṇā bhavaṅga cuti kāle pi esā eva

original: nayo. Gatinimittaṃ pana kadāci kammanimittañca ārabbha paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle, tadanantaraṃ
analyzed: nayaḥ gati nimittam pana kadāci kamma nimittam ca ārabbha paṭisandhi ggahaṇa kāle tad anantaram

original: bhavaṅgakāle ca paccuppannārammaṇā, tathā pañcadvāre tadārammaṇavasena pavattiyaṃ.
analyzed: bhavaṅga kāle ca paccuppanna ārammaṇā tathā pañca dvāre tad ārammaṇa vasena pavattiyam

original: Manodvāre pana atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānaṃ javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattiyaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇānaṃ javanānaṃ ārammaṇam gahetvā pavattiyam

original: atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā. Kusalākusalavipākāhetukaupekkhāsahagatamanoviññāṇadhātudvayepi
analyzed: atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇā kusala akusala vipāka ahetuka aupekkhā sahagata manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dvaye pi

original: eseva nayo. Kevalañhi tā yathākkamaṃ manussesu jaccandhādīnaṃ, apāyesu ca sabbesaṃ
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ kevalam hi tāḥ yathākkamam manussesu jaccandha ādīnam apāyesu ca sabbesam

original: paṭisandhi honti. Pañcadvāre ca santīraṇakāle paccuppannārammaṇāva hontīti ayametesaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi honti pañca dvāre ca santīraṇa kāle paccuppanna ārammaṇāḥ va honti iti ayam etesam

original: viseso. Somanassasahagatā pana pañcadvāre santīraṇavasena, tadārammaṇavasena ca pavattikāle
analyzed: visesaḥ somanassa sahagatā pana pañca dvāre santi īraṇa vasena tad ārammaṇa vasena ca pavatti kāle

original: paccuppannārammaṇā, manodvāre ca tadārammaṇakāle atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇāti
analyzed: paccuppanna ārammaṇā manaḥ dvāre ca tad ārammaṇa kāle atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇā ti

original: veditabbā. Hasituppādacittaṃ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ pañcadvāre haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānānaṃ
analyzed: veditabbā hasita uppāda cittam pana khīṇāsavānam pañca dvāre haṭṭha pahaṭṭha ākāram kurumānānam

original: paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti, manodvāre atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha hasituppādavasena
analyzed: paccuppanna ārammaṇam hoti manaḥ dvāre atīta ādi bhede dhamme ārabbha hasita uppāda vasena

original: pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇaṃ. “Kusalākusalā”tiādīsu kusalesu tāva cattāro
analyzed: pavattiyam atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇam kusala akusala ati ādīsu kusalesu tāva cattāro

original: ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekhaputhujjanānaṃ, atītādibhedāni khandhadhātuāyatanāni
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayutta citta uppādā sekha puthujjanānam atīta ādi bhedāni khandha dhātu āyatanāni

original: sammasanakāle, paccavekkhaṇakāle, atītādiārammaṇikaabhiññānaṃ parikammakāle ca atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā.
analyzed: sammasana kāle paccavekkhaṇa kāle atīta ādi ārammaṇika abhiññānam parikamma kāle ca atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: Paññattinibbānapaccavekkhaṇakāle, gotrabhuvodānakāle, paññattinibbānārammaṇikaabhiññānaṃ
analyzed: paññatti nibbāna paccavekkhaṇa kāle gotra bhuvodāna kāle paññatti nibbāna ārammaṇika abhiññānam

original: parikammādikāle ca navattabbārammaṇā. Paññattinibbānāni hi idha atītādikālavasena
analyzed: parikamma ādi kāle ca navattabba ārammaṇā paññatti nibbānāni hi idha atīta ādi kāla vasena

original: navattabbānīti tadārammaṇāni atītārammaṇādivasena navattabbāni. Tenāha “santapaññattikālepī”ti,
analyzed: navattabbāni iti tad ārammaṇāni atīta ārammaṇa ādi vasena navattabbāni tena āha santa paññatti kāle pi iti

original: yathāsambhavaṃ santassa nibbānassa, paññattiyā ca ārammaṇakaraṇakāleti attho. Potthakesu
analyzed: yathāsambhavam santassa nibbānassa paññattiyā ca ārammaṇa karaṇa kāle ti attho potthakesu

original: pana “sante paññattikālesū”ti likhanti, so apāṭho. Tassa pana apāṭhabhāvaṃ ajānantā
analyzed: pana sante paññatti kālesu iti likhanti saḥ apāṭhaḥ tassa pana apāṭha bhāvam a jānantā

original: atthahānimpi asallakkhetvā vacanavipallāsavasena paññattikālasmiṃ satīti atthaṃ likhanti.
analyzed: attha hānim pi a sat lakkhetvā vacana vipallāsa vasena paññatti kālasmim sati iti attham likhanti

original: Ñāṇavippayuttānipi vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Kevalañhi tesaṃ maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇāni
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttāni api vutta nayena iva veditabbāni kevalam hi tesam magga phala nibbāna paccavekkhaṇāni

original: natthi. Ñāṇavirahena lokuttaradhammārammaṇe asamatthabhāvatoti ayameva viseso.
analyzed: natthi ñāṇa virahena lokuttara dhamma ārammaṇe asamattha bhāvato ti ayam eva visesaḥ

original: Akusalesu cattāro diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhedānaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ assādanābhinandanaparāmasanakāle
analyzed: akusalesu cattāro diṭṭhi sampayutta cittuppādāḥ atīta ādi bhedānam tebhūmaka dhammānam assādana abhinandana parāmasana kāle

original: atītādiārammaṇā. Tatheva paññattiṃ ārabbha pavattikāle navattabbārammaṇā. Diṭṭhivippayuttesupi
analyzed: atīta ādi ārammaṇā tathā iva paññattim ārabbha pavatti kāle navattabba ārammaṇā diṭṭhi vippayuttesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Kevalañhi tattha parāmāsaggahaṇaṃ natthi. Dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādā
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ kevalam hi tattha parāmāsa ggahaṇam natthi dve paṭigha sampayutta cittuppādā

original: atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha dussanakāle atītādiārammaṇā, paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha dussanakāle
analyzed: atīta ādi bhede dhamme ārabbha dussana kāle atīta ādi ārammaṇā paṇṇattim ārabbha dussana kāle

original: navattabbārammaṇā. Vicikicchuddhaccasampayuttā tesu dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvena
analyzed: navattabba ārammaṇā vicikicchu ddhacca sampayuttā tesu dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgata bhāvena

original: ca avūpasamavikkhepavasena ca pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
analyzed: ca avūpasama vikkhepa vasena ca pavattiyam atīta anāgata paccuppanna nava ttabba ārammaṇā

original: Kiriyāsu aṭṭha sahetukacittuppādā kusalacittuppādagatikā eva. Tattha hi ñāṇasampayuttā
analyzed: kiriyāsu aṭṭha sa hetuka cittuppādā kusala cittuppāda gatikā eva tattha hi ñāṇa sampayuttā

original: kusalesu ñāṇasampayuttehi, ñāṇavippayuttā ñāṇavippayuttehi samānā. Kevalaṃ pana te
analyzed: kusalesu ñāṇa sampayuttehi ñāṇa vippayuttāḥ ñāṇa vippayuttehi samānā kevalam pana te

original: sekhaputhujjanānaṃ uppajjanti, ime khīṇāsavānanti ayamevettha viseso. Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: sekha puthujjanānam uppajjanti ime khīṇa āsavānam ti ayam eva ittha visesaḥ kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: pana upekkhāsahagatā pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena pavattiyaṃ paccuppannārammaṇā,
analyzed: pana upekkhā sahagatā pañca dvāre voṭṭhabbana vasena pavattiyam paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: manodvāre atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānañceva paññattinibbānārammaṇānañca javanānaṃ
analyzed: manas dvāre atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇānaṃ ca iva paññatti nibbāna ārammaṇānaṃ ca javanānam

original: purecārikakāle atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā. Abhiññādvayassa atītādiārammaṇataṃ
vakkhati. Navattabbā…pe… ādināti kasiṇanimittādipaññattārammaṇattā atītārammaṇādinā navattabbā.
analyzed: ādinā ati kasiṇa nimitta ādi paññatta ārammaṇa ttā atīta ārammaṇa ādinā

original: 327. Kriyā pañcāti ñāṇasampayuttā catasso, ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatāti
analyzed: kriyā pañca ati ñāṇa sampayuttā catasso ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu upekkhā sahagatā ati

original: imā pañca kiriyā. Rūpato pañcamī kriyāti rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātā kiriyābhiññā
analyzed: imā pañca kiriyāḥ rūpataḥ pañcamī kriyā ati rūpāvacara pañcama jhāna saṅkhātā kiriyā abhiññā

original: ca. Natthi kiñci agocaranti atītādibhedesu, kālavimuttesu ca agocaraṃ nāma kiñci
analyzed: ca natthi kiñci agocaranti atīta ādi bhedesu kāla vimuttesu ca agocaram nāma kiñci

original: natthi, sabbameva nesaṃ gocaraṃ hotīti attho.
analyzed: natthi sabbam eva nesam gocaram hoti iti attho

original: Atītārammaṇattikaṃ.
analyzed: atīta ārammaṇa ttikam

original: Vuttanayānusāreneva ajjhattārammaṇattikasaṅgahitopi visayīvibhāgo sakkā viññātunti
analyzed: vutta naya anusārena iva ajjhatta ārammaṇa ttika saṅgahitaḥ api visayī vibhāgaḥ sakkā viññātunti

original: so visuṃ na uddhaṭo. Sarūpato panesa evaṃ veditabbo – viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti
analyzed: so visum na uddhaṭaḥ sarūpataḥ pana isaḥ evam veditabbaḥ viññāṇañca āyatanam nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti

original: ime tāva kusalavipākakiriyāvasena cha cittuppādā attano santānasambandhaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ
analyzed: ime tāva kusala vipāka kiriyā vasena cha cittuppādāḥ attano santāna sambandham heṭṭhimam

original: samāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattanato ajjhattārammaṇā. Rūpāvacaracatukkajjhānāni, paṭhamatatiyārūppāni,
analyzed: samāpattim ārabbha pavattanataḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇāḥ rūpāvacara catukka jjhānāni paṭhama tatiya ārūppāni

original: lokuttarakusalavipākāni ca niyakajjhattato bahibhāvena bahiddhābhūtāni pathavīkasiṇādīni
analyzed: lokuttara kusala vipākāni ca bahi bhāvena bahiddhā bhūtāni pathavī kasiṇa ādīni

original: ārabbha pavattito bahiddhārammaṇāni. Sabbeva kāmāvacarakusalākusalābyākatā dhammā
analyzed: ārabbha pavattitaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇāni sabbe iva kāmāvacara kusala akusala abyākatāḥ dhammāḥ

original: rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānañca ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇāni. Tattha kāmāvacarakusalato cattāro
analyzed: rūpāvacara pañcama jhānañca ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇāni tattha kāmāvacara kusalato cattāro

original: ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā attano khandhādīni paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā, paresaṃ

original: khandhādipaccavekkhaṇe, paṇṇattinibbānapaccavekkhaṇe ca bahiddhārammaṇā, tadubhayavasena
analyzed: khandha ādi paccavekkhaṇe paṇṇatti nibbāna paccavekkhaṇe ca bahiddhā ārammaṇā tad ubhaya vasena

original: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā. Ñāṇavippayuttesupi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi tesaṃ nibbānapaccavekkhaṇā
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇāḥ ñāṇa vippayuttesu pi esā iva nayaḥ kevalam hi tesam nibbāna paccavekkhaṇā

original: natthi. Akusalāpi attano khandhādīnaṃ assādanābhinandanaparāmāsādikāle ajjhattārammaṇā,
analyzed: natthi akusalā api attanaḥ khandha ādīnam assādana abhinandana parāmāsa ādi kāle ajjhatta ārammaṇā

original: parassa khandhādīsu ceva anindriyabaddharūpakasiṇādīsu ca tatheva pavattikāle bahiddhārammaṇā,
analyzed: parassa khandha ādīsu ca iva anindriya baddha rūpa kasiṇa ādīsu ca tathā iva pavatti kāle bahiddha ārammaṇā

original: tadubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā. Dvepañcaviññāṇāni, tisso ca manodhātuyoti
analyzed: tad ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddhā ārammaṇā dve pañca viññāṇāni tisso ca

original: ime terasa cittuppādā attano rūpādīni ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā, parassa
analyzed: ime terasa cittuppādāḥ attanaḥ rūpa ādīni ārabbha pavattiyam ajjhatta ārammaṇā parassa

original: rūpādīsu pavattā bahiddhārammaṇā, tadubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā, somanassasahagataṃ

original: santīraṇaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena attano pañcarūpādidhamme manodvāre
analyzed: santīraṇam pañca dvāre santīraṇa tad ārammaṇa vasena pañca rūpa ādi dhamme manaḥ dvāre

original: tadārammaṇavasena aññepi ajjhattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa vasena aññe pi ajjhattike kāmāvacara dhamme ārabbha pavattiyam ajjhatta ārammaṇā

original: paresaṃ dhammesu pavattamānā bahiddhārammaṇā, tadubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā.
analyzed: paresam dhammesu pavattamānā bahiddha ārammaṇā tad ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇā

original: Upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇadvayepi eseva nayo.

original: 374-5. Yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbhāti rūpārūpanibbānapaññattīsu yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbha.

original: Iti abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma

original: 7. Sattamo paricchedo
analyzed: sattamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Vipākacittappavattiniddesavaṇṇanā
376. Anantañāṇenāti anantārammaṇe pavattañāṇena. Niraṅgaṇenāti ettha rāgādayo akusalā aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgino puggalā nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti aṅgaṇāti vuccanti. Yathāha –
analyzed: ananta ñāṇena ati ananta ārammaṇe pavatta ñāṇena niraṅgaṇena ati ettha rāga ādayaḥ akusalāḥ etehi tad samaṅginaḥ puggalāḥ nihīna bhāvam gacchanti iti aṅgaṇā iti vuccanti yathā āha

original: “Rāgo aṅgaṇaṃ, doso aṅgaṇaṃ, moho aṅgaṇaṃ, pāpakānaṃ kho, āvuso, akusalānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ aṅgaṇa”nti ca ādi.
analyzed: rāgaḥ aṅgaṇam dosaḥ aṅgaṇam mohaḥ aṅgaṇam pāpakānam kho āvuso akusalānam icchā avacarānam adhivacanam yat idam ca ādi

original: Attano santāne sīlādiguṇe esī gavesīti guṇesī, tena guṇesinā. Karuṇāyaṃ niyutto,

original: Yadi evaṃ –

analyzed: javite ahetuka tad ārammaṇam hoti iti evam javana vasena hetu niyamanam daṭṭhabbam katham

original: 426. Sotaghānādināti sotaghānādiviññāṇehi. Etthāpi ambopamā pākaṭikāva. Yantavāhopamāya
analyzed: sota ghāna ādinā ati sota ghāna ādi viññāṇehi ettha api ambā upamā pākaṭikā iva yantavāha upamāya

original: panettha satta yantavāhā tehi hatthayante nāma sajjite sālasāmikaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā
analyzed: pana ittha satta yantavāhā tehi hattha yante nāma sajjite sāla sāmikam aṭṭhamam katvā

original: vuttanayānusāreneva yojanā veditabbā.
analyzed: vutta naya anusārena iva yojanā veditabbā

original: 434-6. Vuddhimupetassāti mātukucchito nikkhamitvā saṃvarāsaṃvare paṭṭhapetuṃ samatthabhāvena
analyzed: vuddhim upetassa ati mātukucchitaḥ nikkhamitvā saṃvara asaṃvare paṭṭhapetum samattha bhāvena

original: vuḍḍhippattassa. Kiñcāpi ahetukapaṭisandhikassa kammasarikkhakajavanameva dassetuṃ
analyzed: vuḍḍhippattassa kiñca api ahetuka paṭisandhikassa kamma sarikkhaka javanam eva dassetum

original: “duhetūnaṃ…pe… vasānasmi”nti vuttaṃ. Tihetukajavanampi pana tesaṃ javati, javanassa
analyzed: vasānasmin ti vuttam ti hetuka javanam pi pana tesam javati javanassa

original: duhetukabhāvepi kammassa duhetukavipākadāne asamatthatāya “ahetuka…pe… jāyate”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: du hetuka bhāve pi kammassa du hetuka vipāka dāne asamattha tāya vuttam

original: 443-8. “Ahetupaṭisandhissā”tiādīsu adhippāyo heṭṭhā āgatova. Apāyesu paṭisandhidāyakakammena
analyzed: ahetu paṭisandhissa ati ādīsu adhippāyaḥ heṭṭhā āgataḥ iva apāyesu paṭisandhi dāyaka kammena

original: paṭisandhito hīnatadārammaṇassa anipphannato tassa labbhamānaṭṭhānameva dassetuṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhitaḥ hīna tad ārammaṇassa anipphannataḥ tassa labbhamāna ṭṭhānam eva dassetuṃ

original: “sugatiya”nti vuttaṃ, kāmāvacarasugatiyanti attho. Tenāti tena jātapaṭisandhivipākena.
analyzed: sugatiyam ti vuttam kāmāvacara sugatiyam ti attho tena ati tena jāta paṭisandhi vipākena

original: “Catūsu apāyesu labbhatī”ti vatvā tassa visayadassanatthaṃ “thero nerayikāna”ntiādi
analyzed: catūsu apāyesu labbhati iti vatvā tassa visaya dassana ttham theraḥ nerayikānanti ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Theroti nirayacārikāya pākaṭattā mahāmoggallānattheramāha. Niraye bhavā nerayikā.
analyzed: vuttam thero ti niraya cārikāya mahāmoggallāna ttheram āha niraye bhavā nerayikā

original: Dhammaṃ desetīti niraye padumaṃ māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāya nisinno dhammaṃ deseti. Vassatīti
analyzed: dhammam deseti iti niraye padumam māpetvā paduma kaṇṇikāya nisinnaḥ dhammam deseti vassati iti

original: antohetvatthaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, vassāpetīti attho. Theraṃ disvāti therassa dassanahetu.
analyzed: antar hetu attham katvā vuttam theram disvā ti therassa dassana hetu

original: Iminā indanīlapaṭimāvaṇṇassa therassa iṭṭhārammaṇabhāvena kusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā
analyzed: iminā indanīla paṭimā vaṇṇassa therassa iṭṭha ārammaṇa bhāvena kusala vipāka cakkhu viññāṇa uppattiyā

original: kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Esa nayo “dhammaṃ sutvā”tiādīsupi. Gandhanti tena māpitagandhaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇam dasseti esa nayaḥ dhammam sutvā ati ādīsu pi gandhanti tena māpita gandham

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisinnassa cīvaragandha”nti vuttaṃ. Ghāyatanti
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam pana candana vane divāvihāram nisinnassa cīvara gandhanti vuttam gha āyatanti

original: ghāyantānaṃ. Santīraṇadvayanti atiiṭṭhamajjhattassa gandhādino vasena santīraṇadvayaṃ.
analyzed: gha ayantānam gandha ādinaḥ vasena santīraṇa dvayam

original: Kusalavipākānaṃ, iṭṭhārammaṇassa ca niraye sambhavadīpanena sesāpāyattayepi sambhavo dassitova hoti.
analyzed: kusala vipākānaṃ iṭṭha ārammaṇassa ca niraye sambhava dīpanena sesa apāya ttaye pi sambhavaḥ dassitaḥ va hoti

original: 450. Niyamoyeva niyamattaṃ, tadārammaṇacittampi javanena niyāmitanti vuttaniyamoti
analyzed: niyamaḥ yā iva niyama ttam tad ārammaṇa cittam pi javanena niyāmitanti vutta niyamaḥ ti

original: attho. Kusalaṃ pana sandhāyāti kusalajavanaṃ sandhāya dīpitaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, kusalassa
analyzed: attho kusalam pana sandhāya ati kusala javanam sandhāya dīpitam aṭṭhakathāyam kusalassa

original: viya akusalassa sadisavipākābhāvatoti adhippāyo. Ettha ca kusalajavanānantaraṃ sahetukatadārammaṇasseva
analyzed: viya akusalassa sadisa vipāka abhāvato ti adhippāyaḥ ettha ca kusala javana anantaram sa hetuka tad ārammaṇassa iva

original: vacanaṃ. Javanassa kammasarikkhakahetuvasena sahetukattā javanānurūpato vuttaṃ. Paricitavasena
analyzed: vacanam javanassa kamma sarikkhaka hetu vasena sa hetuka ttā javana anurūpataḥ vuttam paricita vasena

original: pana aññakammenāpi taṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva
analyzed: pana añña kammena api tam ahetuka tad ārammaṇam na hoti iti na vattabbam na hi paṭisandhi janakam eva

original: kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janeti, atha kho aññakammampi paṭisandhidāyakakammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato
analyzed: kammam tad ārammaṇam janeti atha kho añña kammam pi paṭisandhi dāyaka kammena nibbattetabba tad ārammaṇato

original: visadisampi nibbattetīti. Akusalajavanānantarañca ahetukatadārammaṇampi javanassa
analyzed: visadisam pi nibbatteti iti akusala javana anantaram ca ahetuka tad ārammaṇam pi javanassa

original: kammasarikkhakahetukattā tadanurūpato vuttaṃ. Yathāvuttanayena pana sahetukatadārammaṇampi na hotīti natthi.
analyzed: kamma sa rikkhaka hetuka ttā tad anurūpataḥ vuttam yathā vutta nayena pana sa hetuka tad ārammaṇam pi na hoti iti natthi

original: 456-7. Ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravāde soḷasa vipākacittāni saddhiṃ dvādasakamaggena
analyzed: ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḍanāga tthera vāde soḷasa vipāka cittāni saddhim dvādasaka maggena

original: ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena ca vibhāvetvā moravāpivāsimahādattattheravāde visesābhāvato
analyzed: ca iva ahetuka ṭṭhakena ca vibhāvetvā moravāpi vāsi mahādatta tthera vāde visesa abhāvato

original: taṃ anāmasitvā mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde kusalākusalakiriyavasena piṇḍitvā dassitānaṃ
analyzed: tam an āmasitvā mahādhammarakkhita thera vāde kusala akusala kiriya vasena piṇḍitvā

original: piṇḍajavanānaṃ vasena tadārammaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “somanassayute citte”tiādi vuttaṃ. Somanassa…pe…
analyzed: piṇḍa javanānam vasena tad ārammaṇam dassetum somanassa yute citta itiādi vuttam somanassape

original: javiteti iṭṭhārammaṇe kusalākusalakiriyābyākatavasena somanassayutesu terasasu javanacittesu
analyzed: javitā iti iṭṭha ārammaṇe kusala akusala kiriyā abyākata vasena somanassa yutesu terasasu javana cittesu

original: javitesu. Gavesitabbā…pe… mānasāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena somanassasahagatāni pañceva
analyzed: javitesu gavesitabba āpe mānasā ti heṭṭhā vutta nayena somanassa sahagatāni pañca eva

original: tadārammaṇacittāni gavesitabbāni. Upekkhā…pe… javitesūti kusalākusalakiriyavasena
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa cittāni gavesitabbāni upekkhā pe javitesu ti kusala akusala kiriya vasena

original: cuddasasu upekkhāsahagatajavanacittesu javitesu. Cha gavesitabbānīti upekkhāsahagatāni
analyzed: cuddasasu upekkhā sahagata javana cittesu javitesu cha gavesitabbāni iti upekkhā sahagatāni

original: cha eva gavesitabbāni. Khīṇāsavānaṃ pahīnavipallāsatāya kiriyājavanaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe
analyzed: cha eva gavesitabbāni khīṇa āsavānam pahīna vipallāsa tāya kiriyā javanam iṭṭha ārammaṇe

original: upekkhāsahagataṃ na hotīti somanassasahagatakiriyājavanesu javitesu somanassasahagatatadārammaṇameva
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam na hoti iti somanassa sahagata kiriyā javanesu javitesu somanassa sahagata tad ārammaṇam eva

original: hoti. Iṭṭhamajjhatte, aniṭṭhādīsu ca somanassabhāvato upekkhāsahagatakiriyājavanesu
analyzed: hoti iṭṭha majjhatte aniṭṭha ādīsu ca somanassa bhāvataḥ upekkhā sahagata kiriyā javanesu

original: javitesu upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇamevāti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Sekhaputhujjanānaṃ
analyzed: upekkhā sahagata tad ārammaṇam eva ati idam ettha sanniṭṭhānam sekha puthujjanānam

original: pana appahīnavipallāsatāya iṭṭhamajjhatte, aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe ca somanassasahagatajavanaṃ
analyzed: pana appahīna vipallāsa tāya iṭṭha majjhatte aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe ca somanassa sahagata javanam

original: uppajjatīti somanassasahagatajavanāvasāne somanassasahagatatadārammaṇameva hoti,
analyzed: uppajjati iti somanassa sahagata javana avasāne somanassa sahagata tad ārammaṇam eva hoti

original: natthi upekkhāsahagatanti nāyaṃ niyamo. Iṭṭhārammaṇepi vuttanayānusārena yojetabbaṃ. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: na atthi upekkhā sahagatan ti na ayam niyamaḥ iṭṭha ārammaṇe pi vutta naya anusārena yojetabbam tena itam vuccati

original: “Parittakusalādosa-pāpasātakriyājavā;
analyzed: paritta kusala a dosa pāpa sāta kriyā javā

original: Pañcasvekaṃ tadālambaṃ, sukhitesu yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: pañcasu ekam tad ālambam sukhitesu yathāraham

original: “Pāpā kāmasubhā ceva, sopekkhā ca kriyājavā;
analyzed: pāpā kāma subhā ca iva sa upekkhā ca kriyā javā

original: Sopekkhesu tadālambaṃ, chasvekamanurūpato”ti.
analyzed: sa upekkhesu tad ālambam chasu ekam anurūpa tā ti

original: 458-62. Duhetukāhetukānaṃ vipākāvaraṇehi samannāgatattā jhānuppādoyeva natthīti āha
analyzed: du hetuka ahetukānam vipāka āvaraṇehi samannāgata ttā jhānuppādaḥ yā iva natthi iti āha

original: “tihetusomanassenā”ti. Jhānato parihīnassāti uppāditalokiyajjhānato parihīnassa.
analyzed: ti hetu somanassena ati jhānataḥ parihīnassa ati uppādita lokiya jhānataḥ parihīnassa

original: Vippaṭisārinoti “mahantena vāyāmena uppādito me paṇītadhammo naṭṭho”ti uppannavippaṭisāravantassa.
analyzed: vippaṭisārino ti mahantena vāyāmena uppāditaḥ me paṇīta dhammo naṭṭho ti uppanna vippaṭisāravantassa

original: Kiṃ…pe… mānasanti ayaṃ anumatipucchā, tadārammaṇamānasaṃ jāyate kiṃ, na vāti ayañhettha
analyzed: ayam anumati pucchā tad ārammaṇa mānasam jāyate kim na vāti

original: attho. Bhavaṅgapāto vā hotu tadārammaṇaṃ vā, ko ettha vibandhoti āha “paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā”tiādi.
analyzed: atthaḥ bhavaṅga pātaḥ vā hotu tad ārammaṇam vā kaḥ ettha vibandho ti āha paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā tiādi

original: Avacanameva paṭisedhoti katvā āha “paṭisiddhā”ti. Yadi somanassānantaraṃ domanassaṃ,
analyzed: avacanam eva paṭisedho ti katvā āha paṭisiddhā ati yadi somanassa anantaram domanassam

original: domanassānantaraṃ somanassaṃ vā uppajjeyya, tadā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: domanassa anantaram somanassam vā uppajjeyya tadā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo

original: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi
analyzed: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantara paccayena paccaya utiādi

original: viya “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa
analyzed: viya sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa

original: anantarapaccayena paccayo, dukkhāya vedanāya…pe… sukhāya vedanāya…pe… paccayo”ti
analyzed: anantara paccayena paccayaḥ dukkhāya vedanāyape sukhāya vedanāyape paccayaḥ ti

original: vattabbaṃ siyā, tathā gaṇanavāre ekekavedanāsampayuttassa attanā samānavedanāsampayuttassa,
analyzed: vattabbam siyā tathā gaṇana vāre ekeka vedanā sampayuttassa attanā samāna vedanā sampayuttassa

original: itaravedanādvayasamaṅgissa ca paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya “anantare navā”ti vattabbaṃ
analyzed: itara vedanā dvaya samaṅgissa ca paccaya bhāvam sandhāya anantare navā ti vattabbam

original: siyā, na ca panevaṃ pāḷi āgatā. Domanassasomanassavedanāya sampayuttānaṃ pana aññamaññaanantarapaccayavasena
analyzed: siyā na ca pana evam āgatā domanassa somanassa vedanāya sampayuttānam pana aññamañña anantara paccaya vasena

original: gaṇanadvayaṃ parihāpetvā “anantare sattā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi
analyzed: gaṇana dvayam parihāpetvā anantare sattā iti vuttam tasmā yathā dhamma sāsane avacanam pi

original: paṭisedhasadisaṃ abhāvasseva dīpanatoti vuttaṃ “paṭisiddhā”ti. Assa vā anantaraṃ
analyzed: paṭisedha sadisam abhāvassa iva dīpanato ti vuttam paṭisiddhā iti assa vā anantaram

original: domanassassa uppattīti sambandho. Assāti somanassassa.
analyzed: domanassassa uppatti iti sambandho assa ati somanassassa

original: Evaṃ bhavaṅgapātābhāve kāraṇaṃ vatvā puna tadārammaṇābhāvaṃ dassento āha “mahaggata”ntiādi.
analyzed: evam bhavaṅga pāta abhāve kāraṇam vatvā puna tad ārammaṇa abhāvam dassentaḥ āha mahaggata ntiādi

original: Tattheva paṭisiddhanti “parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena
analyzed: tattha iva paṭisiddhanti paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ mahaggata ārammaṇassa dhammassa kamma paccayena

original: paccayo”ti vacanābhāvato tattheva paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhaṃ. Kiṃ nu kātabbanti kiṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti vacana abhāvato tattha eva paṭṭhāne paṭisiddham kim nu kātabban ti kim kātabbam

original: Na hi sakkā ettakena “acittako”ti vattunti adhippāyo. Ettha ca mahaggatārammaṇameva
analyzed: na hi sakkā ettakena acittakaḥ ti vattunti adhippāyaḥ ettha ca mahaggata ārammaṇam eva

original: domanassajavanaṃ nidassanavasena vuttaṃ. Iṭṭhārammaṇabhūte pana buddhādiārammaṇepi
analyzed: domanassa javanam nidassana vasena vuttam iṭṭha ārammaṇa bhūte pana buddha ādi ārammaṇe pi

original: domanassajavane javite somanassapaṭisandhikassa tadārammaṇasambhavo, bhavaṅgapāto vā natthi.
analyzed: domanassa javane javite somanassa paṭisandhikassa tad ārammaṇa sambhavaḥ bhavaṅga pāto vā natthi

original: 464-5. Iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇassa domanassānantarañca somanassassa
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇe upekkhā sahagata tad ārammaṇassa domanassa anantarañca somanassassa

original: abhāvato “upekkhāsahitā hetū”tiādinā ācariyena vutte puna codako anubandhanto āha
analyzed: abhāvataḥ upekkhā sahitāḥ hetu uti ādinā ācariyena vutte puna codakaḥ anubandhantaḥ āha

original: “āvajjanaṃ kimassā”ti. Ācariyo pana kimettha āvajjanagavesanena, tena vināva idaṃ
analyzed: āvajjanam kim assa ati ācariyo pana kim ettha āvajjana gavesanena tena vinā āvaḥ idam

original: cittaṃ uppajjatīti dīpento āha “natthi ta”nti. Puna codako āvajjanena vinā cittappavattiṃ
analyzed: cittam uppajjati iti dīpentaḥ āha natthi tanti puna codakaḥ āvajjanena vinā citta ppavattim

original: avisahanto āha “taṃ jāyate katha”nti. Evaṃ pana vutte ācariyo kimettha āvajjanena,
analyzed: a visahantaḥ āha tam jāyate katham ti evam pana vutte ācariyaḥ kim ettha āvajjanena

original: kiñca āvajjanena vinā cittappavatti natthīti idaṃ na ekantikanti dīpetuṃ nirāvajjanacittānaṃ
analyzed: kiñca āvajjanena vinā citta pavatti natthi iti idam na ekantikan ti dīpetum

original: sambhavaṃ dassento āha “bhavaṅgāvajjanāna”ntiādi, bhavaṅgāvajjanānaṃ kiṃ āvajjanaṃ,
analyzed: sambhavam dassentaḥ āha bhavaṅga āvajja nāna ntiādi bhavaṅga āvajja nānam kim āvajjanam

original: nanu natthevāti adhippāyo. Nanu ca bhavaṅgāvajjanāni tāva sakasakavisayesu ninnattā
analyzed: nanu nattha iva ati adhippāyaḥ nanu ca saka saka visayesu

original: āvajjanena vinā uppattiyaṃ bahulaṃ ciṇṇattāva uppajjanti, ayaṃ pana kathaṃ uppajjatīti

original: idaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya puna nirāvajjanacittāni dassento āha “maggassā”tiādi. Maggassa
analyzed: idam anuyogam sandhāya puna nirāvajjana cittāni dassentaḥ āha maggassa atiādi maggassa

original: lokuttaramaggassa cittassa. Anantarassa phalassa cāti maggānantarassa phalassa ca
analyzed: lokuttara maggassa cittassa anantarassa phalassa ca ati magga anantarassa phalassa ca

original: atthāya kiṃ āvajjananti sambandho. Evaṃ natthīti yathā etesaṃ, evametassāpi natthi.
analyzed: atthāya kim āvajjananti sambandhaḥ evam na atthi iti yathā etesam evam etassa api na atthi

original: Ānandācariyo panettha ariyamaggacittaṃ, maggānantarāni phalāni ca parikammāvajjanena
analyzed: ānandācariyaḥ pana ittha ariya magga cittam magga anantarāni phalāni ca parikamma āvajjanena

original: sāvajjanāni samānāni asatipi nirāvajjanuppattiyaṃ ninnādibhāve uppattiyā nidassanamattavasena
analyzed: sāvajjanāni samānāni ninna ādi bhāve uppattiyā nidassana matta vasena

original: vuttānīti vaṇṇeti. Ayaṃ hissa adhippāyo – yadi hi nibbānārammaṇāvajjanābhāvaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: vuttāni iti vaṇṇā iti ayam hi ssa adhippāyaḥ yadi hi nibbāna ārammaṇa avajjana abhāvam sandhāya

original: vuttāni siyuṃ, gotrabhuvodānāni dassitabbāni siyuṃ teheva etesaṃ nirāvajjanatāsiddhito,
analyzed: vuttāni siyum gotra bhuvaḥ udānāni dassitabbāni siyum tehi iva etesam nirāvajjana tā siddhitaḥ

original: phalasamāpattikāle ca “parittārammaṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā
analyzed: phala samāpatti kāle ca paritta ārammaṇam mahaggata ārammaṇam anulomam phala samāpattiyā

analyzed: santāne pavattanataḥ aphalam eva iti

original: tesameva āveṇikabhāvena ete chaḷeva. Jātitoti kusalākusalābyākatajātito. Navadhāti

analyzed: atthaḥ na iva sampajjati iti na sijjhati hetū hetu sampayuttakānam dhammānam tad samuṭṭhānānam ca

analyzed: āha na tesam tiādi hetū hetu sampayuttakānam dhammānam tad samuṭṭhānānam ca rūpānam

original: kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti. Sabbattha upanissayabhāvo balavakammavasena
analyzed: kammam vipākassa upanissaya paccayena paccayo ti sabbattha upanissaya bhāvaḥ balava kamma vasena
