analyzed: vañcaka ttā abhūtena ati yakkhinī ādayaḥ abhūtena atacchena manāpa vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna ādinā

original: sattānaṃ vañcakattā mahantāni abhūtāni etesūti mahābhūtāti sammatā. Yathā hi yakkhinīādayo
analyzed: sattānam vañcakattā mahantāni abhūtāni etesu iti mahābhūtā ati sammatā yathā hi yakkhinī ādayaḥ

original: manāpehi kāḷasāmādivaṇṇehi, puthulapīvarakisādisaṇṭhānehi, hatthabhamuādivikkhepehi
analyzed: manāpehi kāḷa sāma ādi vaṇṇehi puthula pīvara kisa ādi saṇṭhānehi hattha bhamu ādi vikkhepehi

original: ca attano bhayānakabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti, attano vasaṃ nenti, evametepi
analyzed: ca attanaḥ bhayānaka bhāvam paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti attanaḥ vasam nenti evam ete pi

original: itthipurisādīsu manāpena chavivaṇṇena, manāpena aṅgapaccaṅgasaṇṭhānena, manāpena
analyzed: itthi purisa ādīsu manāpena chavi vaṇṇena manāpena aṅga paccaṅga saṇṭhānena manāpena

original: ca hatthapādaaṅgulibhamukavikkhepena attano kakkhaḷattādisarīralakkhaṇaṃ paṭicchādetvā
analyzed: ca hattha pāda aṅguli bhamuka vikkhepena attano kakkhaḷa ttā ādi sarīra lakkhaṇam paṭicchādetvā

original: bālajanaṃ vañcenti, attano sabhāvaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na dentā taṃ attano vasaṃ nenti.
analyzed: bāla janam vañcenti attanaḥ sabhāvam daṭṭhum na dentā tam attanaḥ vasam nenti

original: 627-30. Cakkhusotantiādīsu rūpameva rūpatā. Hadayañca taṃ vatthu ca manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnanti
analyzed: cakkhu sota nti ādīsu rūpam eva rūpa tā hadayam ca tam vatthu ca manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātūnam ti

original: hadayavatthu, hadayassa vā viññāṇassa vatthūti hadayavatthu, purimapadalopena pana
analyzed: hadaya vatthu hadayassa vā viññāṇassa vatthu uti hadaya vatthu purima pada lopena pana

original: “vatthu”nti vuttaṃ. Kabaḷīkāro āhāroyeva āhāratā. Kiñcāpi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ rūpaniddese
analyzed: vatthum ti vuttam kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ yeva āhāra tā kiñca api dhammasaṅgaṇiyam rūpa niddese

original: kabaḷīkāro āhāro osāne uddiṭṭho, idha pana nipphannarūpānaṃ ekaṭṭhāne dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ osāne uddiṭṭhaḥ idha pana nipphanna rūpānam eka ṭṭhāne dassana ttham

original: hadayavatthuanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhoti. Lahutā ādi yāsaṃ mudutākammaññatānanti lahutādayo,
analyzed: hadaya vatthu anantaram ādi yāsam lahu tā ādayaḥ

original: tāsaṃ tayaṃ lahutādittayaṃ, tattha lahubhāvo lahutā, tathā mudutāpi. Kammani sādhu
analyzed: tāsam tayam tattha lahu bhāvaḥ lahu tā tathā mudu tā api kammani sādhu

original: kammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo kammaññatā. Lahutādīnaṃ sayaṃ anipphannattā nipphannarūpavikārabhāvaṃ
analyzed: tassa bhāvaḥ kammañña tā lahu tā ādīnam sayam a nipphanna ttā nipphanna rūpa vikāra bhāvam

original: dassetuṃ “rūpassā”ti visesanaṃ kataṃ. Catuvīsatīti gaṇanaparicchedo, balavarūpādīnaṃ
analyzed: dassetum rūpassa ati visesanam katam catuvīsati iti gaṇana paricchedaḥ balava rūpa ādīnam

original: nisedhanattho. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Nissāyāti nissāya
analyzed: nisedhana atthaḥ tattha yam vattabbam tam paratas bhavissati nissāya ati nissāya

original: eva, na pana nissayavasenapi. Catūhi upādānehi nimuttatāya nikkhantaṃ upādānato mānasaṃ
analyzed: eva na pana nissaya vasena api catūhi upādānehi nimutta tāya nikkhantam upādānataḥ mānasam

original: etassāti nirupādānamānaso.
analyzed: etassa ati nirupādāna mānasaḥ

original: 631-2. Patthaṭattāti puthuttā, tena puthubhāvato puthavī, puthavī eva pathavīti niruttinayena
analyzed: tena puthuttā tena puthu bhāvato puthavī puthavī eva pathavī iti nirutti nayena

original: saddasiddhi dīpitā hoti. Ayaṃ pana sambhārapathaviyā vasena yujjati. Sā hi puthubhūtā
analyzed: dīpitā hoti ayam pana sambhāra pathaviyā vasena yujjati sā hi puthu bhūtā

original: patthaṭāti. Lakkhaṇapathaviyā vasena pana pathanaṭṭhena pathavī, sahajarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvena
analyzed: patthaṭā ti lakkhaṇa pathaviyāḥ vasena pana pathana ṭṭhena pathavī sahaja rūpānam patiṭṭhā bhāvena

original: pakkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti attho. Purimopi vā attho lakkhaṇapathaviyā vasena labbhati.
analyzed: pakkhāyati upaṭṭhāti iti attho purimaḥ api vā attho lakkhaṇa pathaviyā vasena labbhati

original: Vāyanatoti samudīraṇato, desantaruppattihetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghāṭassa pāpanatoti attho.
analyzed: vāyanataḥ iti samudīraṇataḥ desa antara uppatti hetu bhāvena bhūta saṅghāṭassa pāpanataḥ ti attho

original: Tejeti paripāceti, niseti vā, tikkhabhāvena sesabhūtattayaṃ usmāpetīti attho. Gāthābandhavasena
analyzed: tejeti paripāceti nisā iti vā tikkha bhāvena sesa bhūtattayam usmāpeti iti atthaḥ gāthābandha vasena

original: cettha iti-saddalopato “tejeti”cceva vuttaṃ. Evaṃ “āpetī”ti etthāpi. Tasmā tejetīti
analyzed: ca ittha iti sadda lopato vuttam evam āpeti iti ettha api tasmā tejeti iti

original: tejo, āpetīti āpoti vuttaṃ hoti. Āpeti pālanāti anupāletabbarūpapariyosānaṃ āpeti
analyzed: tejaḥ āpeti iti āpaḥ iti vuttam hoti āpeti pālanā ati anupāletabba rūpa pariyosānam āpeti

original: pattharati. Tathā hetaṃ “ābandhanakicca”nti vuccati. Āpīyatīti āpo. Sosīyati pivīyatīti
analyzed: pattharati tathā ha itam ābandhana kiccam ti vuccati āpīyati iti āpaḥ sosīyati pivīyati iti

original: atthoti keci. Ayaṃ panattho sasambhārāpe yujjatīti vadanti, lakkhaṇāpepi yujjateva.
analyzed: atthaḥ iti keci ayam pana atthaḥ sa sambhāra āpe yujjati iti vadanti lakkhaṇa āpe pi yujjatā iva

original: Sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti. Āpāyatīti
analyzed: saḥ api hi pharusa pācana visosana ākārena sesa bhūta ttayena pīyamānaḥ viya pavattati iti āpāyati iti

original: vā āpo, brūheti vaḍḍhetīti attho. Tathā hesa paribrūhanaraso. Tesanti yathāvuttānaṃ
analyzed: vai āpaḥ brūha iti vaḍḍheti iti attho tathā ha esa paribrūhana raso tesanti yathāvuttānam

original: bhūtopādāyabhedānaṃ rūpānaṃ. Vakkhāmīti kathessāmi. Kiṃ kāraṇāti āha “lakkhaṇādīsū”tiādi.
analyzed: bhūta upādāya bhedānam rūpānam vakkhāmi iti kathessāmi kim kāraṇā ti āha lakkhaṇa ādīsu utiādi

original: Hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā lakkhaṇādīsu ñātesu dhammā āvi bhavissanti, tasmā tesaṃ
analyzed: hi saddaḥ hetu atthaḥ yasmā lakkhaṇa ādīsu ñātesu dhammāḥ āvi bhavissanti tasmā tesam

original: parato āvibhāvahetūti attho.
analyzed: paratas āvi bhāva hetu uti attho

original: 633-4. Kāni pana tāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni nāma, yesu ñātesu dhammā
analyzed: kāni pana tāni lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānāni nāma yesu ñātesu dhammā

original: āvi bhavissantīti imaṃ codanaṃ sodhetuṃ lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni sarūpato
analyzed: āvi bhavissanti iti imam codanam sodhetum lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānāni sarūpato

original: kathento āha “sāmaññaṃ vā”tiādi. Sāmaññaṃ sādhāraṇo aniccādiko. Sabhāvo kakkhaḷādiphusanādiko
analyzed: kathentaḥ āha sāmaññam vā atiādi sāmaññam sādhāraṇaḥ anicca ādiko sabhāvo kakkhaḷa ādi phusana ādiko

original: asādhāraṇabhāvo. Kiccanti sandhāraṇādikiccaṃ. Sampattīti sampannabhāvo. “Suraso gandhabbo”tiādīsu
analyzed: iti

original: hi gandhabbasampattiyā rasa-saddena vuccamānattā sampatti rasoti. Phalanti sahajātanānakkhaṇikavasena
analyzed: hi gandha bba sampattiyāḥ rasa saddena vuccamāna ttā sampatti rasaḥ ti phalanti sahajāta nānā khaṇika vasena

original: ṭhitaṃ phalaṃ. Upaṭṭhānanayoti gahetabbabhāvena ñāṇassa upaṭṭhānākāro. Āsannakāraṇanti padhānakāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhitam phalam upaṭṭhāna nayo ti gahetabba bhāvena ñāṇassa upaṭṭhāna ākāraḥ āsanna kāraṇam ti padhāna kāraṇam

original: Lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷattaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: lakkhīyati etena ati lakkhaṇam kakkhaḷattam lakkhaṇam etissa ati kakkhaḷatta lakkhaṇā

original: Nanu ca kakkhaḷattameva pathavīdhātūti? Saccametaṃ. Tathā hi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena
analyzed: nanu ca kakkhaḷattam eva pathavī dhātu uti saccam etam tathā hi viññāta a viññāta saddattha tā vasena

original: asambhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato. Evañhi atthavisesāvabodho
analyzed: asambhinne pi dhamme kappanā siddhena bhedena evam niddeso kataḥ evam hi attha visesa avabodho

original: hotīti. Atha vā lakkhīyatīti lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷā hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti
analyzed: hoti iti atha vā lakkhīyati iti lakkhaṇam kakkhaḷā hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷatta lakkhaṇā ati

original: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesāsupi eseva nayo. Patiṭṭhānarasāti sahajātadhammānaṃ
analyzed: evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo sesāsu pi esa iva nayaḥ patiṭṭhāna rasā ati sahajāta dhammānam

original: patiṭṭhānabhāvakiccā. Asahajātānampi santativasena patiṭṭhānabhāvo hoteva. Tato eva
analyzed: patiṭṭhāna bhāva kiccā asahajātānam pi santati vasena patiṭṭhāna bhāvaḥ hotā iva tatas eva

original: nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhātīti sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā. Iminā
analyzed: na īsam sampaṭicchana ākārena ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhāti iti sampaṭicchana paccupaṭṭhānā iminā

original: kiccavasenevettha “paccupaṭṭhāna”nti dasseti. Padaṭṭhānaṃ panettha catunnampi ekato katvā vakkhati.
analyzed: kicca vasena iva ittha paccupaṭṭhānanti dasseti padaṭṭhānam pana ittha catunnam pi ekatas katvā vakkhati

original: Paggharaṇalakkhaṇāti dravatābhāvato vissandanalakkhaṇā. Brūhanarasāti sahajātadhammānaṃ
analyzed: paggharaṇa lakkhaṇā ati drava tā bhāvataḥ vissandana lakkhaṇā brūhana rasā ati sahajāta dhammānam

original: milātabhāvūpagamanaṃ adatvā vaḍḍhanakiccā. Tathā hi sā tesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti
analyzed: milāta bhāva upagamanam a datvā vaḍḍhana kiccā tathā hi sā tesam pīṇita bhāvam dasseti iti

original: vuccati. Saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhirakaudakaṃ viya nahāniyacuṇṇassa sahajātadhammānaṃ
analyzed: vuccati saṅgaha paccupaṭṭhānā ti bāhiraka odakam viya na hāniya cuṇṇassa sahajāta dhammānam

original: vippakirituṃ adatvā sampiṇḍanavasena saṅgaṇhanapaccupaṭṭhānā. Paripācanarasāti pariṇatabhāvakaraṇarasā.
analyzed: vippakiritum a datvā sampiṇḍana vasena saṅgaṇhana paccupaṭṭhānā paripācana rasā ati pariṇata bhāva karaṇa rasā

original: Maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: maddava anuppadāna paccupaṭṭhānā ti bāhiraggi viya jatu loha ādīnam sahajāta dhammānam mudu bhāva anuppadāna paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Vitthambhanalakkhaṇāti pūraṇalakkhaṇā. Samudīraṇarasāti kampanarasā. Abhinīhāro bhūtattayassa
analyzed: vitthambhana lakkhaṇā ati pūraṇa lakkhaṇā samudīraṇa rasā ati kampana rasā abhinīhāraḥ bhūta ttayassa

original: desantaruppattihetubhāvo, nīharaṇaṃ vā bījato aṅkurādikassa viya. Ekekā…pe… tabbāti
analyzed: desantara uppatti hetu bhāvaḥ nīharaṇam vā bījataḥ aṅkura ādikassa viya

original: pathavīdhātu āpādibhūtattayapadaṭṭhānā, āpodhātu pathavītejādibhūtattayapadaṭṭhānāti
analyzed: pathavī dhātu āpa ādi bhū tattaya padaṭṭhānā āpaḥ dhātu pathavī teja ādi bhū tattaya padaṭṭhānā ati

original: evaṃ ekekā dhātu avasiṭṭhabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: evam ekekā dhātu

original: Ārohapariṇāhavasena hi majjhime imasmiṃ sarīre pariggayhamānā paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā
analyzed: āroha pariṇāha vasena hi majjhime imasmin sarīre pariggayhamānā paramāṇu bheda sañcuṇṇā

original: sukhumarajabhūtā pathavīdhātu doṇamattā siyā. Sā ca tato upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpodhātuyā
analyzed: sukhuma raja bhūtā pathavī dhātu doṇa mattā siyā sā ca tatas upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpas dhātuyā

original: yathā na vikirati, evaṃ ābandhanavasena saṅgahitā. Yathā pana paggharaṇasabhāvāya
analyzed: yathā na vikirati evam ābandhana vasena saṅgahitā yathā pana paggharaṇa sabhāvāya

original: āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ picchalabhāvaṃ nāpajjati, evaṃ tejodhātuyā anupālitā.
analyzed: āpaḥ dhātuyāḥ vasena kilinna bhāvam picchala bhāvam na āpajjati evam tejaḥ dhātuyāḥ anupālitā

original: Yathā pana tassā vasena na vikirīyati, evaṃ vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitā saṅghātabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yathā pana tassā vasena na vikirīyati evam vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitā saṅghāta bhāvam

original: pāpitā. Evaṃ sukhumarajabhūtāpi ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi āpotejovāyodhātūhi
analyzed: evam ābandhana paripācana samudīraṇa kiccāhi āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyaḥ dhātūhi

original: laddhapaccayā sinehena temitā, tejasā paripakkā, vāyunā vitthambhitā piṭṭhacuṇṇāni
analyzed: laddha paccayā sinehena temitā tejasā paripakkā vāyunā vitthambhitā piṭṭha cuṇṇāni

original: viya na ito cito ca vikirīyati viddhaṃsīyati, avikiriyamānā aviddhaṃsiyamānā nānappakārakaṃ
analyzed: na itas citas ca vikirīyati viddhaṃsīyati a vikiriyamānā a viddhaṃsiyamānā nānā pakārakaṃ

original: itthipurisaliṅgādibhāvavibhāgaṃ upagacchati, aṇuthūladīgharassathirakathinādibhāvañca pakāseti.
analyzed: itthi purisa liṅga ādi bhāva vibhāgam upagacchati aṇu thūla dīgha rassa thiraka thina ādi bhāvam ca pakāseti

original: Yūsagatā ābandhanākārabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejānupālitā vāyovitthambhitā
analyzed: ābandhana ākāra bhūtā pana ittha āpodhātu pathavī patiṭṭhitā teja anupālitā vāyo vitthambhitā

original: na gaḷati, na paggharati, na parissavati. Evaṃ tīhi dhātūhi anupālitā apaggharamānā
analyzed: na gaḷati na paggharati na parissavati evam tīhi dhātūhi anupālitā apaggharamānā

original: aparissavamānā piṇḍitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Esā hi anubrūhanarasā.
analyzed: a parissavamānā piṇḍita bhāvam dasseti esā hi anubrūhana rasā

original: Asitapītādiparipācitā cettha usumākārabhūtā uṇhattalakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā
analyzed: asita pīta ādi paripācitā ca ittha usuma ākāra bhūtā uṇhatta lakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavī patiṭṭhitā

original: āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti, vaṇṇasampattiñcassa āvahati.
analyzed: āposaṅga hitā vāyovitthambhitā imam kāyam paripāca iti vaṇṇa sampattim ca assa āvahati

original: Sā hi yathānubhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī
analyzed: sā hi yathā anubhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasa ādi sampattiyāḥ hetu bhāvam gacchantī

original: imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti, vaṇṇasampattiñca āvahati. Kammūpanissayāya hi cittapasādahetukāya
analyzed: imam kāyam paripāceti vaṇṇa sampattiñca āvahati kamma upanissayāya hi citta pasāda hetukāya

original: ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo, pageva utuāhārasamuṭṭhānāya rūpasampattiyāti.
analyzed: ca sarīre vaṇṇa sampadāya tejodhātu visesa paccayo pagā iva utu āhāra samuṭṭhānāya rūpa sampattiyā ti

original: Tāya ca pana paripācito ayaṃ kāyo na pūtibhāvaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: tāya ca pana paripācitaḥ ayam kāyaḥ na pūti bhāvam gacchati

original: Aṅgamaṅgānusaṭā cettha samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavīdhātuyā attani
analyzed: ca ittha samudīraṇa vitthambhana lakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavī dhātuyā

original: patiṭṭhāpīyati. Yathā sahajātadhammehi visuṃ na hoti, evaṃ āpodhātuyā saṅgayhati.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpīyati yathā sahajāta dhammehi visum na hoti evam āpodhātuyā saṅgayhati

original: Yathā sahajātadhammā na parissavanti, evaṃ tejodhātuyā anupālīyati. Sā evaṃ tīhi
analyzed: yathā sahajāta dhammāḥ na parissavanti evam tejaḥ dhātuyā anupālīyati sā evam tīhi

original: dhātūhi yathārahaṃ anupāliyamānā imaṃ kāyaṃ vitthambheti. Tāya pana vitthambhito
analyzed: dhātūhi yathāraham anupāliyamānāḥ imam kāyam vitthambheti tāya pana vitthambhitaḥ

original: ayaṃ kāyo na paripatati, ujukaṃ tiṭṭhati, iccevaṃ ekekāya dhātuyā tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ

original: yojenti. Diṭṭhamaṇḍaleti abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte diṭṭhamaṇḍale.
analyzed: yojenti diṭṭha maṇḍale iti abhimukhe ṭhitānam sarīra saṇṭhāna uppatti desa bhūte diṭṭha maṇḍale

original: 653-5. Sandhāraṇā…pe… hutvānāti sandhāraṇanahāpanamaṇḍanabījanakiccāhi catūhi dhātīhi
analyzed: sandhāraṇa ape sandhāraṇa na hāpana maṇḍana bījana kiccāhi catūhi dhātīhi

original: khattiyakumāro viya sandhāraṇābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi attanissayabhūtāhi
analyzed: khattiya kumāraḥ viya sandhāraṇa ābandhana paripācana samudīraṇa kiccāhi atta nissaya bhūtāhi

original: catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ hutvā. Utucittādināti tīhi santatisamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi.
analyzed: catūhi dhātūhi katu upakāram hutvā utu citta ādinā ati tīhi santati samuṭṭhāpakehi utu citta āhārehi

original: Ettha ca kalāpantaragatā utuāhārā adhippetāti vadanti. Āyunā katapālananti catudhātunissiteneva
analyzed: ettha ca kalāpa antara gatāḥ utu āhārāḥ adhippetā ati vadanti āyunā catu dhātu nissitena iva

original: jīvitindriyena rakkhiyamānaṃ. Tathā hetaṃ kammajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Vaṇṇagandharasādīhīti
analyzed: jīvitindriyena rakkhiyamānam tathā ha itam kamma ja rūpa paripālana lakkhaṇam vaṇṇa gandha rasa ādīhi iti

original: ādi-ggahaṇena ojaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, “vaṇṇagandharasojāhī”ti vā pāṭho. Vatthudvārañca sādhayanti
analyzed: ādi gahaṇena ojam saṅgaṇhāti vā pāṭhaḥ vatthu dvāram ca sādhayanti

original: yathāyogaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇassa hi nissayabhāvato vatthubhāvaṃ,
analyzed: yathāyogam vatthu dvāra bhāvam sādhayamānam cakkhu viññāṇassa hi nissaya bhāvataḥ vatthu bhāvam

original: pavattimukhabhāvato dvārabhāvañca sādheti. Sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pana tadārammaṇāvasānānaṃ
analyzed: pavatti mukha bhāvataḥ dvāra bhāvañca sādhā iti sampaṭicchana ādīnam pana

original: aññanissitattā dvārabhāvameva sādheti, na vatthubhāvaṃ. Ūkāsirasamānena pamāṇenāti
analyzed: añña nissita ttā dvāra bhāvam eva sādheti na vatthu bhāvam ūka sira samānena pamāṇena ati

original: ūkāsirasamānena padesappamāṇena lakkhitaṃ hutvā ūkāsirasamānappamāṇe ṭhāneti vā attho.
analyzed: ūkāsi rasamānena padesa ppamāṇena lakkhitam hutvā ūkāsi rasamāna ppamāṇe ṭhāne iti vā atthaḥ

original: Tiṭṭhatīti satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ viya tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: tiṭṭhati iti satta akkhi paṭalāni byāpetvā sattasu picu paṭalesu āsitta telam viya tiṭṭhati

original: Evañca katvā cakkhussa anekakalāpagatatā siddhā hoti. Upaddavānaṃ paṭalanirākaraṇepi
analyzed: evam ca katvā cakkhussa aneka kalāpa gata tā siddhā hoti upaddavānam paṭala nirākaraṇe pi

original: hi cakkhu vijjatevāti. Yathā ca cakkhu, evamimassa nissayabhūtā catasso dhātuyo,
analyzed: hi cakkhu vijjate iva ati yathā ca cakkhu evam imassa nissaya bhūtā catasso dhātuyaḥ

original: āyuvaṇṇādīni ca satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāneva avinibbhogavuttittāti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: āyu vaṇṇa ādīni ca satta akkhi paṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāna eva avinibbhoga vutti ttā ati gahetabbam

original: 656. Vuttanti dhammasenāpatinā vuttaṃ. Rūpāni manupassatīti ma-kāro padasandhikaro
analyzed: vuttam ti dhammasenāpatinā vuttam rūpāni manupassati iti makāro pada sandhi karo

original: “aññamaññaṃ samaṇamacalo”tiādīsu viya. Atha vā manūti maccoti attho. Kiñcāpi cakkhu
analyzed: aññam aññam samaṇam acalo ti ādīsu viya atha vā manu uti macco ti attho kiñca api cakkhu

original: rūpaṃ na passati, kiñcarahi tannissitaṃ viññāṇameva. Tathā hi “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tiādīsu
analyzed: rūpam na passati kiñcarahi tad nissitam viññāṇam eva tathā hi mañcāḥ ukkuṭṭhim karonti itiādīsu

original: viya nissitakiriyaṃ nissaye viya katvā vohārasambhavato “cakkhupasādena passatī”ti
analyzed: viya nissita kiriyam nissaye viya katvā vohāra sambhavato cakkhu pasādena passati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Ācariyajotipālattherenāpi hi imināva adhippāyena idaṃ vuttaṃ. Idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: vuttam ācariya jotipāla ttherena api hi iminā ava adhippāyena idam vuttam idam ettha sanniṭṭhānam

original: kiṃ cakkhu rūpaṃ passati, udāhu viññāṇanti, kiñcettha – yadi cakkhu passeyya, aññaviññāṇasamaṅginopi
analyzed: kim cakkhu rūpam passati udāhu viññāṇan ti kiñca ittha yadi cakkhu passeyya añña viññāṇa samaṅginaḥ api

original: cakkhu passeyya. Atha viññāṇaṃ, kuṭṭādiantaritampi passeyya tassa appaṭighātattā?
analyzed: cakkhu passeyya atha viññāṇam kuṭṭa ādi antaritam pi passeyya tassa a paṭighāta ttā

original: Nāyaṃ doso. Yassa “cakkhu passatī”ti mataṃ, tassāpi na sabbaṃ cakkhu passati, atha
analyzed: na ayam dosaḥ yassa cakkhu passati iti matam tassa api na sabbam cakkhu passati atha

original: kho viññāṇādhiṭṭhitameva. Yassa pana viññāṇaṃ passatīti mataṃ, tassāpi na sabbaṃ
analyzed: kho viññāṇa adhiṭṭhitam eva yassa pana viññāṇam passati iti matam tassa api na sabbam

original: viññāṇaṃ passati, atha kho cakkhunissitameva, tañca antarite nuppajjati. Yattha ālokassa
analyzed: viññāṇam passati atha kho cakkhu nissitam eva tat ca antarite na uppajjati yattha ālokassa

original: kuṭṭādīhi vinibandho, yattha pana so natthi phalikaabbhapaṭalādimhi, tattha antaritepi
analyzed: kuṭṭa ādīhi vinibandhaḥ yattha pana saḥ natthi phalika abbha paṭala ādimhi tattha antarite pi

original: uppajjati eva, tasmā taṃ anuppannattā antaritaṃ na passati. Idameva ca sanniṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: uppajjati eva tasmā tam an uppanna ttā antaritam na passati idam eva ca sanniṭṭhānam

original: yaṃ kho cakkhuviññāṇaṃ passatīti. Tañhi dassanakiccaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cakkhunā
analyzed: yam kho cakkhu viññāṇam passati iti tat hi dassana kiccam yadi evam katham cakkhunā

original: rūpaṃ disvāti. Tena dvārena karaṇabhūtenāti ayamettha abhisandhi. Atha vā nissitakiriyā
analyzed: rūpam disvā ati tena dvārena karaṇa bhūtena ati ayam ettha abhisandhi atha vā nissita kiriyā

original: nissayassa pavuccati yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti. Ūkāsirasamūpamanti ūkāsirasamānūpamaṃ,
analyzed: nissayassa pavuccati yathā mañcāḥ ukkuṭṭhim karonti iti ūkāsi rasama anūpamam

original: ūkāsirappamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañcassa patiṭṭhānokāsavasena vuttaṃ, na pana attano
analyzed: vuttam hoti idam ca assa patiṭṭhāna ukāsa vasena vuttam na pana attanaḥ

original: pamāṇavasena. Tañhi paramāṇupariyantena pamāṇena atisukhumamevāti. Ūkāsirappamāṇe
analyzed: pamāṇa vasena tat hi paramāṇu pariyantena pamāṇena ati sukhumam eva ati ūkāsira pamāṇe

original: pana padese idaṃ pavattati. Na kevalañca idameva, sabbānipi sabbaṭṭhānikarūpāni tattha
analyzed: pana padese idam pavattati na kevalam ca idam eva sabbāni api sabba ṭṭhānika rūpāni tattha

original: pavattanteva. Idañca tattha nibbattantaṃ taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā eva nibbattati. Ekūnapaṇṇāsakalāpavasena
analyzed: pavattantā iva idam ca tattha nibbattantam tam padesam pūretvā eva nibbattati ekūna paṇṇāsa kalāpa vasena

original: ca saheva pavattati, sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukattā rūpānaṃ, ekekassa ca cittassa tīsu
analyzed: ca saha iva pavattati satta rasa cittakkhaṇa āyuka ttā rūpānaṃ ekekassa ca cittassa tīsu

original: tīsu khaṇesu kammajarūpānaṃ uppajjamānattā.
analyzed: tīsu khaṇesu kamma ja rūpānam uppajjamāna ttā

original: 657. Suṇātīti sotanti ettha kiṃ sotaṃ suṇāti, udāhu viññāṇantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena
analyzed: suṇāti iti sotam ti ettha kim sotam suṇāti udāhu viññāṇam ti ādinā heṭṭhā vutta nayena

original: yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tanutambalomāciteti sasambhārasotabilassa anto sukhumehi
analyzed: yathāsambhavam yojetabbam tanu tamba loma ācita iti sa sambhāra sota bilassa antaḥ

original: tambavaṇṇalomehi sañcite. Aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padeseti aṅgulimuddikāsaṇṭhānamaṃsayutte
analyzed: tamba vaṇṇa lomehi sañcite aṅgulivedhaka saṇṭhāne aṅguli muddikā saṇṭhānam aṃsa yutte

original: padese. Vuttappakārāhīti sandhāraṇādikiccāhi. Āyunā paripāliyamānanti ettha vaṇṇādīhi
analyzed: padese vutta ppakārāhi iti sandhāraṇa ādi kiccāhi āyunā ettha vaṇṇa ādīhi

original: parivāritanti sambandhitabbaṃ. Tiṭṭhatīti pubbe vuttanayena taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: parivāritam tiṭṭhati iti pubbe vutta nayena tam padesam pūretvā tiṭṭhati

original: Sesaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Ghāyatīti gandhopādānaṃ karoti. Sāyatīti rasaṃ vindati.
analyzed: sesam vutta nayena veditabbam ghāyati iti gandha upādānam karoti sāyati iti rasam vindati

original: Jīvitamavhāyatīti ettha rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitanimittaṃ ajjhoharaṇaraso
analyzed: jīvitam avhāyati iti ettha rasa ggahaṇa mūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvita nimittam ajjhoharaṇa rasaḥ

original: jīvitaṃ, taṃ avhāyati tasmiṃ ninnatāya avhāyantamiva hoti. Uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne
analyzed: jīvitam tam avhāyati tasmin ninna tāya avhāyantam iva hoti uppala dalagga saṇṭhāne

original: padeseti majjhe chinnassa uppaladalassa aggabhāgasaṇṭhāne padese. Malānanti kilesādimalānañceva
analyzed: padese ti majjhe chinnassa uppala dalassa agga bhāga saṇṭhāne padese malānan ti kilesa ādi malānan ca iva

original: malavisayānañca sāsavadhammānaṃ anuttariyabhāvaṃ gacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu
analyzed: mala visayānam ca sa āsava dhammānam anuttariya bhāvam gacchantesu kāma rāga nidāna kamma janitesu

original: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā
analyzed: kāma rāgassa ca visesa paccayesu ghāna jivhā kāyesu kāyassa visesataḥ sa āsava paccaya ttā

original: soyeva tesaṃ āyoti vuccati. Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
analyzed: saḥ yā iva tesam āyaḥ ti vuccati tena hi phoṭṭhabba sukham assādentā sattāḥ methunam pi sevanti

original: Atha vā kāyindriyavatthukā cattāro khandhā balavakāmarāgādihetubhāvato visesato malā,
analyzed: atha vā kāyindriya vatthukā cattāraḥ khandhāḥ balava kāma rāga ādi hetu bhāvataḥ visesataḥ malā

original: tesamayaṃ āyo hetūti kāyoti vutto. Imasmiṃ kāyeti imasmiṃ sasambhārakāye. Sopi hi
analyzed: āyaḥ hetu uti kāyo ti vutto imasmin kāye iti imasmin sa sambhāra kāye saḥ api hi

original: kucchitānaṃ kesādimalānaṃ āyabhāvato kāyoti vuccati. Yāvatā upādinnakaṃ atthīti iminā
analyzed: kucchitānam kesa ādi malānam āya bhāvato kāyo ti vuccati yāvatā upādinnakam atthi iti iminā

original: kesagganakhaggādīsu kāyapasādassa abhāvamāha. Kappāsapaṭale sneho viyāti imināssa
analyzed: kesa agga nakha agga ādīsu kāya pasādassa abhāvam āha kappāsa paṭale snehaḥ viyāti iminā assa

original: nirantarabhāvaṃ. Ime ca pana cakkhādayo rūpādigocaraninnatāya vammikaudakaākāsagāmasivathikāsaṅkhātagocaraninnatāya
analyzed: nirantara bhāvam ime ca pana cakkha ādayaḥ rūpa ādi gocara ninna tāya vammika audaka ākāsa gāma sivathikā saṅkhāta gocara ninna tāya

original: ahisuṃsumārapakkhikukkurasigālā viya daṭṭhabbā. Visamajjhāsayatāya hi cakkhu vammikacchiddābhiratasappo
analyzed: ahi suṃsumāra pakkhi kukkura sigālāḥ viya daṭṭhabbāḥ visamajjhāsayatāya hi cakkhu vammika chidda abhirata sappo

original: viya, bilajjhāsayatāya sotaṃ udakabilābhiratasuṃsumāro viya, ākāsajjhāsayatāya ghānaṃ
analyzed: viya bila ajjhāsayatāya sotam udaka bila abhirata suṃsumāraḥ viya ākāsa ajjhāsayatāya ghānam

original: ajaṭākāsābhiratapakkhi viya, gāmajjhāsayatāya jivhā gāmābhiratakukkuro viya, upādinnakajjhāsayatāya
analyzed: a jaṭā kāsa abhirata pakkhi viya gām ajjhāsayatāya jivhā gāma abhirata kukkuraḥ viya upādinna kajjhāsayatāya

original: kāyo āmakasusānābhiratasigālo viyāti. Visamajjhāsayatāyāti cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṃ
analyzed: kāyaḥ āmaka susāna abhirata sigālaḥ viyāti cakkhussa visamajjhāsayam

original: viya hotīti katvā vuttā. Cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
analyzed: viya hoti iti katvā vuttā cakkhumataḥ vā puggalassa ajjhāsaya vasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayam esa nayo sesesu pi

original: Daṭṭhu…pe… lakkhaṇanti ettha daṭṭhuṃ kāmetīti daṭṭhukāmo tassa bhāvo daṭṭhukāmatā,
analyzed: ettha daṭṭhupe lakkhaṇanti ettha daṭṭhum kāmeti iti daṭṭhu kāmaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ daṭṭhu kāma tā

original: rūpataṇhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sā pana anāgate cakkhādīsu ādīnavapaṭicchādikāvijjāmūlapatthanāsabhāvā
analyzed: adhivacanam sā pana anāgate cakkhu ādīsu ādīnava paṭicchādikā vijjā mūla patthanā sabhāvā

original: pākaṭā apākaṭāti duvidhā. Tattha yā ayaṃ “īdisaṃ īdisañca sukhumatamavisayaggahaṇasamatthaṃ
analyzed: pākaṭā apākaṭā ati duvidhā tattha yā ayam īdisam īdisam ca

original: cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ kammāyūhanato pubbe, pacchā vā uppannā pākaṭā. Indriyavisesaṃ
analyzed: cakkhu hotu uti evam kamma āyūhanato pubbe pacchā vā uppannā pākaṭā indriya visesam

original: pana anāmasitvā avisesena paripuṇṇāyatanabhavasampattiṃ patthetvā, apatthetvā vā
analyzed: pana an āmasitvā avisesena paripuṇṇa āyatana bhava sampattim patthetvā a patthetvā vā

original: tattha avigatataṇhāvasena kammaṃ karontassa appahīnabhāvena anusayitā api kammasāmatthiyavicittahetubhūtā
analyzed: tattha avigata taṇhā vasena kammam karontassa appahīna bhāvena anusayitā api kamma sāmatthiya vicitta hetu bhūtā

original: apākaṭā. Sā duvidhāpi nidānaṃ upanissayo yassa taṃ daṭṭhukāmatānidānaṃ, tadeva kammaṃ,
analyzed: apākaṭā sā duvidhā api nidānam upanissayaḥ yassa tam daṭṭhu kāma tā nidānam tat eva kammam

original: taṃ samuṭṭhānametesanti daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānāni, evaṃvidhānaṃ bhūtānaṃ
analyzed: tam samuṭṭhānam etesanti daṭṭhu kāma tā nidāna kamma samuṭṭhānāni evaṃvidhānam bhūtānam

original: pasādo daṭṭhukāmatā…pe… pasādo, taṃ lakkhaṇamassa, tathā hutvā lakkhīyatīti vā daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammasamuṭṭhānabhūtapasādalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: pasādaḥ daṭṭhu kāma tāpe pasādo tam lakkhaṇam assa tathā hutvā lakkhīyati iti vā daṭṭhu kāma tā nidāna kamma samuṭṭhāna bhūta pasāda lakkhaṇam

original: Ettha ca gabbhaseyyakānaṃ dinnapaṭisandhikaṃ, aññaṃ vā kammaṃ cakkhādīni nibbatteti.
analyzed: ettha ca gabbhaseyyakānam dinna paṭisandhikam aññam vā kammam cakkha ādīni nibbatteti

original: Opapātikānaṃ pana paṭisandhikkhaṇeva paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ paṭisandhijanakameva
analyzed: opapātikānam pana paṭisandhi khaṇā iva paripuṇṇa āyatanānam nibbattamānānam paṭisandhi janakam eva

original: kammaṃ paripuṇṇasakalamattabhāvaṃ nibbattetīti gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana ekakammunā
analyzed: kammam paripuṇṇa sakala matta bhāvam nibbatteti iti gahetabbam katham pana eka kammunā

original: nibbattamānānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visesoti? Kāraṇassa bhinnattā. Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā
analyzed: nibbattamānānam cakkha ādīnam visesaḥ ti kāraṇassa bhinna ttā taṃ taṃbhava patthanā bhūtā

original: hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
analyzed: hi taṇhā taṃ taṃ bhava pariyāpanna āyatana abhilāsa tāya sayam vicitta rūpā upanissaya bhāvena

original: taṃtaṃbhavanibbattakakammassapi vicittabhedataṃ vidahati. Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ tathāvidhasamatthatāyogena
analyzed: taṃtaṃbhava nibbattaka kammassa api vicitta bheda tam vidahati yatas tad āhita visesam tathāvidha samattha tā yogena

original: anekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekavisiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti, na cettha samatthatāsamatthatāsabhāvato
analyzed: aneka rūpa āpannam viya aneka visiṭṭha sabhāvam phalam nibbatteti na ca ittha samattha tā a samattha tā sabhāvato

original: aññā veditabbā. Kāraṇavisesena āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanasamatthatābhāvato
analyzed: aññā veditabbā kāraṇa visesena āhita visesassa visiṭṭha phala nipphādana samattha tā bhāvato

original: ekasseva kammassa soḷasādivipākanibbattanahetubhāvena ca ayamattho sampaṭicchitabbo.
analyzed: ekassa iva kammassa soḷasa ādi vipāka nibbattana hetu bhāvena ca ayam attho sampaṭicchitabbo

original: Lokepi ekasseva sālibījassa paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇataṇḍulaphalanibbattihetutā dissateva.

analyzed: visayam tattakam visayam gahaṇa ākāram pharitvā gaṇhāti tasmai asiddham etam sa antare

analyzed: adhike ca visaye viññāṇa uppatti hetu bhāvato ti tam na adhiṭṭhānataḥ bahi indriya uppattiyā

original: Sati ca etassa bahi pavattiyaṃ adhiṭṭhāne pihitepi visayaggahaṇaṃ siyā, tasmā adhiṭṭhānadese

original: “Sabbagocarayogepi, diṭṭhaṃ rūparavesu yaṃ;
analyzed: sabba gocara yoge pi diṭṭham rūpa ravesu yam

analyzed: tassa atthaḥ sabbesam cakkha ādīnam gocarena rūpa ādinā yoge eka kāriya sādhaka ttā sambandhe

original: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyanti. Asampattaggāhakatte

analyzed: vai attānam pakāseti tena āha sūcayati iti

original: 664. Itthiyā eva indriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ. Yathā cakkhādīni indriyāni purisassapi honti,
analyzed: itthiyā eva indriyam itthi indriyam yathā cakkha ādīni indriyāni purisassa api honti

original: nayidaṃ tathā. Idaṃ pana niyamena itthiyā eva hoti, tasmā “itthindriya”nti vuccati.

original: Evaṃ purisindriyepi. Itthiyā bhāvo, itthīti bhavati etena cittaṃ, abhidhānaṃ vāti

original: Ādi-ggahaṇena itthinimittaitthikuttaitthākappānaṃ saṅgaho. Tattha visadaavisadahatthapādāditā

analyzed: saṇṭhānam itthi liṅgam itthīnam hi hattha pāda gīvā aura ādi saṇṭhānam na purisānam

original: hoti. Tathā hi tāsaṃ heṭṭhimakāyo visado, uparimakāyo avisado, hatthapādā khuddakā,

original: mukhaṃ khuddakaṃ, thanamaṃsā avisadā, tā nimmassudāṭhikā. Kesabandhavatthaggahaṇañca
analyzed: mukham khuddakam thana maṃsāḥ avisadā tāḥ nimmassu dāṭhikā kesa bandha vattha gahaṇam ca

original: itthinimittaṃ. Daharakālepi suppakamusalakādīhi kīḷā makacivākena suttakantananti

analyzed: ca evamādi itthikuttam itthi kiriyā ati atthaḥ avisada ṭṭhāna gamana ādi ākāraḥ itthākappo

original: Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatīti

original: vadanti. Idaṃ pana itthiliṅgādiparidīpanaṃ akusalanti vatvā aññathāpi vaṇṇenti ācariyā.
analyzed: vadanti idam pana itthi liṅga ādi paridīpanam akusalanti vatvā aññathā api vaṇṇenti ācariyā

original: Kathaṃ? Yonipadeso itthiliṅgaṃ, sarādhippāyā itthinimittaṃ, avisadaṭṭhānagamanādayo
analyzed: katham itthi liṅgam sarā adhippāyāḥ itthi nimittam a visada ṭṭhāna gamana ādayo

original: itthikuttaṃ, itthisaṇṭhānaṃ itthākappoti. Ettha ca adhippāyo nāma purisasmiṃ methunataṇhā.

original: Sā hi tāsaṃ niccaṃ balavatarā pavattati, ato sāpi itthīti sañjānanassa nimittatāya
analyzed: sā hi tāsam niccam balavatarā pavattati atas sā api itthī iti sañjānanassa nimitta tāya

original: “itthinimitta”nti vuccati. Kiñcāpi itthīti saññāṇassa nimittatāya kuttākappānampi

original: nimitteyeva antogadhatā, tathāpi tesaṃ visuṃ gahaṇato sarādhippāyā eva nimittabhāvena adhippetā.
analyzed: nimittā iya iva antogadha tā tathā api tesam visum gahaṇataḥ sarā adhippāyāḥ eva nimitta bhāvena adhippetā

original: 665. Kiṃ panetaṃ itthiliṅgādi itthindriyaṃ viya paṭisandhisamuṭṭhitaṃ hotīti āha
analyzed: kim pana itam itthi liṅga ādi itthi indriyam viya paṭisandhi samuṭṭhitam hoti iti āha

original: samuṭṭhahanti, yebhuyyena pana itthindriyasahiteyeva santāne taṃtadākārā hutvā sambhavanti,
analyzed: samuṭṭhahanti yebhuyyena pana santāne tam tad ākārāḥ hutvā sambhavanti

original: itarattha ca na bhavantīti tesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitaṃ upādāya “itthindriyaṃ paṭicceva
analyzed: itarattha ca na bhavanti iti tesam tad bhāva bhāvitam upādāya itthi indriyam paṭicca iva

original: jāyantī”ti vuttāni. Evañca katvā vakkhati “itthi…pe… kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti.
analyzed: jāyanti iti vuttāni evañca katvā vakkhati itthipe kāraṇa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam ti

original: Īdiseneva kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā indriyasahite
analyzed: īdisena iva kāraṇa bhāva saṅkhātena adhipati bhāvena tassa indriya tā vuttā indriya sahite

original: santāne itthiliṅgādiākārarūpapaccayānaṃ aññathā anuppādanato, na pana indriyādipaccayasambhavato.
analyzed: santāne itthi liṅga ādi ākāra rūpa paccayānam aññathā anuppādanataḥ na pana indriya ādi paccaya sambhavato

original: Tathā hetaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ viya ekakalāpagatānaṃ āhāro viya kalāpantararūpānaṃ upatthambhakamanupālakaṃ
analyzed: tathā jīvitindriyam āhāraḥ

original: vā na hoti. Evañca katvā jīvitindriyaāhārānaṃ viya imassa indriyapaccayatā, atthiavigatapaccayatā
analyzed: vā na hoti evañca katvā jīvita indriya āhārānam viya imassa indriya paccaya tā atthi avigata paccaya tā

original: ca pāḷiyaṃ na vuttā. Yasmā paccayantarādhīnāni itthiliṅgādīni, tasmā yatthassa ādhipaccaṃ,
analyzed: ca pāḷiyam na vuttā yasmā paccaya antara adhīnāni itthi liṅga ādīni tasmā yatthassa ādhipaccam

original: taṃsadisesu matacittakatarūpesupi taṃsaṇṭhānatā dissati. Yasmā panete itthindriyaṃ
analyzed: tad sadisesu mata citta kata rūpesu pi tad saṇṭhāna tā dissati yasmā pana ete itthi indriyam

original: paṭicca jāyantāpi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ na samuṭṭhahanti, pavatteyeva samuṭṭhahanti,
analyzed: paṭicca jāyantā api gabbhaseyyakānam paṭisandhiyam na samuṭṭhahanti pavatteya iva samuṭṭhahanti

original: tasmā āha “pavatte…pe… paṭisandhiya”nti.

analyzed: saṃseda ja opapātikānam pana kiñci itthi indriyena saha paṭisandhiyam eva nibbattati

original: Na cāti ca-kāro vacanīyantarasamuccaye. “Kiñcā”ti imassa atthe daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā liṅgādiākāresu
analyzed: na ca ati cakāraḥ vacanīya antara samuccaye kiñca ati imassa atthe daṭṭhabbo yasmā liṅga ādi ākāresu

analyzed: rūpesu rūpa āyatanam cakkhu viññeyyam tasmai āha itthi liṅga ādayaḥ cakkhu viññeyyāḥ honti iti

original: Yasmā pana tato aññāni yathāyogaṃ sotaviññeyyāni ceva manoviññeyyāni ca, tasmā vuttaṃ

original: “na vā”ti. Yathāvutto papañco purisindriyepi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabboti atidesaṃ
analyzed: na vā ati yathāvutto papañcaḥ purisa indriye pi yathāsambhavam yojetabbo ti atidesam

original: koci cinteyyāti āha “purisindriye”ti. Paṭhamakappānanti paṭhamakappikanarānaṃ. Tesañhi
analyzed: koci cinteyya ati āha purisa indriya iti paṭhama kappānam ti paṭhama kappika narānam tesam hi

original: āharataṃ muttakarīsesu sañjātesu tesaṃ nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni bhijjanti, purisassa
analyzed: āharatam mutta karīsesu sañjātesu tesam nikkhamana atthāya vaṇa mukhāni bhijjanti purisassa

original: purisabhāvo, itthiyā ca itthibhāvo pāturahosi. Tathā hi purimattabhāvesu pavattaupacārajhānānubhāvena

original: itthipurisindriyāni pāturahesuṃ. Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya balavakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro
analyzed: itthi purisa indriyāni yadā pana assa vicchinna tāya balava kāma rāgaḥ laddha avasaraḥ

original: ahosi, tadā tadūpanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ santāne sañjāyanti.
analyzed: ahosi tadā tad upanissayāni tāni sattānam santāne sañjāyanti

original: 668. Paratoti paṭhamakappato aparabhāge. Pavatte…pe… parivattatīti yathā taṃ soreyyakaseṭṭhiputtassa
analyzed: paratas ti paṭhama kappataḥ apara bhāge parivattati iti yathā tam soreyyaka seṭṭhi puttassa

analyzed: viya ati adhippāyaḥ api saddena paṭhama pārājikāyam vinīta vatthu pāḷiyam āgata bhikkhussa

original: bhikkhuniyā viya ca paṭisandhiyaṃ samuṭṭhitassapi pavatte parivattanaṃ dīpeti. Yathāha –
analyzed: bhikkhuniyāḥ viya ca paṭisandhiyam samuṭṭhitassa api pavatte parivattanam dīpeti yathā āha

original: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti. Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthi liṅgam pātubhūtam hoti tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisa liṅgam pātubhūtam hoti iti

original: Yassa pana paṭisandhiyaṃ dvīsu ekampi na samuṭṭhitaṃ, so abhāvako nāma, tassa pavattiyampi indriyuppatti na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: yassa pana paṭisandhiyam dvīsu ekam pi na samuṭṭhitam saḥ abhāvakaḥ nāma tassa pavattiyam pi indriya uppatti na hoti iti daṭṭhabbam

original: 669. Kiṃ panetassa ubhayassapi nibbattiyā, vināsanassa ca kāraṇaṃ, yato idaṃ samuṭṭhāti,
analyzed: kim pana itassa ubhayassa api nibbattiyāḥ vināsanassa ca kāraṇam yatas idam samuṭṭhāti

original: parivattatīti ca vuccatīti imaṃ anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “mahatā pāpakammenā”tiādi.
analyzed: parivattati iti ca vuccati iti imam anuyogam manasi katvā āha mahatā pāpa kammena atiādi

original: Tattha mahatāti paradārikakammādinā mahābalena. Pāpakammena upanissayabhūtena. Mahatā
analyzed: tattha mahatā ti paradārika kamma ādinā mahā balena pāpa kammena upanissaya bhūtena mahatā

original: kusalenevāti idaṃ sugatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Duggatiyaṃ pana ubhayampi akusalakammeneva jāyati.

analyzed: indriye vinaṭṭhe ekantena iva liṅgam pi vinassatā iva ati āha itthi liṅgam vinassati iti

original: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo – imesu dvīsu purisindriyaṃ uttamaṃ, itthindriyaṃ
analyzed: ayam pana ittha adhippāyaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ imesu dvīsu purisa indriyam uttamam itthi indriyam

original: hīnaṃ, purisindriyassa antaradhānaṃ mahantena akusalena kammena hoti, samuṭṭhānaṃ

original: mahantena kusalakammena, itthindriyassa antaradhānaṃ dubbalākusalena, samuṭṭhānampi

original: hotīti. Yadi sugatiyaṃ itthindriyampi kusaleneva nibbattati, kathañcarahi “paradārikakammaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti yadi sugatiyam itthi indriyam pi kusalena iva nibbattati kathaṃ carahi paradārika kammam

original: katvā niraye paccitvā teneva pāpakammena pañcasatakkhattuṃ manussaloke itthī hutvā
analyzed: katvā niraye paccitvā tena iva pāpa kammena pañca sata kkhattum manussa loke itthī hutvā

original: nibbattatī”tiādivacananti? Nāyaṃ virodho nissandaphalavasena vuttattā. Tathā hi paṭisandhiyaṃ
analyzed: nibbattati iti ādi vacanam ti na ayam virodhaḥ nissanda phala vasena vutta ttā tathā hi paṭisandhiyam

original: tāva purisindriyanibbattanārahampi kammaṃ kadāci paradārikādinā balavapāpakammena
analyzed: tāva purisa indriya nibbattana araham pi kammam kadāci para dārikā ādinā balava pāpa kammena

original: paṭibāhitasāmatthiyaṃ assa, tadā attano purisindriyanibbattane asamatthatāya itthindriyameva
analyzed: paṭibāhita sāmatthiyam assa tadā attanaḥ purisa indriya nibbattane asamattha tāya itthi indriyam eva

original: nibbatteti. Pavattiyaṃ pana attano balavabhāvena itthindriyūpanissayaṃ paradārikamakusalakammaṃ
analyzed: nibbattā iti pavattiyam pana attanaḥ balava bhāvena itthi indriya upanissayam paradārikam akusala kammam

original: paṭibāhitvā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya purisindriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ kadāci laddhasāmaggitāsañjātabalavisesena
analyzed: paṭibāhitvā paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya purisa indriyam samuṭṭhāpentam kadāci laddha sāmaggi tā sañjāta bala visesena

original: paradārikādinā kammena paṭibāhitasāmatthiyaṃ bhaveyya, tadā attano dubbalatāya purisindriyaṃ
analyzed: paradārikā ādinā kammena paṭibāhita sāmatthiyam bhaveyya tadā attanaḥ dubbala tāya purisa indriyam

original: na nibbatteti, itthindriyameva nibbatteti. Evaṃ paradārikādikammūpanissayena itthindriyassa
analyzed: na nibbattā iti itthi indriyam eva nibbattā iti evam para dārikā ādi kamma upanissayena itthi indriyassa

original: nibbattanato taṃ tena nibbattitaṃ katvā vuccati.
analyzed: nibbattanataḥ tam tena nibbattitam katvā vuccati

original: 671-2. Yadā pana taṃ kammaṃ puna sāmaggipaṭilābhato, parikkhīṇapāpakammatāya vā balavappattaṃ
analyzed: yadā pana tam kammam puna sāmaggi paṭilābhataḥ parikkhīṇa pāpa kamma tāya vā balava pattam

analyzed: abhavissa tadā dinna vedham viya rukkham tad apagame attanaḥ bala anurūpam purisa indriyam

original: taṃ taṃ indriyaṃ na janeti. Sattarasamacittena saha uppannaṃ visadisindriyuppattito
analyzed: tam tam indriyam na janeti sattarasama cittena saha uppannam visadis indriya uppattitaḥ

original: purimacittena saha nirujjhati. Yadi hi sattarasamacittuppādato parampi uppajjeyya,
analyzed: purima cittena saha nirujjhati yadi hi sattarasama citta uppādataḥ param pi uppajjeyya

analyzed: itaram nu uppajjati ekasmin santāne dvinnam sahuppattiyāḥ an icchita ttā tena iva hi yassa

original: vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatī”ti imasmiṃ pañhe “no”ti

analyzed: paṭikkhepo kato ti evam ca katvā vakkhati ubhatobyañjanassa api itiādi ekasmin ca niruddhe

analyzed: tad paṭibaddhāni liṅga ādīni katipaya divasehi nirujjhanti tesu niruddhesu itarāni anukkamena

original: jāyantīti ācariyā. Itthinimittuppādakakammato, purisanimittuppādakakammato vāti ubhato
analyzed: jāyanti iti ācariyāḥ itthi nimitta uppādaka kammataḥ purisa nimitta uppādaka kammataḥ vā ati ubhatas

analyzed: duvidham byañjanam assa ati ubhatobyañjanaḥ tassa api iti yassa duvidham byañjanam atthi

analyzed: tassa api ekam eva indriyam siyā kim pana itarassa ati dasseti

original: purisanimittameva, itaraṃ pana na tassa itthindriyapurisindriyahetuto jāyati. Taṃ
analyzed: purisa nimittam eva itaram pana na tassa itthi indriya purisa indriya hetutaḥ jāyati taṃ

analyzed: pana yena kāraṇena hoti tam dassetum evam santā iti anuyogam katvā na ca abhāva uti ādinā

original: Na taṃ byañjanakāraṇanti taṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ na hoti. Kasmā? Sadā

original: abhāvato. Itthiubhatobyañjanassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati, tadā purisabyañjanaṃ

original: kāraṇanti ce? Āha “tassā…pe… kāraṇa”nti. Tattha kammasahāyanti purimabhavasiddhassa
analyzed: kāraṇanti ce āha kāraṇanti tattha

original: indriyanibbattakakammassa sahāyaṃ. Rāgacittanti itthiyā purisasmiṃ, purisassa itthiyaṃ
analyzed: indriya nibbattaka kammassa sahāyam rāga cittanti itthiyā purisasmim purisassa itthiyam

original: paṭicchannaṃ hoti. Yasmā panimassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako
analyzed: paṭicchannam hoti yasmai ekam eva indriyam hoti tasmai

original: sayampi paraṃ uddissa gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, attānaṃ uddissa parampi gaṇhāpeti. So hi itthindriyavantatāya
analyzed: sayam pi param uddissa gabbham gaṇhāti attānam uddissa param pi gaṇhāpeti saḥ hi itthi indriyavanta tāya

original: sayaṃ gaṇhāti, paresu upakkamakaraṇato paraṃ gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako paresu
analyzed: sayam gaṇhāti paresu upakkama karaṇataḥ param paresu

original: upakkamakaraṇato paraṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti, sayaṃ pana purisindriyavantatāya gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
analyzed: upakkama karaṇataḥ param gabbham gaṇhāpeti sayam pana purisa indriyavanta tāya gabbham na gaṇhāti

original: Yasmā itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādayo honti, tesu ca santesu itthīti pakāso hoti,
analyzed: yasmai itthi indriye sati itthi liṅga ādayaḥ honti tesu ca santesu itthī iti pakāsaḥ hoti

original: tasmā taṃ tassa pakāsanakāraṇanti āha “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti. Duvidhampi panetaṃ

original: indriyaṃ kāyapasādo viya sakalasarīrabyāpakameva, na cassa kāyapasādena saṅkaro lakkhaṇabhedato, nissayabhedato ca.
analyzed: indriyam kāya pasādaḥ viya sakala sarīra byāpakam eva na ca ssa kāya pasādena saṅkaraḥ lakkhaṇa bhedataḥ nissaya bhedato ca

original: 673. Sahajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇanti yathā attanā sahajātarūpāni tīsu khaṇesu pavattanti,
analyzed: sahaja rūpa paripālana lakkhaṇan ti yathā attanā sahajāta rūpāni tīsu khaṇesu pavattanti

original: evaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Jīvitindriyassa ekantakammajattā sahajaggahaṇeneva anupāletabbānampi

original: kammajabhāvova siddhoti kammajaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇattayamattaṭṭhāyīnampi

original: kammajarūpānaṃ pavattihetubhāveneva taṃ anupālakaṃ. Tenāha “tesaṃ pavattanarasa”nti.

original: Pavattanañcettha vuttanayena tesaṃ yāpanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ ṭhitihetukatā. Na hi kammajānaṃ

original: kammameva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ sakkoti āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Taṅkhaṇābhāvato.
analyzed: kammam eva ṭhiti hetu bhavitum sakkoti āhāra ja ādīnam āhāra ādi viya kim kāraṇam

original: Kammañhi niruddhaṃ rūpassa paccayo hoti, tato taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpāni matapitikā viya
analyzed: kamman hi niruddham rūpassa paccayaḥ hoti tatas tad samuṭṭhāna rūpāni matapitikāḥ viya

original: puttā cūḷapituādinissayena aññanissayeneva pavattanti, aññañca tesaṃ yāpanasamatthaṃ

original: natthi aññatra jīvitindriyenāti tadeva tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ. Āhārajādayo pana dharamānakapitikā
analyzed: natthi aññatra jīvitindriyena ati tat eva tesam pavattana rasam āhāra ja ādayo pana

original: viya puttā aññanirapekkhā sakasakapaccayavaseneva pavattanti. Āhārādayo hi attano
analyzed: viya puttāḥ añña nirapekkhā saka saka paccaya vasena iva pavattanti āhāra ādayaḥ hi attanaḥ

original: atthikkhaṇeyeva rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ ṭhitipavattiyāva tiṭṭhanti, tato taṃsamuṭṭhānāni

original: adhippāyaviññāpanassa kāraṇabhāvena gayhatīti kāyena adhippāyaṃ viññāpetīti. Tathā
analyzed: adhippāya viññāpanassa kāraṇa bhāvena gayhati iti kāyena adhippāyam viññāpeti iti tathā

original: kāyena viññāyati, tasmā kāyena viññattītipi kāyaviññattīti.
analyzed: kāyena viññāyati tasmā kāyena viññatti iti pi kāya viññatti iti

original: 678. Cittajāniladhātuyāti abhikkamādipavattakacittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuyā. Ākāravikāratāti

original: cittajamahābhūtānaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ sāmatthiyaṃ? Calanahetutā, cittajatā, upādāyarūpatā
analyzed: kim tam sāmatthiyam calana hetu tā citta ja tā upādāya rūpa tā

original: ca. Atha vā cittajāniladhātuyā ekā ākāravikāratāti sambandho. Na kevalañhi sāmivacanaṃ

analyzed: calana sambandha apekkhāya eva atha kho ākāra vikāra sambandha apekkhāya api iti

original: Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ viññattiyā upādāyarūpattaṃ. “Cittajāniladhātuyā”ti hi vacanena
analyzed: yadi evam katham viññattiyāḥ hi vacanena

analyzed: ākāra vikāra tā viññatti āpajjati na ca eka bhūta nissitam upādāya rūpam

original: hoti. Sāmatthiyādhikañca kāraṇānukāritāya. Kāraṇañhi abhikkamādipavattakaṃ cittaṃ,

original: taṃ calanādhippāyasabhāvaṃ tato samuṭṭhite kalāpe anukaronte vāyodhātuyā eva adhikattaṃ

original: Kīdisī panāyaṃ vikāratāti āha “sahajātassa rūpassa calane hetū”ti. Tattha sahajātassāti
analyzed: kīdisī pana ayam vikāra tā iti āha sahajātassa rūpassa calane hetu tattha sahajātassa āti

original: nadīsotacalanena tattha pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍādīnaṃ viya. Viññattivasena pana

original: calananti yujjati. Hetūti hetubhūtā sahakārīkāraṇabhūtā. Ettāvatā ca kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti?

original: Yā kusalacittassa vā…pe… abyākatacittassa vā abhikkamantassa vā…pe… pasārentassa

analyzed: hutvā abhāva ākāraḥ anicca tā nāma ati evam tesam yeva aṭṭhārasannam nipphanna rūpānam vikāra bhūta ttā

original: nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā ca, tesaṃyeva ca rūpānaṃ vikārattā te asaṅkhatā nāma kathaṃ
analyzed: nipphannā ca iva saṅkhatā ca tesam iva ca rūpānam vikāra ttā te asaṅkhatāḥ nāma katham

original: nipphannarūpā saṅkhatā, tesaṃ pana vikārabhūtā kathaṃ asaṅkhatā nāma hontīti atthaṃ

original: 726-7. Itthibhāvo…pe… vaṇṇitāti phalaṭhapanaṃ. “Evaṃ sante”tiādi codanā. “Aññaṃ panā”tiādi

original: 728-30. Aññaṃ pana aññasmiṃ na catthīti ṭhapetvā aññamaññāvinibbhogavasena pavattiṃ
analyzed: aññam pana aññasmin na catthi iti ṭhapetvā aññamaññā vinibbhoga vasena pavattim

original: Asaṅkaranti asaṃkiṇṇaṃ. Yadi evaṃ, na sabbattha kāyāyatanādikanti? Tampi natthi paramatthato.

original: Evamudīritanti sabbaṭṭhānikanti evamudīritaṃ.
analyzed: evam udīritanti sabba ṭṭhānikam ti evam udīritam

analyzed: pañcavaṇṇānam nīla ādi pañcavaṇṇa suttamayānam ekam ekassa vā eka eka vaṇṇa vasena

analyzed: dhajānam chāyā tesam upamatam upamā bhāvam gatā sampattā ati attho keci pana chāyā

analyzed: vadanti tam pana tehi chāyā upamatam gatā ati ettha bahu bīhi vasena iva

analyzed: attano paccayehi loke niyuttam viditanti vā lokikam tassa bhāvaḥ lokika ttam

original: Jotipālattherādayo pana “saṃsedajassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ
analyzed: jotipālatthera ādayaḥ pana saṃseda jassa jaccandha badhira aghānaka napuṃsakassa jivhā kāya vatthu dasakānam

original: vasena tiṃsarūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ, na opapātikassa. Dhammahadayavibhaṅgapāḷiyañca
analyzed: vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti iti vuttam na opapātikassa dhamma hadaya vibhaṅga pāḷiyam ca

original: ‘upapattikkhaṇe’ti vuttattā opapātikasseva vasena nayo nīto. Yamakaṭṭhakathāyañca

original: opapātika-ggahaṇameva kataṃ, na pana saṃsedaja-ggahaṇaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva

analyzed: vā yoniyā sabbam paripuṇṇa āyatanam yonim saṅgahetvā dassetum opapātikānam ti vuttam ti

original: ca, tasmā na koci pāḷivirodho”ti vadanti.
analyzed: ca tasmai na koci vadanti

original: Apare panāhu – “kāmadhātuyaṃ aghānako opapātiko natthi. Yadi bhaveyya, kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni

analyzed: kesañci pana aghānaka kīṭānam atthi bhāvataḥ apāyesu saṃseda ja upapātike sandhāya itam vuttan ti

original: vadanti. Taṃ ānandācariyādīnaṃ matena paṭikkhepārahamevāti.
analyzed: vadanti tam ānandācariya ādīnam matena paṭikkhepa araham evā ti

original: 757-8. Ukkaṃsassāvakaṃsassa antareti “sattatī”ti vuttaukkaṃsaparicchedassa, “tiṃsā”ti
analyzed: antareti sattati iti vutta okkaṃsa paricchedassa tiṃsa ati

original: vuttaavakaṃsaparicchedassa ca majjhe. Anurūpato…pe… vibhāvināti jātiandhassa saṭṭhi
analyzed: ca majjhe anurūpa tope jāti andhassa

original: rūpāni cakkhudasakābhāvato, tathā badhirassa sotadasakābhāvato, andhabadhirassa pana

original: rūpānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ vasena rūpānaṃ samuppatti viññātabbāti attho. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttamevāti.
analyzed: rūpānam pāṇīnam vasena rūpānam samuppatti viññātabbā ati atthaḥ yat pana ittha vattabbam tat vuttam eva ati

original: 759-60. Evaṃ tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiyaṃ rūpappavattiṃ dassetvā idāni pavattiyaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: evam tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiyam rūpa ppavattim dassetvā idāni pavattiyam dassetuṃ

original: “sattavīsati rūpānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmāvacarasattassa hi paripuṇṇāyatanassa asati

original: andhabadhirādipasādavighāte yāva maraṇacittassa heṭṭhā sattarasamacittaṃ, tāva sattavīsati

original: hāyanavaḍḍhanāni veditabbāni. Nanu aṭṭhavīsatiyeva rūpāni kāmabhave pavattantīti
analyzed: hāyana vaḍḍhanāni veditabbāni nanu aṭṭhavīsatiyā iva rūpāni kāma bhave pavattanti iti

original: āha “appavattanato”tiādi.
analyzed: āha appavattanato tiādi

original: Ghānaṃ…pe… na vijjareti kāmavirāgabhāvanāvasena gandhādiggāhakesu pasādesu virattā
analyzed: na vijjarā iti kāma virāga bhāvanā vasena gandha ādi gāhakesu pasādesu virattā

original: hontīti ghānādittayaṃ natthi. Cakkhusotesu pana anuttaradassanādiatthaṃ virattā na
analyzed: honti iti ghāna ādi ttayam na atthi cakkhu sotesu pana anuttara dassana ādi attham virattā na

original: hontīti tāni tesaṃ uppajjanti. Bhāvadvayaṃ kāmarāgūpanissayattā na uppajjati. Keci
analyzed: honti iti tāni tesam uppajjanti bhāva dvayam kāma rāga upanissaya ttā na uppajjati keci

original: pana “lahutādittayampi rūpabhave natthi dandhattakarādidhātukkhobhābhāvato. Sati
analyzed: pana rūpa bhave natthi dandha ttakara ādi dhātu kkhobha abhāvato sati

original: hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhehi lahutādīhi bhavitabba”nti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: hi tādise dhātu kkhobhe tad paṭipakkhehi lahu tā ādīhi bhavitabbanti vadanti tam akāraṇam

original: Na hi vūpasametabbapaccanīkāpekkho tabbirodhidhammuppādo. Tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu
analyzed: na hi vūpasametabba paccanīka apekkhaḥ tad birodhi dhamma uppādaḥ tathā sati sa hetuka kiriya cittuppādesu

original: kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvo eva siyā, tasmā pañceva rūpāni saññībrahmānaṃ na uppajjanti,
analyzed: abhāvaḥ eva siyā tasmā pañca iva rūpāni na uppajjanti

original: avasesāni tevīsati rūpāni uppajjanti. Asaññībrahmānaṃ pana pañca pasādarūpāni, bhāvadvayaṃ,
analyzed: avasesāni tevīsati rūpāni uppajjanti asaññībrahmānam pana pañca pasāda rūpāni bhāva dvayam

original: hadayavatthu, viññattidvayaṃ, lahutādittayanti terasa rūpāni vajjetvā avasesāni pannarasa uppajjanti.
analyzed: hadaya vatthu viññatti dvayam terasa rūpāni vajjetvā avasesāni pannarasa uppajjanti

original: 761. Catusantatīti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena catusantatirūpāni. Rūpe honti tisantatīti
analyzed: catusantati iti catunnam paccayānam vasena catusantati rūpāni rūpe honti tisantati iti

original: brahmānaṃ anāhārabhāvena āhārajarūpānaṃ abhāvato tisso santatiyo. Dvisantatīti cittajāhārajānaṃ
analyzed: brahmānam anāhāra bhāvena āhāra ja rūpānam abhāvataḥ tissaḥ santatiyaḥ dvi santati iti citta ja āhāra jānam

original: abhāvato dve santatiyo. Bahiddhā ekasantatīti kammajādīnaṃ tissannampi abhāvato utujasantatiyeva.
analyzed: abhāvataḥ dve santatiyaḥ bahiddhā eka santatī iti kamma ja ādīnam abhāvataḥ utu ja santatiyā iva

original: 762-4. Evaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu rūpānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ vatvā idāni tattha nesaṃ
analyzed: evam paṭisandhi pavattīsu rūpānam gaṇana paricchedam vatvā idāni tattha na īsam

original: uppattikkamaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ nibbattamāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbesanti kāmarūpabhavikānaṃ
analyzed: uppatti kkamam dassetum rūpam nibbattamāna ntiādi vuttam sabbesan ti kāmarūpa bhavikānam

original: sabbasattānaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe panāti ettha dasakattayaṃ hotīti pāṭhaseso. Tenāha
analyzed: sabba sattānam paṭisandhi khaṇe pana ati ettha dasaka ttayam hoti iti pāṭha sesaḥ tena āha

original: “yathevā”tiādi. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dasakattayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttampi “tañca kho sandhicittassā”tiādikaṃ
analyzed: yathā iva atiādi paṭisandhi khaṇe dasaka ttayam heṭṭhā vuttam pi tat ca kho sandhi cittassa ati ādikam

original: visesaṃ dassetuṃ puna vuttaṃ. Cittassa tīsu khaṇesu kammajarūpānaṃ samuppattito āha
analyzed: visesam dassetum puna vuttam cittassa tīsu khaṇesu kamma ja rūpānam samuppattitaḥ āha

original: “tathevā”tiādi. Tiṃsa tiṃsevāti tiṃsa tiṃseva kammajarūpāni.
analyzed: tathā iva atiādi tiṃsa tiṃsā iva ati tiṃsa tiṃsā iva kamma ja rūpāni

original: Ānandācariyo pana “cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇameva natthi, bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca rūpuppādo natthīti
analyzed: ānandācariyo pana cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇam eva natthi bhaṅga kkhaṇe ca rūpuppādo natthi iti

original: catusamuṭṭhānikānipi rūpāni cittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva hontī”ti āha. Vuttañhi tena
analyzed: catu samuṭṭhānikāni api rūpāni cittassa uppāda khaṇe yeva honti iti āha vuttam hi tena

original: – yo cettha cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇo vutto, so ca atthi natthīti vicāretabbo. Cittayamake
analyzed: yaḥ ca ittha cittassa ṭhiti khaṇaḥ vutto saḥ ca atthi natthi iti vicāretabbo citta yamake

analyzed: hi uppannam uppajjamānanti etassa vibhaṅge bhaṅga kkhaṇe uppannam no ca uppajjamānanti

original: ettakameva vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe cā”ti. Tathā”na uppajjamānaṃ
analyzed: ettakam eva vuttam na vuttam ṭhiti kkhaṇe bhaṅga kkhaṇe ca ati uppajjamānam

original: na uppanna”nti ettha “bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ no ca na uppanna”nti ettakameva
analyzed: na uppannanti ettha bhaṅga kkhaṇe na uppajjamānam no ca na uppannanti ettakam eva

original: vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe cā”ti. Evaṃ “na niruddhaṃ na nirujjhamāna”nti
analyzed: vuttam na vuttam ṭhiti kkhaṇe bhaṅga kkhaṇe ca ati evam na niruddham na nirujjhamānam

original: etesaṃ paripuṇṇavissajjane “uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañcā”ti vatvā “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ,
analyzed: etesam paripuṇṇa vissajjane uppāda khaṇe anāgatam ca ati vatvā ṭhiti khaṇa iti avacanam

original: atikkantakālavāre ca “bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkanta”nti vatvā “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti
analyzed: atikkanta kālavāre ca bhaṅga kkhaṇe cittam uppāda kkhaṇam vītikkantanti vatvā ṭhiti kkhaṇa iti

original: avacanaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇābhāvaṃ cittassa dīpeti. Suttepi hi “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti
analyzed: avacanam ṭhiti kkhaṇa abhāvam cittassa dīpeti sutte pi hi ṭhitassa aññathattam paññāyati iti

analyzed: tassa iva ekassa aññathatta abhāvataḥ yassāḥ aññathattam paññāyati sā santati ṭṭhitī iti

original: na na sakkā vattuṃ. Vijjamānaṃ taṃkhaṇadvayasamaṅgī ṭhitanti. Yo cettha cittassa
analyzed: na na sakkā vattum vijjamānam yaḥ ca ittha cittassa

original: nirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādo vutto, so ca vicāretabbo. Kasmā? “Yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ
analyzed: nirodha kkhaṇe rūpuppādaḥ vutto so ca vicāretabbo kasmā yassa vā pana samudaya saccam

original: nirujjhati, tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti? No”ti vuttanti, na ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva
analyzed: nirujjhati tassa dukkha saccam uppajjati iti no ti vuttam ti na ca citta samuṭṭhāna rūpam eva

analyzed: sandhāya paṭikkhepaḥ kato ti sakkā viññātum citta samuṭṭhāna rūpa adhikārassa abhāvāti

original: Ācariyassa hi ayamadhippāyo – uppannauppajjamānavārādīsu “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ
analyzed: ācariyassa hi ayam adhippāyaḥ uppanna a uppajjamāna vāra ādīsu ṭhiti khaṇa iti avacanam

original: “cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ nāma natthī”ti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Na hi yathādhammasāsane
analyzed: cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇam nāma natthi iti imam attham dīpeti na hi yathā dhamma sāsane

original: abhidhamme labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ dissati. Na kevalaṃ abhidhamme avacanameva
analyzed: abhidhamme labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇam dissati na kevalam abhidhamme avacanam eva

original: cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇabhāvajotakaṃ, apica kho “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evamāgatā
analyzed: cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇa bhāva jotakam api ca kho ṭhitassa aññathattam paññāyati iti evam āgatā

original: suttantapāḷipi. Aññathattaṃ nāma pubbāparaviseso. Apica yathā bhūto dhammo uppajjati,
analyzed: aññathattam nāma pubba apara visesaḥ apica yathā bhūtaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: kiṃ tathā bhūtova bhijjati, udāhu aññathā bhūto. Yadi tathā bhūtova bhijjati, na
analyzed: kim tathā bhūta uva bhijjati udāhu aññathā bhūtaḥ yadi tathā bhūtaḥ uva bhijjati na

original: jaratāya sambhavo. Aññathā bhūto, añño eva soti sabbathāpi ṭhitikkhaṇassa abhāvoyeva.
analyzed: jaratāya sambhavaḥ aññathā bhūtaḥ aññaḥ eva so ti sabbathā api ṭhiti kkhaṇassa

original: Yadi ca cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpaṃ uppajjeyya, taṃ dukkhasaccanti katvā “no”ti vattuṃ
analyzed: yadi ca cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe rūpam uppajjeyya tam dukkha saccanti katvā no ti vattum

original: na sakkā, vuttañca, tasmā viññāyati “cittassa nirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādo natthī”ti.
analyzed: na sakkā vuttam ca tasmā viññāyati cittassa nirodha kkhaṇe rūpuppādo natthi iti

original: Ācariyajotipāladhammapālattherānaṃ panetaṃ nakkhamati. Tehi “ekadhammādhārabhāvepi
analyzed: ācariya jotipāla dhammapāla ttherānam pana itam na khamati tehi eka dhamma ādhāra bhāve pi

original: uppādanirodhānaṃ añño uppādakkhaṇo, añño nirodhakkhaṇo. Uppādāvatthañhi upādāya uppādakkhaṇo,
analyzed: uppāda nirodhānam aññaḥ uppāda khaṇaḥ aññaḥ nirodha kkhaṇaḥ uppādau attham hi upādāya uppāda kkhaṇaḥ

original: nirodhāvatthaṃ upādāya nirodhakkhaṇo. Uppādāvatthāya ca bhinnā nirodhāvatthāti ekasmiṃyeva

original: ca sabhāvadhamme yathā icchitabbā, aññathā aññoyeva dhammo uppajjati, añño nirujjhatīti
analyzed: ca sabhāva dhamme yathā icchitabbā aññathā aññaḥ yeva dhammaḥ uppajjati aññaḥ nirujjhati iti

original: āpajjeyya, evaṃ nirodhāvatthāya viya nirodhābhimukhāvatthāyapi bhavitabbaṃ, sā ṭhiti

original: jaratā cā”ti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ.
analyzed: jaratā ca ati sampaṭicchitabbam etam

original: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā pāḷiyaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇo na vuttoti? Vineyyajjhāsayānurodhena nayadassanavasena
analyzed: yadi evam kasmā pāḷiyam ṭhiti khaṇaḥ na vuttaḥ ti vineyya jhāsayā anurodhena naya dassana vasena

original: pāḷigatīti veditabbāti. Abhidhammadesanāpi hi kadāci vineyyajjhāsayānurodhena pavattati,
analyzed: pāḷi gatī iti veditabbā ti abhidhamma desanā api hi kadāci vineyya jjhāsayā anurodhena pavattati

original: yathā rūpassa uppādo “upacayo santatī”ti bhinditvā desito. Hetusampayuttadukādidesanā
analyzed: yathā rūpassa uppādaḥ upacayo santati iti bhinditvā desitaḥ hetu sampayutta duka ādi desanā

original: cettha nidassitabbā. “Yassa vā panā”tiādipucchāya vissajjane ca arūpalokaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
analyzed: ca ittha nidassitabbā yassa vā pana ati ādi pucchāya vissajjane ca arūpa lokam citta samuṭṭhāna rūpam

original: vā sandhāya “no”ti sakkā vattuṃ. Ayañhi yamakadesanāya pakati, yadidaṃ yathāsambhavayojanāti.
analyzed: vā sandhāya na uti sakkā vattum ayan hi yamaka desanāya yat idam yathā sambhava yojana ati

original: Atha vā paccāsattiñāyena yaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, tena yaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ uppādetabbaṃ

original: cittacetasikatappaṭibaddharūpasaṅkhātaṃ, tassa tadā uppatti natthīti “no”ti vissajjanaṃ,
analyzed: citta cetasikata paṭibaddha rūpa saṅkhātam tassa tadā uppatti natthi iti no ti vissajjanaṃ

original: na sabbassa vacanato, tasmā na sakkā cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe, bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca rūpuppādanaṃ
analyzed: na sabbassa vacanato tasmā na sakkā cittassa ṭhiti kkhaṇe bhaṅga kkhaṇe ca rūpa uppādanam

original: paṭikkhipitunti vadanti.
analyzed: paṭikkhipitunti vadanti

original: Utujarūpāni pana paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhakanavakavasena uppajjanti.

original: vuttaṃ. Suphusitanti suṭṭhu phusitaṃ, sacchikatanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ajātantiādīni cattāri
analyzed: vuttam su phusitanti suṭṭhu phusitam sacchikatam ti vuttam hoti ajāta nti ādīni cattāri

original: padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: padāni aññamañña vevacanāni atha vā vedanā ādayaḥ viya hetu paccaya samavāya saṅkhātāya

original: kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ. Kāraṇena vinā sayameva ca na bhūtaṃ
analyzed: kāraṇa sāmaggiyā na jātam na nibbattanti ajātam kāraṇena vinā sayam eva ca na bhūtam

original: na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ. Evaṃ ajātattā abhūtattā yena kenaci kāraṇena
analyzed: na pātubhūtam na uppannanti abhūtam evam a jāta ttā a bhūta ttā yena kenacid kāraṇena

original: na katanti akataṃ. Jātabhūtakatabhāvo ca nāma rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti, na
analyzed: na a katanti a katam jāta bhūta kata bhāvaḥ ca nāma rūpa ādīnam saṅkhata dhammānam hoti na

original: asaṅkhatasabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ asaṅkhatanti vuttaṃ. Paṭilomato vā
analyzed: asaṅkhata sabhāvassa nibbānassa āti dassana attham asaṅkhatan ti vuttam paṭilomataḥ vā

original: samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ, na tathā saṅkhataṃ, saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti
analyzed: samet ca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhatam na tathā saṅkhatam saṅkhata lakkhaṇa rahitanti

original: ca asaṅkhatanti. Evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe pakativādīnaṃ pakati
analyzed: ca evam anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattita bhāve paṭisiddhe pakativādīnam pakati

original: viya siyā nu kho, ekeneva kāraṇena etaṃ katanti āsaṅkāya na kenaci katanti dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: viya siyā nu kho ekena iva kāraṇena etam katanti āsaṅkāya na kenacid katanti dassana attham

original: “akata”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūtanti
analyzed: a katam ti vuttam evam a paccayam pi samānam sayam eva nu kho idam bhūtam pātubhūtanti

original: āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ. Ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo
analyzed: āsaṅkāya tad nivattana attham abhūtanti vuttam ayam cetassa

original: sabbena sabbaṃ ajātadhammattāti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sabbena sabbam ajāta dhamma ttā ti dassetum ajātam ti vuttam

original: Asaṅkhatantīti iti-saddo ādiattho. Tena –
analyzed: iti saddo ādi attho tena

original: “No cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ. Nayidha jātassa
analyzed: no ca itam bhikkhave abhavissa a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhatam jātassa

original: bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha. Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi
analyzed: bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyetha yasmā ca kho bhikkhave atthi

original: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti –
analyzed: a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhatam tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyati iti

original: Evamādisuttapadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tenāha “anekesu suttantesū”ti. Dhammena sadevakassa
analyzed: evamādi sutta padam saṅgaṇhāti tena āha anekesu suttantesu iti dhammena sa devakassa

original: lokassa sāmī, dhammassa vā yathicchitaṃ desanato sāmī issaroti dhammasāmī. Tathāgata-saddassa
analyzed: lokassa sāmī dhammassa vā yathicchitam desanato sāmī dhamma sāmī tathāgata saddassa

original: attho heṭṭhā kathitova. Sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhamme abhisambuddho, sammā sayameva sammohaniddāvigamena
analyzed: atthaḥ heṭṭhā kathitaḥ iva sammā sāmam sabba dhamme abhisambuddho sammā sayam eva sammoha niddā vigamena

original: paṭibuddho, buddhiyā vikasitavāti vā sammāsambuddho.
analyzed: paṭibuddhaḥ buddhiyā vikasita vāti vā sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: Parittattiketi “parittā dhammā, mahaggatā dhammā, appamāṇā dhammā”ti evaṃ parittādidhammavasena āgate parittattike.
analyzed: paritta ttike ti parittāḥ dhammāḥ mahaggatāḥ dhammāḥ appamāṇāḥ dhammāḥ ti evam paritta ādi dhamma vasena āgate paritta ttike

original: Navattabbārammaṇattāti navattabbārammaṇattappasaṅgato. Tenāha “navattabbārammaṇapakkhaṃ
analyzed: nava ttabba ārammaṇa ttā iti nava ttabba ārammaṇa tta ppasaṅgataḥ tena āha nava ttabba ārammaṇa pakkham

original: bhajeyyu”nti. Rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānāti catukkanayena tikajjhānā, pañcakanayena
analyzed: bhajeyyunti rūpa avacara ttika catukka jjhānā ati catukka nayena tika jjhānā pañcaka nayena

original: catukkajjhānā. Kusalakiriyānaṃ abhiññābhāvappattiyā parittādikepi ārabbha pavattanato
analyzed: catukka jhānā kusala kiriyānam abhiññā bhāva ppattiyā paritta ādike pi ārabbha pavattanato

original: “catutthassa jhānassa vipāko”ti āha. Tasmāti yathāvuttayuttito ceva pāḷito ca. Kiñca
analyzed: catutthassa jhānassa vipāko ti āha tasmā iti yathā vutta yuttitaḥ ca iva pāḷitaḥ ca kiñca

original: bhiyyo – saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ, apica anulomabhāvappattaṃ kilese
analyzed: bhiyyas saṅkhata dhamma ārammaṇam vipassanā ñāṇam apica anuloma bhāva pattam kilese

original: tadaṅgavasena pajahati, samucchedavasena pajahituṃ na sakkoti, tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tad aṅga vasena pajahati samuccheda vasena pajahitum na sakkoti tathā sammuti sacca ārammaṇam

original: paṭhamajjhānādikusalañāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati, na samucchedavasena.
analyzed: paṭhamajjhāna ādi kusala ñāṇam vikkhambhana vasena iva kilese pajahati na samuccheda vasena

original: Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa, sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne
analyzed: iti saṅkhata dhamma ārammaṇassa sammuti sacca ārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānam samuccheda ppahāne

original: asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa ariyamaggañāṇassa tadubhayaviparītabhāvena
analyzed: asamattha bhāvataḥ tesam samuccheda ppahāna karassa ariya magga ñāṇassa tad ubhaya viparīta bhāvena

original: ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, tañca nibbānameva. Tenāhu porāṇā –
analyzed: ārammaṇena bhavitabbam tat ca nibbānam eva tena āhu porāṇā

original: “Ñāṇaṃ yaṃ saṅkhatālambaṃ, paññattālambameva vā;
analyzed: ñāṇam yam saṅkhata ālambam paññatta ālambam eva vā

original: Pāpe hanti na taṃ vatthuṃ, tadaññaṃ sampaṭicchiya”nti.
analyzed: pāpe hanti na tam vatthum tad aññam sampaṭicchiyanti

original: Rūpasabhāvābhāvatoti etena yathā rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanasabhāvo, paṭighātavantatā kalāpato
analyzed: rūpa sabhāva abhāvataḥ ti etena yathā rūpa dhammānam paṭighātavanta tā kalāpato

original: vuttiyā padesasambandho sabhāvo, evaṃ nibbānassa katthaci paṭighāto, sappadesatā
analyzed: vuttiyā padesa sambandhaḥ sabhāvaḥ evam nibbānassa katthaci paṭighātaḥ sappadesa tā

original: ca natthīti dasseti. Na hi nibbānaṃ “asukadisāya, asukapadese”ti vā niddisīyati.
analyzed: ca na atthi iti dasseti na hi nibbānam asuka disāya asuka padese iti vā niddisīyati

original: Papañcābhāvatoti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcehi saha avaṭṭhānavasena abhāvato, tesaṃ abhāvapaccayatāya
analyzed: papañca abhāvato ti taṇhā māna diṭṭhi papañcehi saha avaṭṭhāna vasena abhāvato tesam abhāva paccaya tāya

original: ca. Taṇhādiṭṭhimānā hi saṃsāre satte papañcentīti papañcā nāma.
analyzed: ca taṇhā diṭṭhi mānāḥ hi saṃsāre satte papañcenti iti papañcā nāma

original: 772-5. Evaṃ nibbānaṃ yuttito, suttato ca sādhetvā idāni tassa pariyāyasandassanatthaṃ
analyzed: evam nibbānam yuttitaḥ suttataḥ ca sādhetvā idāni tassa pariyāya sandassana attham

original: “accantamananta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saṃsārappavattiyā pariyosānabhūtattā antaṃ.
analyzed: accantam anantam tiādi vuttam tattha saṃsāra ppavattiyā pariyosāna bhūta ttā antam

original: Iminā anupādisesanibbānadhātu kathitāti vadanti, sopādisesanibbānadhātupi vaṭṭati,
analyzed: iminā anupādisesa nibbāna dhātu kathitā iti vadanti sopādisesa nibbāna dhātu pi vaṭṭati

original: akatantipi paṭhanti. So heṭṭhā vuttatthova. Sauppādavayantābhāvena anantaṃ. Kilesapariḷāhābhāvena,
analyzed: paṭhanti saḥ heṭṭhā vutta tthaḥ uva anantam kilesa pariḷāha abhāvena

original: kilesakkhobhābhāvena ca santaṃ. Palokitābhāvena apalokitaṃ. Atittikarabhāvena paṇītaṃ.
analyzed: kilesa kkhobha abhāvena ca santam palokita abhāvena apalokitam a tittikara bhāvena paṇītam

original: Sabbadukkhahananato saraṇaṃ. Kilesacorehi anupaddutattā nibbhayatāya khemaṃ. Sabbupaddavanivāraṇato
analyzed: sabba dukkha hananataḥ saraṇam kilesa corehi an upadduta ttā nibbhaya tāya khemam sabba upaddava nivāraṇato

original: tāṇaṃ. Jātiādidukkhehi anubandhassa allīyituṃ yuttaṭṭhānatāya leṇaṃ. Yathāpaṭipannassa
analyzed: tāṇam jāti ādi dukkhehi anubandhassa yutta ṭṭhāna tāya leṇam yathā paṭipannassa

original: santidāyakattena paraṃ patiṭṭhābhāvato parāyaṇaṃ.
analyzed: santi dāyaka ttena param patiṭṭhā bhāvato parāyaṇam

original: Sabbapīḷāvimuttatāya sivaṃ. Upanissayahīnānaṃ sabbaññumukhato sutvāpi ṭhapetvā guṇavasena
analyzed: sabba pīḷā vimutta tāya sivam upanissaya hīnānam sabbaññu mukhataḥ sutvā api ṭhapetvā guṇa vasena

original: sabhāvato paṭivijjhituṃ dukkaratāya nipuṇaṃ. Aviparītatāya saccaṃ. Sabbadukkhaparikkhayakarattā
analyzed: sabhāvataḥ paṭivijjhitum dukkara tāya nipuṇam a viparīta tāya saccam sabba dukkha parikkhaya kara ttā

original: dukkhakkhayaṃ. Tejussadatāya santattaayoguḷe makkhikāhi viya catūhi āsavehi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
analyzed: dukkha kkhayam tejus sada tāya santatta ayaḥ guḷe makkhikāhi viya catūhi āsavehi ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena

original: pavattituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya anāsavaṃ. Mahākāruṇikassāpi dhammadesanāya appossukkabhāvāpādanena
analyzed: pavattitum a sakkuṇeyya tāya anāsavam mahā kāruṇikassa api dhamma desanāya appossukka bhāva āpādanena

original: paṭivijjhituṃ dukkaratāya sududdasaṃ. Lokuttaradhammesupi asaṅkhataguṇena visiṭṭhatāya
analyzed: paṭivijjhitum dukkara tāya su duddasam lokuttara dhammesu pi asaṅkhata guṇena visiṭṭha tāya

original: paraṃ. Saṃsāramahāsamuddassa tīrabhūtattā pāraṃ. Maṃsacakkhuno, dibbacakkhuno vā
analyzed: param saṃsāra mahā samuddassa tīra bhūta ttā pāram maṃsacakkhuno dibbacakkhuno vā

original: agocaratāya anidassanaṃ. Nidassanasaṅkhātāya upamāya abhāvato vā anidassanaṃ.
analyzed: a gocara tāya a nidassanam nidassana saṅkhātāya upamāya abhāvataḥ vā a nidassanam

original: Avipariṇāmadhammattā dhuvaṃ. Tatoyeva paramapatiṭṭhābhāvato dīpaṃ. Rogādipīḷābhāvato
analyzed: a vipariṇāma dhamma ttā dhuvam parama patiṭṭhā bhāvataḥ dīpam roga ādi pīḷā bhāvataḥ

original: abyāpajjhaṃ. Tatoyeva anītikaṃ. Taṇhālayābhāvato anālayaṃ. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatesu asaṅkhatakoṭṭhāsabhūtattā,
analyzed: abyāpajjham tatas yeva anītikam taṇhā ālaya abhāvataḥ anālayam saṅkhata asaṅkhatesu asaṅkhata koṭṭhāsa bhūta ttā

original: paramapatiṭṭhābhāvato vā padaṃ. Avināsabhāvena accutaṃ. Akkharaṇato avinassanato akkharaṃ.
analyzed: parama patiṭṭhā bhāvataḥ vā padam a vināsa bhāvena accutam akkharaṇataḥ a vinassanataḥ akkharam

original: Saṅkhatanissaṭattā vimutti. Bhavabandhanavimuttihetutāya mokkhaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkhata nissaṭa ttā bhava bandhana vimutti hetutāya mokkham

original: 776-7. Evanti yathāvuttanayena. Viññāyāti uggahaparipucchāvasena jānitvā. Adhigamūpāyoti paṭivijjhanūpāyabhūtā tisso sikkhā. Kātabboti paṭipajjitabbo.
analyzed: evam ti yathā vutta nayena viññāya ati uggaha paripucchā vasena jānitvā adhigama upāyo ti paṭivijjhana upāya bhūtā tisso sikkhā kātabbo ti paṭipajjitabbo

original: Saddhaṃ, buddhiñca karoti vaḍḍhetīti saddhābuddhikaraṃ. Tathāgatamateti tipiṭakabuddhavacane,
analyzed: buddhim ca karoti vaḍḍheti iti saddhā buddhi karam tathāgata matā iti tipiṭaka buddha vacane

original: catūsu saccesu vā. Paññāya sambhūtaṃ, paññāya vā sambhavo etassāti paññāsambhavaṃ,
analyzed: catūsu saccesu vā paññāya sambhūtam paññāya vā sambhavaḥ etassa ati paññāsambhavam

original: tadeva sampasādanaṃ buddhādīsu adhimuccanaṃ, taṃ karotīti paññāsambhavasampasādanakaraṃ.
analyzed: tat eva sampasādanam buddha ādīsu adhimuccanam tam karoti iti paññā sambhava sampasādana karam

original: Atthabyañjanasālinanti atimadhurehi atthabyañjanehi samannāgataṃ, atthabyañjanasāravantanti
analyzed: attha byañjana sālinanti ati madhurehi attha byañjanehi samannāgatam attha byañjana sāravantanti

original: vā attho ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā. Sāraṃ jānantīti sāraññū, te vimhāpetīti sāraññuvimhāpanaṃ.
analyzed: vā atthaḥ rakārassa lakāram katvā sāram jānanti iti sāraññū te vimhāpeti iti sāraññu vimhāpanam

original: Niṭṭhanti pariyosānaṃ, sutamayamūlakaṃ anupādāparinibbānanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: niṭṭhanti pariyosānam suta maya mūlakam anupādā parinibbānam ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Iti abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma

original: Abhidhammāvatārasaṃvaṇṇanāya
analyzed: abhidhamma avatāra saṃvaṇṇanāya

original: Nibbānaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nibbāna niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 12. Dvādasamo paricchedo
analyzed: dvādasamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Paññattiniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: paññatti niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Etthāti yathāuddiṭṭhadhammānaṃ niddesapariyosāne. Ettakamevāti cittacetasikarūpanibbānamattameva.
analyzed: ettha iti yathā uddiṭṭha dhammānam niddesa pariyosāne ettakam eva ati citta cetasika rūpa nibbāna mattam eva

original: Paññāpetabbatoti paramatthadhammā viya sakasakasabhāvavasena apaññāyamānā hutvā lokasaṅketavasena
analyzed: paññāpetabbato ti paramattha dhammāḥ viya saka saka sabhāva vasena a paññāyamānāḥ hutvā loka saṅketa vasena

original: paññāpiyamānattā. Paññāpanatoti paramatthavasena vijjamānāvijjamānadhammānaṃ pakāsanavasena
analyzed: paññāpiyamāna ttā paññāpanato ti paramattha vasena vijjamāna a vijjamāna dhammānam pakāsana vasena

original: paññāpanato. Tattha “paññāpetabbato”ti iminā paññāpīyati pakārena ñāpīyatīti paññattīti
analyzed: paññāpanataḥ tattha paññāpetabbato ti iminā paññāpīyati pakārena ñāpīyati iti paññatti iti

original: evaṃ kammasādhanavasena atthapaññattibhūtā upādāpaññatti vuttā. “Paññāpanato”ti iminā
analyzed: evam kamma sādhana vasena attha paññatti bhūtā upādā paññatti vuttā paññāpanato ti iminā

original: paññāpeti pakārena ñāpetīti paññattīti evaṃ kattusādhanavasena tassā abhidhāyakabhūtā
analyzed: paññāpeti pakārena ñāpeti iti paññatti iti evam kattu sādhana vasena tassāḥ abhidhāyaka bhūtā

original: nāmapaññattīti veditabbaṃ. Paṇṇattidukaniddese “saṅkhā…pe… vohāro”ti catūhi padehi
analyzed: nāma paññattī iti veditabbam paṇṇatti duka niddese saṅkhāpe vohāraḥ ti catūhi padehi

original: upādāpaññatti vuttā. “Nāmaṃ…pe… abhilāpo”ti chahi padehi nāmapaññatti kathitāti ācariyānaṃ
analyzed: upādā paññatti vuttā abhilāpo ti chahi padehi nāma paññatti kathitā ati ācariyānam

original: icchitattā vuttaṃ “tenevāhā”tiādi. Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti heṭṭhā abhidhammamātikāya
analyzed: icchita ttā vuttam tena iva āha atiādi tesam tesam dhammānam ti heṭṭhā abhidhamma mātikāya

original: vuttānaṃ kusalākusalādidhammānaṃ. Saṅkhāti “ahaṃ mamā”tiādinā saṅkhāyamānatā. Samaññāti
analyzed: vuttānam kusala akusala ādi dhammānam saṅkhā ati aham mama ati ādinā saṅkhāyamāna tā samaññā ati

original: saṅketavasena ñāyamānatā. Paññattīti asaṅkaravasena anekadhā vibhajitvā paññāpiyamānatā.
analyzed: saṅketa vasena ñāyamāna tā paññatti iti asaṅkara vasena anekadhā vibhajitvā paññāpiyamāna tā

original: Vohāroti pākaṭaṃ katvā vuccamānatā, kathanavasena upayujjamānatā vā. Atthābhimukhaṃ
analyzed: vohāraḥ iti pākaṭam katvā vuccamāna tā kathana vasena upayujjamāna tā vā attha abhimukham

original: namatīti nāmaṃ. Taṃ pana anvattharuḷhīvasena duvidhaṃ, sāmaññaguṇakittimaopapātikanāmavasena
analyzed: namati iti nāmam tam pana anvattha ruḷhī vasena duvidham sāmañña guṇa kittima opapātika nāma vasena

original: catubbidhaṃ. Nāmakammanti nāmakaraṇaṃ. Nāmadheyyanti nāmaṭhapanaṃ, nāmadheyyanti
analyzed: catubbidham nāmakammanti nāma karaṇam nāmadheyyanti nāma ṭhapanam nāmadheyyanti

original: vā seṭṭhānaṃ nāmaṃ. Akkharadvārena atthaṃ nīharitvā utti kathanaṃ nirutti. Byañjananti

analyzed: vuttam catukka jhānikā ti catukka naya vasena catubbidha rūpāvacara jhānavanto tesam

original: ekekasseva ārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Pañcakanayavasena pana “pañcakajjhānikā”ti veditabbā.

original: Paṭhamajjhānikāti paṭhamajjhānasseva ārammaṇabhūtā, paṭikkūlabhāvato pana itaresaṃ

original: 819. Tikajjhānavahāti catukkanayena tikajjhānavahā, pañcakanayena pana catukkajjhānavahā,
analyzed: tika jhāna vahā ati catukka nayena tika jhāna vahā pañcaka nayena pana catukka jhāna vahā

analyzed: na honti appanappattāḥ hi mettā ādayo somanassena vinā na ppavattanti catutthaḥ pi brahmavihāraḥ ti

analyzed: sambandhaḥ brahmānam uttamānam vihāraḥ brahma bhūtaḥ vā brahmavihāro saḥ upekkhā bhāvanā vasena

analyzed: catuttha jhāniko tattha api mettā ādi vasena paṭiladdha jhāna catukkassa iva etam appeti

original: netarassa. Kasmā? Mettādīnaṃ nissandattā. Yathā hi kasiṇānaṃ nissandā āruppā, yathā
analyzed: na itarassa kasmā metta ādīnam nissanda ttā yathā hi kasiṇānam nissandāḥ āruppāḥ yathā

original: ca samathavipassanānissandā nirodhasamāpatti, evaṃ mettādinissandā upekkhā. Āruppā

original: catutthajjhānikāti aṅgasamatāvasena āruppāpi catutthajjhānasseva pabhedāti katvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: catuttha jhānikā ti aṅga samatā vasena āruppā api catuttha jhānassa iva pabhedā iti katvā vuttam

original: 820. Evaṃ jhānabhedato dassetvā puna samatikkamato dassetuṃ “vasenārammaṇaṅgāna”ntiādi
analyzed: evam jhāna bhedataḥ dassetvā puna samatikkamataḥ dassetum vasena ārammaṇa aṅga ananti ādi

analyzed: vasena samatikkamaḥ duvidhaḥ kim sabbesu eva duvidhaḥ labbhati no ti āha gocara ape

analyzed: aṅgānam vasena samāna ttā rūpe rūpāvacarika kammaṭṭhānesu vitakka ādīnam
