analyzed: atikkamaḥ idam ca labbhamānaka vasena vuttam paṭhamajjhānikesu duvidhaḥ api

original: samatikkamo natthi, nīvaraṇasamatikkamo idha aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇattā na gahito.
analyzed: samatikkamaḥ natthi nīvaraṇa samatikkamaḥ idha aṭṭhannam pi samāpattīnam sādhāraṇa ttā na gahitaḥ

original: 821. Evaṃ samatikkamavasena dassetvā puna vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanavasena dassetuṃ “daseva
analyzed: evam samatikkama vasena dassetvā puna vaḍḍhana āvaḍḍhana vasena dassetum

original: kasiṇānī”tiādimāha. Imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni.
analyzed: kasiṇāni iti ādim āha imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa vaḍḍhetabbāni

original: Na ca…pe… asubhādayoti sesā asubhādayo pana neva vaḍḍhetabbā. Kasmā? Paricchinnākāreneva
analyzed: na ca pe asubha ādayaḥ ti sesāḥ asubha ādayaḥ pana na iva vaḍḍhetabbā kasmā paricchinna ākārena iva

analyzed: upaṭṭhānato ānisaṃsa abhāvato ca tathā hi dasa asubhāni kāya gata asati ca attanaḥ ṭhita ukāsena

original: evaṃ, asubhajjhānānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatāvacanaṃ virujjhatīti? Na virujjhati. Ekacco

analyzed: hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittam gaṇhāti ekaccaḥ appaka iti iminā pariyāyena

analyzed: upaṭṭhāti vaḍḍhayataḥ api ca vāta rāsiyā iva vaḍḍhati picu piṇḍa ādi vasena upaṭṭhahantam pi

analyzed: dibba anubhāvena paṭikkūla ākārena na upaṭṭhāti assāsa passāsānam brahmaloke abhāvato

analyzed: diṭṭhena gahetabbāni pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittam na īsam gahetabbanti atthaḥ ti

original: 828-31. Satiyampi ca kāyamhīti kāyagatāsatiyampi. Diṭṭhena tacapañcakanti tacapañcakamattameva

original: 832-5. Evaṃ gahaṇavasena dassetvā idāni paccayato dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānesu hetesū”tiādi
analyzed: evam gahaṇa vasena dassetvā idāni paccayataḥ dassetum kammaṭṭhānesu hetesu utiādi

original: samanantarā nirodhaṃ phusatīti katvā vuttaṃ “catutthamāruppa”ntiādi. Vipassanābhavasampattisukhānaṃ

analyzed: dassetum kammaṭṭhānam gahetvā itiādi vuttam santike vasantassa āti ācariyena saddhim

original: ekagehe, ekavihāre vā vasantassa. Kathetabbanti pavattiṃ sutvā sutvā kathetabbaṃ.

original: Na hi ekavārameva āgatassa tasmiṃ khaṇe kathetabbaṃ, tato paraṃ na kathetabbanti yujjati.
analyzed: na hi eka vāram eva āgatassa tasmin khaṇe kathetabbam tatas param na kathetabbanti yujjati

original: kathaṃ jhānassa ārammaṇabhāvoti āha “upaṭṭhā…pe… maya”nti. Tattha paññajanti bhāvanāmayaṃ
analyzed: katham jhānassa ārammaṇa bhāvaḥ ti āha upaṭṭhāpe mayanti tattha paññajanti bhāvanā mayam

original: paññājanitaṃ, bhāvanāpaññāya sañjānanamattanti vuttaṃ hoti. Na hi asabhāvadhammassa
analyzed: paññā janitam bhāvanā paññāya sañjānana mattam ti vuttam hoti na hi a sabhāva dhammassa

original: kutocisamuṭṭhānaṃ atthi. Tenāha “bhāvanāmayaṃ upaṭṭhānākāramatta”nti, kevalaṃ samādhilābhino
analyzed: kutoci samuṭṭhānam atthi tena āha bhāvanā mayam upaṭṭhāna ākāram attanti kevalam samādhi lābhinaḥ

original: bhāvanāvisesajanitaṃ tammayaṃ upaṭṭhānākāramattameva bhāvanāvisesānubhāvena upaṭṭhātīti attho.
analyzed: bhāvanā visesa janitam tammayam upaṭṭhāna ākāra mattam eva bhāvanā visesa anubhāvena upaṭṭhāti iti atthaḥ

original: 875-8. Vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāneva na puna tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti adhippāyo.
analyzed: vikkhambhitāna eva sannisinnāna eva na puna tad attham ussāhaḥ kātabbaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Paṭibhāganimitte hi uppajjamāneyeva taṃvisayaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ nīvaraṇe vikkhambhentameva
analyzed: paṭibhāga nimitte hi uppajjamāne iya iva taṃvisayam upacāra jjhānam nīvaraṇe vikkhambhentam eva

original: uppajjati. Kilesā sannisinnāvāti avasesā tadekaṭṭhakilesā ca sammadeva nisinnā, upasantāti
analyzed: uppajjati kilesā sannisinnā avāti avasesā tad ekaṭṭha kilesā ca sammat eva nisinnā upasantā ati

original: attho. “Upacārasamādhinā”ti vutte itaropi samādhi atthīti atthato āpannanti tampi
analyzed: atthaḥ upacāra samādhinā iti vutte itaraḥ api samādhi atthi iti atthataḥ āpannanti tam pi

original: dassetuṃ “ākārehi pana dvīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dvīhi ākārehīti jhānadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvo,
analyzed: dassetum ākārehi pana dvīhi itiādi vuttam dvīhi ākārehi iti jhāna dhammānam paṭipakkha dūrībhāvaḥ

original: thirabhāvappatti cāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. Idāni tāni kāraṇāni samādhiavatthāmukhena
analyzed: thira bhāva ppatti ca ati imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi idāni tāni kāraṇāni samādhi avatthā mukhena

original: dassetuṃ “upacārakkhaṇe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upacārakkhaṇeti upacārabhūmiyaṃ upacārāvatthāyaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum upacāra khaṇa itiādi vuttam upacāra kkhaṇe ti upacāra bhūmiyam upacāra avatthāyam

original: Tassa paṭilābheti yadatthāya ayaṃ paṭipanno, tassa appanāsamādhissa paṭilābhe adhigamāvatthāyaṃ.
analyzed: tassa paṭilābhe ti yad atthāya ayam paṭipannaḥ tassa appanā samādhissa paṭilābhe adhigama avatthāyaṃ

original: Kathaṃ upacārabhūmiyaṃ samādhiyati, kathañca appanābhūmiyanti āha “nīvāraṇappahānenā”tiādi.
analyzed: katham upacāra bhūmiyam katham ca appanā bhūmiyam ti āha nīvāraṇa pahānena atiādi

original: Upacārakkhaṇe yadipi jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni na honti, tesaṃ
analyzed: upacāra kkhaṇe yadi pi jhāna aṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggata bhāva pattāni na honti tesam

original: paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena cittaṃ samādhiyati, paṭilābhabhūmiyampi appanāpattānaṃ
analyzed: paṭipakkha dhammānam vikkhambhanena cittam samādhiyati paṭilābha bhūmiyam pi appanā pattānam

original: jhānaṅgānaṃ pātubhāvena samādhiyatīti attho.
analyzed: pātubhāvena samādhiyati iti attho

original: 879-80. Aṅgāni…pe… na cāti upacārakkhaṇe aṅgāni na ca thāmajātāni neva bhāvanābalappattāni
analyzed: na ca ati upacāra kkhaṇe aṅgāni na ca thāma jātāni na iva bhāvanā bala ppattāni

original: hontīti attho. Appanāyāti appanakkhaṇe. Tasmāti yasmā aṅgāni thāmajātāni jāyare,
analyzed: honti iti atthaḥ appanāya ati appana khaṇe tasmā iti yasmai aṅgāni thāma jātāni jāyare

original: tasmā. Appanācittaṃ divasampi pavattatīti yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya
analyzed: tasmai appanā cittam divasam pi pavattati iti yathā nāma balavā purisaḥ āsanā vuṭṭhāya

original: divasampi tiṭṭheyya, evamevaṃ appanāsamādhimhi uppanne jhānacittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ
analyzed: divasam pi tiṭṭheyya evam evam appanā samādhimhi uppanne jhāna cittam sakim bhavaṅga vāram

original: chinditvā uppannaṃ kevalaṃ rattimpi divasampi kusalajavanapaṭipāṭivaseneva pavattatīti
analyzed: chinditvā uppannam kevalam rattim pi divasam pi kusala javana paṭipāṭi vasena iva pavattati iti

original: attho. “Appanāpattaṃ divasampi pavattatī”ti vadatā upacārakkhaṇe na tathāti dassitaṃ
analyzed: attho appanā āpattam divasam pi pavattati iti vadatā upacāra kkhaṇe na tathā iti dassitam

original: hoti. Tattha hi aṅgānaṃ athāmajātattā yathā nāma daharo kumāro ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno
analyzed: hoti tattha hi aṅgānaṃ yathā nāma daharaḥ kumāraḥ ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamānaḥ

original: punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati, evamevaṃ cittaṃ kālena nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, kālena bhavaṅgaṃ otarati.
analyzed: punappunam bhūmiyam patati evam evam cittam kālena nimittam ārammaṇam karoti kālena bhavaṅgam otarati

original: 881-4. Teneva pallaṅkenāti yasmiṃ nisinno paṭibhāganimittaṃ adhigacchi, teneva pallaṅkena
analyzed: tena iva pallaṅkena ati yasmin nisinnaḥ paṭibhāga nimittam adhigacchi tena iva pallaṅkena

original: karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā. Upacārabhūmiyañhi nimittavaḍḍhanaṃ
analyzed: karaṇa bhūtena hetu bhūtena vā tam nimittam vaḍḍhetvā upacāra bhūmiyat hi nimitta vaḍḍhanam

original: yuttaṃ. Cakkavattiyagabbhovāti cakkavatti bhavituṃ puññavā gabbho viya. Parihāni
analyzed: yuttam cakkavattiya gabbha uvā ati cakkavatti bhavitum puññavā gabbhaḥ viya

original: na vijjatīti laddhūpacārajjhānassa parihāni na vijjati. Nimitte hi aparihīne tadārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: na vijjati iti laddha upacāra jhānassa na vijjati nimitte hi a parihīne tad ārammaṇam

original: jhānaṃ aparihīnameva hoti, nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhajjhānampi vinassati
analyzed: jhānam a parihīnam eva hoti nimitte pana ārakkha abhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddha jhānam pi vinassati

original: tadāyattavuttittā. Tenāha “ārakkhaṇe”tiādi.
analyzed: tad āyatta vutti ttā tena āha ārakkhaṇa itiādi

original: 885. Āvāsoti yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ nimittaṃ nuppajjati, uppannaṃ vā
analyzed: āvāsaḥ iti yasmin āvāse vasantassa anuppannam nimittam na uppajjati uppannam vā

original: vinassati, anupaṭṭhitā ca sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṃ na samādhiyati,
analyzed: vinassati anupaṭṭhitā ca sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca cittam na samādhiyati

original: ayaṃ asappāyo āvāso, tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti, tattha ekekasmiṃ tīṇi
analyzed: ayam asappāyaḥ āvāso tasmā yasmin vihāre bahū āvāsāḥ honti tattha ekekasmim tīṇi

original: tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yattha cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti, taṃ pahāya tabbiparīte vasitabbaṃ.
analyzed: tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yattha cittam ekaggam na hoti tam pahāya tad biparīte vasitabbam

original: Gocaroti gocaragāmo, so senāsanato atidūre accāsanne pubbadisāya vā pacchimadisāya
analyzed: gocaro ti gocara gāmo so senāsanataḥ atidūre acca āsanne pubba disāya vā pacchima disāya

original: vā asulabhabhikkho asappāyo. Bhassanti dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāpariyāpannā asappāyakathā.
analyzed: vā a sulabha bhikkhaḥ a sappāyaḥ bhassanti dvattiṃsa tiracchāna kathā pariyāpannāḥ a sappāya kathāḥ

original: Sā hissa nimittantaradhānāya saṃvattati. Puggaloti tiracchānakathiko, sīlādiguṇavirahito
analyzed: sā hi ssa nimitta antaradhānāya saṃvattati puggalaḥ ti tiracchāna kathiko sīla ādi guṇa virahitaḥ

original: puggalo, yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ na samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thiraṃ na
analyzed: puggalaḥ yam nissāya asamāhitam vā cittam na samādhiyati samāhitam vā thiram na

original: hoti, evarūpo. So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva karoti. Bhojanaṃ
analyzed: hoti evarūpaḥ saḥ hi tam kaddama udakam iva accham udakam malīnam eva karoti bhojanam

original: pana kassaci ambilaṃ, kassaci madhuraṃ asappāyaṃ hoti. Utupi kassaci sīto, kassaci
analyzed: pana kassaci ambilam kassaci madhuram asappāyam hoti kassaci kassaci

original: uṇho. Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu na hoti, taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca
analyzed: uṇhaḥ tasmai yam bhojanam vā utum vā sevantassa phāsu na hoti tam bhojanam saḥ ca

original: utu asappāyo. Iriyāpathoti ṭhānacaṅkamanādīsu yo imassa asamāhitacittassa samādhānāya,
analyzed: utu asappāyaḥ iriyāpatho ti ṭhāna caṅkamana ādīsu yaḥ imassa asamāhita cittassa samādhānāya

original: samāhitacittassa ca thirabhāvāya na hoti, ayaṃ asappāyo iriyāpatho, tasmā tampi āvāsaṃ
analyzed: samāhita cittassa ca thira bhāvāya na hoti ayam asappāyaḥ iriyāpatho tasmā tam pi āvāsam

original: viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā vajjetabbaṃ.
analyzed: viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā vajjetabbam

original: 886. Sappāye satta seveyyāti vuttaviparītavasena sappāye āvāsādike satta seveyya.
analyzed: sappāye satta seveyya ati vutta viparīta vasena sappāye āvāsa ādike satta seveyya

original: Tattha bhassasappāyaṃ nāma dasakathāvatthusannissitaṃ, tampi mattāya bhāsitabbaṃ.
analyzed: tattha bhassasappāyam nāma dasa kathā vatthu sannissitam tam pi mattāya bhāsitabbam

original: Evañhi paṭipajjatoti evaṃ vuttappakārena satta asappāye vajjetvā satta sappāye sevanavasena
analyzed: evam hi paṭipajjato ti evam vutta ppakārena satta asappāye vajjetvā satta sappāye sevana vasena

original: paṭipajjantassa nimittāsevanabahulassa.
analyzed: paṭipajjantassa nimitta āsevana bahulassa

original: 888-9. Yena vinā appanāya kusalo na hoti, so dasavidho vidhi, appanākosallaṃ, tannibbattaṃ
analyzed: yena vinā appanāya kusalaḥ na hoti saḥ dasavidhaḥ vidhi appanā kosallam tad nibbattam

original: vā ñāṇaṃ ganthavitthārabhayena idha na dassitaṃ, atthikena pana visuddhimaggato gahetabbanti
analyzed: vā ñāṇam gantha vitthāra bhayena idha na dassitam atthikena pana visuddhi maggato gahetabbanti

original: adhippāyo. Paṭiladdhe nimittasmiṃ, evañhi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ appanā sampavattatīti sambandho.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ paṭiladdhe nimittasmin evam hi sampādayataḥ appanā kosallam appanā sampavattati iti sambandhaḥ

original: 890-2. Sāti appanā. Evañhīti hi-saddo hetuattho, yasmā ṭhānametaṃ na vijjati, tasmā
analyzed: sā ati appanā evam hi iti hi saddaḥ hetu atthaḥ yasmā ṭhānam etam na vijjati tasmā

original: cittappavattiākāraṃ bhāvanācittassa līnuddhatādivasena pavattiākāraṃ sallakkhayaṃ
analyzed: citta ppavatti ākāram bhāvanā cittassa līn uddhata ādi vasena pavatti ākāram sat lakkhayam

original: upadhārento samataṃ vīriyasseva vīriyassa samādhinā samataṃyeva yojayetha, kathaṃ
analyzed: upadhārentaḥ samatam vīriyassa iva vīriyassa samādhinā samataṃyā iva yojayetha katham

original: pana yojayethāti āha “īsakampī”tiādi. Tattha layanti līnabhāvaṃ, saṅkocanti attho.
analyzed: pana yojayetha iti āha īsakampi itiādi tattha layanti līna bhāvam saṅkocanti attho

original: Yantanti gacchantaṃ, paggaṇhetheva samabhāvāyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “accāraddhaṃ nisedhetvā
analyzed: yantanti gacchantam paggaṇhetha iva sama bhāvāya ati adhippāyaḥ tena āha acca āraddham nisedhetvā

original: samameva pavattaye”ti. Taṃ mānasanti sambandho.
analyzed: samam eva tam sambandhaḥ

original: 894-9. Evanti vuttappakārena vīriyasamatāyojanavasena, paṭipannabhāvanāmānasaṃ paṭibhāganimitteyeva
analyzed: evam ti vutta ppakārena vīriya sama tā yojana vasena paṭipanna bhāvanā mānasam

original: ṭhapanavasena nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato tassa yogino. Samijjhissatīti uppajjissati.
analyzed: ṭhapana vasena nimitta abhimukham paṭipādayataḥ tassa yogino samijjhissati iti uppajjissati

original: Pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīti bhāvanāvasena upaṭṭhitaṃ tadeva paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Javanānīti
analyzed: pathavīkasiṇanti pathavī iti bhāvanā vasena upaṭṭhitam tat eva paṭibhāga nimittam javanāni iti

original: kāmarūpāvacarajavanāni. Tenāha “ekaṃ tu rūpāvacarikaṃ bhave”ti. Aññehīti pākatikehi
analyzed: kāma rūpāvacara javanāni tena āha ekam tu rūpāvacarikam bhava iti aññehi iti pākatikehi

original: kāmāvacaracittehi. Balavatarāti bhāvanābalena paṭutarabhāvappattiyā accantabalavanto.
analyzed: kāmāvacara cittehi bhāvanā balena paṭutara bhāva ppattiyā accanta balavantaḥ

original: Parikammopacāratoti parikammattā, upacārattā ca. Tattha parikammattāti paṭisaṅkharaṇattā.
analyzed: parikamma upacārato ti parikamma ttā upacāra ttā ca tattha parikamma ttā ati paṭisaṅkharaṇa ttā

original: Upacārattāti yathā gāmādīnaṃ āsannadeso “gāmūpacāro, nagarūpacāro”ti vuccati, evaṃ
analyzed: upacāra ttā iti yathā gāma ādīnam āsanna desaḥ gāma upacāraḥ nagara upacāro ti vuccati evam

original: appanāya āsannattā samīpacārittā. Upacārāni appanaṃ upecca carantīti katvā. Appanāyānulomattāti
analyzed: appanāya āsanna ttā samīpa cāri ttā upacārāni appanam upecca caranti iti katvā appanāya anuloma ttā ati

original: nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ parikammatopi lahukaṃ appanānipphādakavasena, guṇavasena vā appanāya
analyzed: nānā vajjana vīthiyam lahukam appanā nipphādaka vasena guṇa vasena vā appanāya

original: anukūlattā. Etthāti etesu parikammopacārānulomasaññitesu. Sabbantimaṃ tatiyaṃ, catutthaṃ
analyzed: anukūla ttā ettha ati etesu parikamma upacāra anuloma saññitesu sabbantimam tatiyam catuttham

original: vā gotrabhūti pavuccati parittagottassa abhibhavanato, mahaggatagottassa bhāvanato ca.
analyzed: vā gotrabhūti pavuccati paritta gottassa abhibhavanataḥ mahaggata gottassa bhāvanataḥ ca

original: 900-3. Avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhame naye gahitāgahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “gahitāgahaṇenā”tiādi.
analyzed: avisesena sabbesam sabbā samaññā ati paṭhame naye gahita a gahaṇam hoti iti āha gahita a gahaṇena atiādi

original: Ekekassa gahitanāmaṃ itaresaṃ aggahaṇato, ekekanāmavasena gahitassa itaranāmavasena
analyzed: ekekassa gahita nāmam itaresam aggahaṇataḥ ekeka nāma vasena gahitassa itara nāma vasena

original: aggahaṇato vā nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena “paṭhamaṃ upacāraṃ
analyzed: aggahaṇato vā nānā vajjana parikammam eva parikammanti adhippāyena paṭhamam upacāram

original: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vāti vā-saddo aniyamo, so pana khippābhiññadandhābhiññavasena
analyzed: vā tiādi vuttam catuttham pañcamam vā iti vā saddo aniyamo saḥ pana khippa abhiñña dandha abhiñña vasena

original: veditabbo. Khippābhiññassa hi catutthaṃ appeti, dandhābhiññassa pañcamaṃ. Tato paranti
analyzed: veditabbo khippa abhiññassa hi catuttham appeti dandha abhiññassa pañcamam tatas paranti

original: pañcamato paraṃ. Tenāha “chaṭṭhe vā”tiādi. Kasmā na jāyatīti āha “āsannattā bhavaṅgassā”ti.
analyzed: param tena āha chaṭṭhe vā ati ādi kasmā na jāyati iti āha āsanna ttā bhavaṅgassa ati

original: Cittaniyāmavasena hi uppajjitabbesu sattasu javanesu chaṭṭhasattamajavanavāragaḷanaṭṭhānabhūtattā
analyzed: citta niyāma vasena hi uppajjitabbesu sattasu javanesu chaṭṭha sattama javana vāra gaḷana ṭṭhāna bhūta ttā

original: bhavaṅgassa āsannaṃ javanaṃ patati. Tāvadeti tāvadeva. Chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamaṃ vā javanaṃ
analyzed: bhavaṅgassa āsannam javanam patati tāvat eti tāvat eva chaṭṭham sattamam vā javanam

original: patantaṃ viya hoti parikkhīṇajavanattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: patantam viya hoti parikkhīṇa javana ttā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: 904-6. Atha kimetaṃ vuccati “chaṭṭhe sattame vāpi appanā na jāyatī”ti? Ābhidhammikagodattatthero
analyzed: atha kim etam vuccati chaṭṭhe sattame vā api appanā na jāyati iti ābhidhammikagodatta thero

original: hi “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena
analyzed: hi purimā purimā kusalāḥ dhammā pacchimānam pacchimānam kusalānam dhammānam āsevana paccayena

original: paccayo”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vatvā yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti,
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti imam suttam vatvā yathā a laddha āsevanam paṭhama javanam gotrabhum na uppādeti

original: laddhāsevanaṃ pana balavabhāvato dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ uppādeti, evaṃ laddhāsevanatāya
analyzed: laddha āsevanam pana balava bhāvataḥ dutiyam tatiyam vā gotrabhum uppādeti evam laddha āsevana tāya

original: balavabhāvato chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamampi vā appetīti chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamampi vā appanā hotīti
analyzed: balava bhāvataḥ chaṭṭham sattamam pi vā appeti iti chaṭṭham sattamam pi vā appanā hoti iti

original: vadatī”ti imaṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāya therassa taṃ mataṃ paṭikkhipitvā yathāvuttamatameva
analyzed: vadati iti imam codanam manasi nidhāya therassa tam matam paṭikkhipitvā yathāvutta matam eva

original: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “purimehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpetum purimehi itiādi vuttam

original: Pariyante ṭhātuṃ neva sakkotīti papāte eva patatīti adhippāyo. Appetuṃ na sakkotīti
analyzed: pariyante ṭhātum na iva sakkoti iti papāte eva patati iti adhippāyaḥ appetum na sakkoti iti

analyzed: punappunam āvajjana ādinā sādhetabbā tasmā vuttam āvajjitvā atiādi

original: 927. Imesu pana ādikammikena samāpajjanabahuleneva bhavitabbaṃ, na paccavekkhaṇabahulena.
analyzed: imesu pana ādikammikena samāpajjana bahulena iva bhavitabbam na paccavekkhaṇa bahulena

original: Paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, athassa
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇa bahulassa hi jhāna aṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti

analyzed: tāni eva upaṭṭhita ttā upari ussukkanāya paccaya tam na āpajjanti so appaguṇe jhāne

original: ussukkamāno paṭhamajjhānāva parihāyati, na ca sakkoti dutiyaṃ adhigantuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ

original: “paṭhame avasippatte”tiādi. Ubhato bhaṭṭhoti puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjituṃ na

original: sakkotīti adhippāyo. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –

analyzed: idha ekaccaḥ bhikkhu bālaḥ abyattaḥ a khetta ññū akusalaḥ vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi

analyzed: dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: so taṃ nimittaṃ nāsevati, na bhāveti, na bahuliṃ karoti, na svādhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: saḥ tam nimittam na āsevati na bhāveti na bahulim karoti na svādhiṭṭhitam adhiṭṭhāti

original: Tassa evaṃ hoti ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā…pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja

original: viharituṃ. Tassa evaṃ hoti ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja

original: vihareyya’nti, so na sakkoti vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ,
analyzed: vihareyyanti so na sakkoti vivicca iva kāmehipe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharitum

original: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ubhato bhaṭṭho ubhato parihīno”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu ubhatas bhaṭṭhaḥ ubhatas parihīnaḥ ti

original: 928-31. Kāmassahagatā…pe… carantīti ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññā ceva
analyzed: caranti iti ārammaṇa vasena kāma sahagatā hutvā saññā ca iva

analyzed: manasikārā ca samudācaranti saññā sīsena ca ittha tad sahagataḥ cittuppādaḥ gahitaḥ manakkāra ggahaṇena

original: āvajjananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena hānaṃ parihāniṃ
analyzed: āvajjananti daṭṭhabbam kāma anupakkhandānam saññā manasikārānam vasena hānam parihānim

original: bhajatīti hānabhāgiyaṃ. Keci pana “saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyo dhammo’ti vacanato hānabhāgiyā
analyzed: bhajati iti hāna bhāgiyam keci pana hāna bhāgiyaḥ dhammo ti vacanataḥ hāna bhāgiyā

original: kāmasaññādikāti tehi parihāpiyamānaṃ jhānampi kāraṇūpacārena hānabhāgiyaṃ nāmā”ti
analyzed: kāma saññā ādikā ati tehi parihāpiyamānam jhānam pi kāraṇa upacārena hānabhāgiyam nāma ati

original: vadanti. Tadanudhammatā satīti tasseva jhānassa anudhammatā ārammaṇavasena tadanugatā
analyzed: vadanti tad anudhamma tā satī iti tassa iva jhānassa anudhamma tā ārammaṇa vasena tad anugatā

original: satipatirūpakā nikanti. Atakkasahitāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ pattukāmassa taṃ santato,

original: manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena taṃsahagatā. Visesabhāgiyanti visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa
analyzed: manasi karoto ārammaṇa vasena tad sahagatā visesa bhāgiyanti visesa bhūtassa dutiya jhānassa

original: padaṭṭhānatāya taṃ bhajatīti visesabhāgiyaṃ. Nibbidāsaṃyutāti vipassanārammaṇā.

original: 932-5. Paguṇatoti vasitappattato. Āsannākusalārikāti nīvaraṇappahānassa taṃpaṭhamatāya
analyzed: paguṇataḥ ti vasita pattataḥ āsannā a kusalārikā ati nīvaraṇa ppahānassa taṃ paṭhama tāya

analyzed: āsanna nīvaraṇa paccatthikā thūlam nāma vipulam pi pheggu āha

original: “thūlattā…pe… dubbalā”ti. Tatoti dutiyajjhānato. Dubbalāni aṅgāni imissāti aṅgadubbalā.
analyzed: thūla ttāpe dubbalā ati tatas ti dutiya jhānataḥ dubbalāni aṅgāni imissā ati aṅga dubbalā

original: Santato cintayitvāti paṭhamajjhāne viya oḷārikaṅgānaṃ abhāvato, santadhammasamaṅgitāya

original: te paṭhamajjhānepi santi, tehi pana te santatarā, paṇītatarā ca honti. Nikantinti

analyzed: nikāmanam apekkhanti attho pariyādāya ati khepetvā vikkhambhetvā ati attho

original: 943-4. Sampasādananti sampasādanasaṅkhātāya saddhāya yogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ
analyzed: sampasādanam ti sampasādana saṅkhātāya saddhāya yogataḥ jhānam pi sampasādanam

original: nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya. Nanu cāyaṃ saddhā paṭhamajjhānepi atthi, kasmā

original: idameva “sampasādana”nti vuttanti? Vuccate – paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena
analyzed: idam eva sampasādanan ti vuttanti vuccate paṭhama jhānam vitakka vicāra khobhena

original: vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti, tasmā satipi saddhāya taṃ sampasādananti
analyzed: vīci taraṅga samākulam iva jalam na su pasannam hoti tasmā satipi saddhāya tam

original: na vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana vitakkavicārakkhobhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā, tasmā
analyzed: na vuttam imasmin pana vitakka vicāra khobha abhāvena laddha ukāsā balavatī saddhā tasmā

original: balavasaddhāya samannāgatattā idameva “sampasādana”nti vuttaṃ. Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ,

original: attani jātaṃ, attano santāne nibbattanti attho. Tīṇi aṅgāni imassāti tivaṅgikaṃ.
analyzed: attani jātam attano santāne nibbattanti tīṇi aṅgāni imassa ati tivaṅgikam

original: Sesanti pītiādīnaṃ aññehi balavabhāvo, tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ vā javanānaṃ parikammopacārānulomagotrabhubhāvo,
analyzed: pīti ādīnam aññehi balava bhāvo tiṇṇam catunnam vā javanānam parikamma upacāra anuloma gotra bhu bhāvo

original: chaṭṭhe sattame vā appanāyānuppatti ekacittakkhaṇatā, tato bhavaṅgapāto, puna bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: chaṭṭhe sattame vā appanāya anuppatti eka citta kkhaṇa tā tatas bhavaṅga pāto puna bhavaṅgam

analyzed: vicchinditvā paccavekkhaṇa atthāya āvajjanam tatas jhāna paccavekkhaṇan ti idam sabbam

analyzed: vutta avasesam heṭṭhā paṭhama jhāne vutta nayena iva samupalakkhitabbam

original: 948-9. Piyatoti kāmayato. Uppilāpananti kāmañcāyaṃ pariggahesu apariccattapemassa
analyzed: piyataḥ ti kāmayataḥ kāmam ca ayam pariggahesu a pariccatta pemassa

original: anādīnavadassino taṇhāsahagatāya pītiyā pavattiākāro, idha ca dutiyajjhānapīti adhippetā,
analyzed: anādīnava dassinaḥ taṇhā sahagatāya pītiyā pavatti ākāraḥ idha ca dutiya jhāna pīti adhippetā

original: tathāpi sabbaso pītiyaṃ avirattassāpi anubandheyyāti uppilāpanaṃ idha ādīnavavasena
analyzed: tathā api sabbaso pītiyam a virattassa api anubandheyya ati uppilāpanam idha ādīnava vasena

original: vuttaṃ. Atha vā dutiyajjhānasseva tatiyajjhānaṃ viya ahutvā uppilāpanākārena pavatti

analyzed: uppilāpanam viyā ti uppilāpanam ti vuttam tatiyam santataḥ disvā iti sambandhaḥ

analyzed: satiyā sampajaññena sampannanti saraṇa lakkhaṇāya satiyā asammoha lakkhaṇena

original: 972. Somanassassa pahīnattā āha “ekaṅgavippahīna”nti. Tañca pana somanassaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesuyeva pahīyati.
analyzed: somanassassa pahīna ttā āha eka aṅga vippahīnam ti tat ca pana somanassam eka vīthiyam purima javanesu yā iva pahīyati

original: 974. Purimajjhānesu parikammādivasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacarajavanānaṃ ekasadisattā
idha labbhamānaṃ kañci visesaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āsevanaṃ na hotīti āsevanapaccayena
analyzed: idha labbhamānam kañci visesam dassetum yasmā itiādi vuttam āsevanam na hoti iti āsevana paccayena

analyzed: paccayaḥ na hoti ayam ha ittha adhippāyaḥ yasmā pada antara saṅgahitassa attanaḥ sabhāva ggāhāpana saṅkhāta āsevana paccaya ttā bhāvato

original: sukhavedanā upekkhāvedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti, catutthajjhāneva upekkhāvedanāya
analyzed: sukha vedanā upekkhā vedanāya āsevana paccayena paccayaḥ na hoti catuttha jhānā iva upekkhā vedanāya

original: bhavitabbaṃ sātisayaṃ sukhavirāgabhāvanattā, tasmā idha appanāvīthiyaṃ upekkhāsampayuttajavaneheva bhavitabbanti.
analyzed: bhavitabbam sa atisayam sukha virāga bhāvana ttā tasmai idha appanā vīthiyam upekkhā sampayutta javanehi iva bhavitabbanti

original: 976. Evaṃ catukkanayavasena jhānappabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni pañcakanayampi dassetuṃ
analyzed: evam catukka naya vasena jhāna ppabhedam dassetvā idāni pañcaka nayam pi dassetum

original: “yaṃ catukkanaye”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dvidhā pana katvānāti vitakkavicārānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ

original: pahānaṅgavasena gaṇanato dvidhā katvā. Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ katanti avitakkavicāramattaṃ
analyzed: pahā anaṅga vasena gaṇanataḥ dvidhā katvā dutiyam tatiyam a vitakka vicāra mattam

original: avitakkaavicāranti evaṃ dutiyajjhānañceva tatiyajjhānañca kataṃ abhidhammeti adhippāyo.
analyzed: avitakka avicāranti evam dutiya jhānañca iva tatiya jhānañca katam abhidhamma iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Suttantesu hi pañcakanayo sarūpato na gahito, kasmā pana abhidhamme gahitoti? Puggalajjhāsayato,
analyzed: suttantesu hi pañcaka nayo sarūpataḥ na gahito kasmā pana abhidhamme gahito ti puggala jjhāsayato

original: sannisinnadevaparisāya hi yesaṃ paṭhamajjhāne vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, itare
analyzed: sannisinna deva parisāya hi yesam paṭhama jhāne vitakkaḥ eva oḷārikataḥ upaṭṭhāti itare

original: santato, tesaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ katvā pañcakanayena
analyzed: santataḥ tesam caturaṅgikam a vitakka vicāra mattam dutiya jhānam katvā pañcaka nayena

original: desesi. Yesaṃ vitakkavicārā oḷārikato upaṭṭhitā, tato tesaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ tivaṅgikaṃ

original: katvā catukkanayena desesi. Yesaṃ vitakkova oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, tehi taṃ atikkamitvā
analyzed: katvā catukka nayena desesi yesam vitakkaḥ uva oḷārikataḥ upaṭṭhāti tehi tam atikkamitvā

original: caturaṅgikaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkā. Yesaṃ vitakkavicārā, tehi dvepi ekato
analyzed: caturaṅgikam dutiya jhānam uppādetum sakkāḥ yesam vitakka vicārāḥ tehi dve api ekatas

original: atikkamitvā tivaṅgikaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkā.
analyzed: a tikkamitvā tivaṅgikam dutiya jhānam uppādetum sakkā

original: 979. Atthabyañjanavasena suṭṭhu madhuraṃ, tatoyeva varataraṃ vacanaṃ yassa soyaṃ
analyzed: attha byañjana vasena suṭṭhu madhuram varataram vacanam yassa soyam

original: sumadhuravarataravacano. Kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati, na hi ekampi na rañjayati.
analyzed: kam nu janam nā iva rañjayati na hi ekam pi na rañjayati

original: Atinisita …pe… nīyoyanti atitikhiṇabuddhippasādehi janehi vedanīyo ayaṃ gantho, paricchedoti vā adhippāyo.
analyzed: atinisita atitikhiṇa buddhi pasādehi janehi vedanīyaḥ ayam gantho paricchedaḥ ti vā adhippāyo

original: Iti abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhammatthavikāsiniyā nāma

original: Abhidhammāvatārasaṃvaṇṇanāya
analyzed: abhidhamma avatāra saṃvaṇṇanāya

original: Rūpāvacarasamādhibhāvanāniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpāvacara samādhi bhāvanā niddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 15. Pannarasamo paricchedo
analyzed: pannarasamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: Arūpāvacarasamādhibhāvanāniddesavaṇṇanā
980. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇavasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni dassetvā yasmā sesakasiṇavasena
analyzed: evam pathavī kasiṇa vasena catukka pañcaka jjhānāni dassetvā yasmā sesa kasiṇa vasena

original: niddisiyamāne ganthagāravo hoti, tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaraṃ vibhāvetuṃ
analyzed: niddisiyamāne gantha gāravaḥ hoti tasmā tam sabbam ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaram vibhāvetum

original: “rūpārūpa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Rūpārūpamatītenāti rūpārūpabhavaṃ atikkantena, punānūpapattivasena
analyzed: āraddham rūpa arūpam atītena ati rūpa arūpa bhavam atikkantena

original: rūpārūpabhavaṃ atikkantena, pageva kāmāvacarabhavaṃ. Rūpārūpādivedināti rūpārūpādibhūmantaravedinā.
analyzed: rūpa arūpa bhavam atikkantena pagā iva kāmāvacara bhavam rūpa arūpa ādi vedinā ati rūpa arūpa ādi bhūm antara vedinā

original: 982-4. Yasmā ayaṃ arūpāvacarasamādhi nāma rūpavirāgabhāvanā rūpavirāgavaseneva abhinipphādetabbāva,
analyzed: yasmai ayam arūpāvacara samādhi nāma rūpa virāga bhāvanā rūpa virāga vasena iva

original: tasmā taṃ uppādetukāmassa rūpe virajjanākāraṃ, virattamānasena ca tadatthāya paṭipajjanavidhiṃ
analyzed: tasmā tam uppādetu kāmassa rūpe virajjana ākāram viratta mānasena ca tad atthāya paṭipajjana vidhim

original: dassetuṃ “rūpe kho”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Daṇḍanaṭṭhena daṇḍo, muggarādi, parapīḷanādhippāyena
analyzed: dassetum rūpe kho ti ādi āraddham daṇḍana ṭṭhena daṇḍaḥ muggara ādi para pīḷana adhippāyena

original: tassa ādānaṃ daṇḍādānaṃ. Ādi-saddena satthādānakalahaviggahavivādatuvaṃtuvaṃpesuññādīnaṃ,

original: Dibbacakkhuvasenevāti dibbacakkhuupanissayeneva. Tañhi etassa uppādane parikammaṃ.

original: evaṃ āhāro uppannassa kāyassa brūhetā, sandhārako cāti vuttaṃ “dhātī…pe… bhave”ti.
analyzed: evam āhāraḥ uppannassa kāyassa sandhārako ca ati vuttam dhātīpe bhaveti

original: Kāmañcettha avijjādayo nāmakāyassāpi paccayo, pakārantarena pana tassa pākaṭaṃ paccayapariggahavidhiṃ
analyzed: kāmam ca ittha avijjā ādayaḥ nāmakāyassa api paccayaḥ pakāra antarena pana tassa pākaṭam paccaya pariggaha vidhim

original: dassetuṃ “cakkhuñcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha cakkhuñcāti ca-saddo samuccayattho, tena
analyzed: dassetum cakkhum ca iti ādi vuttam tattha cakkhum ca iti ca saddo samuccaya ttho tena

original: cakkhuviññāṇassa āvajjanādiṃ ajjhattaṃ sabbaṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Rūpamālokameva
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇassa āvajjana ādim ajjhattam sabbam paccaya jātam saṅgaṇhāti rūpam ālokam eva

original: cāti pana ca-saddena yathā bāhirarūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo, yathā ca
analyzed: ca iti pana ca saddena yathā bāhira rūpam cakkhu viññāṇassa ārammaṇa paccayaḥ yathā ca

original: āloko upanissayapaccayo, evaṃ aññampi bāhiraṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Paṭiccāti
analyzed: āloko upanissaya paccayaḥ evam aññam pi bāhiram paccaya jātam saṅgaṇhāti paṭicca ati

original: paccayabhūtaṃ laddhāti attho. Tena cakkhussa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena,
analyzed: paccaya bhūtam laddhā ti attho tena cakkhussa nissaya purejāta aindriya vippayutta atthi avigata vasena

original: rūpālokānañca yathāsambhavaṃ ārammaṇaupanissayapurejātaatthiavigatavasena, itaresañca
analyzed: rūpa ālokānam ca yathāsambhavam ārammaṇa upanissaya purejāta atthi avigata vasena itaresam ca

original: saddasaṅgahitānaṃ anantarādisahajātādivasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ādi-saddena phassādīnaṃ
analyzed: sadda saṅgahitānam anantara ādi sahajāta ādi vasena paccaya bhāvam dasseti ādi saddena phassa ādīnam

original: viya saha paccayehi sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Evaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: viya saha paccayehi sota viññāṇa ādīnam saṅgahaḥ veditabbaḥ evam sammasana upagam sabbam

original: nāmaṃ saha paccayena saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “nāmakāyassa paccayaṃ parigaṇhatī”ti.
analyzed: nāmam saha paccayena saṅgahitam hoti tena āha nāmakāyassa paccayam parigaṇhati iti

original: 1238-40. Disvānāti etarahi pavattiṃ disvā. Tathevidanti iminā na kevalaṃ sappaccayatāmattameva
analyzed: etarahi pavattim disvā iminā na kevalam sappaccaya tā mattam eva

original: paccāmaṭṭhaṃ, atha kho yādisehi etarahi pavattati, tādisehi avijjādipaccayeheva atītepi
analyzed: atha kho yādisehi etarahi pavattati tādisehi avijjā ādi paccayehi iva atīte pi

original: pavattitthāti paccayasahitatāpi paccāmaṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pubbanteti atītakhandhappabandhakoṭṭhāse. Pañcadhāgatāti –
analyzed: pavattittha ati paccaya sahita tā api daṭṭhabbam pubba ante ti atīta khandha ppabandha koṭṭhāse pañcadhā gatā ati

original: “Ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahosiṃ ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ nu kho
analyzed: ahosim nu kho aham atīta maddhānam na nu kho ahosim aham atīta maddhānam kim nu kho

original: ahosiṃ ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ ahamatītamaddhānaṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ

original: ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti –
analyzed: ahosim nu khalu aham atītam addhā ananti

original: Pañcahi ākārehi āgatā, pavattā vā. Aparanteti anāgate khandhappabandhakoṭṭhāse. Pañcadhā samudīritāti –
analyzed: pañcahi ākārehi āgatā pavattā vā aparantā iti anāgate khandha ppabandha koṭṭhāse pañcadhā samudīritā ati

original: “Bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho bhavissāmi ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ,
analyzed: bhavissāmi nu kho aham anāgatam addhānam na nu kho bhavissāmi aham anāgatam addhānam

original: kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho bhavissāmi ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ,
analyzed: kim nu kho bhavissāmi aham anāgatam addhānam katham nu kho bhavissāmi aham anāgatam addhānam

original: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhāna”nti –
analyzed: kim hutvā kim bhavissāmi nu kho aham anāgatam addhānam ti

original: Evaṃ pañcadhā kathitā.
analyzed: evam pañcadhā kathitā

original: 1241. Paccuppannepi addhāneti etarahi paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā cutipariyante addhānepi.
analyzed: paccuppanne pi addhāne iti etarahi paṭisandhim ādim katvā cuti pariyante addhāne pi

original: Addhāna-ggahaṇena cettha paccuppannakhandhakoṭṭhāsameva vadati. Na hi tabbinimutto
analyzed: addhāna gahaṇena ca ittha paccuppanna khandha koṭṭhāsam eva vadati na hi tad vinimuttaḥ

original: añño koci kālo nāma atthīti. Chabbidhā parikittitāti –
analyzed: añño koci kālaḥ nāma atthi iti chabbidhā parikittitā ati

original: “Ahaṃ nu khosmi, no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi, kathaṃ nu khosmi, ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī ca bhavissatī”ti –
analyzed: aham nu kho asmi no nu kho asmi kim nu kho asmi katham nu kho asmi ayam nu kho satto kutas āgataḥ saḥ kuhim gāmī ca bhavissati iti

original: Evaṃ chabbidhā vuttā. “Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassā”tiādīsu viya padesepi sabba-saddassa
analyzed: evam chabbidhā vuttā sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa ati ādīsu viya padese pi sabba saddassa

original: pavattanato “sabbā”ti vatvāpi “anavasesā”ti vuttaṃ. Natthi etissā avaseso avasiṭṭhoti
analyzed: pavattanato sabbā ti vatvā api anavasesā ti vuttam natthi etissā avasesaḥ avasiṭṭho ti

original: anavasesā, soḷasavidhāpi cesā ekakaṅkhāvasenāpi anavasiṭṭhā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: anavasesā soḷasavidhā api ca isā eka kaṅkhā vasena api anavasiṭṭhā hutvā iti vuttam hoti

original: Pahiyyatīti vikkhambhanavasena pahiyyati. Kāmaṃ nāmarūpamattaṃ vinā sattassa adassanena
analyzed: pahiyyati iti vikkhambhana vasena pahiyyati kāmam nāma rūpa mattam vinā sattassa adassanena

original: diṭṭhivisuddhiyāva paccuppanne kaṅkhā pahīnā, atītānāgate kaṅkhānaṃ pahānena pana
analyzed: diṭṭhi visuddhi yāva paccuppanne kaṅkhā pahīnā atīta anāgate kaṅkhānaṃ pahānena pana

original: paccuppanne kaṅkhāya atisayappahānaṃ dassetuṃ idheva sā vuttā. Atha vā paccuppanne
analyzed: paccuppanne kaṅkhāya atisaya ppahānam dassetum idhā iva sā vuttā atha vā paccuppanne

original: nissattanāmarūpassa paccayesu pavattakaṅkhāya idheva tīraṇato sā idha vuttā. Vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ
analyzed: nissatta nāmarūpassa paccayesu pavatta kaṅkhāya idha iva tīraṇataḥ sā idha vuttā vaṇṇa bhaṇanam

original: vā etaṃ idha paccuppannakaṅkhāya pahānavacanaṃ yathā taṃ sotāpattimaggādīsu pahīnānampi
analyzed: vai etam idha paccuppanna kaṅkhāya pahāna vacanam yathā tam sotāpatti magga ādīsu pahīnānam pi

original: ca pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānātiādinā anāgāmimaggādīsu vacananti.
analyzed: ca anāgāmi magga ādīsu

original: 1242. Kammavipākānaṃ vasenāpīti purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanaṃ saṅkhārā,
analyzed: kamma vipākānam vasena api iti purima kamma bhavasmim mohaḥ avijjā āyūhanam saṅkhārā

original: nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ
analyzed: nikanti taṇhā upagamanam upādānam cetanā bhavaḥ iti ime pañca dhammā purima kamma bhavasmiṃ

original: idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā, idha paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ,
analyzed: idha paṭisandhiyā paccayāḥ idha paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ okkanti nāma rūpam pasādaḥ āyatanaṃ

original: phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ pure katassa
analyzed: phuṭṭhaḥ phassaḥ vedayitam vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā idhu upapatti bhavasmim pure katassa

original: kammassa paccayā, idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā…pe… cetanā bhavo iti ime
analyzed: kammassa paccayāḥ idha paripakka ttā āyatanānam mohaḥ cetanā bhavaḥ iti ime

original: pañca dhammā kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayāti evaṃ vuttānaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭānaṃ
analyzed: pañca dhammā kamma bhavasmim āyatim paṭisandhiyā paccayā ti evam vuttānam kamma vaṭṭa vipāka vaṭṭānam

original: vasena. Kilesavaṭṭopi cettha kammasahāyatāya kammavaṭṭeneva saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vasena kilesa vaṭṭaḥ api ca ittha kamma sahāya tāya kamma vaṭṭena iva saṅgahito ti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: 1243. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti ettha diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyanti ettha diṭṭhadhammaḥ vuccati paccakkha bhūtaḥ paccuppanno

original: attabhāvo, tattha veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ. Upapajjāparāpariyāhosikammavasā
analyzed: atta bhāvaḥ tattha veditabba phalam kammam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam upapajjā aparāpariyā ahosikamma vasā

original: panāti upapajjavedanīyaaparāpariyavedanīyaahosikammavasena. Uttarapadalopavasena
analyzed: panāti upapajja vedanīya apara apariya vedanīya ahosi kamma vasena uttara pada lopa vasena

original: hi “upapajjāparāpariya”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha paccuppannabhavato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā
analyzed: hi vuttam tattha paccuppanna bhavataḥ anantaram upapajjitvā

original: veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ. Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ aññasmiṃ
analyzed: veditabba phalam kammam upapajja vedanīyam apare apare diṭṭhadhammataḥ aññasmiṃ aññasmiṃ

original: yatthakatthaci attabhāve veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ. Ahosi eva kammaṃ,
analyzed: yattha katthaci atta bhāve veditabba phalam kammam apara apariya vedanīyam ahosi eva kammam

original: na tassa vipāko ahosi, atthi, bhavissati cāti evaṃ vattabbakammaṃ ahosikammaṃ.
analyzed: na tassa vipākaḥ ahosi atthi bhavissati ca ati evam vattabba kammam ahosikammam

original: Paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā
analyzed: paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūta tāya paccaya visesena paṭiladdha visesa tāya ca balava bhāva ppattā

analyzed: tādisassa pubba abhisaṅkhārassa vasena sa atisayā hutvā pavattā paṭhama javana cetanā tasmin yeva

original: attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā nāma. Sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne
analyzed: atta bhāve phala dāyinī diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyā nāma sā hi vutta ākārena balavati javana santāne

original: guṇavisesayuttesu upakārānupakāravasappavattiyā, āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca
analyzed: guṇa visesa yuttesu upakāra anupakāra vasa pavattiyā āsevana alābhena appa vipāka tāya ca

original: itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ, okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti
analyzed: itara dvayam viya pavatta santa anuparama apekkham okāsa lābha apekkham ca kammam na hoti iti

original: idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ ahetukaphalaṃ deti, sahetukaphaladāne
analyzed: idhā iva puppha mattam viya pavatti vipāka mattam ahetuka phalam deti sa hetuka phala dāne

original: pana paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanampi āpajjeyya. Tathā asakkontanti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma
analyzed: pana paṭisandhi ākaḍḍhanam pi āpajjeyya tathā a sakkontanti kammassa vipāka dānam nāma

original: upadhippayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ
analyzed: upadhi payoga ādi paccaya antara samavāyena iva hoti iti tad abhāvataḥ tasmin yā iva atta bhāve vipākam

original: dātuṃ asakkontaṃ. Ahosikammaṃ…pe… vipākoti ettha “ahosi kamma”nti padaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
analyzed: dātum asakkontam ettha ahosi kamman ti padam visum visum

original: yojetabbaṃ “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko,
analyzed: yojetabbam ahosi kammam na ahosi kamma vipāko ahosi kammam na bhavissati kamma vipāko

original: ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko”ti. Tattha sakasakakālātikkantassa upapajjavedanīyassa,
analyzed: ahosi kammam natthi kamma vipāko ti tattha saka saka kāla atikkantassa upapajja vedanīyassa

original: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa ca vasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañhi kammassa, vipākakālassa ca
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyassa ca vasena purimam vuttam tat hi kammassa vipāka kālassa ca

original: atītattā tathā vattabbattaṃ labhati, dutiyaṃ anāgate arahattaṃ pāpuṇantassa purimabhavesu
analyzed: atīta ttā tathā vattabba ttam labhati dutiyam anāgate arahattam pāpuṇantassa purima bhavesu

analyzed: katam upapajja vedanīyam arahataḥ atīta bhavesu katam apara apariya vedanīyam ca sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Apare pana “ekameva atītaṃ kammaṃ addhattaye vipākābhāvaṃ sandhāya tidhā
analyzed: vuttam apare pana ekam eva atītam kammaṃ addhattaye vipāka abhāvam sandhāya tidhā

original: vibhajitvā vutta”nti vadanti.
analyzed: vibhajitvā vuttanti vadanti

original: Atthasādhikāti dānādipāṇātipātādiatthassa nipphādikā. Kā pana sāti āha “sattamajavanacetanā”ti.
analyzed: attha sādhikā ti dāna ādi pāṇātipāta ādi atthassa nipphādikā kā pana sā ati āha sattama javana cetanā iti

original: Sā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā, paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino
analyzed: sā hi sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā vutta nayena paṭiladdha visesā paṭisandhiyā anantara paccaya bhāvino

original: vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena vā tathā abhisaṅkhatā samānā anantarattabhāve
analyzed: vipāka santānassa anantara paccaya bhāvena vā tathā abhisaṅkhatā samānā anantara tta bhāve

original: vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyaṃ nāma. Yebhuyyavuttiyā cettha “sattamajavanacetanā”ti
analyzed: vipāka dāyinī upapajjavedanīyam nāma yebhuyya vuttiyā ca ittha sattama javana cetanā ati

original: vuttaṃ. Paccavekkhaṇavasitādipavattiyaṃ pana pañcamādikāpi hoti. Vipākaṃ detīti paṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: vuttam paccavekkhaṇa vasita ādi pavattiyam pana pañcama ādikā api hoti vipākam deti iti paṭisandhim

original: datvā pavattivipākaṃ deti, adinnapaṭisandhikaṃ pana pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthi.
analyzed: datvā pavatti vipākam deti adinna paṭisandhikam pana pavatti vipākam deti iti natthi

original: Cutianantarañhi upapajjavedanīyassa okāsoti ācariyā. Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi
analyzed: cuti anantaram hi upapajja vedanīyassa okāso ti ācariyā paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jāti sate pi

original: pavattivipākaṃ deti. Tenāha bhagavā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti.
analyzed: pavatti vipākam deti tena āha bhagavā tiracchāna gate dānam da tvā sataguṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā ati

original: Ubhinna…pe… detīti yathāvuttakāraṇavirahato diṭṭhadhammūpapajjavedanīyabhāvaṃ asampattā
analyzed: deti iti yathā vutta kāraṇa virahataḥ diṭṭhadhamma upapajja vedanīya bhāvam a sampattā

original: pañca cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā okāsaṃ labhati, tadā paṭisandhivipākaṃ,

original: pavattivipākaṃ vā deti. Sati saṃsārappavattiyāti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe
analyzed: pavatti vipākam vā deti sati saṃsāra pavattiyā ati iminā asati saṃsāra ppavattiyam ahosi kamma pakkhe

original: tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti dīpeti.
analyzed: tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvato ti dīpeti

original: 1244. Evaṃ tāva vipākadānakālavasena catubbidhaṃ dassetvā idāni vipākadānapariyāyato,
analyzed: evam tāva vipāka dāna kāla vasena catubbidham dassetvā idāni vipāka dāna pariyāyato

original: kiccato ca catubbidhataṃ dassetuṃ “garuka”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha garukanti mahāsāvajjaṃ,
analyzed: kiccato ca catubbidha tam dassetum garuka nti ādi vuttam tattha garuka nti mahā sāvajjam

original: mahānubhāvañca aññena kammena paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyakammaṃ. Bahulanti abhiṇhaso
analyzed: mahā anubhāvañca aññena kammena paṭibāhitum a sakkuṇeyya kammam bahulanti

original: kataṃ, ekavāraṃ katvāpi abhiṇhasamāsevitañca. Āsannanti maraṇāsannakāle anussaritaṃ,

analyzed: tadā katam ca garuka ādi bhāvam a sampattam

original: vattabbakammaṃ. Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā, garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ mātughātakādikammaṃ
analyzed: vattabba kammam tattha kusalam vā hotu akusalam vā garuka agarukesu yam garukam mātughātaka ādi kammam

original: vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā, tadeva paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Tathā bahulābahulesu yaṃ bahulaṃ

analyzed: uppajjati uppannam ca vayam upeti iti iminā ākārena sama paññāsa lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā

original: ṭhitaṃ. Adhunā uppannaṃ na tāva balappattanti āha “taruṇa”nti. Kalāpasammasanādivasena
analyzed: ṭhitam adhunā uppannam na tāva bala ppattanti āha taruṇam iti kalāpa sammasana ādi vasena

analyzed: pavatta sammasanam nippariyāyena vipassanā samaññam labhati udaya bbaya anupassanā ādi vasena

original: pavattameva labhatīti āha “yassa cā”tiādi.
analyzed: pavattam eva labhati iti āha yassa ca atiādi

original: 1278-80. Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya vipassantassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā uppajjantīti
analyzed: athassa imāya taruṇa vipassanāya vipassantassa dasa vipassana pakkilesāḥ uppajjanti iti

analyzed: balava vipassanāya ati atthaḥ na hi tadā vipassana upakkilesāḥ uppajjanti iti vipassakassa ati

original: Diṭṭhiggāhādivatthubhāvena vipassanaṃ upakkilesantīti upakkilesā. Sampatto catusaccaphalapaṭivedho
analyzed: diṭṭhi ggāha ādi vatthu bhāvena vipassanam upakkilesanti iti upakkilesā sampattaḥ catu acca phala paṭivedho

analyzed: yena so sampatta paṭivedho so ca sotāpanna ādīnam aññataraḥ hoti iti āha sotāpanna ādinā ti

original: Apicāti ayaṃ vakkhamānasamuccayattho. Idañca ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena vuttaṃ balavavipassanāpattassāpi
analyzed: api ca iti ayam vakkhamāna samuccaya tthaḥ idam ca ukkaṭṭha niddesa vasena vuttam balava vipassanā pattassa api

original: anuppajjanato. Sampattapaṭivedhassāti vā balavipassanāpattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sopi
analyzed: an uppajjanataḥ sampatta paṭivedhassa ati vā bala vipassanā pattam sandhāya vuttam saḥ api

original: hi paṭivedhappattiyā āsannārahadese ṭhitattā sampattapaṭivedho nāma hoti. Evañca
analyzed: hi paṭivedha ppattiyāḥ āsanna araha dese ṭhita ttā sampattapaṭivedhaḥ nāma hoti evam ca

original: sati apicāti vuttasamuccayattho hoti. Atha vā api-saddo vuttasamuccayattho. Ca-saddo
analyzed: sati api ca iti vutta samuccaya tthaḥ hoti atha vā api saddo vutta samuccaya tthaḥ ca saddo

original: avuttasamuccayattho. Tena nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā

original: 1281. Vipassanāpaṭipattiyeva hi sasambhārā pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipatti, tadaññā vippaṭipatti,

original: samathavasenāpi hotīti tannivattanatthamāha “sadā vipassakassevā”ti. Uppajjantīti
analyzed: samatha vasena api hoti iti tad nivattana attham āha sadā vipassakassa iva āti uppajjanti iti

original: etthāpi eva-kāro sambandhitabbo, tena na nuppajjantīti attho. Aññathā maggāmaggañāṇasseva

analyzed: yathābhūtam na pajānāti dukkha tope anattataḥ upaṭṭhānam yathābhūtam na pajānāti iti

original: 1282. Idāni tesaṃ obhāsādīnaṃ sarūpavibhāvanatthaṃ tesu uppannesu vipassanāya upakkilissanākārañca

original: viddhaṃsanavaseneva tadā vipassanācittuppādassa pavattanato.

original: 1288-90. Manussānaṃ ayanti mānusī, manussayogyakāmasukharati. Tādisehi manussavisesehi

original: vipassanācittasampayuttā saddhā”tiādinā vuttanayānusārena vipassanāvaseneva ñeyyā.

original: khandhehi khandhānaṃ, phalena kammassa, dukkhena vā sattānaṃ saṃyojanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena
analyzed: khandhehi khandhānam phalena kammassa dukkhena vā sattānam saṃyojana ṭṭhena bandhana ṭṭhena

original: saṃyojanāni. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vibādhanaṭṭhena, upatāpanaṭṭhena, saṃkiliṭṭhatāya
analyzed: saṃyojanāni sampayutta dhammānam vibādhana ṭṭhena upatāpana ṭṭhena saṃkiliṭṭha tāya

original: ca kilesā. Abhinivesādivasena micchāviparītaṃ pavattanato micchāsabhāvāti micchattā.
analyzed: ca kilesāḥ abhinivesa ādi vasena micchā viparītam pavattanataḥ micchā sabhāvā ati micchat tā

original: Loke dhammā, lokapariyāpannā dhammā, lokappavattiyaṃ sati anuparamadhammattā vāti
analyzed: loke dhammāḥ loka pariyāpannāḥ dhammāḥ loka ppavattiyam sati anuparama dhamma ttā vāti

original: lokadhammā. Maccherassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vāti macchariyaṃ. Viparītaṭṭhena vipallāsā.
analyzed: loka dhammāḥ maccherassa bhāvaḥ kammam vāti macchariyam viparīta ṭṭhena vipallāsā

original: Nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca ganthanato ganthā. Ariyehi agantabbā, ayuttā gatīti
analyzed: nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca ganthanataḥ ganthāḥ ariyehi a gantabbā ayuttā gatī iti

original: vā agati. Āsavantīti āsavā, ābhavaggato sabbamokāsalokaṃ, āgotrabhuto sabbe dhamme
analyzed: vā agati āsavanti iti āsavāḥ ā bha vaggataḥ sabba mokāsa lokam ā gotrabhutaḥ sabbe dhamme

original: byāpetvā pavattantīti attho, āsavanti saṃsāradukkhanti vā āsavā, cakkhādīhi vā saṃvarāsaṃvaradvārehi
analyzed: byāpetvā pavattanti iti atthaḥ āsavanti saṃsāra dukkhanti vā āsavā cakkha ādīhi vā saṃvara asaṃvara dvārehi

original: sattasantāne āsavanti vaṇato yūsāni sandanti viyāti āsavā, āsavanti vā etehi cittāni
analyzed: satta santāne āsavanti vaṇataḥ yūsāni sandanti viyāti āsavāḥ āsavanti vai etehi cittāni

original: visayesūti āsavā. Saṃsāramahāsāgarappattihananato oghā viyāti oghā. Heṭṭhā vuttanayena
analyzed: visayesu iti āsavā saṃsāra mahā sāgara ppatti hananataḥ oghāḥ viyā ti oghāḥ heṭṭhā vutta nayena

original: yojanato yogā. Nivārenti lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesādhigamanti nīvaraṇāni. Aniccādidhammasabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yojanataḥ yogāḥ nivārenti lokiya lokuttara guṇa visesa adhigamanti nīvaraṇāni anicca ādi dhamma sabhāvam

original: atikkamma parato asabhāvato āmasantīti parāmāsā. Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: atikkamma paratas a sabhāvataḥ āmasanti iti parāmāsāḥ maṇḍūkam pannagaḥ viya ārammaṇam

original: bhusaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni. Appahīnabhāvena sattasantāne anusenti mūsikavisaṃ viya
analyzed: bhusam ādiyanti iti upādānāni appahīna bhāvena satta santāne anusenti mūsika visam viya

original: anurūpakāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti anusayā. Cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena malā.
analyzed: anurūpa kāraṇam labhitvā uppajjanti iti anusayā cittassa malīna bhāva karaṇa ṭṭhena malā

original: Akusalakammāni ca tāni duggatīnaṃ pathā cāti akusalakammapathā. Idha pana kammapathabhāvaṃ
analyzed: akusala kammāni ca tāni duggatīnam pathā ca ati akusala kamma pathāḥ idha pana kamma patha bhāvam

original: appattānaṃ taṃsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cittaṃ uppajjati etthāti cittuppādo,
analyzed: appattānam taṃsa bhāvataḥ gahaṇam daṭṭhabbam cittam uppajjati ettha ati cittuppādo

original: cetasikarāsi, akusalo ca so cittuppādo cāti akusalacittuppādo.
analyzed: cetasikarāsi akusalo ca so cittuppādo ca ati akusala cittuppādo

original: Kāmabhavato uparikoṭṭhāsabhāvato tatiyamaggappattiyā uddhaṃ bhajitabbato, sevitabbato
analyzed: kāma bhavataḥ upari koṭṭhāsa bhāvataḥ tatiya magga ppattiyāḥ uddham bhajitabbataḥ sevitabbataḥ

original: cāti uddhambhāgā, rūpārūpabhavā, tesaṃ hitāni tatthuppajjanakhandhādiyojanatoti uddhambhāgiyāni,
analyzed: ca ati uddhambhāgā rūpa arūpa bhavā tesam hitāni uddhambhāgiyāni

original: tāniyeva saṃyojanānīti uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni. Rūpārūpabhavato heṭṭhimakoṭṭhāsabhāvato
analyzed: saṃyojanāni iti uddhambhāgiya saṃyojanāni rūpa arūpa bhavataḥ heṭṭhima koṭṭhāsa bhāvataḥ

original: tatthuppādakilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvena tatiyamaggappattiyā heṭṭhā bhajitabbato vā adhobhāgā,
analyzed: appahīna bhāvena tatiya magga ppattiyāḥ heṭṭhā bhajitabbataḥ vā adhobhāgā

original: kāmabhavā, tesaṃ hitāni saṃyojanānīti adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanānīti.
analyzed: tesam hitāni saṃyojanāni iti adhobhāgiya saṃyojanāni iti

original: Imesu pana dasasu rūpabhavasaṃyojanaṃ, arūpabhavasaṃyojanaṃ, kāmabhavasaṃyojanañca atthato lobhova, sakkāyadiṭṭhisīlabbataparāmāsāpi diṭṭhiyeva, tasmā dhammato satta saṃyojanāni.
analyzed: imesu pana dasasu rūpa bhava saṃyojanam arūpa bhava saṃyojanam kāma bhava saṃyojanam ca atthataḥ lobhaḥ uva sakkāya diṭṭhi sīla bbata parāmāsā api diṭṭhiyā iva tasmā dhammato satta saṃyojanāni

original: Micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhīti tathā pavattānaṃ vitakkavīriyasamādhīnamadhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: micchā saṅkappaḥ micchā vāyāmaḥ micchā samādhi iti tathā pavattānam vitakka vīriya samādhīnam adhivacanam

original: Micchāvācādayo tayo tathā pavattā cetanā. Micchāsati pana cittuppādo. Micchāñāṇaṃ
analyzed: micchā vācā ādayo tayo tathā pavattā cetanā micchā sati pana citta uppādo micchāñāṇam

original: tathā pavatto moho. Micchāvimutti lokathūpikādīsu mokkhoti pavattamicchāgāho.
analyzed: tathā pavattaḥ mohaḥ micchāvimutti lokathūpika ādīsu mokkho ti pavatta micchāgāho

original: Kāraṇūpacārenāti lābhahetuko lābho, alābhahetuko alābhotiādinā kāriyassa kāraṇavasena upacaraṇena. Lokadhammaggahaṇanti lokadhammaggahaṇena gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇa upacārena ati lābha hetukaḥ lābhaḥ alābha hetukaḥ alābha uti ādinā kāriyassa kāraṇa vasena upacaraṇena loka dhamma gahaṇanti loka dhamma gahaṇena gahaṇam

original: Āvāse macchariyaṃ, āvāsahetukaṃ vā macchariyanti āvāsamacchariyaṃ. Evaṃ kulamacchariyādīnipi.
analyzed: āvāse āvāsa hetukam vā āvāsa macchariyam evam kula macchariya ādīni pi

original: Tattha āvāsoti vihārādi. Kulanti upaṭṭhākakulaṃ, ñātikulañca. Lābhoti paccayalābhoyeva.
analyzed: tattha āvāso ti vihāra ādi kulam ti upaṭṭhāka kulam ñāti kulam ca lābho ti paccaya lābhaḥ yeva

original: Vaṇṇoti sarīravaṇṇo ca guṇavaṇṇo ca. Dhammoti āgamo, adhigamo ca.
analyzed: vaṇṇo ti sarīra vaṇṇo ca guṇa vaṇṇo ca dhammo ti āgamaḥ adhigamaḥ ca

original: “Tayo”ti vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā ca pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
analyzed: tayo ti vatthum a bhinditvā vuttam bhinditvā ca pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti

original: Abhisajjanūpanayhanavasena pavattanato abhijjhābyāpādānaṃ kāyaganthatā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: abhisajjana upanayhana vasena pavattanataḥ abhijjhā byāpādānam kāya gantha tā daṭṭhabbā

original: “Idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti evaṃ avatthumhi pavatto abhiniveso idaṃsaccābhiniveso.
analyzed: idam eva saccam mogham aññanti evam avatthumhi pavattaḥ abhinivesaḥ idaṃsacca abhiniveso

original: Sīlabbataparāmāsaidaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā cettha atthato diṭṭhiyeva, tasmā dhammato tayo kāyaganthā.
analyzed: sīla bbata parāmāsa edaṃsacca abhinivesa kāyaganthā ca ittha atthataḥ diṭṭhiyā iva tasmā dhammato tayo kāyaganthā

original: “Chandadosamohabhayānī”ti agatikāraṇattā vuttaṃ, chandādīhi pana akattabbakaraṇaṃ, kattabbākaraṇañca agati nāma.
analyzed: chanda dosa moha bhayāni iti agati kāraṇa ttā vuttam chanda ādīhi pana akattabba karaṇam kattabba akaraṇam ca agati nāma

original: Āsavesu kāmarāgabhavarāgā atthato lobhoti dhammato tayo āsavā.
analyzed: āsavesu kāma rāga bhava rāgā atthataḥ lobho ti dhammato tayo āsavā

original: Tesamevāti kāmarāgādīnameva. Te hi ogho viya attani patite apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti, saṃsāradukkhato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti, khandhādīni ca khandhādīhi yojenti.
analyzed: tesam eva ati kāma rāga ādīnam eva te hi oghaḥ viya attani patite apāyasa muddam pāpenti saṃsāra dukkhato ca sīsam ukkhipitum na denti khandha ādīni ca khandha ādīhi yojenti

original: Kāmupādānādīnīti kāmupādānadiṭṭhupādānasīlabbatupādānaattavādupādānāni. Diṭṭhupādānādīni cettha tathā pavattā diṭṭhiyeva, kāmupādānaṃ lobhoti dhammato dve upādānāni.
analyzed: kāma upādāna ādīni iti kāma upādāna diṭṭhupādāna sīla bbata upādāna attavāda upādānāni diṭṭhupādāna ādīni ca ittha tathā pavattā diṭṭhiyā iva kāma upādānam lobho ti dhammataḥ dve upādānāni

original: Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena sattasantāne anusentīti anusayā. Kasmā satteva
analyzed: satta anusayā ti ettha yadi appahīna ṭṭhena satta santāne anusenti iti anusayā kasmā sattā iva

original: vuttā, nanu aññesampi kilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvo vijjatīti? Na mayaṃ appahīnamattena
analyzed: vuttā nanu aññesam pi kilesānam appahīna bhāvo vijjati iti na mayam appahīna mattena

original: anusayaṃ vadāma, kintu appahīnabhāvena thāmagatakilesā anusayāti, thāmagamanañca
analyzed: anusayam vadāma kintu appahīna bhāvena thāma gata kilesāḥ thāma gamanam ca

original: nesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena
analyzed: na isam aññehi asādhāraṇaḥ sabhāvaḥ daṭṭhabbo tathā hi dhamma sabhāva vedinā tathāgatena

original: imeyeva anusayā vuttā, kāmarāgoyeva anusayo kāmarāgānusayo. Evaṃ sesesupi. Apare
analyzed: ime iva anusayāḥ vuttā anusayo kāma rāga anusayo evam sesesu pi apare

original: pana “kāmarāgassa anusayo”tiādinibbacanaṃ vatvā kāmarāgādīnaṃ bījabhūtā attabhāvassa
analyzed: pana kāma rāgassa anusaya uti ādi nibbacanam vatvā kāma rāga ādīnam bīja bhūtāḥ atta bhāvassa

original: kilesasambhūtā kilesuppādanasatti anusayāti vaṇṇenti, tesaṃ matapaṭikkhepo idha papañcāvahattā anāhaṭo.
analyzed: kilesa sambhūtā kilesa uppādana satti anusayā ti vaṇṇenti tesam mata paṭikkhepaḥ idha anāhaṭaḥ

original: Pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto, pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: pāṇassa atipāto pāṇa atipāto pāṇa uti vohārato satto paramatthataḥ jīvitindriyam tasmin

original: pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
analyzed: pāṇe pāṇa saññinaḥ jīvitindriya upacchedaka ppayoga samuṭṭhāpikā vadhaka cetanā pāṇātipātaḥ

original: Parabhaṇḍe tathāsaññino tadādāyakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Asaddhammakāmatāya
analyzed: para bhaṇḍe tathāsaññino tad ādāyaka ppayoga samuṭṭhāpikā theyya cetanā adinnādānam asat dhamma kāma tāya

original: kāyadvārappavattā agantabbaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro. Abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ
analyzed: kāya dvāra ppavattā a gantabba ṭṭhāna vītikkama cetanā kāmesu micchā ācāraḥ abhūtam vatthum

original: bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
analyzed: bhūtataḥ param viññāpetu kāmassa tathā viññāpana ppayoga samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādaḥ

original: So pana parassa atthabhedakarova kammapatho, itaro kammameva. Saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa
analyzed: so pana parassa attha bheda karaḥ uva kamma pathaḥ itaro kammam eva saṃkiliṭṭha cittassa

original: parabhedanakāmatāya, attapiyakamyatāya vā parabhedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā.
analyzed: para bhedana kāma tāya vā para bheda kappayoga samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇa vācā

original: Sāpi dvīsu bhinnesuyeva kammapatho. Paramammacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā ekantapharusacetanā
analyzed: sā api dvīsu bhinnesu yeva kamma patho ekanta pharusa cetanā

original: pharusavācā. Anatthaviññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā saṃkiliṭṭhacetanā samphappalāpo
analyzed: pharusa vācā anattha viññāpana ppayoga samuṭṭhāpikā saṃkiliṭṭha cetanā samphappalāpaḥ

original: nāma. So pana parehi gahiteyeva kammapatho hoti. “Aho vatedaṃ mama hotū”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā
analyzed: nāma saḥ pana parehi kamma pathaḥ hoti aho vata idam mama hotu uti evam parabhaṇḍa abhijjhāyana lakkhaṇā

original: abhijjhā. “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadosalakkhaṇo byāpādo. “Natthi
analyzed: abhijjhā aho vata ayam satto vinasseyya ati evam manaḥ padosa lakkhaṇaḥ byāpādaḥ natthi

original: dinna”ntiādinā nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā micchādiṭṭhi. Ettha ca natthikaahetukaakiriyadiṭṭhīhiyeva kammapathabhedo.
analyzed: dinna nti ādinā nayena viparīta dassana lakkhaṇā micchādiṭṭhi ettha ca kamma patha bhedaḥ

original: Imesu ca pāṇātipātādi tividhaṃ kāyakammameva. Taṃ kāyavacīdvāresuyeva uppajjati,
analyzed: imesu ca pāṇa atipāta ādi tividham kāya kammam eva tam uppajjati

original: na manodvāre. Tathā musāvādādi catubbidhaṃ vacīkammameva. Abhijjhādikaṃ pana tividhaṃ
analyzed: na manaḥ dvāre tathā musāvāda ādi catubbidham vacī kammam eva abhijjhā ādikam pana tividham

original: manokammameva. Taṃ tīsupi dvāresu pavattati. Dvārantaresupi pavattamānassa sakasakanāmāpariccāgo
analyzed: manaḥ kammam eva tam tīsu pi dvāresu pavattati dvāra antaresu pi pavattamānassa saka saka nāma a pariccāgaḥ

original: vuttoyeva. Dhammato cettha ādito satta cetanāsabhāvā, itare tayo cetanāsampayuttāti
analyzed: dhammato ca ittha āditaḥ satta cetanā sabhāvā itare tayo cetanā sampayuttā ati

original: daṭṭhabbā. Mahāsāvajjaappasāvajjappayogādibhedo pana tattha tattha vuttanayena veditabbo.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā mahā sāvajja appa sāvajja ppayoga ādi bhedaḥ pana tattha tattha vutta nayena veditabbo

original: Etānīti imāni maggañāṇāni. Yathāsambhavanti taṃtaṃmaggānurūpaṃ.
analyzed: etāni iti imāni magga ñāṇāni yathā sambhavanti tat tat magga anurūpam

original: Apāyaṃ gacchanti etehīti apāyagamanīyā. Sesāti na apāyagamanīyā. Oḷārikāti tatiyamaggena
analyzed: apāyam gacchanti etehi iti apāya gamanīyā sesā ati na apāya gamanīyā oḷārikā ati tatiya maggena

original: pahātabbāvatthaṃ upādāya oḷārikā. Tenāha “sukhumā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā”ti. Sukhumā
analyzed: upādāya oḷārikā tena āha sukhumā tatiya magga ñāṇa vajjhā ati sukhumā

original: kāmarāgapaṭighāti sambandho. Catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā evāti avadhāraṇena paṭhamamaggādivajjhataṃ
analyzed: kāma rāga paṭighā ati sambandho catuttha magga ñāṇa vajjhā eva ati avadhāraṇena paṭhama magga ādi vajjhatam

original: nivatteti. Na hi rūparāgādīnaṃ apāyagāminiyāvatthāpi atthi, yato te paṭhamañāṇavajjhāpi siyunti.
analyzed: nivattā iti na hi rūpa rāga ādīnam apāya gāminiyā avatthā api atthi yatas te paṭhama ñāṇa vajjhā api siyunti

original: Yattha yattha pana eva-saddena avadhāraṇaṃ akatvā yaṃ yaṃ dutiyañāṇavajjhanti vā
analyzed: yattha yattha pana eva saddena avadhāraṇam a katvā yam yam vā

original: tatiyañāṇavajjhanti vā catutthañāṇavajjhanti vā vakkhati, tattha tattha so so purimañāṇehi
analyzed: tatiya ñāṇa vajjhanti vā catuttha ñāṇa vajjhanti vā vakkhati tattha tattha so so purima ñāṇehi

original: hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo. Tena lobha…pe…
analyzed: hata apāya gamanīya ādi bhāvaḥ u va hutvā upari ñāṇa vajjhaḥ hoti iti veditabbaḥ tena lobha pe

original: catutthañāṇavajjhānīti ettha lobhādayo heṭṭhimamaggavajjhāpi honteva.
analyzed: catuttha ñāṇa vajjhāni iti ettha lobha ādayaḥ heṭṭhima magga vajjhā api hontā iva

original: Yaseti parivāre.
analyzed: yasā iti parivāre

original: Dukkhe sukhanti saññācittavipallāsāti sambandho.
analyzed: dukkhe sukham ti saññā citta vipallāsā ti sambandho

original: Agatiyo paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhāti kiñcāpi chandādayo taṇhādisabhāvā uparimaggavajjhā,
analyzed: agatiyo paṭhama magga ñāṇa vajjhā ti kiñcā api chanda ādayo taṇhā ādi sabhāvāḥ upari magga vajjhā

original: tathāpi tammūlakassa akattabbakaraṇassa, kattabbākaraṇassa ca apāyagamanīyatāya paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā.
analyzed: tathā api tad mūlakassa a kattabba karaṇassa kattabba a karaṇassa ca apāya gamanīya tāya paṭhama magga ñāṇa vajjhā

original: Katākatakusalākusalavisayaṃ yaṃ vippaṭisārabhūtaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ idha tatiyañāṇavajjhaṃ
analyzed: kata akata kusala akusala visayam yam vippaṭisāra bhūtam kukkuccam tam idha tatiya ñāṇa vajjham

original: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana “kukkuccapakatatāya āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ sandhāya
analyzed: vuttam yam pana kukkucca pakata tāya āpattim āpajjati iti vuttam kukkuccam tam sandhāya

original: “kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena pahīyantī”ti dhammasaṅgaṇīaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
analyzed: kukkucca vicikicchā sotāpatti maggena pahīyanti iti dhammasaṅgaṇī aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam

original: tasmā dvinnaṃ vacanānaṃ ayaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo. Aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesu adhippāyova
analyzed: tasmā dvinnam vacanānam ayam adhippāyaḥ veditabbaḥ aññesu pi edisesu ṭhānesu adhippāyaḥ uva

original: pariyesitabbo, na virodhato paccetabbaṃ. Oḷārikānavasesappahānaṃ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa
analyzed: pariyesitabbaḥ na virodhataḥ paccetabbam oḷārika anavasesa ppahānam vā sandhāya kukkuccassa

original: paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā vuttā. Yaṃ pana arahato uppajjamānaṃ “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama tatiya ñāṇa vajjha tā vuttā yam pana arahataḥ uppajjamānam bhagavatā paṭikkhittam

original: anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjitunti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesī”ti
analyzed: anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjitunti kukkuccāyantaḥ na paṭiggahesi iti

original: āgataṃ kukkuccaṃ, na taṃ nīvaraṇaṃ. Na hi nīvaraṇaṃ arahato uppajjati, nīvaraṇapatirūpakaṃ
analyzed: āgatam kukkuccam na tat nīvaraṇam na hi nīvaraṇam arahataḥ uppajjati nīvaraṇa patirūpakam

original: pana kappatīti vīmaṃsanabhūtaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma, taṃ tathāpavattacittuppādova.
analyzed: pana kappati iti vīmaṃsana bhūtam vinayakukkuccam nāma tam

original: Kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā anusahagatā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, oḷārikānaṃ pana dutiyañāṇavajjhatā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva.
analyzed: kāma rāga paṭigha anusayāḥ anu sahagatā tatiya ñāṇa vajjhā oḷārikānam pana dutiya ñāṇa vajjha tā heṭṭhā vutta nayā va

original: Akusalacittuppāda-ggahaṇena cettha makkhapalāsamāyāsāṭheyyathambhasārambhādīnaṃ saṅgaho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: akusala cittuppāda ggahaṇena ca ittha makkha palāsa māyāsa āṭheyya thambha sārambha ādīnam saṅgahaḥ kato ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 1376. Tena tenāti tena tena ghātakena saddhiṃ. Kiṃ panetāni ete dhamme ghātentāni
analyzed: tena tena ati tena tena ghātakena saddhim kim pana itāni ete dhamme ghātentāni

original: atītānāgate ghātenti, udāhu paccuppanneti. Kiṃ panettha, yadi tāva atītānāgate, aphalo
analyzed: atīta anāgate udāhu paccuppanna iti kim pana ittha yadi tāva atīta anāgate

original: vāyāmo āpajjati. Kasmā? Pahātabbānaṃ tadā natthitāya. Atha paccuppanne, tathāpi aphalo

original: vāyāmena saddhiṃ pahātabbānaṃ atthitāya. Athāpi kathañci pahānaṃ siyā, saṃkilesikā

analyzed: a samugghāṭita ttā kāraṇa lābhe sati avassam uppajjana arahā kilesā te attanaḥ uppattiyā

original: anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentāni etāni te anāgate ghātenti nāma.
analyzed: an uppatti dhamma tam āpādentāni etāni te anāgate ghātenti nāma

original: 1377-82. Pariññādīni kiccānīti pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena cattāri kiccāni.
analyzed: pariññā ādīni kiccāni iti pariññā apahāna sacchikiriyā bhāvanā vasena cattāri kiccāni

original: Vuttānīti “dukkhaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā, “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passatī”tiādinā ca
analyzed: vuttāni iti dukkham pariññeyyam tiādinā yaḥ bhikkhave dukkham passati itiādinā ca

analyzed: vuttāni sacca abhisamayā iti catunnam ariya saccānam paṭivijjhana khaṇe

original: Yathāsabhāvatoti aviparītasabhāvena. “Jānitabbānī”ti vatvā kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ,
analyzed: yathā sabhāvataḥ ti aviparīta sabhāvena jānitabbāni iti vatvā katham pana itam jānitabbam

original: kathaṃ nāma ekekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni sambhavanti. Na hi tādisaṃ
analyzed: katham nāma ekekassa ñāṇassa eka kkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni sambhavanti na hi tādisam

original: kiñci loke diṭṭhaṃ atthi, na ca vacanaṃ labbhatīti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya tesaṃ jānanavidhiṃ
analyzed: kiñci loke diṭṭham atthi na ca vacanam labbhati iti codanam manasi nidhāya tesam jānana vidhim

original: upamāvasena tāva dassetuṃ “padīpo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vidaṃsetīti dasseti. Pariyādiyatīti khepeti.
analyzed: upamā vasena tāva dassetum padīpaḥ hi itiādi vuttam vidaṃseti iti dasseti pariyādiyati iti khepeti

original: 1383-4. Pariññābhisamayenāti anavasesato paricchijja jānanasaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena.
analyzed: pariññā abhisamayena ati anavasesataḥ paricchijja jānana saṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena

original: Abhisametīti asammohavasena paṭivijjhati. Pahānābhisamayenevāti samucchedappahānasaṅkhātena
analyzed: abhisameti iti asammoha vasena paṭivijjhati pahāna abhisamayena iva ati samuccheda ppahāna saṅkhātena

original: paṭivijjhanena asammohatova abhisameti. Bhāvanāvidhināti sahajātādipaccayatāvasena
analyzed: paṭivijjhanena asammohataḥ va abhisameti bhāvanā vidhinā ati sahajāta ādi paccaya tā vasena

original: bhāvanābhisamayavidhinā. Maggañāṇañhi sammāsaṅkappādivasena maggapubbabhāgabhāvanāsambhūtena

original: ariyamaggabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena abhisametīti aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ asammohato
analyzed: ariya magga bhāvanā saṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena abhisameti iti aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam a sammohato

original: paṭivijjhati. Tañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ attanipi sammohaṃ viddhaṃsetiyeva.
analyzed: paṭivijjhati tat hi sampayutta dhammesu sammoham viddhaṃsentam attani pi sammoham viddhaṃsetiyā iva

original: Nirodhanti nibbānaṃ. Sacchikarotīti paccakkhakaraṇavasena paṭivijjhati. “Nirodhaṃ
analyzed: nirodhanti nibbānam sacchikaroti iti paccakkha karaṇa vasena paṭivijjhati nirodham

original: sacchikarotī”ti nirodhasaccamekaṃ ārammaṇapaṭivedhena cattāripi saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena
analyzed: sacchikaroti iti nirodha saccam ekam ārammaṇa paṭivedhena cattāri pi saccāni asammoha paṭivedhena

original: maggañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhati.
analyzed: magga ñāṇam paṭivijjhati

original: Evaṃ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṃ ekapaṭivedhaṃ āgamenapi sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi
analyzed: evam yutti vasena vibhāvitam eka paṭivedham āgamena api sādhetum vuttam api cetanti ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti hi “yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi
analyzed: vuttam magga samaṅgissa ñāṇam ti hi yaḥ nu kho āvuso dukkham passati dukkha samudayam pi

original: so passati, dukkhanirodhampi, dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadampi so passatī”ti ekasaccadassanasamaṅgino
analyzed: so passati dukkha nirodham pi dukkha nirodha gāmini paṭipadam pi so passati iti eka sacca dassana samaṅginaḥ

original: aññasaccadassanasamaṅgibhāvavicāraṇāyaṃ tamatthaṃ sādhetuṃ āyasmatā gavampatittherena
analyzed: tam attham sādhetum āyasmatā gavampati therena

original: vuttaṃ. Aññathā kamābhisamaye sati purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādipassato

original: dukkhādidassanaṃ puna avattabbaṃ siyā. Idāni panettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ karonto āha
analyzed: dukkha ādi dassanam puna a vattabbam siyā idāni pana ittha upamā saṃsandanam karontaḥ āha

original: samudayappahānassa andhakāravināsanasadisatā, ñāṇālokaparibrūhanatāya maggabhāvanāya

analyzed: āloka vidaṃsana sadisa tā tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā tathā

original: tathā kilesasnehapariyādānaṃ hotīti nirodhasacchikiriyāya snehapariyādānasadisatā
analyzed: tathā kilesa sneha pariyādānam hoti iti nirodha sacchikiriyāya sneha pariyādāna sadisa tā

original: kāraṇūpacārena vuttā.
analyzed: kāraṇa upacārena vuttā

original: 1385-6. Aparāyapi upamāya tamatthaṃ dassento āha “uggacchanto”tiādi. Obhāsetīti pakāseti.
analyzed: upamāya tam attham dassentaḥ āha uggacchantā iti ādi obhāseti iti pakāseti

original: Paṭihaññatīti paṭippassambheti. Etthāpi yathā sūriyo rūpagatāni obhāseti, evaṃ maggañāṇaṃ

analyzed: dukkham parijānāti yathā andhakāram vināseti evam samudayam pajahati yathā ālokam

analyzed: evam sabba kilesa daratha pariḷāha paṭippassaddhi bhūtam nirodham sacchikaroti iti upamā saṃsandanam daṭṭhabbam

analyzed: sakam sakam phala samāpattim samāpajjanti keci pana anāgāmi arahantaḥ iva samāpajjanti

original: samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāyā”ti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ attanā paṭiladdhasamāpattisamāpajjane
analyzed: samādhismin paripūra kāri tāyai ati vadanti tam akāraṇam attanā paṭiladdha samāpatti samāpajjane

original: phalameva uppajjati, na maggo. Añño eva hi vipassanācāro ariyamaggāvaho, añño phalasamāpattiāvaho.

original: Tathā hi ariyamaggavīthiyaṃ anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṃ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṃ

analyzed: sa atisayam padālanena lokiya ñāṇesu ukkaṃsa pārami pattāni magga anukūlāni hutvā uppajjanti

original: parikammappattāni hutvā uppajjantīti na tesaṃ kutoci vuṭṭhānasambhavo. Yato nesaṃ

analyzed: dhammānam appavatti hi kāmacchanda ādi samucchindanena samādhismiṃ

original: paripūrakāritāya samathaphalasamannāgatattā nirodhaṃ samāpajjanti. Tathā hetaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ
